text: Eu udi mukenji wa nyama ne wa nyunyu ne wa bintu bidi bienda mu mai ne bintu bionso bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba, bua kutahulula bintu bibi ne bintu bimpe, ne bintu bidi ne muoyo binudi mua kudia ne bintu bidi ne muoyo binudi kanuyi mua kudia
Bakabihata ku mesu kua Palô

Mu dituku dibidi nenufile bana balume ba ngombe dikumi ne babidi ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi budi, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Arone uvua musele Elisheba muana wa Aminadabe

Enzelai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue adibo kabayi basonge; nuenu nenuoshilehu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, milambu; nenufile kabidi milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, nenudieku; nenusanke ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Esetê kakanza kumanyisha mukelenge tshisamba tshiandi ne bantu bandi bu muakamuambila Môdekai, bualu bua Esetê wakatumikila dî dia Môdekai bu muakenzeye hakadiye mudiundishibue kudiye

Bakasangana mukandu ku Akemeta mu nsubu wa mukelenge udi mu buloba bua Bena Madai, wakadi mufunda nunku: Mu tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia bukelenge bua mukelenge Kolesha mene, mukelenge Kolesha wakela mukenji eu bua nsubu wa Nzambi wa mu Yelushalema ne: Base nsubu au mu muaba wakadibo bafila milambu, bajadike bishimikidi biandi bikole; bule buabi nebuikale coudées makumi asambombo ne butshiama buabi nebuikale coudées makumi asambombo; base ne milongo ya mabue manene isatu ne mulongo wa mabaya mahia mahia; difutu dia mudimu eu difume mu nsubu wa mukelenge

Biwashiha bantu aba bu mundi umue, hashishe bisamba bionso biakunvua lumu luebe nebiambe ne, Bualu bua Yehowa kakadi ne bukole bua kulua ne bantu aba mu buloba buakahaneye, nunku yeye wakabashiha mu tshihela
Nunku Bena Moaba bakateketa dituku adi ku tshianza tshia Bena Isalele; buloba buakadi talalâ bidimu makumi muanda mukulu
Uye ku tshitupa tshia ku mutu kua misulu tshia Mezopotamiya, kumbelu kua kakuebe Betuyele, muledi wa mamuebe
Bobo batshidi bantu bebe ne buhianyi buebe, bawakahatula ne bukole buebe bunene ne diboko diebe diolola
Nunku yeye ne bantu bandi bonso bakahingana ku buloba buandi
Pashishe neakose muminu wa mbuji wa mpumbu bua mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Bikala umue wabo kayi muakane, udi mulema anyi udi mufofo anyi udi muoneka muaba mukuabo, kanumushihedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bumuka mu Tahate, kuyabu ku Tera
Tamare kuanyisha, umulomba ne: Kadi wanji kungeyeka tshintu bua nshale mutekemene
Bakangata muntu ne muntu bantu bandi, bakuabo bakadi ne bua kubuela dia Lumingu, bakuabo bakadi ne bua kuluhuka dia Lumingu, bakaya kudi Yehoyada, muakuidi wa Nzambi
Hashishe hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu unuha, nenjadike disanka ku mukuna wa Gelizima, ne mulau ku mukuna wa Ebala
Dituku dia muanda mukulu: Ngameliyele, muana wa Pedashure, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Menashe
Yeye udi butumbi buenu, yeye udi Nzambi wenu, wakanuenzela malu manene ne a kukema anuakatangila ku mesu

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia makookeshi makwabo adi Dîyi dikulu ne mêyi ne mikandu akapeesha, Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi kadi katangila, mu tshitupa tshia kumpala ne mu tshitupa tshia ndekeelu, malomba a ditangilula bilumbu bwaalu mbadiâta mêyi ne mikandu ku makasa, malomba mikala atontolola ngenzelu, nkoselu wa bilumbu ne mapangadika a bamfumu ba mbulamatadi munene

Dutelonone Masanka Alualua kudi Batumikidi ba Mikenji Binuananukila kutumikila mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi yonso indi nnuambila lelu, hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuteke ku mutu kua bisamba bionso bia hanshi ha buloba; ne masanka â onso nealue kunudi, neanuhete, binuatumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kadi kanuyi mutantshi mule to
Muaba awu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, neele musenga wa manananshi mu mbabula
Bualu kai nuakushiya mulume ku nyima
Nunku bantu ba mukelenge Hezikiya bakafika kudi Yeshaya
Ebi mbintu bia kujidila n abi tshioshelu, hakelabo manyi ha mutu hatshi
Hashishe Samuele wakamba ne, Nulue kundi ne Agaga, mukelenge wa Bena Amaleka
Davidi wakamuebesha ne, Wewe kuakutshina kulenga muntu wakela Yehowa manyi ha mutu bua kumushiha bua tshinyi
Nudisange bua kuntendelela
Davidi wakambila Abishai ne bantu bandi bonso ne, Monai, muan anyi mulume wakaluhuka munda muanyi udi ukeba muoyo wanyi; nunku Muena Benyamina eu kena mua kutamba kuenza nunku, anyi
Neuhingane tshikondo kai
Kadi tshisamba tshimue netshipite tshikuabu ku bukole
Nanku, Maweja Nangila neanupeshe munyinyi wa nuenu kudia

Dihingana Diabo mu Yelushalema Hashishe bakajuka kudi ba ku mutu kua biota bia batatu ba mu Bena Yuda ne bia batatu ba mu Bena Benyamina, ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi, buonso buabo mene bakadi ne mitshima mitabulushibue kudi Nzambi, bua kuyabo bua kulongolola nsubu wa Yehowa udi mu Yelushalema

Meshobaba ne Yameleke ne Yoasha, muana wa balume wa Amasaya, ne Yoele ne Yehu, muana wa balume wa Yoshibeya, muana wa balume wa Selaya, muana wa balume wa Asiele, ne Eleyehoenai ne Yâkoba ne Yeshohaya ne Asaya ne Adiele ne Yesimiele ne Benaya ne Ziza, muana wa balume wa Shifi, muana wa balume wa Alono, muana wa balume wa Yedaya, muana wa balume wa Shimeli, muana wa balume wa Shemaya; bantu aba batuakutela men abo nunku bakadi bakelenge ba mu meku abo ne ba mu nsubu yabo bakatamba kuyisangana
Nenufike pabuipi ne ditunga dia bena Amone
Kadi ndi mbanda kabidi kudi Maweja Nangila ku mukuna bua kumulomba, misangu mikuabu ne udi mua kungitaba bua kunufuilaku luse, ku tshilema tshienu etshi

Dielulula Bidi Mvidi Mukulu muenzele bena Izrayele Moshe kubikila bena Izrayele bonsu, kubambila ne: Panuvua mu Ejipitu, nuvua badimuene muvua Maweja Nangila mukengeshe mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende, ne bantu bonsu
Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Butoke buenzeke
Nenulongolole nshila, nenutahulule mikalu ya buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi bituha bisatu, bua mushihianganyi yonso anyemenemu

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka , utentemuna ku mudimu ne , padibio bienzeka, umbusha ku mudimu, pa dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene ditangilula mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila : bamwenampala mu matunga meenyi ne batumibwe ba pa bwaabo; bamfumu banene ne bamfumu ba ku mutu kwa bilwilu ne kwa bampulushi ba ditunga, panyima pa dijadika dia Kapangu ka ku mutu kwa bilwilu; Mfumu wa eta majolo mujima, bamfumu ba eta majolo ne bakumanda ba inite minene ya bilwilu, panyima pa dijadika dia Kapangu ka ku mutu kwa bilwilu; balombodi ba ku mutu kwa midimu ya mbulamatadi; bamfumu ba midimu ne nzubu ya mbulamatadi; batumibwe ba mbulamatadi mu kumpanyi ne mu bishimikidi bia ditunga, pa kumbusha batangiludi ba bibutshilu
Ubulabe budimbu munda ne panyima

Kanudi tshintu tshidifuile: nudi mua kuha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu atshi, yeye atshidie; anyi nudi mua kutshihanyisha muntu wa bende; bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kadi wandingi bua tshinyi
Kalongu ka kumpala : Bidi Bitangila Mulombodi wa Ditunga Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi Mfumu wa Mbulamatadi
Pandi meme Maweja Nangila, lubuebue ludi bukole buabu, mbafila mu bianza bia baluishi babu, muluishi umue neatshimune bena Izrayele tshinunu, baluishi babidi nebanyemeshe bena Izrayele binunu dikumi
Kutekaye miendu ayi bimpe bua kutokeshayi kumpala kua tshitekelu tshia miendu
Ebele pende kumulambula banabute ba mikoku mimpe ya mafuta
Ke muvua Yoshuwa mushipe bena Amaleke bonsu, mubabutule nanku
Debola, muena mudimu wa bakashi wa Lebeka, wakafua, bakamujika muinshi mua mutshi munene wa mu Betele, bakabikila muaba au ne, Alonobakuta
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Tshiena mua kunutuala nkayanyi: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakunukumbasha ba bungi, ne monai, lelu nudi bu bungi bua mitoto ya mulu
Hulama wakatula bivuadi ne nkasu ne mpanza
Lulengu elu kaluena lusokoma kundi, luteka mu tshibutshilu tshianyi, anyi
Bobu bavua bamuambila amu kumuambila ne: Kabiena nanku nansha kakese
Udi walamina bu nyama wa ntambue, udi ulala hanshi bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, nganyi neamubishe
Bena Izrayele bonsu bavua bamuindile bangabanga ne kutuadija luendu
Nanku ndi nkutendakena ne: Udianjile kumpala
Tuye kumushiha, tumuele mu mukela mukuabo, netuambe ne, Nyama mubi wakamudia, netumone tshiavuisha bilota biandi
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kwenza mushindu wa kuvudija bûngi bwa mpala ya balema mu bishimikidi bia ditunga dijima, bia polovensa ne misoko
Kadi bushuwa tatu wanyi utshidi ne muoyi anyi
Yozefe kuya kuleja kabidi tatuende Yakobe kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu

Yoshiya Udi Ulengesha Nsubu wa Yehowa Mukelenge wakela dî kudi Hilekiya, muakuidi munene, ne kudi bakuidi ba mu mulongo muibidi ne kudi balami ba nsubu bua bobo bumushe malonga onso a Bâla ne a Bashela ne a kutendelela n au misumba yonso ya mu diulu mu nsubu wa Yehowa; wakayosha ku mpenge kua Yelushalema mu madimi a ku Kidelona; bakaya ne butue buabi ku Betele
Ahaza wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika hohamue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi; Hezikiya, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Bienzedi bia Lehabama bikuabo ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Bimuna bia bena Ejipitu kufua bionsu
Aba mbana ba balume ba Yelamele
Bungi bua bantu bakafua ku disama edi bakadi binunu dikumi ne binai ne nkama muanda mutekete, ha mutu ha bantu bakafua bua bualu bua Kola
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kadi kakenza bu muakenza bakelenge ba Isalele bakadi ku mpala kuandi
Asa ne Bâsha, mukelenge wa Isalele, bakaluangana nvita matuku onso a muoyo wabo
Neamupeshe kabidi nkudimba nansha kamanda nkutshi bu mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Yeye wakamukuata ku tshianza tshiandi, wakamubuesha mu dikalu diandi
Yeye wakadi ne tshiji tshikole nunku munyi
Bantu bakenza bu muakadi mulayi eu

Meme nakamana kulongolola bintu bia mu nsubu wa Nzambi wanyi ne bukole buonso bundi n abu, or ya bintu bia tshiamu tshia or, ne argent ya bintu bia tshiamu tshia argent, ne tshiamu tshia mitaku tshia bintu bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne tshiamu tshifike tshia bintu bia tshiamu tshifike, ne mitshi ya bintu bia mitshi; ne mabue a onyx ne mabue adibo balengesha n au bintu ne mabue a mishindu yonso ne mabue onso a mushinga mukole ne mabue manene matoke a bungi

Ku bintu bidibu bangate kudi bena mvita bavua mu mvita, pa bantu nkama itanu, nungumushile muntu umue, pa nyama nkama itanu, nungumushile nyama umue: ngombe umue, mpunde umue, mukoku umue ne mbuji umue
Ushipe nyama, ulambe biakudia
Mose wakafua argent ya buhikudi buabo kudi Alona ne bana bandi balume bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bua Dana yeye wakamba ne, Dana udi bu muana wa nyama wa ntambue: udi muhika mumuke ku Bashana
Nanku bena Izrayele kumusha bantu bonsu abu mu mitanda yabu
Kîyata bâla eu udi Kîyata yalima kabidi ne Laba; bimenga bibidi ne misoko yabi
Kumuelaye bilengejilu bia mpawungi mu nshingu
Ke mukalenga Balake kutuma bantu kudi Balaame, muana wa Beyore, uvua musombe ku Petore pabuipi ne musulu wa Perate, mu ditunga dia bena Amavi
Kabidi muana wa ku ndelanganyi ya mukaji neaboze mutu webe, wewe pebe neumusume ku tshikankanya

Bobo nebanutshintshimike ku bibi bienu bionso tô ne hahona ngumbu yenu yonso inuakueyemena mu buloba buenu buonso; bobo nebanutshintshimike ku misoko yenu yonso mu buloba buonso budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Angata mashi a mbuji awu, aye nawu muaba wa tshijila menemene, panyima pa tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja
Yeye wakabika mu nkuasa wandi
Bena Isalele bakatshunguluka mu nvita, ne Bena Benyamina bakabanga kubashiha, bantu bu makumi asatu, bamba ne, Bulelela, tudi tubashiha bu mutuakenza diambedi
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubela nyima, upingana kuende
Yeye wakababala mu Bezeke: Bena Isalele bakadi binunu nkama isatu, ne Bena Yuda bakadi binunu makumi asatu
Udimuke ku mpala kuandi, unvue di diandi, kumufuishishi tshiji, yeye kena ukubuikidila bubi buebe bualu bua dina dianyi didi munda muandi

Bukokeshi bua Yehoasha Mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete tshia bukelenge bua Yoasha, mukelenge wa Yuda, Yehoasha, muana wa Yehoaza, wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele mu Samalea; wakabakokesha bidimu dikumi ne bisambombo
Nuleje munudi nunnemeka
Wewe newangate bilulu, uluatshishe Alona tshikowelu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu ha efoda ne efoda ne tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi ne umuele mukaba muluka bilengele wa efoda ku tshimono
Muntu webe udi munkatshi mua bantu bebe bawakusungula: badi bantu banene, kabena mua kubadibua bualu bua bungi buabo
Moshe kumuka ne bantu mu mitanda kusemena ku mukuna bua kumonangana ne Mvidi Mukulu
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Bisamba ebi bidi bituhita bunene, nembihate munyi
Nenkusankishe ne tshintu tshionsu tshiwalomba

Bualu bua wewe wakuamba lelu ne, Baminyampala ne bantu badi tshianana ku mesu kuanyi; ndi ngelangana meji munda ne, Bu Abashaloma muikale ne muoyo, ne bu tuetu bonso bafue, bualu ebu buakadi kunsankisha

Uvuluke ne wewe wakadi muhika mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatulamu ne tshianza tshia bukole ne diboko diandi diolola: nunku Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakalelela mukenji bua wewe uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu
Bantu nebapete muaba wa kuasa, bilondeshile bungi buabu
Nanku angata mupika wanyi ewu, ikale mukajebe
Nunku mukelenge wakela dî kudi Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada; yeye wakaya, wakamushiha, wakafua
Yehowa wakenza bu mu dî dia Mose yeye wakumusha bisumbu bia tuishi kudi Palô ne kudi bena mudimu bandi ne kudi bantu bandi, nansha kishi kamue kakashala

Yehowa wakasomba n enu mpala ha mpala ha mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, Meme nakimana hankatshi henu ne Yehowa tshikondo atshi, bua kunulesha dî dia Yehowa; nuenu nuakatshina bualu bua kahia, kanuakabanda ku mukuna; yeye wakamba ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Nudi bashale bapika ba mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Hashishe, hakalua Bena Yuda kutudi bakadi bashikama ha buihi n abo, bakatuambila misangu dikumi ku nseke yonso ne, Bunudi n abu mbua kuhingana kutudi
Nuenu nuvuluke ne nuakadi bahika mu buloba bua Ejipitu; bua bualu ebu nakunuelela mukenji eu
Nunku Samuele wakaya, wakalala mu muaba wandi kabidi
Nsongalume wandi wakamutua muele, yeye wakafua biandi
Bavua baye kabidi ne bionsu bivuabu basangane mu nzubu ya tshimenga
Pashishe Moshe ne bakulu makumi muanda mutekete ba bena Izrayele, kupingana ku mitanda
Tshidi mwa kusopweesha, mu tshiôtshi nkayatshi, Bukalenga bunene ne polovensa pa malongolola aditshi tshimona akumbana mwa kutanshisha bubanji ne nsombelu wa beena ditunga
Nebupule nzubu awu, bumushe bintu bionsu bivua bimuibaka nabi: mabue, mabaya ne bionsu bivua bishinguila nabi

Enzelai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue adibo kabayi basonge; nuenu nenuoshilehu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, milambu; nenufile kabidi milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, nenudieku; nenusanke ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yai muana mulume wa Manashe wakaya wakanyenga misoko mikuabo wakayidika ne, Hawota y i misoko ya Yai
Yehowa anuleshe luse lujalame ne bulelela; meme kabidi nennufute bua kalolo kenu, bualu bua nuenu nuakenza bualu ebu
Patshiabu dinda, nennuandamune malu onsu adi Maweja Nangila mummanyishe
Mose wakadimusha bantu dituku adi mene ne, Bantu aba nebimane ha mutu ha Gelizima bua kuvudishila bantu disanka hanuasabuka Yadene: Shimeona ne Lewi ne Yuda ne Yisakâ ne Yosefe ne Benyamina
Bena Peleshete bakalua tshikondo tshikuabo, bakamuangalaka mu tshibanda tshia Lefayima
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamueneka kudi mukashi, wakamuambila ne, Tangila, wewe udi nkumba, kuena muanze kulela; kadi wewe newimite difu, neulele muana wa balume
Tangilai, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakateka buloba ku mpala kuenu: yai bienu, nubuhiane, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu; kanutshinyi, kanuikadi ne buowa

Kadi bintu bionso bia mu mai budi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba, bidi mu mai manene anyi mu misulu, bidi bibi kunudi, nebikale bibi kunudi, kanudi munyinyi wa bintu ebi, ne mibidi mifue yabi neyikale bu bintu bibi kunudi

Muntu wakadi muhanduke mu bianza biabo wakaya, wakamanyisha Abalama, Muena Ebelu, wakadi ushikama hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mamale, muena Amole, muan abo ne Eshekola, muan abo ne Ane, bobo bakalamatangana ne Abalama
Bena Yuda bonso bakakudimuna Bena Isalele dî ne, Bualu bua mukelenge udi muikulu wetu wa mu diku dietu; nudi nufuila tshiji bua bualu ebu tshinyi
Yakoba wakanyema mu musokoko, Labana, Muena Alama, kakadi mumanye bualu, yeye kakamuambila ne, Nyaya

Yoshua wakumuka ku Libina ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi n andi; bakalua ku Lakisha, bakasaku tshitudilu ne bakabaluisha; Yehowa wakafila Lakisha mu bianza bia Bena Isalele, wakaunyenga dituku dibidi, wakashiha ku muele wa nvita ne bantu bonso bakadimu, bu muakenzeleye Libina
Yakobe kuimanyika dibue muaba awu, kuela manyi ne maluvu a mulambu pa dibue adi bua kudijidila
Masama onso ne makenga adi kâyi mafunda mu mukanda wa mikenji, Yehowa neanutumineu, tô ne hanuajimishibua
Mvidi Mukulu kuinyika muaba mume ne: Mbuloba, mayi avua madisange ne: Mmayi manene
Kanukengeshi muntu muenyi udi muase mu ditunga dienu
Nanku nenushale ne muoyi; nenuvulangane
Yakobe kubikidisha Leya ne Rakele mu budimi muvuaye ne bimuna biende
Bakashi, bena mutumba n andi, bakamuidika dina, bamba ne, Bakalelela Naomi muana, bakamuidika dina ne, Obeda, nyeye udi tatu wa Yishai, tatu wa Davidi
Nuenu nulonde Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numutshine, nutumikile mikenji yandi, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nulamate kudiye
Nanku banemeke milambu ya tshijila idi bena Izrayele bandambula meme, Maweja Nangila

Hakaya Mose mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kusomba ne Yehowa, hashishe yeye wakunvua Di diakadi diakula n andi ha mutu ha tshibuikidi tshia ha mutu ha mushete wa Nzambi hankatshi ha bakeluba babidi ne yeye wakasomba ne Yehowa
Wenza masosu engelela bu tshiamu tshia mpawungi, uluke kabidi tukaba tukese tubidi tua tshiamu tshia mpawungi menemene tupindakaja bu mionji

Bilamba abi, Arone ne bana bende ba balume babivuale anu padibu babuele mu ntenta wa kusambakena, nansha padibu baye pabuipi ne tshilambuilu tshidi muaba wa tshijila bua mudimu wa butuangaji, nanku butaka buabu kabuakumueneka, kabuena bubakebela lufu to
Kabavua baya kuasa mitanda muaba mukuabu, pavua divuba dishale kuimana pa nzubu wa tshijila
Nzambi wakamba ne, Buloba buvuishe bifukibua bidi ne muoyo bu mudi mishindu yabi, ya bimuna ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi, ne nyama yonso ya ha buloba bu mudi mishindu yai, bualu buakenjibua

Bualu budi Bena Isalele ne Bena Lewi n abu mbua kulua ne milambu ya bintu bidibo bakuha bia blé ne ya nvinyo mihia mihia ne ya manyi mu nsubu idi bintu bia tshijila, ne kudi bakuidi badi benza mudimu, ne kudi batuadi ne kudi bimbi ba misambu; katuena tulekela nsubu wa Nzambi wetu
Padiye upingaja makuta, udi wangata budimi buende
Kadi, tshiena mbingisha muntu udi mupile
Panuabenga kupikula muanabute awu, numutshibule nshingu
Mamuende wa Rebeka, ne muanabu ne Rebeka, kuandamunabu ne: Nsongakaji anji ashale kabidi matuku dikumi
Nuikale nundambula mulambu wa mushindu ewu kashidi ne ndelanganyi yenu yonsu
Pashishe divuba dinene kumueneka ku mukuna

Bakokeshi bakalua ne mabue a onyx ne mabue makuabo a kuteka mu efoda ne mu tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, ne manyi ne bintu bia dihembu dimpe bia kuela mu manyi, ne manyi a muinda ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne manyi adi atua dihembu
Yosefe wakalota tshilota, wakatshiawila bana babo, bobo bakatamba kuikala n andi lukuna
Neanuendeshe diakalenga ku midimu yenu yonsu
Ahazaya, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Nudi balekela bana ba balume ne muoyi bua tshinyi
Bakambilangana ne, Tuyai kuasa musoko ne tshibumba tshile, musonga watshi neufike mulu mu matutu tuikale ne dina dia butumbi, bua katutangadiki ha buloba buonso
Bimuna biabo bionso ne bintu biabo bionso ne nyama yabo yonso kabiena bikale bu bietu, anyi

Kadi biahidiabo ditalala, ne bialuanganabo n enu, hashishe nenubatshintshimike; ne hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu aba mu bianza bienu, nenushihe balume bonso ne miele ya nvita; kadi bakashi ne bana bakese ne bimuna ne bintu bionso bia mu musoko, nenudiangatshile ebi; nuenu nenudie bintu bionso bia badi n enu lukuna, bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe
Mose wakamba ne, Bantu bandi n abo badi bena nvita binunu nkama isambombo, ne wewe wakuamba ne, Nembahe munyinyi, bua bobo badie ngondo mujima

Nshobo ya kumudilu yakakuata Yehoyada, mibidi yakakuata Yedaya; misatu yakakuata Halima, mmai yakakuata Seolima, mitanu yakakuata Malakiya, Disambombo yakakuata Miyamina, ya muanda mutekete yakakuata Hakosa, ya muanda mukulu yakakuata Abiya, ya tshitema yakakuata Yeshua, ya dikumi yakakuata Shekanya, ya dikumi ne umue yakakuata Eleyashiba, ya dikumi ne ibidi yakakuata Yakima, ya dikumi ne isatu yakakuata Hupa, ya dikumi ne inai yakakuata Yeshebaba, ya dikumi ne itanu yakakuata Bilega, ya dikumi ne isambombo yakakuata Imê, ya dikumi ne muanda mutekete yakakuata Hezî, ya dikumi ne muanda mukulu yakakuata Hapisese, ya dikumi ne tshitema yakakuata Petahiya, ya makumi abidi yakakuata Yehekezele, ya makumi abidi ne umue yakakuata Yakina, ya makumi abidi ne ibidi yakakuata Gamula, ya makumi abidi ne isatu yakakuata Delaya, ya makumi abidi ne inai yakakuata Mâzaya
Ei idi nyama mudi mua kudia: ngombe ne mukoko ne mbushi, mbashi ne kabuluku ne ntole ne mbushi wa ha mpata, ne lusumbi, ne ngulungu ne mukoko wa mu mikuna
Bialua mukuenu muntu muhele, biahaneye tshituha tshia buloba buandi, ne bialua bana babo bua kubuhikula, badi mua kuhikula buloba buakahanabo kudi muan abo
Yakobe udi uluangana ne Mvidi Mukulu Butuku abu, Yakobe ubika, kuangataye bakaji bende babidi, ne bana bende dikumi ne umue
Gideona wakamanya ne, Yeye udi muanjelo wa Yehowa; Gideona wakamba ne, Aka, Mukelenge Yehowa
Mayi a tshipupu Musangu uvua mayi a tshipupu uwuja buloba, Nowa uvua ne bidimu nkama isambombu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Hamana wakambila mukashi wandi Zeleshe ne balunda bandi bualu buonso buakamukuata
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Lua biebe, nenkuleshe muaba mukuabo, bumue Nzambi neitabushe bua wewe ubangelele mulau ku muaba au
Kumupukilaye
Nubivuluke, nubienze; bualu ebu budi lungenyi luenu ne budimu buenu ku mesu kua bantu badi bunvua mikenji ei yonso, badi bamba ne, Bulelela, bantu aba banene badi ne lungenyi ne budimu
Lubuebue alu ludi mu ditunga dia Kenaane, mu buloba bua Makpela, pabuipi ne Mambre
Kabidi uvua mumuangalajilamu bantu pa buloba bujima
Ukebe muntu awu
Yeye wakambila Gehazi, muena mudimu wandi, ne, Bikila Muena Shunema eu
Nuenu bena Izrayele, kanupepeji dina dianyi dia tshijla to
Eleyasafa, muana mulume wa Deuele, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Gada
Wakosha nsubu wa Yehowa ne nsubu wa mukelenge ne nsubu minene yonso ya mu Yelushalema mu kahia

Musambu wa Davidi bua Disakidila Dituku adi Davidi wakadianjila kuela mukenji bua kusakidilabo Yehowa kudi Asafa ne bana babo ne musambu eu, ne, Nusakidile bienu Yehowa, nubikile dina diandi, numanyishe bienzedi biandi munkatshi mua bukua bantu
Ke muvua Yakobe mutungunuke ne madilu a muanende Yozefe nanku
Dina dia muanabu ne Yabale divua Yubale
Hashishe Abalahama wakahingana kudi bansongalume bandi, bakabika, bakaya bonso hohamue ku Be sheba, Abalahama wakashikama mu Be sheba
Kadi baleleshi bavua batshina Mvidi Mukulu
Yeye wakakosa mutshi, wakawela mu mai, ne tshisui tshiakalelemuka
Hakalua nyuma mubi mufume kudi Nzambi kudi Shaula, hashishe Davidi wakangata tshisanji, wakatshimba ne tshianza tshiandi: Shaula wakadi usangala, wakalua bimpe, ne nyuma mubi wakumuka kudiye
Bena Isalele bakambila Bena Hiwi ne, Bumue nuenu nudi ba munkatshi muetu, nunku netuhunge n enu tshihungidi munyi
Ngulube kena muakane kunudi, bualu bua udi ne mikono mihanduluke, kadi kena uhingishilula bintu mukana
Nunku Mose wakafunda musambu eu dituku adi, wakauyisha Bena Isalele

Yeye wakafunda mikanda ya kuhenda n ai Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ne ya kumudiula n ai, wamba ne, Bu muakadi nzambi ya bisamba bia mu maloba makuabo kayiyi ne bukole bua kuhandisha bantu mu bianza bianyi, nunku Nzambi wa Hezikiya kena mua kuhandisha bantu bandi mu tshianza tshianyi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Bena Yuda nebaye; monai, nakafila buloba mu bianza biabo
Bena Amaleka ne Bena Kanâna badi bashikama mu tshibanda, makelela nuhingane, yai mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze
Hakabuela Elisha mu nsubu, wakasangana muana mufue muladika ha bulalu buandi
Eyowa, Meme Maweja Nangila ndi ne tshiiji tshikole, tshidi tshifika too ne mu kandondu ka bafue
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakahingisha muan abo Eleyakima mu bukelenge bua Yuda ne Yelushalema; wakamuidika dina ne Yehoyakima
Kulondolola Balami ba Bibi ne Batangidi Mudimu wa balami ba bibi: ba Bena Kola, Meshelemeya, muana wa Kole, wa bana ba Asafa
Batentekedi aba bakamona muntu ufuma mu musoko, bakamuambila ne, Tudi tukusengelela ne utuleshe tshibuelelu tshia mu musoko, ne tuetu netukufuile luse

Numanye bienu lelu ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi uya ku mpala kuenu udi bu kahia kadi kabutula bionso; yeye nembashihe, neabahoneshe ku mpala kuenu: nunku nenubihate, nembajimishe lubilu, bu muakanuambila Yehowa
Muanjelo wa Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Angata munyinyi ne mikata idi kayiyi ne luevene, ubiteke ha mutu ha dibue edi, witshikishe nsuhu
Dielulula Bena diakalenga Nuenu bitabe Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bakumbaje bimpe mikenji yende yonsu indi nnumanyisha lelu eyi, nenuikale bena diakalenga bapite bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba
Bena Sulia ne Bena Isalele kabakaluangana nvita tô bidimu bisatu
Tshintu tshionso tshia dikumi tshia ngombe anyi tshia mikoko bidibo babala netshikale tshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Ku ndekelu nebafuile mu tshimuangi
Nâmana wakamba ne, Biwabenga, ndi nkusengelela ne, Bahe muntu webe maloba bu majitu adi mpunda ibidi mua kuambula; bualu bua muntu webe kena ufila mulambu kudi nzambi mukuabo, anu kudi Yehowa
Bua Dana yeye wakamba ne, Dana udi bu muana wa nyama wa ntambue: udi muhika mumuke ku Bashana
Moshe ne Arone kuboya butu bua muiku, kuya nabu kumpala kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Hakebesha Davidi Yehowa, yeye wakamuambila ne, Kubandi; ya ha nyima habo, ufike kudibo ha buludiludi ne mitshi ya mûr
Kanutemeshi kahia mu matshika enu onso dituku dia Lumingu
Ulekele bantu banyi baye kuntendelela
Kubambilaye ne: Lambulayi Mvidi Mukulu wenu milambu anu mu ditunga emu
Kadi mesu enu akatangila malu manene onso akenza Yehowa
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakulua tshihi, anyi
Wewe newikale udima, kadi buloba kubuyi butoloka bintu bia nsongu
Kundombi bualu ebu kabidi to
Bavua ba bungi, kabidi banene bale, bu muvua ndelanganyi ya Anake
Meme ndi mua kukuenzela bibi
Hashishe yeye wakambila Zêba ne Salemuna ne, Bantu banuakashiha ku Tabô bakadi ba mushindu kai
Kadi too ne mpindiewu, Maweja Nangila kena muanji kunupesha lungenyi lua kujingulula bionsu bivua bienzeka ebi to
mianda ya nzubu ya mu tshimenga ne ya mu musoko, ya bulongolodi ne bulami bwa njila ne bintu bia tshibûngi bia polovensa ne misoko;
Bule bua tshilulu tshimue buakadi coudées makumi asatu, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées anai bilulu dikumi ne tshimue biakadi ne luidi lumue
Bantu bonsu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Dane badi
Mmumue ne: dituku dimue nedienze tshidimu tshijima tshia tshibawu
Bobo kabanyangishi bintu bia tshijila Nakafila Bena Isalele kudi Yehowa, bua kabatekedi bantu bujitu bua bubi bua bakuidi hadia bakuidi bintu bia tshijila bia bantu meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila

Ka, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ujadike ne muntu webe Davidi tatu wanyi mulayi uwakamuha ne, Wewe kuena uhanga muntu wa kushikameye ku mesu kuanyi mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Isalele; bikala bana bebe badimuke mu nshila yabo ku mpala kuanyi bua kuendabo bu muwakuenda ku mpala kuanyi
Bualu malongesha abu a pa malu a Mvidi Mukulu avua makandike bena Ejipitu bua kudiila pamue ne bena Ebrewu
Biamu bitoke bia mushinga mukole bivua bena Izrayele bavuabu babadike balambule, bivua kilo
Bafile kabidi muana wa ngombe mulume, kabidi ne muana wa mukoku wa tshidimu tshimue, kayi ne bulema, bua kubilambula Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa kuosha
Tuetu tudi bakese, bobu badi ba bungi
bulongolodi bwa dishintakaja dia kashintu

Haleha bidimu bisatu nuenu nempatule tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso biakakumbana tshidimu atshi, nenutshiteke ku mbelu kuenu; ne Bena Lewi, bualu bua bobo kabena ne tshituha anyi buhianyi kunudi, ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi ku mbelu kuenu nebalue, nebadie, nebukute; nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Bena Ashure nebanukuate mu bupika
Shafana secrétaire wakambila mukelenge ne, Hilekiya, muakuidi munene, wakumpesha mukanda

Kanubueshi muntu mukuabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa mene, anu bakuidi ne Bena Lewi badi ne mudimu wabo; bobo nebabuele bualu bua bobo badi bantu ba tshijila; kadi bantu bonso bakuabo batumikile mukenji wa Yehowa
Kadi nulame meyi ne mikenji yanyi, bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Naomi wakambila mamuen andi ne, Yehowa udi kayi ulekela kalolo kandi kudi badi ne muoyo ne badi bafue amusankishe
Bualu bua Yehowa wakasungula Bena Lewi munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kunuenzela mudimu mu dina dia Yehowa, ne yeye ne bana bandi balume tshiendelele
Pashishe boshe ngombe awu mujima, yeye mutangile
Hakatshimonabo, Bena Isalele bakakemangana ne, Etshi ntshinyi
Ke muvuabu banualamina mu njila, nuenu bamane kupungila bikole
Uteke tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Tshiena muhunge n enu nuenu nkayenu tshihungidi etshi ne kuditshiha eku, kadi ne muntu yonso udi muimane ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, lelu, ne muntu yonso udi kayi muimane n etu lelu
Umpeshe bua meme kudia
Pinganayi ku midimu yenu

Kadi bikala mulume usangakena ne mushikankunde udi mubangila kudi mulume mukuabo mu budimi, udi umuakuata ku bukole, udi ulala n andi, anu mulume wakalala n andi neafue biandi; kadi kanuenji mushikankunde bualu; yeye kena muenze bualu bubi budibo mua kumushihela; bualu ebu budi bu muntu udi uhika ku mpala kua muena mutumba n andi udi umushiha; bualu bua yeye wakasangakena n andi mu budimi; ne mushikankunde mubangila kudi mukuabo wakadila, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kumusungila
Mutuangaji neambule mulambu wa kukobolola nawu muntu awu
Mulùme wakanda undi musele, ucidi kwàbù, Kulonga kalasa wa kujikija mukanda, Udi anu ukèba mudimu wa kwètù, Tudi pembe basombe kuzubu kwa baledi
Kadi bilema binudi nuenza mu mudimu wenu wa butuangaji nebitangile anu wewe Arone ne ndelanganyi yebe
Neumukume ne mabue, neumushihe; bualu bua yeye wakakeba mua kunusesuisha mu nshila wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Igale, muana wa Yozefe, wa mu tshisamba tshia Isakare
Enza tukoho binai tua ha tshitekelu bu bilongo bia amande ne mahu atshi ne bilongo bia tshi
Nsongakaji kumuambila kabidi ne: Kumbelu kuetu kudi muaba wa nuenu kulala, kudi kabidi bisosa bivule bia kuladika nyama ne bia kuyidisha

Asa wakadila kudi Yehowa Nzambi wandi, wakamba ne, Yehowa, kakuena mukuabo bu wewe udi mua kukuatshisha badi ne bukole ne badi kabayi ne bukole; utukuatshishe, Yehowa Nzambi wetu; bualu bua tuetu tudi tukueyemena, tuakuluila mu dina diebe bua kuluangana ne tshisumbu etshi tshinene
Bamuteke ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, ne ku nyima nebamuhingishe kabidi
Neanupe ditunga dijima divuaye mulaye bankambua benu

Ahazaya wakakuluka mu tusoso tua mabaya a madidishi a ku nsubu wandi wa kulu wa mu Samalea, wakasama; wakabikila ba messager bandi, wakabambila ne, Yai bienu kudi Bâla zebuba, nzambi wa mu Ekelona, numuebeshe ne, Meme nensangale ku disama edi, anyi
Ahaza wakaya ku Damaseke bua kusangileye ne Tigelata pilesê, mukelenge wa Ashû; wakatangilaku tshioshelu tshiakadi mu Damaseke
Rebeka uvua nsongakaji muimpe, wengelela
Bâsha wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu Tîsa; Ela, muan andi mulume, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Patshi wabu bapatula Tamare pa mbelu, kutuminaye tatuende muenu mukenji ne: Joja bintu abi: tshitampi, nshinga ne dikombu mbia muena difu dindi muimite
Kulondolola Bukokeshi bua Amasaya Bak

Mikenji ya bena Levi Malu makuabu tuasakidila: Mushinga wa malaya Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele mikenji idi ilonda eyi ne: Padi muntu mulaye Maweja Nangila bua kumulambula muntu, udi mua kukumbaja dilaya diende pa kufuta bungi kampande bua nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, pa mutu pa muntu awu: bilondeshile mishinga eyi: Bua muntu mulume wa bidimu makumi abidi too ne ku makumi asambombu, nebafute Maweja Nangila nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole makumi atanu, bilondeshile tshipimu tshia nkanu tshia muaba wa tshijila
Ushikame n anyi, wikale bu tatu ne muakuidi kundi, nenkuhe bituha bia argent dikumi ku tshidimu ku tshidimu ne bilulu bia kuluata ne bia kudia biebe

Nvita yakadi mu Gata kabidi, kuakadi muntu munene wakadi ne minu ne bana ba makasa makumi abidi ne binai, minu isambombo ku tshianza ne ku tshianza, ne bana ba makasa basambombo ku dikasa ne ku dikasa; wakaledibua kudi muntu wa nfiondo
Bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua ne bidi bidikoka hanshi kabiena biakane kunudi; kanubidi
Bualu Maweja Nangila mmumane kumvua lumu lua buenzayi bua bena tshimenga etshi, mututume bua kutshibutula
Betasheba wakatua mpala wandi hanshi, wakakukuila mukelenge
Bakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Isalele, bualu ebu buakulua munyi, bua tshisamba tshimue katshiyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele lelu
Amrame uvua musele Yokebede, muana wa Levi, mulelela mu Ejipitu
Hadada wa kafua, ne Samala wa ku Maseleka, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Hashishe Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakaya, wakamuhonesha, wakamushiha; wakajikibua mu nsubu muandi wa mu tshihela

Kanubengi muenyi anyi bana ba nshiya dilumbulula didi diakane; kanuangatshi bilulu bia mukashi wa mu lufuila bu tshieya: nuvuluke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhikula: bua bualu ebu nakunuelela mukenji eu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Yehu Udi Ushiha Ahazaya Kul
Ke mushindu uvua bena Izrayele benza bua kukuata ditunga, divua Maweja Nangila mubapeshe
Kanudi munyinyi wa nyama ei, kanulengi tshianza ham bidi hai, kayena miakane kunudi
Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi kafikisha dimanyisha edi ku buludiki bwa bitadi
Kadi Yehowa wakabenga bua kubutula Bena Yuda, anu bualu bua muntu wandi Davidi, bualu bua wakamulaya bua kumushileye bana bandi muinda tshiendelele

Bakenza biluwa bia ku mbelu kua ntempelo ku mitshi ya olive; bunene buabi buakadi bu tshituha tshinai tshia tshimanu tshia nsubu; bakenza bibi bibidi bia mitshi ya cyprès; bakenza tshibi tshimue ne mabaya abidi ne tshikuabo ne mabaya abidi
Edi ndisanka dia Yuda; wakamba ne, Yehowa, unvua dî dia Yuda, ulue n andi kudi bantu bandi: bianza biebe bimukoleshe, wikale mukuatshishi wandi kudi bena lukuna
Mikenji ei kayena dishiya dia mai manene, bua nuenu nuambe ne, Nganyi watusabukila dishiya dia mai manene bua kulua n ai kutudi ne bua kutunyuisha bua tuetu kuyenza
Kalongu kinâyi : Bidi bitangila Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshiabanyi tshia mpetu ne bintu
Kanungu ka Beena Kongo bônso badi ne bukookeshi bwa kusanka ne bubanji bwa mu ditunga
Nsubu eu udi munene, muntu yonso wahitaku neakeme, wamba ne, Yehowa wakenzela buloba ebu ne nsubu eu nunku bishi
Moshanganyi wa kapia, bamoshe kende
Kanungu ka Mêyi a maalu a mpetu adi aleeja makookeshi ne majitu a Mbulamatadi
Bumuka ku Arada, kuyabu ku Makelote
Ebere kulela bana ba balume babidi: muanabute dina diende Pelega, bualu mu matuku ende ke muvua ditapulukangana dituadija munkatshi mua bantu
Panuikala banange Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, panuenza anu mudiye musue, panuakumbaja mikenji yonsu indi nnuambila eyi, yeye neadiundishe ditunga dienu
Bakamutandisha bikole

Kanushihi milambu ya kuhita kua Yehowa munda mua misoko idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe; anu mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi, nenushihe milambu ya kuhita kua Yehowa dilolo habuela diba, ha diba mene dinuakahatuka mu Ejipitu
Yakoba wakadi ne Lakele tshiji, wakakonka ne, Meme ndi bu Nzambi udi mujidike munda muebe ne, Kuledi, anyi
Nunku bubidi buabo bakahingana ku Beteleheme Hakaluabo ku Beteleheme bena musoko bonso bakadi basasakata bualu buabo bamba ne, Eu nNaomi, anyi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Enza biebe nyoka ne mubidi bu kahia, umuteke kulu kua mutshi, nunku hamutangila mundi musumibue, neikale ne muoyo
Bantu aba nebimane ha mutu ha Ebala bua kuela bantu mulau: Lubena ne Gada ne Ashe ne Zebuluna ne Dana ne Nafatale

Malu a Mukelenge Wabo Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hanuabuhiana, bakashikamamu, hanuamba ne, Tudisunguile mukelenge bua kuteka ku mutu kuetu bu bisamba bikuabo bidi bituela munkatshi; nenutekele mukelenge ku mutu kuenu anu yeye udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula; nutekele anu wa munkatshi mua bana benu bu mukelenge wenu; kanuteki muenyi udi kayi muan enu ku mutu kuenu
Ke muvuaye musue kusela Mahalata muana wa Ismayele
Kadi Hamana wakaya ku nsubu wandi lubilu, udila muadi ne mutu wandi mubuikila tshilulu
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe bu lusenga lua ku muelelu wa mayi manene, ludi muntu kayi mua kubala
Yoaba ne muan abo Abishai bakalonda Sheba, muana wa Bikili
Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakafila Sihona ne bantu bandi bonso mu bianza bia Bena Isalele, ne bobo bakabashiha; nunku Bena Isalele bakangata buloba bua Bena Amole, bantu ba ku luseke alu

Yehowa wakamufila buloba buonso bua Gilada tô ne ku Dana, ne buloba buonso bua Nafatale, ne bua Efelayima ne Manashe ne buloba buonso bua Yuda tô ne ku mai manene a ku nyima, ne buloba bua ku Sude, ne mpata wa mu tshibanda tshia Yeleko, musoko wa mabue, tô ne ku Soâ
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Nenudie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku asambombo; ne dituku dia muanda mutekete nedikale dia tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; kanuenji mudimu nansha
Davidi wakamanya ne, Shaula udi ungelela tshifulu: nunku yeye wakabikila Ebeyatâ muakuidi, wakamuambila ne, Lua kundi ne efoda
Bakambila Abimeleke ne, Bantu bonso bakadi mu tshibumba tshia mu Shekeme bakadisangisha hamue
Yeye wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Biakonka bana benu batatu abo mu matuku atshidi ku mpala ne, Mabue â ntshinyi
Nunku tuakashikama mu tshibanda tshitangilangane ne Bete peô
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Numanye ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neakengeshe bisamba bionsu binudi nutshina ebi anu mushindu awu
Hakamona bantu ba Hadadezê ne, Tuakutambibua bukole kudi Bena Isalele, bakanvuangana ne Davidi, bakamukuatshila mudimu; Bena Sulia bakahidia kukuatshisha Bena Amona kabidi
Ubakuatshishe, batshimune baluishi babu
Padiye muenza nanku, bintu bionsu bivua mu nzubu nebishale kabiyi bipie mikiya to
dilongolola dia mishindu ya kusonsoloja ne ya kukuba mapa a muntu yônso ne budikadidi bwa nshindameenu bujaadika mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi;
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Ebu mbuloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba ne, Nembuhe tunkanunuina tuenu, nakukuleshabu ne mesu ebe, kadi wewe kuena usabukaku
Bana balume ba Eliezê bakadi Lehabeya kahita; Eliezê kakadi ne bana bakuabo nansha; kadi bana ba Lehabeya bakadi ba bungi
Ushaleku too ne pajika tshiji tshia mukuluebe Esawu
Bumuka mu Almone Diblatayime, kuyabu ku mikuna ya Abarime, ivua mitangilangane ne mukuna wa Nebo
Nenuenzeleku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue, kanuoshi tshiamu ha mutu hau

Nuangate kabidi mulambu wa Yehowa kudi bantu bakaya mu nvita mundi umue ku bantu nkama itanu, ne umue wa ngombe ne wa nyama wa mpunda ne wa mikoko kabidi, nutshiangate kudi tshituha tshiabo, nutshine kudi Eleazâ muakuidi bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa

Kanuikadi ne kansungusungu hanualumbulula bilumbu; nunvue dî dia muntu mukese ne dia muntu munene muomumue; kanutshinyi mpala wa muntu; bualu bua kulumbulula kua bilumbu kudi kua Nzambi: tshilumbu tshidi tshihita bukole, nulue n atshi kundi, meme nentshiunvue
Bena Isalele ne Bena Peleshete bakela mualu wa nvita, mulongo ne mulongo
Nuvuluke kabidi ne meme ndi bu mufuba wa mifuba yenu ne bu musunyi wa misunyi yenu
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu neanulame, anupingaje mu ditunga dia bankambua benu
Pashishe nenuambile Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu ne: Maweja Nangila wanyi, ndi mukumbaje mikenji yebe yonsu

Hakimita bimuna bikole mafu, Yakoba wakateka mitshi ei ku mpala kuabi mu mai, bua bimuna bimite mafu ku mpala kua mitshi, kadi hakatshidi bimuna bitekete, yeye kakateka mitshi, nunku bimuna bitekete biakadi bia Labana ne bimuna bikole biakadi bia Yakoba
Kabidi meyi ne mikandu bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bivua bikandika bua kabasumbishi madimi abu
Hashishe mukelenge wa Isalele wakabikila kahita, wakamuambila ne, Lua ne Mikaya, muana wa Yimela, lubilu
Lelu nembange kubuesha buowa ne ditshina mu mitshima ya bantu bonso badi muinshi mua diulu, badi bunvua lumu luenu: ne hunvuabo, nebazakale ne mitshima yabo nebanyingalale bualu buenu
Matuku a kunowa akumbana, Kayine kulambula Maweja Nangila biakudia bia mu madimi ende
Manashe wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi atanu ne bitanu
Nanku nubanjije mu bukalenga amu muntu udi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu nkayende musungule
Yeye wakamba ne, Hakadi muana ne muoyo, nakajila bia kudia, nakadila, nakadikonka munda ne, Udi mumanye ne, Yehowa kena unfuila luse, bua muana ikale ne muoyo nganyi
Kadi nuenu bena Izrayele too ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, nulonde mikenji yanyi ne meyi anyi bindi nnupesha
Bualu kai Yehowa udi ulua n etu ku buloba ebu bua kutushihesha ku miele ya nvita

Bena Isalele aba bakatuma Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ muakuidi, kudi Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe, bakamutuma ne bukelenge dikumi, mukelenge wa ku tshisamba mukelenge wa ku tshisamba; muntu ne muntu wakadi ku mutu bua binunu bia meku a Bena Isalele a mu tshisamba tshiandi
Arone kutua munu wende mu mashi awu, kualaba ku matumba matalame avua ku tshilambuilu
Ke Yozefe kulayangana ne mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kutuadija kuendakana, utangila midimu mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Neabafile kunudi, bua mbatshimune bonsu, nubabutule
Mvidi Mukulu kufuka tshibuashibuashi bua kupandulula mayi adi muinshi ne adi mulu
Nuenu nenusankishibue ku mutu kua bantu bonso: nansha mulume nansha mukashi munkatshi muenu anyi munkatshi mua bimuna bienu nebikale nkumba
Padibu balambile munyinyi awu mu luesu lua dibumba, kujika, babishipe
Nakukuenzela bualu bubi kai, bua wewe wakunvuisha ne bantu banyi mu bualu bubi bunene nunku
Bualu pavua Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa diulu, mumpatule mu ditunga dietu ne mu diku dia baledi banyi, uvua mundaye bua kupesha ndelanganyi yanyi ditunga edi
Nunku nakabalengesha kudi bantu ba bende bonso, nakasungila bakuidi ne Bena Lewi midimu yabo, muntu ne muntu mu mudimu wandi, ne bua milambu ya nkunyi, ku misangu yakasungulabo, bua mamuma a diambedi
Nebateke kabidi pa mutu pa bionsu ebi tshilamba tshifikuluke tshienza ne miosa ya nyama
Matempu ne ngombe ebi, nebakuate nabi mudimu bua ntenta wa kusambakena
Pashishe kuamiaminaye kabidi bana bende ba balume, ne ku bilamba biabu
Balaame mumane kuamba nanku, kupinganaye kuabu
Bishala ditoba ditoke mu muaba umue, kadiyi ditampakane mu dikoba, etshi ntshiuja tshiakadiosheye ne kahia, ne muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, etshi ntshibangu tshia kahia
Bantu bonsu aba badi mua kushala bantu benu
Yeye wakamuebesha ne, Biabenga Yehowa kukukuatshisha, ndi mua kukukuatshisha kudi kunyi

Bakatshitekahu milongo ya masoso a mabue mai mu mulongo wa kumudilu bakateka mabue a sardoine ne topaze ne émeraude, mu mulongo muibidi mabue a rubis ne saphir ne calcédoine, mu mulongo muisatu mabue a opale ne agate ne améthyste, mu mulongo muinai mabue a chrysohthe ne onyx ne jaspe
Seruga mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi asatu, kulelaye Nahore
Hashishe Yeholama wakasabuka ne tupitene tuandi ne makalu onso akadiye n au; bakajuka butuku, bakashiha Bena Edome bakadi babanyunguluka ne tupitene tua makalu
Lote kuya kuasa mitanda yende mu bimenga bia mu mpata wa Yardene, wendakana ne bimuna biende too ne ku Sodome
Bualu bua wewe neutangile buloba budi ku mpala kuebe; kadi kuena ubuela mu buloba bundi mpa Bena Isalele
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen

Kanudi mampa adi ne luevene ne mulambu eu; nenudie n au mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mbia kudia bia tshivulukidi tshia dikenga; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu lubilu; nunku numuke dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu matuku onso a muoyo wenu

Hashishe, nulonde ku nyima kuandi, ne yeye nealue, neashikame mu nkuasa wanyi wa bukelenge, bualu bua yeye neikale mukelenge mu muaba wanyi: nakamusungula mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele ne kua Bena Yuda
Mudimu wa tshipwita wa ditunga anyi wa tshipwita mukulumpa udi ubengangana ne midimu idibo bafidila mafutu kudi Ditunga dia beenyi anyi kudi bulongolodi bwa bukwa matunga
Ba bana ba Uziele: Mika; ba bana ba Mika: Shamî
Ismayele uvua muana wa Abrahame

Bena Holi bakashikama mu Sei diambedi, kadi Bena Esau bakabalonda ku nyima; bakabashiha ku mpala kuabo, bakashikama mu muaba wabo; bu muakenza Bena Isalele ku buloba bua buhianyi buabo, buakabahebua kudi Yehowa
Bantu bakadi benda mu makalu ne ha nyima ha tubalu bakaya n andi, tshisumbu tshinene be

Davidi wakaditshiha ne, Tatu webe udi mumanye ne, Meme nakasangana luse ku mesu kuebe ne yeye udi wamba ne, Yonatana kimanyi bualu ebu, anyi yeye neanyingalashe mutshima wandi; kadi bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mutshima webe ne muoyo anu katuha kihi kadi kashala hankatshi hanyi ne lufu
Kadi muanenu kena ne bua kunupingajilawu to

Kanungu ka Bibambalu biônso bibidi bidi bitwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene pa mianda eyi: a lwendu lwa kulonda mu diakajilula dia Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila tunungu twa too ne ku twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; b dianyisha dia diludika ne dikuba dia ditunga pa lukasa kudi bilwilu ne dieelangana dia mvita bilondeshila tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; c diteeleja dia muyuki wa Mulombodi wa ditunga pa ngikadilu wa mianda ya Ditunga bilondeshila kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi ; d diteeka dia bantu basatu beena Kabadi komekela mianda ya Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi
Yonsu wa kudibu kuangata tshiamu tshiende tshia musenga wa kamonya, kuelamu makala a kapia, kabidi ne manananshi bua kulambula Maweja Nangila
MUTU WA MUKANDA VIII: Bidi bitangila ditangilula dia Dîyi dikulu
Dituku ditanu: nundambule ngombe milume tshitema, mikoku ya bimpanga ibidi, bana ba mikoku dikumi ne banayi, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijima, kabidi ne mbuji wa mpumbu umue
Ikale mupika wa bana babu

Ku tshidimu tshionsu, bantu balume bonsu badi munkatshi muenu, nebadileje kudi Maweja Nangila misangu isatu, muaba wikalaye musungule, bua tshibilu tshia mampa adi kaayi mela buanga, bua tshibilu tshia Dinowa biakudia, ne bua tshibilu tshia tuzubu tua Bisasa
Kadi Yehowa wakadi ne Yosefe, waka mulesha luse, wakamuendesha diakelengele kudi mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Kumutshinyi nansha, bualu bua nakamufila mu tshianza tshiebe, ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buandi, wewe neumuenzele bu muwakuenzela Sifiona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona
Kadi semena apa, nkumanyishe muakengeshabu bana benu kudi bena Izrayele matuku adi kumpala
Nanku nenuikale bena diakalenga mu ditunga, dindi meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupeshe bua nushalemu ne muoyi matuku a bungi

Mose wakabambila ne, Hafika bidimu muanda mutekete, mu tshikondo tshidibo bahingashangana bintu, hadiabo bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda, halua Bena Isalele bonso ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udiye usungula, hashishe nenubadile Bena Isalele bonso mikenji ei mu matshu abo

Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakajidila tshisamba tshia Lewi, bua kutualabo mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne bua kuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kamuenzela mudimu, ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina diandi, bu mudibo benza lelu
Anyi bikala ngombe muikale ne tshilele tshia kukuma ne nsengu diambedi, ne bikala mukelenge wandi kayi mumulame, yeye neafute ngombe ku ngombe, ne ngombe mufue neikale wandi
Nukoleshe mitshima yenu, nulue ne mamuma a mu buloba abu Hakayabo nunku, mamuma a nvinyo akabanga kulua
Bana balume ba Yafete badi nunku Gome ne Magoga ne Madai ne Yawana ne Tubala ne Mesheka ne Tilasa
Bikala muntu mubi mukumbane bua kukumibua, hashishe mulumbuluishi neamuladike hanshi, nebamukume ku mpala kuandi; bungi bua mikumu nebuikale bu bubi buandi
Bu mundi njidila Arone ne bana bende ba balume bua bangenzele mudimu wa butuangaji
Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi bakangata or ya tuhita tua binunu ne binunu ne tuhita tua nkama ne nkama, bakalua n ai mu ntenta wa kusambakena bu tshivulukidi tshia Bena Isalele ku mesu kua Yehowa
Bumuka mu Yotbata, kuyabu ku Abrona
Nudienzele bisele ku mpenga inai ya bilulu bienu binudi baluata
Kanudidi munyinyi wa nyama pa muaba muine unuvua bamushipe, bamupatuile mashi to
Kukuatakajabu mabeji a mutshi wa tshinyi bua kuvuala bu bilamba
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neandamune malu enu
Ndimi ya kapia mmibande mu tshimenga tshia Sihone
Mukalenga mumane kusomba mu nkuasa wa bukalenga, bamutentuile mukanda wa mikenji ewu, udibu balame kudi batuangaji ba bena Levi
Hashishe mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Wewe Esetê, mukelenge mukashi, udi musue tshinyi
Ndelanganyi ya Esawu Ke mena a ndelanganyi ya Esawu, nkambua wa bena Edome, bavua base ku mukuna wa Seyire: Ada, mukaji wa Esawu, uvua mulele muana anu umue wa balume, dina diende: Elifaze
Katataka bikai bienu, nusabuke kasulu ka Zelede; tuakasabuka kasulu ka Zelede
Nunku kitabushi bua mashi anyi kumatau hanshi ha buloba anu ku mesu kua Yehowa; bualu bua mukelenge wa Isalele wakalua bua kukeba mukenya bu mudi muntu ukeba nkuadi mu mikuna
Muntu udi ukukebela diakabi, neikale muena diakabi

Bualu bua mitshi yabo ya tumuma tukese idi bu mitshi ya mu Sodoma ne ya mu madimi a Amola: tumuma tuabo tudi bu nyongangandu, ne tshisumbu tshia tumuma tshidi ne bululu: nvinyo yabo idi bu lulengu lua nyoka, bu lulengu bikole lua nyoka wa ntoka

Muntu wakadi ne mutshima mulengele ne kalolo neikale ne disu dibi kudi muan abo ne kudi mukashi udiye munange ne kudi bana bandi bakashala; nunku yeye kena ubabanyinaku munyinyi wa bana bandi hadiye udia, bualu bua yeye kena ne tshintu tshishala kudiye mu ditshintshimika ne mu ditata didi bena lukuna banutatshisha n adi ku misoko yenu yonso
Yeye awu kukonka Yakobe ne: Dina diebe nnganyi
Palô wakamuebesha ne, Wakadi ne tshintu kai bualu hawakashikama n anyi bua wewe udi musue kuhingana ku buloba buebe
Atalaya Udi Unyenga Bukelenge Bak
Baprofete bonso bakamba nunku ne, Ya biebe ku Lamota gilada, wikale ne diakalengele; bualu bua Yehowa neafile musoko mu bianza bia mukelenge
Nuye bienu ne muntu wa mu tshisamba muntu wa mu tshisamba, muntu yonso udi ku mutu kua nsubu wa batatu abo
Kulondolola Bukokeshi bua Ahaza Bak
Dutelonone Mose Udi Uvudishila Bisamba bia Bena Isalele Masanka Â mmasanka akavudishila Mose, muntu wa Nzambi, Bena Isalele, diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua

Masanka a mu Buloba bua Mulayi Nunku nutumikile mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne bukole, ne bua nuenu nubuelemu, ne bua nuenu nuhiane buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana; ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu bua kubahabu ne tunkanunuma tuabo, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi

Padi, panyima pa dibenga kumvwangana pankatshi pa Bibambalu biônso bibidi, tshingenyingenyi anyi dijinga dia kwenzeja dîyi kadiyi dianyishibwa panyima pa didibala kudi Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu, Bilo biônso bibidi bidi bienza kasumbu kasanga ka bantu bûngi bwa momumwe kimikila dieenza dia mukanda mutangila bulongolodi budibu bashaala bakonkoloja
Kadi pavuabu batangile ku ntenta wa kusambakena, kumonabu muvua divuba dileja butumbi bua Maweja Nangila dibuikila ntenta
Kabidi netuikale bena tshibawu padi tatu ufua ku bukunda, muikale ne kanyinganyinga
Katataka, tudi mu tshianza tshiebe, utuenzele budi buimpe ku mesu kuebe
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne mukashi muhika, udi mubangila kudi mulume, udi kayi muanze kuhikudibua, nebabakengeshe bubidi buabo, kabena babashiha bualu bua yeye kakadi muhikudibue
Wakadi ne muana wa balume, dina diandi Shaula, wakadi nsongalume muakane; munkatshi mua Bena Isalele kamuakadi muntu mukuabo wakamuhita bulengele; wakahia bantu bakuabo bule ku makaya andi ne ku mutu
Hashishe mukelenge wakambila mukashi ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Kunsokoki bualu bundi musue kukuebesha

Nusangishe bantu bonso, ne balume ne bakashi ne bana bakese ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, bua buonso buabo bumue, bayile lungenyi, batshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, batumikile mei onso a mikenji ei; nunku bana babo badi kabayi banze kumanya nebunvue, nebamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku onso anudi nushikama mu buloba bunudi nuya dishiya dia Yadene bua kubuhiana
Bakangata buloba buonso bua Bena Amole ku mikalu yabo yonso, ku Ânona tô ne ku Yaboka, ne ku tshihela tô ne ku Yadene
Monai, wewe wakumana kunvua lumu bu muakenzela bakelenge ba Ashû bantu ba mu bisamba bionso, bakababutula tô; wewe neuhanduke, anyi
Kadi wakashintulula difutu dianyi misangu dikumi
Katshia numuka mu Ejipitu too ne munudi bafike muaba ewu, nutshidi amu numutombokela
Hakalua Bena Sulia ba mu Damaseke bua kukuatshishabo Hadadezê, mukelenge wa mu Soba, Davidi wakashiha Bena Sulia binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Mona, nakubanga kufila Sihona ne buloba buandi mu tshianza tshienu, bua nuenu nuhiane buloba buandi
Tunkanunuina tua Sheme Gen
Esawu kuditshipa, kusumbisha bumuanabute buende kudi muakunyende
Bana balume ba Yakoba bakadi dikumi ne babidi
Hashishe ditutu diakabuikila ntenta wa kusangakena, ne butumbi bua Yehowa buakûla nsubu tente
Bileha, muena mudimu wa Lakele, wakimita difu kabidi, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume mukuabo
Yeye ne balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende kuenza kabidi amu tshitunu

Palala, muana wa Uzai, wakalongolola buludiludi ne ditumba dia lumbu tô ne ku tshibumba tshiakadi tshiasa hehi ne nsubu wa mukelenge wakadi ku mukuna, tshidi ku luseke lua luhangu lua balami ba ku bibi
Bakenza nkanu ya mu nsubu ne ya mu bilulu ne ntalanta ya argent lukama, ntalanta ku lukanu, ntalanta ku lukanu

Mose wakashikisha kuambila Bena Isalele bonso mdi â onso; yeye wakabambila kabidi ne, Tekai mei onso anakunuambila lelu mu mitshima yenu, mei onso a mikenji mene mudi nuambila bana benu bua bobo kuyenza
Kaleba ne Yoshua Badi Bashala ne Muoyo Aba mbantu bakabalabo kudi Mose ne kudi Eleazâ muakuidi, bakabala Bena Isalele mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mutangilangane ne Yeleko
Eu ke nDavidi, wakatumbishabo ne maja, hakimbabo ne, Shaula wakashiha binunu bia bantu, Davidi wakashiha binunu makumi bia bantu, anyi

Hashishe bakafika ku Gilada mu buloba bua Tatima hodeshi; bakafika ku Dana yana, bakahitshila mu buloba bua Sidona; bakafika ku musoko wa lumbu wa Tulo, ne ku misoko yonso ya Bena Hiwi ne ya Bena Kanâna; bakanyunguluka ku luseke lua Sude lua Yuda tô ne ku Bê sheba

Hakadi Abashaloma ne muoyo, yeye wakadishimikila dibue dinene mu tshibanda tshia mukelenge, wamba ne, Tshiena ne muana mulume bua kujadikeye dina dianyi; yeye wakidika dibue adi dina diandi; badi badibikila ne, Tshivulukidi tshia Abashaloma tô ne katataka
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Nansha, kubashihi; udi musue kushiha bantu bawakukuata bahika ku muele wa nvita ne ku buta, anyi
Kadi muntu nansha umue wa kunudi, kena mua kukengesha muanabu muena Izrayele to
Bintu ebi bidi tshituha tshia bakuidi kudi bantu badi bafila milambu ya kuosha, nansha ngombe nansha mukoko: bobo nebahe bakuidi diboko ne matama abidi ne tshiadi
Bena Isalele, nuenu nudi ne disanka, banganyi badi bu nuenu basungidibue kudi Yehowa
Kuambaye ne: Mukaji ewu mmunemeke mikenji, mmuenze bimpe, mumpite ne meme mene
Wakamba kabidi ne, Kakuena bualu, bikalaku ditalala kakuyi ditshina mu matuku andi nshala ne muoyo
Kukosabu ditamba dia mutshi wa mvinyo dikale ne tumuma

Yehowa wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole ne diboko diandi diolola ne malu makole ne bimanyinu ne malu a dikema; wakalua n etu mu muaba eu, wakatuha buloba ebu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Kadi pikala mulume wamba bulelela, baledi ba mukaji kabayi ne tshimanyinu, bakulu ba mu tshimenga nebimanyike mukaji ewu mu mushiku wa mbelu wa nzubu wa tatuende
Muntu eu Mika wakadi ne nsubu wa mpingu, Wakenza kabidi efoda ne telafima, wakajidila umue wa bana bandi balume, wakalua muakuidi wandi
Bualu bua nakutshina difik a munda ne tshiji tshikole biakadi Yehowa n abi bua kunushiha
Shekeme muana mulume wa Hamo, Muena Hiwi, mukelenge muana wa buloba, wakamutangila wakamukuata, wakalala n andi, wakamufuisha bundu
Mukaji awu kulela Pinhase
Muaku wa Mvidi Mukulu udi pabuipi nenu Mikenji indi nnumanyisha lelu eyi, kayena minupite lungenyi, kayena kule
Bualu bua kahia aka kanene nekatuoshe; bitunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, kabidi, hashishe netufue
Anu bobu aba ke bavua bambile mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bua anyishe bena Izrayele bumuke bonsu mu ditunga diende
Monai, nakanuyisha mei ne mikenji, bu muakangambila Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, bua nuenu kubienza mu buloba bunudi nubuela bua kubuhiana
Pashishe, nundambule kabidi mbuji wa mpumbu, bua mulambu wa kunukobolola nawu
Genese Badi Bahanyisha Yosefe Badi Baya n Andi mu Ejipitu Yakoba wakashikama mu buloba buakadi tatu andi mushikame mu buloba bua Kanâna
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Mutshima wanyi kawakaya n ebe, hakatuluka muntu mu dikalu diandi bua kusangakeneye n ebe, anyi
Kanuikadi ne bihiminu bibidi mu nsubu yenu, ne tshinene ne tshikese
Bialala mulume ne mukashi, biamueleye bilumi, bubidi buabo nebadioweshe ne mai, nebikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Kadi bantu aba bakatuenzela bimpe, kabakatufuisha bundu, kabakatujimishila nansha tshintu tshimue, musangu utuakuenda n abo, hatuakadi mu madimi
Bualu uvua musue kunumusha mu njila uvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munuambile bua kulonda
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele mei onso akambila Yehowa Mose
Moshe kubikila Arone ne balombodi ba bena Izrayele bonsu

Nkuasa wa bukelenge wakadi ne tshibandilu tshia bidiatshilu bisambombo; nyima wa mutu wa nkuasa wakadi tshijengu; bitekelu bibidi bia maboko biakadi ku luseke ne luseke lua nkuasa; tshifuanyikishi tshia nyama wa ntambue tshiakadi tshilamata ku tshitekelu ne tshitekelu tshia maboko
Yehowa neanutumine masama mabi tô ne hanuajimishibua ha buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana

Bobo bakakudimuna Yoshua dî ne, Bualu bua bakambila bantu bebe bu muakadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muambile muntu wandi Mose bua kunuha buloba buonso, ne bua kushiha bena buloba bonso ku mpala kuenu; nunku tuakatshina bikole bua bualu buenu, ne tuakenza bualu ebu
Benyi badi munkatshi muenu nebabandile ku mutu kuenu, ne nuenu nenuhuekele
Ekesode Mikenji Dikumi Dut
Kadi, panudi nulamba munyinyi wa muana wa mukoku nansha wa muana wa mbuji, kanuedimu mabele a mamuende to
Elisha wakamuambila ne
Kuinyikaye mutu panshi
Kuandamukadi nyoka

Nenubange ku dituku didi dilonda dia lumingu, dituku dinuakalua ne tshisumbu tshia bintu bidibo banyukula, nenubale matuku a lumingu muanda mutekete, tô ne ku dituku didi dilonda dituku dia lumingu dia muanda mutekete bu matuku makumi atanu nenufile mulambu wa bukula buhia buhia kudi Yehowa
Hakatangila Atalaya, mamu wa Ahazaya, ne, Muan anyi mulume udi mufue, yeye wakajuka, wakashiha bana balume bonso ba mukelenge
Kuinyikaye muana muibidi ne: Efrayime, wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu mmumpe lulelu mu ditunga edi, dimvua musombe mu dikenga dinene
Kupinganaye mu Ejipitu
Baminganga abu kulongolola tshitalu matuku makumi anayi ne mafuta a manananshi
Ateke tshianza pa mutu wa mbuji awu, amukosele muminu kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Bintu bia bena Levi Maweja Nangila kuamba kabidi ne: Bena Levi badi bangenzela mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, difutu diabu ke tshia dikumi tshimue tshia bintu bionsu bidi bantu bapeta mu Izrayele
Munkatshi mua bidimu bisambombu, nukune biakudia, nusole mionji yenu ya mvinyo, nunowe binuvua bakune
Yehowa, ubuikile bubi bua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, bawakahikula, kuitabushi bua mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu ashale munkatshi mua bantu bebe Bena Isalele

Anyi bikala munyinyi eu mubishe muandamuke muteke tô kabidi nunku yeye nealue kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neamutangile, ne biandamukeye mutoke tô, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu wakadi ne nsudi udi muakane, ne yeye neikale muakane
Ikale anu muena Izrayele
Mulambu wa kunua newikale tshituha tshinai tshia dikoho ku muana wa mukoko yonso, nebahongoluele Yehowa mulambu wa nvinyo udibo banua mu muaba wa tshijila
Yeye kayi muenze nanku, mmuena tshibawu
Nutumikile mikenji ya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, numunemeke, nuenze mudiye musue

Nunku mbikidilai baprofete bonso ba Bâla ne batendeledi bandi bonso ne bakuidi bandi bonso: nansha umue wabo kashadi, bualu bua bundi n abu mbua kufila mulambu munene kudi Bâla; yonso washala kena wikala ne muoyo
Nuenu nutu nuahidia Yehowa katshia ku dituku dinakanumanya
Rebeka kumona Izake, kutuluka pa kamelu
Neoshe dianyi dionso ha tshioshelu, bu muakenzeye ne dianyi dia mulambu wa kuikisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neafue mulambu wa ku buikila n au bubi buandi ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue
Lakele wakambila tatu andi ne, Mukelenge kanfuidi tshiji, bualu bua meme tshiena mbika ku mpala kuebe, bualu bua ndi mujingakana tshilele tshia bakashi tshidi n anyi
Dutelonone Matuku a Masanka Majalame Ek
Lulengu elu kaluena lusokoma kundi, luteka mu tshibutshilu tshianyi, anyi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Zilepa, muena mudimu wa Lea, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume

Kadi bikala muntu udi unvua mei a mulau eu udiamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Meme nengikale ne ditalala nansha binalonda tshitshu tshia mu mutshima wanyi, bua kutenteka dikuatshika ha mutu ha nyota, Yehowa kena umubuikidila bubi buandi, kadi tshiji tshia Yehowa ne mukau wandi nebimueneke kudi muntu eu ne milau yonso idi mifunda mu mukanda eu neyimukuate, ne Yehowa nenjimishe dina diandi muinshi mua diulu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuikale talala, kanutshinyi Nzambi, Nzambi wa tatu wenu, wakanuha bintu mu bibombi bienu, meme nakadi ne argent yenu
Nengendakane munkatshi mua bimuna biebe lelu, nengumushe bionso bidi ne matoba, ne mikoko yonso idi mifike, ne mbushi yonso idi ne matoba, bintu ebi nebikale difutu dianyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Mulangala
Wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu muanda mukulu
Yeye wakasungula bena bukitu binunu lukama ba mu Isalele ku difutu dia lukama lua ntalanta ya argent
Diba adi mukajebe Sara neikale mumane kulela muana wa balume

Neafile umue wa nyunyu wa nkutshi anyi wa mputu nyunyu udiye mua kuangata umue wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo wa mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bukula, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua muntu udiye musue kulengesha ku mpala kua Yehowa
Mukalenga wa bena Sodome kuya mu tshibandabanda tshia Shawe mmumue ne tshia Mukalenga , bua kuakidila Abrame pawaye upingana ku mvita, mumane kutshimuna Kedorlayomere ne bamfumu bonsu bavuaye nabu
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Tshianza tshiebe tshikale kundi ne ku tshiota tshia tatu wanyi
Shimei wakajuka, wakela tshiseba ha nyima ha mpunda, wakaya kudi Akisha mu Gata bua kukebeye bantu bandi; Shimei wakaya ku Gata, wakahingana ne bantu bandi

Bikaleye mumukume ne tshiji, anyi bikaleye mumuele tshintu, hakadiye muale mu nshila, wakamushiha, anyi bikaleye mumukume ne tshianza tshiandi ne tshiji, mumushihe, nebashihe muntu wakamukuma, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu musombuedi neashihe mushihi wa muntu, hasangakeneye n andi
Tuetu bena Izrayele bonsu tudi bantu ba tshijila
Mutuangaji atue munu mu mashi a mbuji awu, aalabe ku matumba matalame adi ku tshilambuilu tshia milambu ya kuosha

Aba mbashihianganyi badi mua kunyemenamu bua kuikala ne muoyo: muntu yonso udi ushiha mukuabo ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi; bu muntu wakuya ne mukuabo muitu bua kutaha nkunyi, ne hakuambeye kutaha mutshi ne kasui, ne kasui kakukuka, kakutaha muntu mukuabo, kakumushiha; muntu eu neanyemene ku umue wa misoko ei, neikale ne muoyo

Bene hadada wakunvua dî dia mukelenge Asa; wakatuma tupitene tua masalayi andi bua kuluanganabo ne misoko ya Bena Isalele; yeye wakahana Iyona ne Dana ne Abele bete mâka, ne buloba buonso bua Kinelota ne buloba buonso bua Nafatale
Wakaluatshisha Alona kazaku, wakamuela mukaba, wakamuluatshisha tshikowelu ne efoda, wakamuela mukaba wa efoda, wakamusuika ham bidi handi
Nunyangakaje kabidi miaba yabu yonsu idibu batendelela
Maweja Nangila uvua anu mumuele lupemba mu malu onsu
Witabushe bua meme nsabuke, utangile buloba buimpe budi dishiya dia Yadene, mukuna au muimpe, ne Lebanona
Ele, muan a bute wa Yuda, wakadi muntu mubi ku mesu kua Yehowa; yeye wakamushiha
Hakashikisha Yehowa kusomba ne Mose ha mukuna wa Sinai, yeye wakamuha mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu ne munu wa Nzambi
Biabika muena mashimi bua kutumpila mukuabo bua malu mabi akadiye wenza, nunku bubidi buabo badi batandangana, nebimane ku mesu kua Yehowa ne ku mesu kua bakuidi ne balumbuluishi ba mu matuku au
Dituku dia tshitema: Abidane, muana wa Ngideyoni, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Binyamine
Samuele wakakonka Yishai ne, Bana bebe bonso badiku, anyi
Munya udi umenesha biakudia pa madimi abu
Bobo bakanyenga bimuna biabo; tumelo tuabo bu binunu makumi atanu, ne mikoko bu binunu nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne nyama ya mpunda binunu bibidi, ne bantu binunu lukama
Nuenu ba mu biota bia bantu, nuambike Yehowa malu andi, nuambike Yehowa butumbi ne bukole
Padiye umona ne: dikeji didi dienda ditampakana pa dikoba, neambe ne: muntu ewu udi ne mikiya, bualu tshidiye natshi ndisama dia nsudi
Hashishe dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Samuele ne, Nakakudimuna mutshima bua nakasungula Shaula mukelenge, bualu bua yeye wakasesuka, kena undonda, kena utumikila mikenji yanyi
Tshiakunupesha kantu ka mu ditunga diabu to, nansha katupa ka buloba kakese
Kusakidila pa bukookeshi ebu, polovensa idi yabanyangana makookeshi makwabo ne Bukalenga bwa kumutu, ne yabanyangana kabidi nabu lupetu lwa ditunga mu bitupa bia bialukama ne
Moshe kutshiela mu mayi
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neabafile mu bianza bienu, neabakengeshe ne makenga makole, tô ne hajiminabo
Masama onso ne makenga adi kâyi mafunda mu mukanda wa mikenji, Yehowa neanutumineu, tô ne hanuajimishibua
Monai, muntu mununu wakalua mufume ku mudimu wandi wa budimi dilolo; muntu eu wakufuma ku mikuna ya Efelayima, wakadi mushikame mu Gibea; kadi bena musoko bakadi Bena Benyamina
Muntu wandi Zimeli, kapitene ka tshituha tshia makalu andi, wakamuelela tshifufu: yeye wakadi mu Tîsa mukuatshike maluvu mu nsubu wa Âsa wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wandi mu Tîsa
Kanuluatshi tshilulu tshiakakumabo ne miosa ya mikoko misambakasha ne buanda bua lin
Yosefe wakamana bana babo, kadi bobo kabakamumanya
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Katuena basue kufua to
Pashishe kufuaye
Haunvua tshiona tshihita ku mitu ya mitshi ya mûr, bûdi n abu mbua kudikankamika bualu bua Yehowa wakadianjila ku mpala kuebe bua kushiheye masalayi a Bena Peleshete
Nuvua badimuene nkayenu, muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, mubutule bantu, bavua batendelela mvidie Baale Peyore
Yonatana wakela nsongalume dî ne, Endesha, ya biebe lubilu, kujanguluki
Bualu bua nenusabuke Yadene bua kubuelamu ne bua kuhiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha; nenubuhiane, nenushikamemu
Davidi wakambila muakuidi ne, Bulelela, katuena basangile ne bakashi tô matuku asatu; hanakumuka ku musoko, bintu bia bantu aba biakadi bijidika, nebitambe kujidibua tô ne lelu nansha
Mushiki eu wikale mumanyi wa bualu ne dibue edi dikale mumanyi wa bualu, ne, Meme tshiena nsambuka mushiki eu bua kukuenzela bibi, ne wewe kuena usambuka mushiki eu ne dibue bua kungenzela bibi
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, uvua mutue netu ndondu mu mukuna wa Sinayi
Kame udi tatuende wa Kenaane
Nenku milambu ayi ishale ya mutuangaji, bualu idi ya tshijila
Kadi, matamba onsu ne mapu, bikale anu bilamakane, kabidi bienza ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi nkayatshi
Bankambua benu makumi muanda mutekete bakaya mu Ejipitu; katataka Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuvudisha bungi bua mitoto idi mu diulu
Dutelonone Mose Udi Uvudishila Bisamba bia Bena Isalele Masanka Â mmasanka akavudishila Mose, muntu wa Nzambi, Bena Isalele, diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua
Yeye wakamuebesha ne, Ei idi misoko kai iwakumpa, muan etu
Lusumuinu lua bankambua betu ludi luamba ne, Bualu bubi budi bufuma kudi bantu babi; katu tshianza tshianyi katshiena tshikulenga nansha

Hashishe tshiji tshikole netshinkuate dituku adi, ne meme nembalekele, nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo ne bobo nebajimishibue; ne matata ne makenga a bungi nealue kudibo; bobo nebambilangane dituku adi ne, Malu â mabi onso kaena alua kutudi bualu bua Nzambi wetu kena munkatshi muetu, anyi
Nanku Izake kumuambila ne: Wewe kuakusomba mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi, nansha mu buloba budi dibungi dipite kubolesha
Ke pandi nnuambila bua nusungule bimenga bisatu bia kunyemena
Kuena ne bua kubuelela muana wa bakaji wa mukaji wa tatuebe mu nzubu to, bualu mmuana wa tatuebe, kabidi mmuanenu
Pa tshintu tshimue tshivuaye mukune, kupetaye lukama

Hanuakenga mu dikenga, halua malu au onso kunudi, nenuhingane kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu matuku adi ku nyima, nenutumikile dî diandi: bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa luse; yeye kena unuhanga, kena unujimisha, yeye kena uhua muoyo bualu bua tshihungidi tshia batatu enu tshiakahungeye n abo

Kanulondi nzambi mikuabo ya bantu badi ha buihi n enu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi wa mukau, bua tshiji tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, katshikadi kunudi, ne bua yeye kanujimishi ha mutu ha buloba
Kadi kakuakadi dî, nansha muntu wakitaba
Siba wakamba ne, Nyama ya mpunda nya ba mu nsubu wa mukelenge kubandabu; mampa ne mamuma mbua bansongalume kudia; ne nvinyo nya badi bahanga mu tshihela banue
Nzambi ya bisamba abi biakabuela batatu anyi yakabasungila, anyi
Aukose muminu kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Muhika wakamukudimuna dî ne, Nyeye mukelenge wanyi Lebeka wakangata tshilulu tshikudika, wakatshiteka ku mishiku yandi
Davidi wakakonka Bena Gibeona ne, Nennuenzele tshinyi

Binuamona ne kukuatshila Yehowa mudimu kudi kubi, lelu nusungule unudi basue kukuatshila mudimu, ne nzambi yakadi bankambua benu bakuatshile mudimu dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata anyi nzambi ya Bena Amole, bena buloba bunudi bashikame; kadi meme ne ba mu nsubu muanyi netukuatshile Yehowa mudimu

Bikala muntu ne muana mulume udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, katu watumikila dî dia tatu wandi anyi dia mamu wandi, ne yeye katu wabahvuila biamukengeshaho, hashishe tatu wandi ne mamu wandi nebamukuate, nebaluhuke n andi kudi bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne ku tshibi tshia musoko; nebambile bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne, Muana wetu eu udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, kena utumikila mei etu; udi muena lumpukusu ne mukuatshiki wa maluvu
Balake udi umbikila, ungambila ne: Ndi nkusengelela ne: ufike kuneku, utshipe bantu badi bumuke ku Ejipitu, batangalake pa buloba bujima
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Bundi n abu mbua kukutshihisha misangu dungi munyi bua wewe kungambila anu dî dilelela mu dina dia Yehowa
Pashishe bintu bionsu bidi bishale, mutuangaji umuke nabi mu mitanda, aye kubiosha bu mudibu bosha bintu bidi bishale bia ngombe mulume, padibu bakobolola mutuangaji munene
Biakusuma nyota, uye biebe ku milondo ya mai, unue mai akasunabo kudi bansongalume
Bantu bakadinyangisha kudiye, kabena bu bana bandi, bakahambuka, malu abo akanyanguka, akalua manyongoboka
Mutuangaji kena ne bua kubanjija mukaji mudisombele, nansha uvuabu bamane kubanjija, nansha uvua ku dibaka dikuabu, bualu mutuangaji mmuntu wa tshijila, udi ungenzela mudimu
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Ukonke bantu muena muana eu
Bualu ebu buakalua bubi, bualu bua bantu bakaya kutendelela kamue ne kukuabo tô ne ku Dana
Kanuakadia mampa, kanua kanua nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yosefe wakatuma bana babo nunku, bakaya yeye wakabambila ne, Nudimuke, kanutandanganyi mu nshila
Dibaya dionsu divua ne bitaku bibidi

BADI BUMUKA KU SINAYI BAFIKA KU MIKALU YA MOWABE Bena Izrayele badi bumuka Matuku makumi abidi a ngondu muibidi wa tshidimu tshivua tshilonda tshidimu tshivua bena Izrayele bapatuke mu Ejipitu, divuba kubanda mulu ku ntenta wa kusambakena, uvua ne mushete wa ndondu
Kabavua baye ku ntenta wa kusambakena to
Balaame udi wela bena Izrayele lupemba musangu muibidi Balake kumuambila kabidi ne: Tuye nebe muaba mukuabu uudi mua kumona bena Izrayele bonsu
Mose wakafunda mikenji ei, wakayifila mu bianza bia bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne kudi bakulu bonso ba mu Isalele
Siba wakadi ne bana ba balume dikumi ne batanu ne bahika makumi abidi
Palo Wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakamba ne, Nundombele Yehowa, yeye umushe biula kundi ne kudi bantu banyi, nendekele bantu baye kushihela Yehowa nyama
Kufundabu pa mabue apu mena a bana ba Yakobe bu tshitampi
Kadi nuenu, nunyunguluke, yai bienu mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze
Bobo nebayishe bana ba Yakoba mei ebe, ne Bena Isalele mikenji yebe; nebateke musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kuebe, ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ha tshioshelu tshiebe
Neunutonde, unupatukila mu diulu

Umue wa bantu bandi wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua bangate tubalu tutanu tudi tushala mu musoko, bualu bua tubalu tudi bu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele tshidi tshishala, ludi bu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele tshiakadia; tubatume, batangile bualu ebu
Gehazi wakadianjila ku mpala kuabo, wakateka mulangala ha mpala ha muana; kadi kakuakadi dî, nansha diunvuika
Nunku Yehowa wakadi ne Bena Isalele tshiji tshikole, wakabumusha ku mesu kuandi; anu tshisamba tshia Yuda nkayatshi tshiakashala
Nanku, nuvuale bilamba bitela ne malenda
Bamuanabute bonsu badibu bandambula, ba bantu ne ba nyama mbebe wewe
Bena Peleshete bakihata Shaula ne bana bandi balume; Bena Peleshete bakashiha Yonatana ne Abinadaba ne Maleki shua, bana balume ba Shaula
Kadi nentue nebe ndondu
Mulombodi wa bena mudimu kupeta bana babu ne Yozefe, kubambila bionsu abi
Kadi biwokala kuyi wenza bimpe, bualu bubi budi bualamina ku mbelu kuebe, mutshima wa bubi newikale kudi, kadi wewe ubukokeshe
Yeye wakateka balami ku bibi bia ku nsubu wa Yehowa, bua muntu wakadi kayi muakane kabuedi mu nsubu
Kumuangalaye nabu mu ditunga dia Ure wa bena Babilone, kuya kuasa mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Bikala Yehowa Nzambi, numulonde; kadi bikala Bâla Nzambi, numulonde
Hakashikisha Solomo kulomba kuandi ne kutendekena kuandi kudi Yehowa, wakajuka ku mpala kua tshioshelu tshia Yehowa kuakatueye binu biandi hanshi ne bianza biandi biolola mulu
Kuenzekabi nanku
Kadi nebapete tshia dikumi tshia bintu bidi bena Izrayele ne bua kundambula
Kubadikaye bamuanabute ba balume ba bena Izrayele bonsu
Nunku bakafika Davidi ne bantu bandi ku musoko, monai, musoko wakadi muoshibue ne kahia, ne bakadi bakuata bakashi babo ne bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi bu bahika
Noa wakatabala ku muoyo wandi, wakamanya bu muakenza muan andi wa mukala

Nenuteke bintu ebi hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenutendelele ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nenusanke mu malu mimpe onso akanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu ne ba mu nsubu yenu, ne Muena Lewi ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu
Bena Sulia bakalua ne tshisumbu tshikese tshia masalayi; Yehowa wakafila tshisumbu tshia bantu tshinene mu bianza biabo, bualu bua bobo bakadi bahidie Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo
Nanku, bua bena Izrayele kuasa mitanda, nansha kumuka muaba uvuabu basombe, anu ku diyi dia Maweja Nangila

Milau ei yonso neyilue kunudi, neyinulonde, neyinuhete tô ne hanuajimishibua ba buloba; bualu bua nuenu kanuakunvua mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi biakanuambileye: milau ei neyikale kunudi bu tshimanyinu ne dikema, ne kudi bana benu tshiendelele

Yeye neangate nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo ne mitshi ya cèdre ne bintu bikunze kunzû ne mabeshi a hisopa, nealue bintu ebi ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu mashi a nyunyu wakashihabo ha mutu ha mai adi ahueka, yeye neamiamine mashi ham bidi ha muena nsudi udiye musue kulengesha misangu muanda mutekete, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, nealekele nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu tshisuku
Muntu muenze nanku, udi unyanga mikenji
Nunku bantu bandi bakamuambila ne, Bakebele mukelenge wanyi nsongakashi utshidi kamama, imane biandi ku mesu kua mukelenge, akukube, alale mu tshiadi tshiebe bua mukelenge wanyi unvue luya
Genese Yakoba wakunvua mei a bana ba balume ba Labana bamba ne, Yakoba wakakongolola bintu bionso bia tatu wetu wakadiangatshila bubanji buakadi bua tatu wetu
Panudi basue kupeta bapika balume nansha bakaji, nuye kubakeba anu mu bisamba bikuabu bidi pabuipi nenu
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Pingaja tshianza tshiebe pa tshiadi
Bakambila bantu ne, Hitai, nunyunguluke musoko, bena nvita baye ku mpala kua mushete wa Yehowa
Badi bamanyisha lufu lua Moshe Anu dituku adi, Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Uye pa mukuna wa Abarime, mu ditunga dia Mowabe, pabuipi ne Yeriko
Kanulambi muana wa mukoko mu mabele a mamu wandi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi mumane kumvua bijanu bia bena Izrayele
Nuikale bantu ba tshijila kundi, bualu bua meme Yehowa ndi wa tshijila, nakanusungula munkatshi mua bantu bua nuenu nuikale bantu banyi

Masanka Alualua kudi Batumikidi ba Yehowa Binunvua mikenji ei, binuayenza, hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nênze tshihungidi ne luse biakalayeye batatu benu: yeye neanusue, neanusankishe, neanuvudishe, yeye neasankishe bana benu kabidi, ne bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba buebe, midioko yenu, ne nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, ne manyi enu ne bana ba ngombe yenu ne bana ba mikoko yenu, mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu bua kunuhabu
Bena Izrayele mbantu ba pa buabu, mbashilangane ne ba bisamba bikuabu
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Yalede, Mahalelela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi asatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Yeye wakalukila kudi Yuda, wakamuambila ne, Tshiakumusangana, ne balume ba musoko bakungambila ne, Mukashi wa masandi kakadiku
Aye nende mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena bua kulomba luse kudi Maweja Nangila
Kadi bobo kabakangunvuila; Manashe wakabenzesha malu mabi akahita a bisamba biakabutula Yehowa ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bubi
Kalongu ka kumpala : Bidi bitangila Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka
Ulabe mafuta awu kabidi ku dilongu dinene ne ku tshitaku tshiadi bua kubindila

Kanuenzedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku bualu bua bobo badi benzela nzambi yabo malu onso mabi adi atonda Yehowa; bualu bua bobo badi boshila nzambi yabo bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi mene mene ha kahia
Ke muikala mikalu ya ditunga dienu nanku
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, meme nengikale n ebe, ne wewe neushihe Bena Midiyana bu muntu umue
Nenushihele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mulambu wa kuhita kua Yehowa, wa mikoko ne wa ngombe, mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi
Hashishe Davidi wakatumina Yoaba dî ne, Untumine Uliya, Muena Hiti
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Umukayi muaba udi bantu aba bimane

Yeshua ne Bani ne Shelebaya ne Yamina ne Akuba ne Shabetai ne Hodaya ne Mâseya ne Kelita ne Azaya ne Yozabada ne Hanana ne Pelaya ne Bena Lewi bakajingulula bantu mikenji; bantu bonso bakimana mu muaba wabo
Kadi nkadi mukuenzele nenku musangu mukuabu anyi
Bilobu binayi bivua bitshimuna, kupawulabi bintu bionsu bia bena Sodome ne bena Ngomore, too ne biakudia biabu, kunyemabu nabi
Ke mundi nnuteta, bua meme kujadika ne: bena Izrayele nebitabe mikenji yanyi anyi
Yehoshafata wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi, tatu wandi
Bantu bandi mene bakamuelela tshifufu, bakamushiha mu nsubu wandi
Nudimuke bualu bua disama dia nsudi, bua nuenu kuenza malu onso bimpe adi bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi banuyisha: bu munakabambila bobo, nuenu nuenze nunku
