Neutshinke amu kutshinka bua kumanya muaba udi tshisamba tshinene nansha tshikese mua kupeta
Kadi ditunga dinudi nukuata mpindiewu didi ne bibandabanda ne mikuna
Dutelonone Yoshua Udi Musungula bu Muhinganyi wa Mose Mose wakaya biandi, wakambila Bena Isalele bonso mei â
Bena Isalele bakateka balaminyi banyunguluke Gibea
Basatu aba bakadi bana balume ba Noa ne tunkanuniuna tuabo tuakamuangalaka ha buloba buonso
Kadi biamueneka munyinyi wa mubidi mubishe, yeye kena muakane
Nanku nuvuluke ndondu wenu ne Maweja Nangila, nukumbaje bidi ndondu awu unulomba, bua nuikale bena diakalenga mu bionsu binudi nuenza
Rakele kuimita difu, kulela muana wa balume
Nunku Yalobama ne Bena Isalele bonso bakahingana kudi Lehabama dituku disatu bu muakabambila mukelenge ne, Nuhingane kundi kabidi hahita matuku asatu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uhueke biebe, udimushe bantu, kabalu ha buihi bua kumona Yehowa, bungi buabo nebafue
Hanuasa nsubu muhia muhia, nenuenze kabidi lumbu tukese ku mutu kua nsubu, nunku muntu kahonyi hanshi, ne mashi andi kaikadi ku nsubu yenu
Palô Wakabikila Abalama, wakamukonka ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi

Mikenji Neyitekibue mu Mushete wa Tshihungidi tshia Mei Hakashikisha Mose kufunda mei a mikenji ei mu mukanda, hashishe Mose wakadimusha Bena Lewi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ne, Nuangate mukanda eu wa mikenji, nûteke ku luseke lua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, newikaleku bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi

Muntu yônso wendenda udi pende ne tshia kwikala ne moyo wende ne mubidi wende katakata ne kabidi udi pende mwa kutantshisha bumuntu bwende mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso, dia mapa a mukwende ne dia bibidilu bîmpe

Mvidi Mukulu mmumane kungumusha mu nzubu mua baledi banyi, meme kuambila mukajanyi Sara ne: Miaba yonsu itudi tupitshila nebe, ambila bantu ne: Abrahame udi muanetu wa balume, bua kabanshipi bualu buebe
Bena Yuda bakakuata bantu bakuabo binunu dikumi ne muoyo, bakaya n abo ha mutu ha dibue dinene, bakabela hanshi ha mutu ha dibue, nunku bobo bakabakosolola bituha bituha
Yakobe kubenga, wamba ne: Kanuena nuya ne Binyamine wanyi to
Bualu ke muaba undi mmonangana ne bena Izrayele
Kuena ne bua kubuelela mukaji wa muanenu mu nzubu to, bualu udi umuluisha bundu

Hashishe Bena Lewi, Yeshua ne Kadamiele ne Bani ne Hashabeneya ne Shelebaya ne Hodiya ne Shebanya ne Petehiya, bakamba ne, Jukai bienu, nuvudishile Yehowa Nzambi wenu disanka ku tshibangidilu tô ne kunshikidilu
Bintu bionso bia mu mai bidi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba nebikale bintu bibi kunudi
Ke pamvua mumusele nanku

Hakafika munda munya, Eliya wakabaseka ne, Elai dî dikole, bualu bua yeye udi nzambi: yeye udi welangana meji, anyi wakuya kuntu, anyi wakuya ku luendu, anyi yeye udi ulala tulu ne bunudi n abu mbua kumuhisha
Wakalala tulu muinshi mua mutshi wa genêt: mona, muanjelo wakamulenga tshianza, wakamuambila ne, Juka biebe, udie
Biasanganabo bintu bidi ne muoyo mu tshianza tshiandi, nansha ngombe nansha mpunda nansha mukoko, yeye neahingashe bintu misangu ibidi
Dutelonone Bunene bua Yehowa Nunku suai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numunemeke, nutumikile malu andi ne mei andi ne mikenji yandi matuku onso
Ateke tshianza pa mutu pa mukoku awu
Yakobe kuitaba ne: Eyowa, mmeme
Uvua amu ne bana ba bakaji batanu: Mala, Nowa, Ogla, Milka ne Tirsa
Biakabuela mulume ne mukashi ba bintu bionso, bu muakamuambila Nzambi, ne Yehowa wakamuinshidila tshibi
Yakobe kumona kabidi mpala wa Labane mubinduluke, katshiyi bu mu wabu nende diambedi
Wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne bisambombo hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema tô bidimu makumi atanu ne bibidi; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Yekoliya wa mu Yelushalema
Moshe kumuka kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kupatuka mu musoku
Kadi muntu yonsu mukuabu walenga tshitupa tshia mulambu ewu, nebamunyoke

Hakadi Davidi mushikame mu nsubu muandi, Davidi wakambila Natana, muprofete ne, Mona, meme ndi mushikame mu nsubu wa mitshi ya cèdre, kadi mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa udi mushale mu ntenta
Yeye kena mutangile malu mabi munkatshi mua bana ba Yakoba, yeye kena mutangile mitshima mikole munkatshi mua Isalele

Mose wakambila Alona ne Eleazâ ne Itama ne, Kanutudi bifulu ku mitu yenu, kanuhandi bilulu bienu, bua kanufu bienu, ne bua tshiji tshia Yehowa katshilu kudi bantu bonso, kadi bana benu, tshisamba tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, badile bualu bua kahia kakatemesha Yehowa
Muntu umue wakadi kumanya mua kuihata tshinunu tshia bantu, ne bantu babidi bakadi kumanya mua kuihata binunu dikumi bia bantu munyi, bikala Dibue kadiyi dibahane, ne Yehowa kayi mubafile kudibo

Beena ku Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi ne tshia kujadika ne badi bamanyi bapiluke mu mianda ya lupetu, ya mêyi ne mikandu ne ya diludika dia mianda ya mbulamatadi ne badi ne tshia kujadika kabidi ne bakaadi bênza midimu eyi bidimu kabiyi bishadila ku dikumi

Mikenji ya Kusombangana Talalâ Kanuhingashi muhika wakunyemena kunudi munyeme mu bianza bia mukelenge wandi; yeye ashikame n enu mu muaba udiye usungula mu umue wa misoko yenu udi utamba kumusankisha; kanumuenzedi bibi
Bena Yuda bakakonka ne, Nuakulua kutuluisha bualu kai
Bana aba bonsu dikumi ne banayi ke ndelanganyi ya Yakobe, ivuaye mulele ne Rakele

Bimuna bionsu bikale Maweja Nangila munupe mu ditunga dinuasomba, muntu yonsu udi ne mikiya nansha udi kayi nayi, udi mua kubishipa, kudia munyinyi wabi bu mudiye musue, ne muaba udiye musue, anu bu munutu nudia munyinyi wa kabuluku, nansha wa ngulungu
Hakamubikileye, yeye wakabuela, wakimana ku mpala kuandi
Maweja Nangila udi unyoka bantu bende Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Bantu babi aba nebangele mpata kashidi anyi
Sedekiya, muana wa Kenâna, wakadidila nsengu ya tshiamu, wakamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe newihate n ai Bena Sulia tô ne habutukabo
Lua, tunuishe tatu wetu nvinyo, netulale n andi, bua tuetu tulelele tatu wetu bana

Nuenze anu malu adi makane ne mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nubuele ne nuhiane buloba buimpe buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu, bua kunuihatshila bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna ku mpala kuenu, bu muakamba Yehowa
Nyama idi ne mikiya ne idi kayiyi ne mikiya, nyunyi, kabidi ne nyama idi ilandala, kubuela mu buatu ne Nowa, mulume ne mukaji, bu muvua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile
Kalebe, muana wa Yefune, wa mu tshisamba tshia Yuda
Hashishe bakamona tupitene tua makalu Yehoshafata, tuakambilangana ne, Kayeu mukelenge wa Isalele
Bakambilangana ne, Tuyai bietu, tuenzai tushola, tutuoshe mu kalua Bakadi ne tushola bu mabue, ne bitume bu tshimama
Hashishe bantu bonso bakela dî dikole ne, Butudi n abu mbua kuenza malu onso awakutuambila
Ke patudi tushipela Maweja Nangila bamuanabute ba bimuna
Kumuinyikilaye lukasa mulondu mu diboku
Bakashala Palô misoko ya kutekelamu bintu biandi, mena ai Pitoma ne Lamesese
Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, Muena Efelayima wa mu Zeleda, wakadi muntu wa Solomo, ne mamu wandi wakadi Seluya, mukashi wa mu lufuila, wakatombokela mukelenge kabidi
Muntu yonsu udi ulenga tshitalu kayi musue kudikobolola, udi unyanga nzubu wa Maweja Nangila

Yeye udi udianjila kudisunguila tshituha tshiandi, bualu bua etshi ntshituha tshia mukokeshi, wakalua n atshi kudi ba ku mutu kua bantu; yeye udi ujadika dilumbulula diakane dia Yehowa, ne mikenji yandi kudi Bena Isalele
Kishi wakadi tatu wa Shaula; ne Nê, tatu wa Abinê, wakadi muana mulume wa Abiele
Yobaba wakafua ne Hushama, wa mu buloba bua Bena Temana, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Nanku neakose muminu wa nyama wa mulambu wa kuosha
Dituku dibidi bakanyunguluka musoko musangu umue, bakahingana ku tshitudilu; bakenza nunku matuku asambombo
Esawu kuitaba ne: Ke meme ewu, tatu
Mmusue bua nuikale bantu bende, badi bamuenzela mudimu bu muvuaye mumane kunuambila
Ku tshidimu tshionsu, nudie munyinyi wa bimuna ebi ne meku enu, muaba wa tshijila wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, mu nzubu wikalaye musungule

Misoko ya Kunyemena Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuasabuka Yadene mu buloba bua Kanâna, nenusungule misoko ya kunyemena, ne hashiha muntu muntu mukuabo ku mpukahuka, yeye neanyemenemu
Nenushale bioshelu biabo, nutshibule mabue abo bituha, nuoshe Bashela babo ne kahia; nenutahe mpingu yakasongabo ne tshifuanyikishi tshia nzambi yabo; nenjimishe mena abo mu muaba au
Hakukonkabo kudi muan ebe mulume ne, Mei au ne mikenji ne malu biakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bidi tshinyi
Nzambi wakumpa mikemu yabo, ne Nzambi wakafuka mulayi wandi kudi Abalahama ne kudi Isaka ne kudi Yakoba
Bana ba bantu aba mene bakadi bashala mu buloba, hakahanga Bena Isalele kubashiha, Solomo wakabenzesha mudimu bu bahika bandi tô ne ku dituku edi
Kumupeshabu kabidi mutu wa nyama awu, ne munyinyi mumane kukosolola mabulu, bua kubioshila Maweja Nangila pa tshilambuilu

Dutelonone Mua Kufutshisha Mushihianganyi Bubi Buandi Biasanganabo muntu mufue mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu nubuhiane, kabayi bamanye muntu wakamushiha; hashishe bakulu ne balumbuluishi nebaluhuke, nebahime mutantshi kubangila ku muaba udi tshitalu tô ne ku misoko idi ha buihi ne muntu mufue; bakulu ba mu musoko udi utamba ha buihi ne muntu mufue nebangate kana ka ngombe kadi kakayi kanze kuenza mudimu ne tshikokedi; bakulu ba mu musoko nebahueke ne kana ka ngombe mu tshibanda tshidi ne mai adi ahueka, tshidibo kabayi banze kudimamu ne kukunamu bintu, nebatshibule nshingu wa kana ka ngombe mu tshibanda atshi
Meme nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo dituku adi bulelela, bua malu mabi akenzabo, hakakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo

Mukalu wenu wa ku luseke lua ku nôde newikale ku mai manene tô ne ku mukuna wa Hô, ku mukuna wa Hô nenufunde tô ne ku mukalu wa Hamata ku Sedada; mukalu newikale kabidi ku Zifelona tô ne ku mukalu wa Hasâ enana, eu newikale mukalu wenu wa ku nôde
Batuangaji, bana ba Arone, baye ne mashi a ngombe awu kudi Maweja Nangila

Alona neamiamine mashi a nyama mishiha ha nsengu ya tshioshelu etshi bua kubuikidila bantu mibi yabo, yeye nênze bualu ebu musangu umue ku tshidimu ku tshidimu bikondo bienu bionso, tshidi tshia tshijila tshitambe kudi Yehowa
Dielulula Mvidi Mukulu udi ubafuila luse Pashishe Maweja Nangila kungambila ne: Usonge mabue abidi, mafuanangane ne a kumpala
Wakadi ne dikima dikole: wakashiha Bena Amaleka, wakasungila Bena Isalele mu bianza bia bakadi bahaula
Kadi Wambile Yoshua dî, ushindike mutshima wandi, umukoleshe; bualu bua yeye neasabuke ku mpala kua bantu aba, neabahianyishe buloba budi utangila
Mu Holeba nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji kabidi ne Yehowa wakadi n enu tshiji, wakamba kunushiha
Bintu bia tshianyi binudi nunowa mu madimi enu, nubilambule mu nzubu wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Pashishe Arone kuambula biadi bia nyama ne tshibelu tshia ku dia balume dia nyama, kubiela mulu, ubinyukula kumpala kua Mvidi Mukulu, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Yehowa wakaha Davidi bakole bua kutamba bena lukuna bandi kuonso kuakayeye
Yakobe kubenga ne: Kabena ne tshidibu bangenzela to

Nenufume ku nsubu yenu ne mitanda ya mampa ibidi ya kunyukula, milamba ne bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne luevene, ebi mbintu bihuola bia diambedi bifila kudi Yehowa
Yeye wakambila bantu ba mu Penuele ne, hanahingana ne ditalala nenshimbule tshibumba etshi
Mose ne Yoshua bakaya, bakadisangisha mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Balami ba tshibi bakela dî, bakambila ba mu nsubu wa mukelenge lumu alu
Kupangabu mua kulondakaja Yakobe ne bana bende
Benze mushete wa ndondu ne mitshi ya kuelaku, ne tshibuikidiji tshiawu

Bikala muntu muhele, kanuladi tulu ne tshieya tshiandi; nuhingashe tshieya tshiandi habuela diba, bua yeye alale tulu ne tshilulu tshiandi, anuvudishile disanka; bualu ebu nebuikale buakane kunudi, ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Dielulula Nukumbaje mikenji yonsu indi munuambile eyi

Yefeta wakaditshiha kudi Yehowa ne, Biwafila Bena Amona mu tshianza tshianyi, hashishe tshionso tshidi tshiluhuka ku bibi bia nsubu wanyi bua kusangakena n anyi, hanahingana kudi Bena Amona ne ditalala, netshikale tshia Yehowa, nentshifile bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia

Yehowa wakabahana mu bianza bia Yabina, mukelenge wa Bena Kanâna, wakadi ukokesha bantu mu Hasô; kapitene ka masalayi andi kakadi Sisela, wakadi mushikame mu Haloshete, munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende
Ahazaya, muana wa Yeholama, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakayaku bua kutangila Yolama, muana wa Ahaba, mu Yizelele, bualu bua yeye wakadi usama
Pashishe muntu udi ufila bintu abi, neambe kabidi kumpala kua Maweja Nangila ne: Nkambua wanyi uvua muena Arame, kayi ne muaba wa kusomba
Nukumbaje bionsu bidibu banuambila
Neupeshe Arone ne bana bende nkayabu mudimu wa butuangaji
Nunku Nzambi wakasombuela bubi bua Abimeleke buakenzeleye tatu wandi hakashiheye bana babo makumi muanda mutekete

Mu bulongolodi bwenza kudi Dîyi dikulu ne kudi mêyi a ditunga, Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika kadi katangila mu tshitupa tshia kumpala ne mu tshia ndekeelu bibawu bibunda kudi: batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpe; beena Bukalenga bunene bônso ba ditunga pa kumbusha Minisitila Kavulambedi; beena Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu; balumbulwishi ba ku Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika ne balumbulwishi ba ku palake waku; beena Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi ne beena palake mulamatshisha ku Kapangu aka; beena ku Kapangu ka mianda ya lupetu ne beena palake mulamatshisha ku Kapangu aka; balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa kabwendela ne bamfumu ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi etu; balombodi ba kumpala ba Tubadi twa Mbulamatadi twa kabwendela ne bamfumu ba palake milamatshisha ku Tubadi etu; banguvenêla, bindonda bia banguvenêla ba polovensa ne baminisitila ba polovensa; balombodi ba Bisangilu bia polovensa

Bena Ejipitu bakatuenzela bibi, bakatukengesha, bakatuenzesha mudimu mukole; ne tuetu tuakadi la kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua betu, ne Yehowa wakulua dî dietu, wakatangila makenga etu ne mudimu wetu ne majitu etu
Meme panyi kubalomba ne: badi ne tukanu tua tshiamu tshia mpawungi ku matshi, batuntuadile
Bimenga binene bia kumpala bivua ku bumfumu buende bivua: Bahele, Ereke, Akade ne Kalne mu ditunga dia Babilone
Nudie bidia bia kuhita kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bu mudibo bafunde mu mukanda eu wa tshihungidi
Nanku dimukayi, kanupambuki, kanushiyi njila mululame
Nudi nuteta Maweja Nangila bualu kaayi

Alona nealue biandi mu ntenta wa kusangakena, neavule bilulu biandi bia lin biakadiye muluate hakayeye mu muaba wa tshijila, neabishiyemu, yeye neowe mai mu muaba wa tshijila, nealuate bilulu biandi, neahatuke neafile mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bantu wa kuosha ha ka hia, neabuikile bubi buandi ne bubi bua bantu
Yehowa wakahueka mu ditutu, wakimanahu n andi
Ku mutu kua mushiku wa mbelu wa tubalu bakuidi bakalongolola, mu ntu ne muntu buludiludi ne nsubu wandi
Monai, nakuteka buloba ebu buonso ku mpala kuenu: nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu etu Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kubahabu ne tunkanunuina tuabo tudi tubalonda ku nyima
Dibadika Mbabula ya bena Kora Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ambila mutuangaji Elazare, muana wa Arone, ne: upatule mbabula idi mu kapia, utangalaje makala aye kule
Dilolo nenuambe ne, Tudi basue butuku butshie bualu bua buowa budi bunukuata mu mitshima yenu, ne bua malu anudi batangila ku mesu
Hashishe bantu bakumuka ku Haselota, bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Palana

Mose wakabikila Yoshua, wakamuambila ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima, bualu bua wewe uyaya ne bantu aba mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu babo bua kubahabu; ne wewe neubahianyishe buloba abu
Wambile bena Izrayele ne: Mafuta a tshijila aa, nga kujidila nawu bantu badi benzela Maweja Nangila mudimu ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu
Kanuakuyidia munyinyi wayi to
Mose wakalua, wakambila bantu mei onso a musambu eu mu matshu abo, yeye ne Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna
Yeye wakahita bantu aba makumi asatu butumbi, kadi yeye kakadi wa mu mulongo wa basatu ba ku mpala
Nansha, bana banyi, mutshima wanyi udi utamba kunyingalala bualu buenu, bualu bua Yehowa wakateka tshianza tshiandi kundi
Kubamanyishaye bionsu bivua bimuenzekele abi
Bavua ku ndekelu kua tshibuikidiji atshi nseke yonsu ibidi
Yehowa wakamujika mu tshibanda tshia buloba bua Moaba tshiakatangilangana ne Bete peô; kakuena muntu udi mumanye kudi lukita luandi tô ne ku dituku edi
Kunkandiki to

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unsangishile balume makumi muanda mutekete ba bakulu ba mu Isalele, baudi mumanye ne mbakulu ba bantu, ne bakelenge badi ku mutu kuabo, ulue n abo ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bobo bimaneku n ebe
Bua kuluisha tshimenga kampande, nudianjile kulomba bena tshimenga atshi bua kubuelamu tshianana, kakuyi mvita to

Dutelonone Hangata mulume mukashi bua kumubaka, ne bikala mukashi kayi muimpe ku mesu kuandi bualu bua yeye wakamusangana ne malu adi kayi mimpe, hashishe yeye neamufundile mukanda wa kushiha dibaka, neamuheu mu bianza, neamûmushe mu nsubu wandi
Muntu ne muntu wakangata bintu biandi bia nvita; nuakamba kuya ku mikuna
Yeye wakabela lusumuinu luandi ne, Balaka, mukelenge wa Moaba, wakumbikila ku Alama ne ku mikuna ya ku Esete ne, Lua biebe, ungelele bana ba Yakoba mulau, lua biebe kukanda Bena Isalele
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uhatule muntu eu muena bihendu ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bantu bonso bakunvua mei andi batentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu handi ne bantu bonso bamukume ne mabue
Bualu meme Maweja Nangila ndi ne mukawu
Lakele wakamba ne, Nakasangana bibula bikole ne mukulu wanyi wa bakashi, nakumutamba bukole, wakamuidika dina ne, Nafatale
Kadi Nadabe ne Abiku bafuile, bualu bavua balambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa musenga wa kamonya kauyi wa tshijila to

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Nudimuke bienu bimpe; bualu bua kanuakatangila tshifuanyikishi tshia muntu dituku diakasomba n enu Yehowa mu Holeba munkatshi mua kahia; kanuonyi mitshima yenu, kanudisongidi luhingu ne tshifuanyikishi tshia muntu nansha mulume nansha mukashi, nansha tshia nyama yonso ya ha buloba, anyi tshia nyunyu yonso idi yenda mu diulu, anyi tshia tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ha buloba, anyi tshia munyinyi wa mu mai adi muinshi mua buloba; bua hanuabandisha mesu enu mulu, ne hanuatangila diba ne ngondo ne mitoto ne bintu bionso bia mu diulu, kanubitendeledi, kanubienzedi mudimu; ebu mbualu buakaha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso bakuabo badi muinshi mua diulu
Nunku nentume nsongalume, nemmuambile ne, Ya biebe, ukebe mikete

Bulelela, kabakudia bidia bia kuhita kua Yehowa nunku ku matuku a balumbuluishi bakalumbuluila Bena Isalele nansha mu matuku onso a bakelenge ba Isalele nansha a bakelenge ba Yuda; kadi bakadila Yehowa bidia bia kuhita kua Yehowa mu Yelushalema mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge bua Yoshiya
Yakakuata Obeda edome ku sude; ne bana bandi ku tshiluminu
Sara kusanka wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu mmunsekeshe
Bana ba balume ba Etana: Azâya
Nendame ndondu ituvua batua nenu
Yeye wakababanyina bidia biakadi ku mpala kuandi, kadi tshituha tshia Benyamina tshiakahita tshituha tshiabo misangu itanu

Bakalua ne mutu wa Ishi boshete kudi Davidi mu Hebelone, bakambila mukelenge ne, Tangila, mutu wa Ishi boshete, muana wa Shaula, muena lukuna webe wakakeba muoyo webe; Yehowa wakasombuela mukelenge wetu lelu bua Shaula ne bana bandi
Hazaele wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Aba bonso mbana balume ba Yoketana
Mu tshihela: Bete alabâ, Midina ne Sekaka, ne Nibeshana ne Tshimenga tshia Luehu, ne Enegedi; bimenga bisambombo ne misoko yabi

Nebashihe muprofete au anyi mulotshi au wa bilota, bualu bua yeye wakamba mei adi anutombuesha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanu; hatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, wakanuhikula mu nsubu wa lukanu; udi musue kunusesuisha mu nshila wakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenubua nuenu kuendamu

Muvua kabidi ngombe milume dikumi ne ibidi, mikoku ya bimpanga dikumi ne ibidi, bana ba mikoku dikumi ne babidi ba tshidimu tshimue, bua milambu ya kuosha pamue ne milambu ya bintu bia mu madimi ya kulambula pamue ne nyama
Muntu yonsu wa kunudi anemeke tatuende ne mamuende, mundi munuambile
Nuditengule mu mitshima yenu, kanuikadi bantu ba tshitshu kabidi
Moshe uvua uyukila ne Mvidi Mukulu, Mvidi Mukulu umuandamuna ne diyi bu dia dikubakuba dia mvula
Hashishe Zelubabela, muana wa Shaletiele, ne Yeshua, muana wa Yozadaka, bakajuka, bakabanga kuasa nsubu wa Nzambi udi mu Yelushalema; baprofete ba Nzambi bakadi n abo, bakabakuatshisha

Mu tshikondo atshi hakadi Eli mulale mu muaba wandi mesu andi akavua bileshileshi, kakamanya mua kutangila bimpe ; muinda wa Nzambi kawakanji kujima ne Samuele wakadi mulale tulu mu ntempelo wa Yehowa kuakadi mushete wa Nzambi: Yehowa wakabikila Samuele, ne yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Nudikebele bisosa nkayenu kuonsu kunudi basue

Mulambu wa mutuangaji munene Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Padi muntu muenze bualu bubi mu mpukapuka, kayi mulonde mikenji ya Maweja Nangila, numukobolole nunku: Padi mutuangaji munene muenze bualu bubi, budi butampakena bena Izrayele bonsu, udi ne bua kudikobolola
Tatuende wa mukaji neambile bakulu abu ne: Nsongalume ewu uvua musele muananyi wa bakaji
Nuimanyine amu pambelu, bua muanenu awu anutuadile tshintu tshia tshieya nkayende

Yakoba wakambila Shimeona ne Lewi ne, Nuenu nuakuntatshisha, nuakunvuisha bu tshintu tshibi munkatshi mua bena buloba munkatshi mua Bena Kanana ne Bena Pelese, tuetu tudi bakehe ne bobo nebunguile kundi, nebanshihe, nebahaule nsubu wanyi ne meme nenjimishibue

Lewitiki Bakuidi Bikale ba Tshijila Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile bakuidi, bana balume ba Alona, ne, Nansha umue wabo kadinyangi bua bantu bafue badi munkatshi muabo, anu bua bana babo, nansha mamu andi nansha tatu andi, nansha muan andi mulume, nansha muan andi mukashi, nansha muan abo wa balume, nansha muan andi mukashi utshidi kamama, udi kayi ne mulume, yeye udi mua kudinyanga bua bualu buandi
Nunku bantu bonso ba mu buloba bakasanka, musoko wakadi ne ditalala bakashihabo Atalaya ne muele wa nvita
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne bena mu bukalenga buende kumvua ne: bena Izrayele mbamane kunyema

Bikala bena lukuna bahite Bena Isalele bukole, bualu bua bobo bakukuenzela wewe bibi, ne bialukilabo bua kutonda mibi yabo kudi dina diebe, biakutendelelabo ne biakutendekenabo mu nsubu eu, unvue biebe mu diulu, ubuikidile bantu bebe Bena Isalele mibi yabo, ulue n abo kabidi mu buloba buwakabaha ne batatu abo

Nomba Kubala kua Bungi bua Bantu ku Moaba Hashishe hakashika disama, Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi ne, Nubale bungi bua bantu ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, ba mu bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, badi bamanye mua kuya mu nvita ya Bena Isalele

Hanuahanga kuluangana, muakuidi neasemene ha buihi ne bantu, neabambile ne, Bena Isalele, unvuai, nuakusemena hehi ne bantu badi n enu lukuna bua kuluangana n abo lelu: kanuikadi ne mitshima mitekete, kanuikadi ne buowa, kanuzakadi, kanubatshinyi; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila, bua kuluangana ne badi n enu lukuna ne bua kunusungila
Kadi bivuaye mufikishe kudi Binyamine bivua bipite bia bana babu misangu itanu
Nenuikale ne biakudia bia bungi
Kadi mukuabo wakabenga ne, Nansha, muana kikadi nansha webe nansha wanyi, bamukose anu bituha

Ku nyima bakadilongoluela bintu biabo ne bia bakuidi, bualu bua bakuidi, bana ba Alona, bakadi bafila milambu ya kuosha ne ya dianyi tô ne hatula butuku; nunku Bena Lewi bakadilongoluela bintu biabo ne bintu bia bakuidi, bana ba Alona

kwikala anyi bwa bangabanga, anyi bupeta Udi mweena Kongu, mmuntu yônso mweena bisamba bieena bantu ne maloba avwa mênza tshidi tshilwa Kongu mpindiewu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata mu tshikondo tshiakapeteka budikadidi
Pashishe kudielabu mpala panshi
Monai bu muakashihibua bena bukitu
Yeye wakadi muakuidi wa Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu
Uwluke dituku dia Dikisha, udinemeke, bualu ndia tshijila

Ditomboka dia Bena Isalele ne Mudimu wa Balumbuluishi Bena Isalele bakenza malu akadi mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, bakakuatshila Bala mudimu; bakalekela Yehowa Nzambi wa batatu abo, wakafunda n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu; bakalonda nzambi mikuabo, nzambi ya bantu bakadi ha buihi n abo, bakayinamina; bakafikisha Yehowa munda

Abashaloma wakabika dinda dionso, wakimana ha buihi ne nshila wa ku tshibi tshia musoko; nunku hakalua muntu ne tshilumbu bua kuyeye n atshi ku tshilumbuluidi tshia mukelenge, Abashaloma wakamubikila, wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi wa ku musoko kai
Ku luseke luandi lukuabo bakalongolola kudi Hashabiya, mukokeshi wa tshituha tshia luseke lua Kila, bua luseke luandi
Butshia pa kabundubundu Abrahame kuya muaba uvuabu bimane ne Maweja Nangila
Bobo nebashikame mu misoko ei, ne bimuna ne bintu biabo ne nyama yabo mikuabo nebikale mu buloba budi bunyunguluka misoko
Nanku Yoshuwa ne bena Izrayele bonsu nebakumbaje bionsu bidi mutuangaji Elazare ubambila

Milambu yabi ya bintu bidibo banua neyikale tshituha tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne tshintu tshisatu tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshinai tshia dikoho dia nvinyo ku muana wa mukoko yonso, eu udi mulambu unudi nuosha ha kahia ku ngondo ku ngondo tô ne ngondo yonso ya mu tshidimu, Nenufile mulume wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi kudi Yehowa ku mutu kua milambu idibo bafila buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Padi mputa awu mondoke, kabidi boya bua muaba awu bukunzubile, buenda butuka, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu ewu mmupie mikiya, bualu udi ne disama dia nsudi ku mutu nansha ku tshibanga
Kabidi, mu bibilu abi, kanushiyi mafuta a nyama inudi nundambula bua kulalawu ne mu dinda to
Balombodi ba bisamba abi bionsu kumupesha makombu dikumi ne abidi
Mukelenge wakitabusha malu au onso bualu bua tshianza tshimpe tshia Nzambi wanyi tshiakadi kundi
Bakafika ku muaba wakamua mbila Nzambi, ne Abalahama wake nza tshioshelu, wakalongolola nkunyi, wakasuika muan andi Isaka, wakamuladika ha tshioshelu ha mutu ha nkunyi

Bikala bantu ba mu nsubu banya banya, muena nsubu neatahulule muana wa mukoko ne muena nsubu udi hehi n andi ku bungi bua bantu badi mu nsubu, bobo babale bungi bua bantu badi mua kudia muana wa mukoko umue
Katuena bashiye muntu ne muoyi to

Yeye udi udianjila kudisunguila tshituha tshiandi, bualu bua etshi ntshituha tshia mukokeshi, wakalua n atshi kudi ba ku mutu kua bantu; yeye udi ujadika dilumbulula diakane dia Yehowa, ne mikenji yandi kudi Bena Isalele
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuangata dima, kufuka nadi mulume, kumuela mueyelu wa muoyi mu mimpempe ya diulu, mulume kushala tshifukibua tshidi tshienda ne muoyi
Mu luendu alu, dituku dikuabu kumonaye tshiina tshia mayi mu mpata, tshibuikila dibue dia bujitu
Muana wa balume wa bimuna abi, neashale kudi mamuende anu matuku muanda mutekete

Dishiya dia Yadene mu buloba bua Moaba, Mose wakabanga kubamanyisha bua mikenji ne, Yehowa Nzambi wetu wakatuambila mu Holeba ne, Nuakumana kushikama musangu mule mu mukuna eu: bishai luendu luenu, yai bienu ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, ne ku miaba yonso idi hehi n abo mu Alabâ ne mu mikuna ne mu bibanda, ne mu luseke lua ku Sude, ne hehi ne muelelu wa mai manene, mu buloba bua Bena Kanâna ne mu Lebanona tô ne ku musulu munene dina diau Pelata

Bualu ku bisamba bionsu, nansha bidi ne bantu bapite bungi, kakuena tshisamba tshidi ne mvidie pabuipi natshi, bu mudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu pabuipi netu, misangu yonsu itudi Kunubikila, tumulomba diambuluisha
Hashishe Sihona wakalua kutudi ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu nvita ku Yahasa
Bena Amaleke ne bena Kenaane ke badi basomba mpindiewu mu bibandabanda bia ditunga adi
Bikala tshintu atshi ha bulalu buakadiye anyi ha tshintu tshiakashikameye hakatshilengeye, yeye neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Nunku kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Hakakumbana matuku makumi anai Noa wakunzulula ha disoso dia buatu diakenzeye

Hashishe nenulue ne bintu binakanuambila ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi; milambu yenu ya kuosha ne nyama yenu mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu kunudi nuditshiha n aku kudi Yehowa
Nudi mua kudia munyinyi wa kabuluku ne wa mbashi bu mudi bakuabo badia; badi kabayi bakane ne badi bakane badi bamanye mua kudia
Yehowa neanuluile nvita yenu, nenuikale holâ
Kanungu ka Budikadidi bwa kwenza bisangilu kabiyi ndululu ne bia lufu budi bwanyishibwe kadi anu mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bia mulowo
Yehowa wakadi ne Alona tshiji tshikole bua kumushiha; nakalombela Alona musangu eu kabidi
Tshitekelu tshia miendu tshivua tshifula ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi nkayatshi, biangatshile ku dikasa diatshi too ne ku tshilongu tshiatshi tshia ndekelu
Kabidi nudi mua kuadila amu muaba wa tshijila
Yoshua wakambila bantu ne, Nudijidile, bualu bua makelela Yehowa nênze malu a kukema munkatshi muenu
Yehowa wakumpa mabue au abidi akadi mafunda ne munu wa Nzambi; akadi mafundahu mei onso akanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu
Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi badi munkatshi muabo udi ulemba nyama anyi nyunyu bua kudia neahongolole mashi andi hanshi, neajibikile ne dinfuenkenya dia buloba
Ke muvua bankambua ba bena Levi ne ndelanganyi yabu nanku
Shawule, wa mu tshimenga tshia Rehobote, ku muelelu wa mayi
Kadi uvua mupitshile patupu ku nzubu ya bana betu, kayi muimane bua kubashipa
Pashishe kufuaye

Kanungu ka : Ku bukookeshi bwa baminisitila badibo batwa mu nyima, baminisitila bindonda badi bakumbaja makookeshi adibo babapeesha kudi olodonase udi utangila bulongolodi ne ngenzelu wa mudimu wa Bukalenga bunene
Mitshi yonso yakambila mutshi wa nfigi ne, Lua biebe, ubukokeshe
Kututuadilabu bimuma bivuabu bapole mu ditunga adi, bajadikila ne: Ditunga didi Maweja Nangila wetu mutupeshe, didi dimpe ditambe
Mena a misoko ei akadi: Besê mu tshihela, mu muaba wa mpata, wa mu Bena Lubena; ne Lamota mu Gilada wa Bena Gada; ne Golana mu Bashana wa Bena Manashe
Pula, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakalua bua kuhaula buloba
Mei au anakukuambila lelu eu ikale mu mutshima webe; wewe newayishe bana bebe, wewe neusombelele n abo bua mei au, hawashikama mu nsubu webe, ne hawenda mu nshila, ne hawalala, ne hawabika
Kadi Yehowa kena muanze kunuha mitshima ya kumanya n ai ne mesu a kutangila n au ne matshu a kunvua n au tô ne ku dituku edi
Pikala muntu mupele munkatshi mua bana benu, mu tshimenga tshia ditunga dianupesha Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, unusomba tshintu, kanumuiminyi to
Bishimikidi bidi bitwa mungalata mpanda bidi bimungutuka kakuyi dikonka dia muntu bwaalu to bitwadija ku dishikila dia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, umuambile ne, Lekela Bena Isalele bahatuke mu buloba buebe
Panuikala bamusumbe nkayende, numutekela kabidi anu nkayende
Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Dina diebe nYakoba, kabakubikidi ne Yakoba kabidi, nebakubikile ne, Isalele
Nudi mua kudisumbila bia kudia kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kudia; nenudisumbile mai a kunua kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kunua
Ke muvua ndelanganyi ya Sheme nanku
Bualu nuenu nuvua benyi mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Mikenji ya bena Levi c
Utshienze ne mabaya, ushiye munda muatshi mutuhu, utshienze bu munakukulesha ku mukuna
Bakamukudi muna di ne, Nansha, katuena bamanye mua kuenza nunku, anu hatuasangisha mikoko yonso ne humushabo dibue ku mushiku wa dina, hashishe netunuishe mikoko mai
Ndi Nzambi wa ku Betele kuwakela manyi ha mutu ha dibue, ne kuwakaditshihila kundi, bika biebe, umuka ku buloba ebu, uhingane ku buloba buakakulelabo
Mu Melali muakadi diku dia Bena Mali ne dia Bena Mushi au mmeku a Melali
Gehazi wakamuambila ne, Yeye kena ne muana wa balume ne bayandi udi muntu mununu
Bualu bua dibue diabo kadiena bu Dibue dietu nansha bikala bena lukuna balumbuluishi ba bualu
Bapika abu, nudi mua kubasumba kabidi ku bana ba bantu benyi badi basomba mu ditunga dienu, nansha mu balela ba benyi abu, badibu balelela mu ditunga dienu

Bwalu bônso budi bupangisha disungudibwa tshikondo tshia masungulangana budibo balwa kumanya pashishe kudi beena ku tubadi badi ne bukookeshi budi bufikisha ku dijimija dia ngikadilu wa butshipwita munwamfwanka wa ditunga anyi wa butshipwita mukulumpa
Muntu eu wakaya ku buloba bua Bena Hiti, wakasaku musoko, wakawidika ne Luza; edi ndina diau tô ne lelu
Bana balume ba Yefeta: Gomê ne Magoga ne Madai ne Yawana ne Tubala ne Mesheke ne Tilasa
Rakele kuandamuna Yakobe ne: Angata nansha Bila, mupika wanyi ewu, ashale mukajebe, bua alele bana, bikale banyi
Mumusombuele pende: padiye mushipangane, numushipe pende
Nzambi yenu ibike, inukuatshishe, inulame
Yeye wakabambila ne, Bobo bakadi bana betu, bana ba mamu wanyi mene

Genese Bubi bua Bantu Hakabanga bantu kusangana ba bungi ha buloba ne hakalelabo bana bakashi, bansongalume ba bantu ba Nzambi bakamona bana bakashi ba bantu ba tshianana ne, Mbalengele, bakasungula bonso bakasuabo bu bakashi babo Yehowa wakamba ne, Nyuma wanyi kena utendekena bantu tshiendelele, bualu bua badi anu ba ha buloba, ne matuku abo neikale bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi
Mvidi Mukulu umvu muadi wa muana
Kadi bu muvua Rebeka muikale nkumba, Izake kutendelela Maweja Nangila bua mukajende awu alele muana
Muana mulume wenu wa mukoko neikale muakane ne wa tshidimu tshimue nebamuangate munkatshi mua mikoko anyi mua mbushi
Mutuangaji Elazare kuangata mbabula ya tshiamu tshikunze ya bantu bavua Maweja Nangila muoshe ne muoyi
Kutuminaye Balaame ne bavuaye nabu munyinyi wa milambu ayi
Yeye wa kamba ne, Tangila, ndi muntu mununu, tshiena mumanye dituku dia lufu luanyi
Yeye wakabambila ne, Lelu nakuhita bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi; tshiena mua kuya ne mua kulua kabidi; ne Yehowa wakamana kungambila ne, Wewe kuena usabuka Yadene eu
Mukoshi wa nsambu musomba mu nkwaasa kêna usambasamba to
Hakafikabo ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, umue wabo wakasulula tshi bombi tshiandi bua kudisheye mpunda wandi, wakatangila argent yandi ba mutu ha tshibombi tshiandi
Kutekabu biakudia pa mushiki wa mabue awu

Nendue ne muele wa nvita munkatshi muenu bu musombuedi wa tshihungidi tshianyi, ne hanuadisangisha mu misoko yenu, meme nentume masama makole munkatshi muenu, nennufile mu bianza bia bantu badi n enu lukuna
Yoshua wakambila bantu ne, Nuenu nudi bamanyi ba bualu buenu bunuakadiambila ne, Tuakusungula Yehowa, bua kumukuatshia mudimu
Hashishe Bena Yuda binunu bisatu bakaya ku lubuebue lua mu dibue dia Etama, bakambila Shimishona ne, Kuena mumanye ne, Bena Peleshete badi batukokesha, anyi
Muntu yonsu neafike ne mulambu, bilondeshile mudimu udiye wenza, ne mushindu wikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mumuambuluishe
Yakobe ubamona, kuelaye diyi dikole wamba ne: Muaba ewu mmitanda ya Mvidi Mukulu

Hashishe mukashi, muledi wa muana wakatshidi ne muoyo, bualu bua mutshima wandi wakadi wela majie a muana wandi, wakambila mukelenge ne, Mukelenge wanyi, umuhe yeye muana udi ne muoyo, kabamushihi nansha
Benze nzubu wa tshijila ne ntenta, tshilamba tshia kubuikila pa mutu pa ntenta, nkanu, mabaya, mitshi, makunji ne bitaku
Yehowa Nzambi wakakuma bintu mu budimi ku esete, mu Edene, wakatekamu mulume wakafukeye
Bonso bakadi bashikama n abo bakakolesha maboko abo ne bintu bia argent ne bia or ne biuma bikuabo ne nyama ne bintu bia mushinga mukole, ha mutu ha bionso biakasuabo kufila
Nenuikale ne milau mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa

Mikenji ya bintu bidi bikuata butu nansha nsumba Padi butu bukuata ku bilamba bienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha ku bia ndanda, nansha ku bilamba bia pambidi bienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha ne ndanda, nansha ku bilamba bia biseba, nansha ku bintu bienza ne biseba, padi makeji awu amueneka makunzubile, nansha a mayi a matamba, mutuangaji neakenkete butu abu
Kanujanyi bena diku dienu to
Tshisamba tshia Dane:
Mulekela, ampende, bualu bua Yehowa wakamutuma
Nanku, pavua Moshe ubuela mu ntenta amu, divuba divua dibuikila mu mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta

Anu Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakadi mushale wa Bena Lefa; monai, bulalu buandi buakadi bua biamu; budi mu Laba wa Bena Amona: bule buabu buakadi coudées tshitema ne butshiama buabu buakadi coudées mai
Ke muvua luendu lujima lua bena Izrayele nanku
Nunku Alona wakalua ha buihi ne tshioshelu, wakashihela kana ka ngombe ka mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi

Dutelonone Mua Kufutshisha Mushihianganyi Bubi Buandi Biasanganabo muntu mufue mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu nubuhiane, kabayi bamanye muntu wakamushiha; hashishe bakulu ne balumbuluishi nebaluhuke, nebahime mutantshi kubangila ku muaba udi tshitalu tô ne ku misoko idi ha buihi ne muntu mufue; bakulu ba mu musoko udi utamba ha buihi ne muntu mufue nebangate kana ka ngombe kadi kakayi kanze kuenza mudimu ne tshikokedi; bakulu ba mu musoko nebahueke ne kana ka ngombe mu tshibanda tshidi ne mai adi ahueka, tshidibo kabayi banze kudimamu ne kukunamu bintu, nebatshibule nshingu wa kana ka ngombe mu tshibanda atshi
Ba bana ba Hebelone; Yeliya wakadi kahita, Amalia muibidi, Yahaziele muisatu, Yekamama muinai

Kushikisha Alona ne bana bandi balume kubuikila nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bintu bionso bia mu nsubu, hayabo mu nshila, hashishe bana balume ba Kohata nebalue bua kubituala, kadi bobo kabalengi bintu bia tshijila bianza, bua kabafu

Muakuidi neashikike mukashi ku mpala kua Yehowa, neasulule nsuki ya mukashi, neateke mulambu wa bukula wa tshivulukidi mu bianza biandi, eu udi mulambu wa mukau, muakuidi neangate mai a bululu adi elesha mulau mu tshianza tshiandi

Muakuidi neangate diboko dia tshimpanga diakalambabo, ne mutanda wa mampa adi kâyi ne luevene mu tshisaka, ne mukata udi kauyi ne luevene, neabiteke mu bianza bia Munazi hashikisheye kubeya mutu wandi, muakuidi neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, ebi mbintu bia tshijila kudi muakuidi bidi bisangisha ne tshiadi ne tshibelu bidibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, hashika bualu ebu, Munazi udi mumanye mua kunua nvinyo
Wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha mutu hatshi ne ku nseke yatshi ne ku nsengu yatshi, wakenza tshintu tshia or ku matengu onso
Biakudia kabiena bitoloka to
Kadi Nyuma wa Yehowa wakatuela Gideona; yeye wakela mpungi ne Bena Abiezê bonso bakadisangisha kudiye
Hakaleha matuku makumi anai, Yehowa wakampa mabue au abidi akadi malundahu mei a tshihungidi
Wakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ne musenga wa manananshi ha mutu ha mikuna ne ha tukuna ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi yonso
Bonsu babidi kutungunuka ne luendu

Bualu bua mitshi yabo ya tumuma tukese idi bu mitshi ya mu Sodoma ne ya mu madimi a Amola: tumuma tuabo tudi bu nyongangandu, ne tshisumbu tshia tumuma tshidi ne bululu: nvinyo yabo idi bu lulengu lua nyoka, bu lulengu bikole lua nyoka wa ntoka
Yeye wakakokesha bakelenge bonso ku musulu wa Pelata tô ne ku buloba bua Bena Peleshete ne ku mukalu wa buloba bua Ejipitu
Kanungu ka

Bakatuma mikanda ei mu bianza bia bantu ku nseke yonso ya mukelenge bua kushihabo ne bua kubutulabo Bena Yuda bonso ne batekete ne banunu ne bana bakese ne bakashi dituku dimue, mu dituku dia dikumi ne asatu dia ngondo wa dikumi ne ibidi, ngondo wa Adâ mene, ne bua kuhaulabo bintu biabo bionso

Pashishe, ku munyinyi wa mukoku wa tshimpanga awu, umushe bintu bia mafuta: mukila, mafuta, lutandatanda lua ku mutshima, tshibelu tshia luseke lua balume, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta adi malamataku ne adi malamata ku mala
Ku dituku adi mene bahika ba Isaka bakalua kudiye, bakamuambila bua dina dia mai diakimbabo ne, Tuakusangana mai
Bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua ne bidi bidikoka hanshi kabiena biakane kunudi; kanubidi
Nenku mutuangaji alekele nyunyi uvua mushale ne muoyi, aye mu tshisuku
Yehowa avudishile bintu biandi disanka, itabushe mudimu wa bianza biandi: atshibule nyima ya bantu badi bahika ku mpala kuandi, ne ya badi n andi lukuna bua kababiki kabidi
Awu kumukonka ne: Agare, mupika wa Sarayi, udi ufuma penyi
Yozefe kubeya miedi, kushintulula bilamba, kuya kudileja kudi mukalenga

Davidi wakanyingalala bikole; bualu bua bantu bakadi bahunga dî bua kumukuma mabue; mitshima ya buonso buabo yakanyingalala bua bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi; kadi Davidi wakadikolesha mu Yehowa, Nzambi wandi
Pashishe nebandamune ne: Dikenga edi ndibakuate bualu bena ditunga edi kabena bakumbaje ndondu uvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua babu, mutue nabu pawaye mubapatule mu Ejipitu

Nunku Wambile muntu wanyi Davidi ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nakakûmusha mu luhangu lua mikoko hawakadi ulama mikoko, nakakusungula mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu banyi Bena Isalele; nakadi n ebe ku miaba yonso iwakaya; nakashiha bena lukuna bebe bonso ku mpala kuebe; nenkuvuishe dina dinene bu dina dia bantu banene ba ha buloba
Davidi wakajuka ne bantu bakadi n andi, nkama isambombo, bakaya kudi Akisha, muana wa Maoka, mukelenge wa mu Gata
Kabidi udi uyipia matuku muanda mutekete, uyipisha ne bulalu buonsu budiye ulala
Hashishe Sihona wakalua kutudi ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu nvita ku Yahasa
Mushiki wa mabue ne dibue edi bidi bijadika ne: Meme ne wewe katuena mua kusambuka mabue aa ne meji a kuenzelangana bibi to
Môdekai wakalua ku mpala kua mukelenge, bualu bua Esetê wakamuambila bu muakadiye kudiye
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bikala tatu wandi mumutuile lute ku mesu, yeye wakadi kushala ne bundu matuku muanda mutekete, nansha
Bena Izrayele badi batshimuna mukalenga Sihone Patuvua mu tshipela tshia Kedemote, mvua mutume bantu bua kusengelela Sihone, mukalenga wa mu Eshebone, ne: Tudi basue kupitshilaku mu ditunga diebe
Nanku Arone kakufua to
Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena mumanye, ndi mulami wa muakuny anyi, anyi
Mose wakaya mu tshitudilu, yeye ne bakulu ba Isalele
Moshe kuambila bena Levi ne: Biangatshile ku lelu, nudi badijidile bua kuenzela Maweja Nangila mudimu, bualu nudi bitabe diyi diende, bashipe balele benu bu muvuaye munuambile
Wewe kuena mulue kundi munyi
Nenuyisakidile ku milambu ya kuosha, ku milambu ya bukula, ne ya maluvu a mvinyo, ku milambu ya bobumue, inudi nulambula ku budisuile buenu, nansha bua bualu bunuvua balaye
Kumonaye tshiina tshia mayi muaba awu

Yehowa neanunzuluile masanka adiye n au mu diulu bua kunulokeshila nvula ha buloba mu tshikondo tshia nvula, ne bua kunuvudishila disanka mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nusomba bintu kudibo
Bualu bua kahia kakatemeshibua mu tshiji tshianyi, kadi katema tô ne mu Muaba wa Bafue, kadi kosha buloba ne bintu biakadiundamu, kadi kosha makunshi adi muinshi mua mikuna mile
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Kumuseleshaye ne mukaji, dina diende Asnate, muana wa mutuangaji Potifera wa mu tshimenga tshia One
Nanku ndi nkutuma kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bua uye kupatula bantu banyi bena Izrayele badi mukalenga awu mukuate ku bupika
Numanye ne: Maweja Nangila udi mfumu wa mvidie yonsu, ne mukalenga wa bakalenga
Monai, Yehowa wakunuha dituku dijidila, nunku yeye wakunuha bidia bia matuku abidi ku dituku disambombo, muntu ne muntu ashale mu muaba wandi, kaluhuki mu muaba wandi dituku dia muanda mutekete
Wakidika muana mukuabo dina ne, Efelayima, bualu bua wakamba ne, Nzambi wakunkumbasha mu buloba bua dikenga dianyi
Meme nakadimusha balumbuluishi benu tshikondo atshi ne, Unvuai bilumbu bia bana benu, nulumbulule bilumbu bia muntu ne muan abo mulume ne muenyi udi n andi biakane
Lewitiki Dituku dia Dibuikidibua dia Mibi Yehowa wakayikila ne Mose ku nyima kua lufu lua bana balume ba Alona hakaluabo ku mpala kua Yehowa ne hakafuabo
Aba bonso bakadi bana ba Obeda edome; bobo ne bana babo balela ne bana babo bakadi ne bukole bua kuenza n abu mudimu; ba Obeda edome bakadi makumi asambombo ne bantu bahidi
Tshiena nnulama kabidi to
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ nebashikame hehi n andi
Mukelenge wakambila Abashaloma ne, Nansha, muan anyi, bituaya buonso buetu bualu ebu nebuikale bu bujitu kûdi
Muntu yonsu udi ulenga bulalu buvua mukaji awu mulale, nansha tshintu tshionsu tshivua mukaji awu musombe, asukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Nempe bantu aba dikasa dimpe kudi Bena Ejipitu, ne hayabo, kabena baye ne bianza bituhu
Nunku nuye bienu bualu bua nenumusangane ha diba edi
Hashishe nakaya ku tshibi tshia ku luseke lua mpokolo wa mai ne tshiowelu tshia mukelenge; kadi kakuakadi muaba wa nyama unakadi mubande ha nyima handi kuhitshilaku
Bana ba Yakobe bavua basombe batangilangane ne Yozefe
Hashishe yeye wakatuangana n abo mishiku, bakabandisha mei abo, bakadila

Luta Boaza Udi Ubaka Luta Hashishe Boaza wakaya ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko, wakashikamaku, ne monai, muena tshiota au wakamba Boaza wakahitaku wakamuambila ne, Mulumiana, lua somba aha Yeye wakahuka, wakashikama
Solomo wakasangisha makalu ne bena tubalu; wakadi ne makalu tshinunu ne nkama inai, ne bena tubalu binunu dikumi ne bibidi biakatekeye mu misoko yakadi ne makalu ne hamue ne mukelenge mu Yelushalema
Nakaha Maki Gilada
Kanunugu ka : Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi wimana wambila beena ditunga mianda
Tuakabasa mikete, musoko wa Heshebona udi muhaula tô ne ku Dibona, tuakunyanga buloba tô ne ku Nofa ne ku Medeba

Kanudi tshintu tshidifuile: nudi mua kuha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu atshi, yeye atshidie; anyi nudi mua kutshihanyisha muntu wa bende; bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Mose wakaha Maki, muana mulume wa Manashe musoko wa Gilada ne yeye wakasekamamu
Bamane kumiamina mayi a dituku dia muanda mutekete, muntu awu neasukule bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Muntu mukuabo wakaya kudi mukelenge wandi, wakamuambila ne, Nsongakashi wa mu buloba bua Isalele udi Wamba mei nunku
Dîyi didi dileeja mishindu ya makanyika a dikumbajija, a dilongolola pamwe ne njila ya mwa kualonda
Nebakuhedi tô ne ku tshituha tshia bukelenge
Pashishe munyinyi wa nyama ayi, newikale wenu anu bu munudi nuangata tshiadi ne tshibelu tshia luseke lua balume bia nyama ya milambu ya bobumue

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kadi katangila malomba a ditangilula ngumvwilu wa Dîyi dikulu, pa dilomba dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga , dia Bukalenga bunene, dia Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe, dia Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia Batshipwita munwamfwanka, dia tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena tshibambalu tshimwe ne tshimwe tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, dia banguvenêla ba polovensa ne dia balombodi bia bimamwenda wa bukalenga bia polovensa
Yehowa neanumuangalashe munkatshi mua bantu bakuabo, nenuikale bantu bakehe munkatshi mua bisamba mudi Yehowa unutuma
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Manashe, Gamaliele muana mulume wa Pedasû
Bonsu babidi kutua ndondu
Yehowa wakabishila Bena Isalele musungidi, nunku bakahanduka mu bianza bia Bena Sulia
Bakatonkolola makunshi a mabue a Bâla hanshi, bakashimbula nsubu wa Bâla, bakamuvuisha bu diala tô ne ku dituku edi
Yoshua wakanyenga misoko yonso ya bakelenge aba ne bakelenge bai kabidi, wakabashiha ne muele wa nvita, wakababutula, bu muakamba Mose, muntu wa Yehowa
Hashishe bakaya lubilu, muntu ne muntu, wakangata tshilulu tshiandi, bakabijingila muinshi mua makasa andi hanshi ha tshibandilu, bakela mpungi, bamba ne, Yehu udi mukelenge
Adi a njila umwe anyi a mantonya

Yehowa wakangambila kabidi ne, Nakatangila bantu aba ne mona, badi bantu ba tshitshu; undekele, bua meme neashihe, nenjimishe dina diabo muinshi mua diulu; meme nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshidi tshibahita bunene ne bukole
Bakenza bifuanyikishi bia maoshi muinshi mua mubangu wa tshiowelu, makumi abidi ku coudée ne ku coudée: maoshi akadi mu milongo ibidi hakahongololabo tshiowelu
Maweja Nangila kukengesha bena Izrayele, bualu bavua bambila Arone bua kubenzela lupingu lua kana ka ngombe
Aba mbana bakaleleye mu Yelushalema: Shamua ne Shobaba ne Natana ne Solomo ne Yibehâ ne Elishua ne Elepeleta ne Noga ne Nefege ne Yafia ne Elishama ne Bêleyada ne Elifelete

Hakaluabo n andi ku Lehi, Bena Peleshete bakela tshibingu hakasangakenabo n andi; Nyuma wa Yehowa wakamutulukila bikole, ne mionshi yakadi ku maboko andi yakavingutuka bu nuosha mu kahia, ne nkanu yandi yakakohoka ku bianza biandi
Nunku Solomo wakashikisha nsubu wa Yehowa ne nsubu wa mukelenge; Solomo wakamana malu onso bimpe akadi mu mutshima wandi bua nsubu wa Yehowa ne bua nsubu wandi kabidi
Nendengeshe n enu ne tshinyi bua nuenu nuvudishile buhianyi bua Yehowa disanka
Masanka Majalame Ek
Mushindu wa kufila tshia dikumi Ku tshidimu tshionsu, nusunguile Maweja Nangila tshia dikumi tshia bia mu madimi enu
Bakabuela munda mua nsubu bu bantu bakadi bangata blé; bakamutua muele muinshi mua mbale; Lekaba ne muakuny andi Bana bakanyema
Nufunde mena a bantu balume bonsu ku muntu ku muntu, bilondeshile meku abu ne bisamba biabu
Abrame udi ufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane Bobu bamane kufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane, kupitshilabu mu ditunga adi too ne ku mutshi wa tshijila uvua mu Moreya pabuipi ne musoku wa Shekeme
Nudimuke bualu bua disama dia nsudi, bua nuenu kuenza malu onso bimpe adi bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi banuyisha: bu munakabambila bobo, nuenu nuenze nunku

Nehemiya Kutendelela kua Ezela bua Kutondabo Mibi kudi Bena Isalele Bena Isalele bakadisangishaku mu dituku dia makumi abidi ne anai dia ngondo eu, bakajila bia kudia, baluate bilulu bikayabala, bakadiela luhuishi ham bidi
Ambila amu bantu ne: nutungunuke ne luendu

Kadi bikala muntu ne muena mutumba n andi lukuna, umualamina, ubika, umutaha tô ne hafileye, ne bianyemeye ku umue wa misoko ei; hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebatuale bantu, nebamukuatemu, nebamufile mu bianza bia musombuedi bua kufueye
Bualu bukuabo, wewe kuena muanze kulua n etu mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, kuena mutuhe buhianyi bua madimi ne madimi a tumuma, udi musue kuvuisha bantu aba bafofo, anyi
Bakambila Môdekai mei a Esetê
Bakumuka ku mukuna wa Shefe, bakashikama mu Halada
Kadi yeye wakamuambila ne, Uhe bantu, badie, bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bobo nebadie ne bintu nebishale
Dibadika Tshitekelu tshia miendu Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe, bua ambile Arone ne: Paudi utemesha miendu muanda mutekete, uyiteke bimpe bua itokeshe kumpala kua tshitekelu tshia miendu
Moshe ne Arone kuya kuimana kabidi muaba awu
Bua bubi buenu ebu, Maweja Nangila mmumfikile kabidi ne meme munda, unkandika ne: Nansha wewe mene Moshe kuena ufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane to
Bu muakajimisha Yehowa bisamba bikuabo ku mpala kuenu, nunku nuenu nenujimine, bualu bua nuenu nuakahidia kunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Buesha mitshi ei mu nkanu idi ku nseke ibidi ya tshioshelu bua kutshituala

Tshiole tshinene tshiakadi mu Samalea; bakatshintshimika musoko tô ne hakahanabo mutu wa nyama wa mpunda ku nshekele ya argent makumi muanda mukulu, ne tshituha tshinai tshia bibuelelu bia nyunyu wa nkutshi ku nshekele ya argent itanu
Hashishe Hushai wakambila Sadoka ne Ebeyatâ bakuidi ne, Ahitofele wakuambila Abashaloma ne bakulu ba mu Isalele nunku ne nunku; ne meme nakubambila nunku ne nunku
Mukashi wakamuambila ne, Mukashi eu wakungambila ne, Tufile muan ebe wa balume, tumudie lelu, ne makelela netudie muan anyi wa balume
Kanudi bintu bidi kabiyi biakane
Bena bilengulengu kabakamanya mua kuimana ku mpala kua Mose bualu bua mputa ya mbalanga, mputa yakadi ham bidi ha bena bilengulengu ne ham bidi ha Bena Ejipitu bonso
Nenukute mafu tente, nenusakidile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bualu bua buloba buimpe buakalayeye
Bienzedi bia Ela bikuabo biakenzeye ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi
Hebe, Muena Kena, wakatabuluka kudi Bena Kena bakuabo, bana ba Hobaba, tatu andi muenu wa Mose, wakashimika ntenta yandi hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya mu Sânanima, udi hehi ne Kedeshe

Wakenza mitshi ya acacia itanu ya kubuesha mu mabaya akadi ku luseke lumue lua nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne mitshi itanu ya kubuesha mu mabaya a ku luseke lukuabo lua nsubu, ne mitshi itanu ya kubuesha mu mabaya adi ku nyima kua nsubu ku luseke lua ku wesete

Wambile bantu aba ne, Nenuhite mu buloba bua bana benu, bana ba Esau, badi bashikama mu Sei; bobo nebanutshine, nudimuke bienu; kanutandanganyi n abo, bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba buabo, nansha kaba ka bunene bua dikasa dia muntu; bualu bua nakamana kuha Esau mukuna wa Sei bu buhianyi buandi

Mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete tshia buhika bua Yehoyakina, mukelenge wa Yuda, mu dituku dia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete dia ngondo wa dikumi ne ibidi, mu tshidimu tshiakabanga Ewile melodaka kukokesha mu Babulona, yeye wakabisha mutu wa Yehoyakina, mukelenge wa Yuda, mu nsubu wa lukanu; wakamuambila mei mimpe, wakamushikika mu nkuasa wa butumbi ku mutu kua bakelenge bakuabo bakadiye n abo mu Babulona
Tshiyole kufika mu matunga makuabu onsu
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Esau dina diandi dikuabo Edome
Yeye wakambila nsongalume ne, Ya biebe lubilu, ukebe mikete indi ngela
Nenfunde ha mabue au mei akadi mafunda ha mabue awakashiha, wewe wabueshe mu mushete
Kanungu ka Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi mwa kukwata mudimu menemena anu padi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beenabi bikalaku

Hanakunvua mei â, nakashikama hanshi, nakadila, nakajinga matuku makuabo; nakajila bia kudia, nakatendelela ku mpala kua Nzambi wa mu diulu, nakamba ne, Ndi nkusengelela, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mu diulu, Nzambi munene ne wa ditshina, utu walama tshihungidi tshiandi ne luse luandi kudi badi bamunanga ne badi batumikila mikenji yandi, teleja matshu ebe, ubulule mesu ebe bua wewe unvue kulomba kua muntu webe kudiye ukulomba munya ne butuku bualu bua Bena Isalele bantu bebe, hantshidi ntonda mibi ya Bena Isalele yakukuenzelabo
Yeye wakamulelela kabidi Shâfa, tatu wa Mademana, ne Shewa tatu wa Makebena ne tatu wa Gibea; muana wa bakashi wa Kaleba wakadi Akasa
Lubena wakabambila ne Tshiakanuambila ne, Kanuenzedi muana bualu bubi, kadi nuenu kanuakangunvuila, anyi
Bualu ndi Maweja Nangila
Kadi mukalenga ewu kena mulekele bena Izrayele to, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua mumupeshe muoyi wa tshitunu

Genese Luhanza Lujimina Yosefe wakambila mulami wa nsubu wandi ne, Ûshe bibombi bia balume ne bia kudia tente, bungi bua bujitu budibo mua kutuala, teka argent ya muntu ne muntu munda mua tshîbombi tshiandi
Hakabuelabo mu Samalea, Elisha wakatendelela Yehowa ne, Utabashe mesu a bantu aba bua bobo bamone
Ndelanganyi ya Kayine Kayine kubuelela mukajende mu nzubu
Bende mushinga
Tshibangidilu Mvidi Mukulu udi ulaya ne: Sara nealele muana Maweja Nangila kumuenekela Abrahame ku mitshi ya tshijila ya ku Mambre
Katuakudia bintu ebi mu madilu etu, katuakabilenga hatuakadi banyanguke, katuakabifila kudi bakadi mu madilu: tuakutumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakuenza malu onso akatuambileye
Bena Izrayele bonsu bavuabu babadike bavua bantu balume
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Amasaya kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Moshe kubela lupemba wamba ne: Tshisamba tshia bena Rubene tshishale ne muoyi
Kanungu kisâtu Polovensa ne bitupa bia teletwale bidikadile bia Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata bidi ne bwikadi bwa pa mêyi ne mikandu ne badi babiludika kudi biâpu bia munda mwabi

Mose wakangata bintu mu bianza biabo, wakabisha ha tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kahia, ebi mbintu bia kujidila n abi bakuidi bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa eu udi mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Gada, tshisumbu tshia bantu netshimunguile, kadi yeye neabakume ku bikankanyi biabo
Arone neakule ne bantu, ubambila malu auvua ne bua kuamba wewe
Bena Amole bakadi bashikama ku mikuna bakaluhuka kunudi, bakanuihata bu mbulubulu, bakanunyemesha mu Sei tô ne ku Hôma
Wakaya, wakenza bu mu dî dia Eliya; ne yeye ne mukashi ne bonso ba mu nsubu wandi bakabidia matuku a bungi
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji

Nakumana kuamba ne, Nennuhatule mu dikenga dia Ejipitu, nendue n enu mu buloba bua Bena Kanana ne bua Bena Hiti ne bua Bena Amole ne bua Bena Pelese ne bua Bena Hiwi ne bua Bena Yebuse, mu buloba budi ne mabele ne buitshi bia bungi
Bakuidi bakitabusha ne, Katuena tuangata argent kudi bantu kabidi, kadi katuena tulongolola miaba mishimbuke ya mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Moshe ne Arone ne: Nulame bena Kekate bimpe bua bashale ne muoyi munkatshi mua bena Levi bakuabu
Nanku kusanganaye muntu awu ne tumelu tuende ku tshiina tshia mayi
Muntu udi ushihela nzambi mikuabo nyama, kayi uyishihela Yehowa nkayandi, nebamushihe yeye
Kadi katataka ulue ne muimbi wa tshisanji kundi

Hanuashikisha kufila tshia dikumi tshia bintu bienu bionso mu tshidimu tshisatu tshidibo bafila tshia dikumi tshia bintu, nenubale Bena Lewi ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila; nunku bobo nebadie mu misoko yenu, nebukute

Kanubatshinyi: nuvuluke malu akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Palô ne Bena Ejipitu bonso; mateta makole anuakatangila ku mesu, ne bimanyinu, ne malu a kukema, ne tshianza tshikole ne diboko diolola wakanuhatula n abi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nênzele bantu bonso banudi nutshina nunku
Umpe bakashi banyi ne bana banyi, banakakukuatshila mudimu, undekele, nenye, bualu bua wewe udi mumanye mudimu unakukuenzela
Arone neateke miendu pa tshitekelu tshienza ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi nkayatshi, bua kapia kikale katema kumpala kuanyi meme Maweja Nangila butuku bujima

Muntu udi mupeta bukookeshi bwa kupengama mu njila mululame kêna mwa kubanga mudimu kampanda ônso wa kusalulula bulongama bwa ditunga diende dia bangabanga anyi bwa ditunga dikwabo diônso, yêye mwikala mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata to
Abalama wakadi ne bubanji be bua bimuna ne argent ne or
Nakadiangatshila Bena Lewi mu miaba ya ban a bute bonso munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Hashishe Manoa wakasengelela Yehowa, wakamba ne, Mukelenge, ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua muntu wa Nzambi uwakatuma alue kutudi kabidi bua kutuyisha tshibidi mua kuenzela muana utualela
Muntu, udi kayi ne mikiya, neangate butu bua ngombe mukunze awu, abumushe mu mitanda, abuteke muaba udi kauyi ne mikiya
Hakunvua Bâsha lumu elu, yeye wakalekela kuasa Lama; mudimu wakashika
Nenuikale ne mitshi ya olive mu madimi enu onso, kadi kanuena nudilaba manyi ai ham bidi; bualu bua mamuma neahohoke
Kadi kabakumusha bitendelelu bionso biakadi ku mutu kua mikuna; kadi mutshima wa Asa wakadi muakane kudi Yehowa matuku andi onso
Abimeleke kukema wamba ne: Tshiena mumanye udi muenze nanku to
Yeye wakalekela ngombe yandi, wakalonda Eliya lubilu, wakamba ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua meme kuya kusangana ne tatu wanyi ne mamu wanyi mishiku, hashishe nenkulonde
Bana balume bonso ba bakuidi nebaudie mu muaba wa tshijila, etshi ntshintu tshitambe tshijila
lupetu lusomba munda mwa ditunga bwa majinga a polovensa;

Kadi Bena Yuda ba mu Shushana bakadisangisha hamue mu dituku dia dikumi ne asatu ne mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai kabidi; bakikisha mu dituku dia dikumi ne atanu, bakadisunguila dituku dia kudiabo bidia bia disanka ne musangelu
Bua meme kuamba ne, Ndi ne ditekemena bua kuikala ne mulume butuku ebu bua kundelesheye bana ba balume kabidi, nuenu nenuitabushe bua kubindila to ne hakoldbo, anyi
Yonatana, muana wa Shaula, wakadi ne muana mulume, wakadi mulema
Nuyisangishe kabidi ne milambu yenu ya mapiku ne ya budisuile
Bobo bakafuma kudi kunyi
Kadi mutshi wa olive wakayambila ne, Nshiye mafuta anyi andi ntumbisha n au Nzambi ne bantu kabidi, bua kuya kuhehukahehuka ku mutu kua mitshi mikuabo, anyi
Mbakumbaji tshiuvua mundombe
Kulondolola Bukokeshi bua Yoasha Bak
Dutelonone Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu ya Bena Kanâna Ek
Oshe munyinyi onsu pa nkunyi ya kapia idi pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu wa dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Neasambakaje ne buloba buboya panshi muaba wa tshijila
Bena Lubena bakasa Heshebona ne Eleale ne Kiyatayima, ne Nebo ne Bâla meona bakidika misoko ei mena mahia mahia ne Sibema; bakidika misoko mikuabo yakasabo mena mahia mahia
Esetê Hamana Udi Welela Bena Yuda Tshifufu Ku nyima kua malu a mukelenge Ahashawelosha wakabandisha Hamana, muana wa Hamedata, Muena Agaga, wakamuteka ku mutu kua bantu banene bonso bakadi n andi
Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakabuela mu nsubu, wakashikama ku mpala kua Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa Nzambi, meme nganyi ne ba mu nsubu muanyi mbanganyi bua wewe wakulua n anyi tô ne ku dituku edi

Dituku dia tshivulukilu ne dia disanka Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele mikenji idi ilonda eyi ne: Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa muanda mutekete, ndituku dia tshivulukilu ne dia dikisha
Bena Manashe bakangata bituha dikumi ha mutu ha buloba bua Gilada ne Bashana budi dishiya dia Yadene; bualu bua bana ba bakashi ba Manashe bakangata buhianyi munkatshi mua bana bandi ba balume

Kamuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi buleeja mu tunungu twa , ne twa Dîyi ditudi nadi edi, basungudianganyi ne badi mwa kusungudibwa, bilondeshila makanyika a dîyi, badi beena Kongu balume ne bakaji, bikala bamana kukumbaja mvula dikumi ne mwanda mukulu ya tshileledi ne bikala ne makookeshi abo a bweena mwabo ne a tshidiidi
Bana benu ba balume ne ba bakaji nebambule bintu abi
Nuenu kanuyi bakumbaje mikenji eyi, Maweja Nangila neanukengeshe bikole, nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu yonsu
Kupatulabu Miriyame mu mitanda lumingu lujima
Panudi anu numbenga kanuyi nungitaba, meme nemvudije kabidi makenga enu misangu muanda mutekete
Kumuinyikaye dina ne: Ntenta wa kusambakena
Amukose muminu kumpala kua ntenta, luseke lua ku mutu kua tshilambuilu
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Nuenu bana balume ba Seluya, ndi n enu bualu kai
Mamuende wa Betuyele uvua Milka
Kalongu kitânu : Bidi bitangila ndekeelu wa mudimu wa tshipwita wa ditunga anyi wa tshipwita mukulumpa
Yoshua wakamuangalasha bantu, mu ntu ku buhianyi buandi mundi ku buhianyi buandi
Wakamutuma ku tshibanda tshia Hebelone, ne yeye wakalua ku Shekeme Mulumiana wakamusangana ne, mona, wakadi wendakana mu tshisuku, wakamuebesha ne, Udi ukeba tshinyi
Ndayi nutusumbile ntete ayi bua tumone mua kushala ne muoyi

Anyi Nzambi wakamba kuya bua kudisunguila tshisamba munkatshi mua tshisamba tshikuabo, kudi mateta ne kudi bimanyinu ne kudi malu a kukema ne kudi nvita ne ku tshianza tshikole ne diboko diandi diolola ne kudi malu manene adi atshinyisha bantu bu muakanuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Ejipitu ku mesu kuenu, anyi
Yoaba wakaluangana ne Laba, musoko wa Bena Amona, wakanyenga musoko eu wa bukelenge
Mukelenge Lehabama wakabuela lubilu mu dikalu diandi, bua kunyemena ku Yelushalema
Wakangata bantu bu binunu bitanu, wakabatuma bu balaminyi hankatshi ha Betele ne Ai ku luseke lua wesete lua musoko
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona nebashikame hehi n andi Shelumiele muana mulume wa Sulishadai neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Shimeona
Bakatula tshiamu tshia or to ku muhimbu mukese, bakenza nshinga ya or, bakatshikuma ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzu ne bua lin kudi bantu ba lungenyi lule

Bobo nebanutshintshimike ku bibi bienu bionso tô ne hahona ngumbu yenu yonso inuakueyemena mu buloba buenu buonso; bobo nebanutshintshimike ku misoko yenu yonso mu buloba buonso budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Mukelenge wakimana ku luseke lua tshibi, ne bantu bakaluhuka ku nkama ku nkama, ku binunu ku binunu
Nakuamba anu dî nansha
Boshe munyinyi, tshiseba, mashi ne bunyawu
Shaula wakamba ne, Nuenu bukelenge ba bantu, Semenai ha buihi, tumanye bietu, tujingulule bilengele kuakafuma bualu ebu bubi lelu eu
Meme mumane kulonda bankambua banyi, angata tshitalu tshianyi, uye kutshijika anu muaba udibu bajike bankambua banyi
Yehowa wakahunga n abo tshihungidi, wakabadimusha ne, Kanuena ne bualu bua kutshina nzambi mikuabo, kanuyinaminyi, kanuyikuatshidi mudimu, kanuyifididi milambu ya kuosha ha kahia
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuha buloba abu bu buhianyi: bena nvita nebasabuke ne bintu bia nvita ku mpala kua bana benu ba Bena Isalele

Bualu bua bobo ne bana babo balume bakadiangatshila bana bakashi ba bantu aba bu bakashi babo; nunku bantu ba tshijila bakabuelakana ne bena maloba â; bulelela, bantu banene ne bakokeshi bakadianjila kuenza bubi ebu

Miloho ya Davidi Yoaba wakadi ku mutu kua masalayi onso a Bena Isalele; Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakadi ku mutu kua Bena Kelete ne Bena Pelete; Adolama wakadi ku mutu kua bena mudimu; Yehoshafata, muana wa Ahiluda, wakadi mufundi wa malu a bukelenge; Sewa wakadi mufundi; Sadoka ne Ebeyatâ bakadi bakuidi; ne Ila, Muena Yaî, wakadi muakuidi ku mutu kua miloho ya Davidi
Nunku badi babikila muaba au ne, Gilegala tô ne lelu

Moshe ne Arone pamue ne bamfumu dikumi ne babidi ba meku, mfumu umue ku tshisamba umue ku tshisamba, ke bavua babadike bantu balume bonsu, bavua ne bidimu makumi abidi ne pa mutu, bikale ne bukole bua kuenza mudimu mu bisumbu bishilangane bia tshiluilu tshia Izrayele
Nanku wewe Moshe, usemene kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, uteleje bionsu bidiye ukuambila, utumanyishabi
Hakunvueye dî edi, wakajuka, wakanyema bua kusungileye muoyo wandi; hakafikeye ku Bê sheba wa mu buloba bua Yuda, wakashiyaku muntu wandi
Muana wa masandi kabuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa; ne tunkanuniuna tuandi kaubuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa tô ne hahita bikondo dikumi
Nebakuate bana benu ba balume ne ba bakaji mu bupika kudi bantu benyi, nuenu batangile
Nanku Maweja Nangila kujadika ne: Abrame mmuntu muakane
Hakunvua Hilama mei a Solomo yeye wakatamba kusanka, wakamba ne, Yehowa wakaha Davidi muana wa lungenyi makane bua kukokesheye bantu bandi banene, atumbishibue lelu
Bana bandi ba balume bakadi ne bimuna biandi mu tshisuku Yakoba wakahuwa biandi to ne hakaluabo Hamo, tatu wa Shekeme, wakaya kudi Yakoba, wakayikila n andi
Nuenu nutumikile, nuenze mei onso anakunuambila; kanutentekashi dî dikuabo ha mutu ha mei au, kanûmushi dî ku mei au
KOKOLA udju wagashighaita baba shibaiwan wambe kokola kak tshala muana tseula muana wambe kokola mkana mwana tsheula mwana wambe kokola udju wagashighaita baba shibaiwan wambe kokola
Muntu yonso udi uhidia kunvua mei anyi adiye wamba mu dina dianyi, meme nenkose tshilumbu tshiandi
Bakumukaku, bakaya, bakateka bana ne bimuna ne bintu biabo ku mpala kuabo

Hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebamubikile, nebasombe n andi; ne himaneye, wamba ne, Tshiena musue kumuangata, hashishe mukashi wa muan abo nealue kudiye ku mesu kua bakulu, neambulule tshisabata ku dikasa diandi, neamutuile lute ku mesu; neamuambile ne, Nebenzele mulume nunku udi uhidia kudiundisha nsubu wa muan abo mulume
Nupingane kunu ne bimuma bia mu ditunga adi
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila, uvua munusungule bua nuikale tshisamba tshia tshijila

Bena Izrayele badi babanyangana ditunga dia Ngilaade Ke mutuvua bakuate tshikondu atshi matunga a bakalenga babidi ba bena Amore, bavua base luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua musulu wa Yardene, pankatshi pa musulu wa Amone wa muenji mukole, ne mukuna wa Ermone
Meme kupingana muaba wanyi wa mudimu
Nebabuikile tshilamba tshifikuluke ku tshitekelu tshia miendu, ku miendu yatshi, ku lukuatu, ku mbabula ne ku tulangi tua mafuta
Reyuwele uvua mulele bana ba balume banayi: ke Nahate, Zera, Shama ne Miza
Bujitu bua misamadi buakadi bu nshekele ya or makumi atanu
Muntu wandi wakamuebesha ne, Bundi n abu mbua kuteka bintu ebi ku mesu kua bantu lukama, anyi
Shaula wakamuela difuma bua kumushiheye; nunku Yonatana wakamanya ne tatu wandi wakamana kusungula bua kushiheye Davidi
Bisamba bionsu bivua bimuangalaka pa buloba, mayi a tshipupu mamane kukama, mbifume anu kudi Nowa
Wakambila tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne, Tshiena mumumone; kena mumanye bana babo, kena mumanye bana bandi, bualu bua bobo bakatumikila dî diebe ne tshihungidi tshiebe
Ku nyima kuandi Melemota, muana wa Uliya, muana wa Hakosa, wakalongolola tshituha tshikuabo ku tshibi tshia ku nsubu wa Eleyashiba tô ne ku ndekelu wa nsubu wandi
Kuambilabu bena Izrayele bonsu ne: Ditunga dituvua baye kutentekela didi dimpe ditambe
Lupuishi alu, neluenzeje maputa apatuka tufina pambidi pa bantu ne pa nyama
Gehazi wakasemena ha buihi bua kumusakila, kadi muntu wa Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Umulekele bualu bua mutshima wandi udi unema bujitu munda muandi
Amu kutuadija pa diba adi, mukaji awu kena kabidi ne mikiya ya buvyele to
Kaleba wakamba ne, Muntu yonso watamba musoko wa Kîyata sefe, udi ûnyenga, nemmuhe Akasa, muan anyi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Binasangana bantu bakane makumi atanu mu musoko wa Sodoma, nensungile musoko wonso bua bualu buabo
Tuetu babidi tuvua balote bilota bishilangane butuku bumue
Dutelonone Nuenu nudi bana ba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu: kanuditahi nsalu, kanubeyi makiki enu bualu bua bantu bafue
Pashishe kusuikaye muanende Izake, kumuteka pa tshilambuilu pamutu pa nkunyi
Bakelenge Elisha Udi Uhingana mu Mudimu wa Eliya Hakafika tshikondo tshiakasungula Yehowa bua kuya ne Eliya mu diulu mu nvunde, Eliya wakafuma ne Elisha mu Gilegala
Edi ndisanka dia Yuda; wakamba ne, Yehowa, unvua dî dia Yuda, ulue n andi kudi bantu bandi: bianza biebe bimukoleshe, wikale mukuatshishi wandi kudi bena lukuna
Shaula wakamba ne, Bakulua n ai kudi Bena Amaleka bualu bua bantu katuakashiha mikoko ne ngombe biakatamba bulengele, bua kuyishihela Yehowa, Nzambi webe; kadi tuakashiha bintu bionso bikuabo
Moshe kufunda meyi onsu a Maweja Nangila mu mukanda
Ei idi nyama mudi mua kudia: ngombe ne mukoko ne mbushi, mbashi ne kabuluku ne ntole ne mbushi wa ha mpata, ne lusumbi, ne ngulungu ne mukoko wa mu mikuna
Tshimuangi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Wewe newikale bu Mvidi Mukulu ku mesu kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Moshe kusaya tshimpanga atshi, kutshikosolola mabulu mabulu, kuosha pamue ne mutu, kabidi ne munyinyi wa mafuta
Dina dia muana mukashi wa Ashê diakadi Sela
Udi mua kutubutula anu patupu nanku anyi
MUTU WA MUKANDA VI: Bidi bitangila bishimikidi bia ditwa nabi mungalata mpanda Kanungu ka Mbâsa Kasumbu kakese kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana Ditunga kadi kamanyika mu mêyi a ditunga
Hashishe, wewe umuambile ne, Mbintu bia muntu webe Yakoba
Pashishe kufofomijabu mesu a bonsu bavua ku tshiibi, bansongalume ne bantu bakole, bua bapange kumona tshiibi

Nzambi wakambila Abalahama ne, Bualu ebu kabuikadi bujitu ku mesu kuebe, bualu bua nsongalume ne bua muhika webe, witabusha mei onso akukuambila Sala, unvua dî diandi, bualu bua tunkanunuina tuebe netubikidibue mu Isaka
Yozefe kumuambila ne: Dijingulula dia tshilota tshiebe didi nunku: matamba asatu adi aleja matuku asatu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Tangila, dituku dia lufu luebe dikadi ha buihi: bikila Yoshua, ne bubidi buenu nudisangishe mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bua meme mmudimushe
Kanuangatshi tshintu tshia mabuejila, bualu tshintu tshia nanku tshidi tshipangisha mulumbuluishi mua kuambaye bulelela

Bikala muenyi mushikame munkatshi muenu, anyi muntu yonso muikale munkatshi muenu tô ne ku bikondo bienu bionso udi musue kufila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa, yeye nênze bu munudi nuenza
Numanye ne: idi ne mikiya

Mabanza awu nulekelangane mushindu ewu: padi tshidimu tshikumbana tshia kulekelangana mabanza mu dina dia Maweja Nangila, bantu bonsu bavua basombesha bana babu makuta, kabena mua kunana makuta awu to
Dina diebe nedikale ne lumu lunene
Dibadika Ke Maweja Nangila kuambila Arone ne: Ntelejayi wewe, ndelanganyi yebe ne bana benu bena Levi: bilema bidi bantu benza muaba wa tshijila, nebinutangile nuenu bonsu biangatshile ku lelu
Kadi pikalabu bakuate muivi mu munya, mumushipi udi ne tshilumbu
Uvua utshina ne: Binyamine kapetshi diakabi mu njila

Ku Aloê udi ku muelelu wa tshibanda tshia Ânona ne ku musoko mukuabo udi mu tshibanda tô ne ku Gilada, katuakasangana musoko umue wakatuhita bukole bua kûnyenga; Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafua misoko yonso mu tshianza tshietu; anu buloba bua Bena Amona, katuakalua ha buihi n abu; buloba buonso bua dishiya dia kasulu ka Yaboka, ne misoko ya ku mikuna ne miaba yonso yakatukanda Yehowa, Nzambi wetu

Kadi yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila tubalu tua bungi, anyi bua kuhingisha bantu mu Ejipitu bua kuheteye tubalu tua bungi; bualu bua Yehowa wakamana kunuambila ne, Kanuhinganyi mu nshila au kabidi
Kadi nuenu bavua balamate Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, nutshidi bonsu ne muoyi too ne lelu
Benji ba bilengulengu bamone nanku, kuambilabu mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne: Ebi bidi bienzeka ku bukole bua Mvidi Mukulu
Bamonyi ba bualu nebolole bianza kudiye diambedi bua kumushiha, ne ku nyima bantu bonso nebolole bianza biabo
Yosefe wakatuebesha ne, Kujingulula kua malu kakuena kudi Nzambi, anyi
Biwakengesha bana banyi ba bakashi, anyi biwabaka bakashi bakuabo, kakuena mumanyi mukuabo hankatshi hetu, anu Nzambi udi mumanyi wa bualu buetu, meme ne wewe
Nuenu nuakangambila ne, Bualu buwakuamba budi buimpe bua tuetu tuenze
Ekesode Mikenji ya Kuhingashila Bakuabo Bintu Biabo Biba muntu ngombe anyi mukoko, biamushiheye anyi biamuhaneye, yeye neahingashe ngombe itanu ku ngombe umue, ne nukoko mai ku mukoko umue
Nzambi Udi Ukengesha Bena Isalele Nom
Nunku tuakajila bia kudia, tuakananukila kulomba Nzambi wetu bualu ebu; yeye wakatunvuila

Masanka Alualua kudi Batumikidi ba Yehowa Binunvua mikenji ei, binuayenza, hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nênze tshihungidi ne luse biakalayeye batatu benu: yeye neanusue, neanusankishe, neanuvudishe, yeye neasankishe bana benu kabidi, ne bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba buebe, midioko yenu, ne nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, ne manyi enu ne bana ba ngombe yenu ne bana ba mikoko yenu, mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu bua kunuhabu
Muntu yonso udi udia mashi nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Muprofete udi udiambila mei mu dina dianyi ne dikamakama andi tshiyi mumuambile anyi udi wamba mei mu dina dia nzambi mukuabo, muprofete au neafue biandi
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne nyama udi ne mulau

Eu udi mudimu wa bana balume ba Kohata udibo benza ne bintu bia tshijila mu ntenta wa kusambakena, hayabo ku luendu Alona neabuelemu ne bana bandi balume nebatuhe tshilulu tshikudika, nebabituale hatshi mushete wa Nzambi, nebâteke tshibuikilu tshia biseba bia nkonge ha mutu hatshi, nebâteke tshilulu tshifike ha mutu hatshi kabidi, nebabueshemu mitshi ya mushete
Kadi kena muyipete to
Bualu bua nsubu wa kusambakena wa Yehowa wakasabo kudi Mose mu tshihela ne tshioshelu tshiandi biakadi ku mutu kua mukuna wa Gibeona mu tshikondo atshi

Milambu ayi ikale ya mushindu ewu: ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi, ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole ne ya tshiamu tshikunze, bilamba bifikuluke, bikunzubile, bikunze kunzuu, bilamba bia ndanda ne bia boya bua mbuji, biseba bia mikoku ya bimpanga bilaba kakula, biseba bia nyama ya nkonga wa mu mayi, mutshi wa ndunga ne mafuta a kuela mu muendu, manananshi a kusambakaja ne mafuta a kulaba, manananshi makuabu a kuosha, mabue a mushinga mukole a kuteka mu tshilamba tshia efode tshidi mutuangaji munene uvuala, ne tshilamba tshidiye uteka pa tshiadi

Wakasa bitendelelu bia ku mikuna biakashimbula Hezikiya, tatu wandi; wakashila Bâla ne Bashela tshioshelu bu muakenza Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele; wakatendelela bintu bionso bia mu diulu, wakabikuatshila mudimu
Meme Maweja Nangila ndi nditshipa, ngela tshianza mulu, ngamba ne: Ndi ne muoyi kashidi ne kashidi
Bu mudi nyunyu wa mukanku unyungisha disua diandi, udi uhahala ha mutu ha bana bandi; nunku yeye wakolola mahuahua andi, wakabangata, wakabatuala ha mahuahua andi
Maweja Nangila kukolesha Abrame ku muoyi, umuambila ne: Bintu biebe kabena babipiana kudi muena mudimu webe to
Kadi bena lukuna babu bavua mua kunseka, kuela meji ne: tuetu ke bavua bababutule, Maweja Nangila kena ne tshidiye wenza

Yehowa wakanunkila dihembu dimpe: Yehowa wakamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Tshiena ngela buloba mulau kabidi bualu bua bantu badi ne meji mabi mu mitshima yabo hatshidibo bitende tô ne hakulumpabo, tshiena njimisha bifukibua bionso bidi ne muoyo kabidi bu munakenza diambedi

Davidi wakamunyenga tshinunu tshia makalu ne bena nvita binunu muanda mutekete bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu ne bena nvita binunu makumi abidi bakadi benda hanshi; Davidi wakakosa tubalu tuabo tua makalu mijilu yatu ya bikono, kadi wakasungula tukuabo tuakakumbana ku makalu andi lukama
Nsubu wakadiye mushikame, nsubu mukuabo wa mu mbalanda, wakadi muasa muomumue
Shemaya muan andi wa balume wakalela bana ba balume kabidi bakakokesha mu nsubu wa tatu wabo bualu bua bobo bakadi bantu ba bukitu
Dishane uvua mulele Use ne Arane

Samuele Davidi ne Beta sheba Ku tshibangidilu tshia tshidimu tshikuabo hakadi bakelenge baluhuka bua kuluanganabo, Davidi wakatuma Yoaba ne bantu bandi bakadi n andi ne Bena Isalele bonso, bakahaula bintu bia Bena Amona; bakatshintshimika musoko wa Laba
Potifare umvua muvua muena kuende umulondela bionsu bivua Yozefe muenze abi, kufikaye munda bikole bitambe
Davidi wakamba ne, Kakuena mukuabo bu au, ûmpe
Bualu bua nakutshina difik a munda ne tshiji tshikole biakadi Yehowa n abi bua kunushiha
Hashishe bobo bakahuwa, kabakadi ne dî dia kungandamuna
Nunku nutangile mukelenge unuakasungula, unuakalomba; monai, Yehowa wakateka mukelenge ku mutu kuenu

Katataka nudikonke munda bua matuku adi ku nyima akadi ku mpala kuenu, katshia Nzambi wafuka bantu ha buloba, ne ku luseke lumue lua diulu tô ne ku luseke lukuabo ne, Bikalaku bualu bunene nunku, anyi bikalabo bunvue lumu lua bualu bua nunku
Bualu kena mua kunufuila luse ku bubi buonsu bunudi nuenza
Tuye kumuhana kudi Bena Yishemaele, katumulengi tshianza, bualu bua yeye udi muan etu, udi musunyi wetu Bana babo bakamunvuila
Nanku bonsu banudi nabu, bambule bia mvita, bapite kumpala kua bana benu bena Izrayele bakuabu, bua kusabuka musulu wa Yardene
Anu meme nkayanyi makenga bungi nunku
Kuambilaye Arone ne: Angata muana wa ngombe mulume udi kayi ne bulema, umulambule Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Hashishe bakabika, bakaya mu nshila butuku abu
Badi ne bua kukosa nyama muminu, muaba udibu bashipela nyama ya milambu ya kuosha

Nenufile bintu ebi kudi Yehowa mu matuku anudi nudia bidia bia Yehowa, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuditshiha n ai ne bintu budi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne milambu yenu ya kuosha ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua ne milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Pa mutu patshi nundambuilepu milambu ya kuosha ne ya ditua ndondu, nusungula munkatshi mua ngombe, mbuji ne mikoku yenu
Bungi bua bana ba balume ba mu ngondo umue tô ne ha mutu buakadi binunu muanda mukulu ne nkama isambombo, bakadi balama bintu bia nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Muaba awu, ke unudi mua kukumbajila bionsu bindi nnuambila
Amu pelabu mpungi, bamue bantu nebasemene ku mukuna

Hakababishila Yehowa mulumbuluishi, hashishe Yehowa wakadi ne mulumbuluishi eu, wakabasungila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo matuku onso a mulumbuluishi eu; bualu bua Yehowa wakadi ukudimuna mutshima wandi bualu bua kutua kua mikemu yabo yakatuabo hakadibo babakengesha ne hakadibo babatatshisha
Ke muvuabu bakumbaje mikenji yebe, banemeke nanku ndondu webe
Kadi panudi nundambula tshimuna ne bulema pambidi, tshiena ngitaba mulambu wenu awu to
Hakadiye uya ku Sikelaga, bakuabo ba Bena Manashe bakalamata kudiye, Adena ne Yozabada ne Yediele ne Mikaele ne Yozabada ne Elihu ne Siletai, tupitene tua binunu bia bantu ba Manashe
Kadi nuenu nuakandekela, nuakakuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu, tshiena nnusungila kabidi
Wikale ufikishe bilumbu bia bantu kudi Mvidi Mukulu
Kena nansha ne muntu udi mua kumujadikila bualu, nansha udi mubumone
Nenubutuke mu ditunga edi dimpe, didiye unupesha
Nuenu nenuihate bantu badi n enu lukuna, nenubashihe ne muele wa nvita
Mulongu onsu wikale ne mikata isambombu
Bualu bua bobo nebakudimune mutshima wa muan enu mulume, bua yeye kandondi meme bua kukuatshileye nzambi mikuabo mudimu: nunku Yehowa neanukuatshile tshiji, neanujimishe lubilu
Meme Maweja Nangila mbajadiki ne: bena Izrayele bonsu mbantu ba tshitunu
Kanuteki tshintu kumpala kua mpofu, bua adishinde panshi

Nebikale bintu biebe munkatshi mua bintu biakajidilabo ku kahia milambu yabo yonso, ne ya bukula, ne ya kubuikila n ai bubi buabo, ne ya kubuikila n ai kusambuka kuabo kua mikenji, milambu idibo bafila kundi neyikale bu tshintu tshia tshijila kûdi ne kudi bana bebe balume
Nenuanyike milambu ha kahia, nenuyidie mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula; nenualukile dinda, nuhingane mu ntenta yenu
