Dina dia muana yonsu dikale difunda pa dibue bu mudi tshitampi
Hashishe, hakabuela diba ne midima yakadiku, tshikutu tshiakadi ne muishi wa kahia ne tshimunyi tshia kalua kakole biakahita hankatshi ha nseke ya minyinyi
Dinda dionsu, kubandaye ku mukuna wa Sinayi ne mabue awu makuate ku bianza bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Abrahame kuamba kabidi ne: Maweja Nangila kabikutondi, ntshidi anu ntungunuka
Bankambua benu makumi muanda mutekete bakaya mu Ejipitu; katataka Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuvudisha bungi bua mitoto idi mu diulu
Pavua bimuna binua mayi awu, bimpanga bivua bikuata mashina
Nkanu, mitu ya makunji ne milonda, bivua bia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikila Moshe kumuambila ne: Nuenu bantu balume, bakaji benu ne bana, nuye kutendelela Maweja Nangila, kadi bimuna bienu, mikoku, mbuji ne ngombe, bishale munemu

Eu mmukanda wakadi Tatenai, gouverneur wa buloba bua dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, ne Shetâbozenai ne Bena Afâsateka, bena mulongo wandi, bakadi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, batumine mukelenge Dayawesha; bakamutumina mukanda wakadi mufunda nunku: Ditalala dionso dikale kudi mukelenge Dayawesha
Nudi bamanye bimpe ne: bakaji ba bena Madiyane aba ke bavua bitabe meji a Balaame, bafikishe bena Izrayele ku ditombokela Maweja Nangila, bua kutendelela anu mvidie wa ku Peyore
Hakatantamaneye bikole nunku, muleleshi wakamuambila ne, Kutshinyi, bualu bua wewe neulele muana wa balume mukuabo
Hakalela Shela Ebê, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne bisatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi

Binuasangana muntu mu misoko idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, nansha mulume nansha mukashi udi wenza bualu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ushiha tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, wakaya bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu, ne wakayitendelela, nansha diba nansha ngondo, nansha bintu bikuabo bia mu diulu bindi muhidie; bikalabo banuambile dî edi anyi binuikala bunvue lumu lua bualu ebu ku matshu, nenukebakebe tô ne bikala bualu ebu bua bundu buenjibue bulelela mu Isalele, hashishe nenulue ne muntu wakenza bualu bubi ebu ku bibi bia musoko, nansha mulume nansha mukashi, nenubakume ne mabue, nenubashihe
Bualu bantu bavua badianjila kusomba mu ditunga edi, bavua benza buenzayi ebu, ditunga kupia mikiya

Mukalu wabo wakadi ku Helefe ku mutshi wa telebinta wa mu Sananima ne Adami nekeba ne Yabenele tô ne ku Lakuma; wakahatukila ku Yadene; mukalu wakayila ku Azanotatabô, ku wesete, wakayila ku Hukoka; wakafika ku Zebuluna ku sude ne wakatua ku Ashê ku wesete, ne ku Yuda ku Yadene kudi kuhatukila diba
Yehowa, nakuindila luhandu luebe
Yai, muana mulume wa Manashe, wakangata luseke luonso lua Âgoba tô ne ku butshika bua Bena Geshû ne Bena Mâka, wakidika buloba bua Bashana bu dina diandi ne, Hawota yai tô ne ku dituku edi
Hakambeye kufua, bakashi bakadi bimana ha buihi n andi bakamuambila ne, Kutshinyi, bualu bua wewe wakulela muana wa balume
Nuenu nulonde Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numutshine, nutumikile mikenji yandi, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nulamate kudiye
Muntu kai munkatshi mua bantu bonso wakunvua dî dia Nzambi wa muoyo, diakafuma munkatshi mua kahia, bu tuetu tuakulua, ne wakashala ne muoyo
Hashishe nakabadimusha, nakabakonka ne, Nudi nulala ku mbelu kua musoko bua tshinyi
Bana ba bakuidi: bana ba Habaya, bana ba Hakosa, bana ba Bâzilai, nguakabaka mukashi wa mu bana ba Bâzilai, Muena Gilada, wakidikibua dina diabo
Nunku Bena Lewi bakahuwisha bantu bonso ne, Nuikale talalâ, bualu bua edi ndituku dia tshijila, kanunyingalashi mitshima yenu
Diambedi tshiakadi mbungama ku mesu kuandi

Hashishe mukashi wakalua, wakambila bayandi ne, Muntu wa Nzambi wakalua kundi, mpala wandi wakadi mufuane mpala wa muanjelo wa Nzambi, wakuntshinyisha; meme tshiakumuebesha kuakafumeye ne yeye kakungambila dina diandi; kadi yeye wakungambila ne, Mona, wewe newimite difu, neulele muana wa balume; nunku kunu nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, kudi tshintu tshidi katshiyi tshimpe; bualu bua muana eu neikale Munazi kudi Nzambi ku difu diebe, tô ne ku dituku dia lufu luandi
Abrahame kuinyika muana, uvua Sara mumulelele ne: Izake
Reyuwele, muanende mukuabu wa kua mukajende Basmate, udi nkambua wa bamfumu bakuabu bavua basombe mu Edome: ke Nahate, Zera, Shama ne Miza

Bakafika kudi Hilekiya muakuidi munene, bakafila kudiye argent yakaya n ai Bena Lewi, balami ba ku bibuelelu, yakasangishabo ku bianza bia Bena Manashe ne Bena Efelayima ne kudi difuka dia Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina ne bonso ba mu Yelushalema mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Bijanu bidi bena Izrayele bakujana nabi nebijike
Bantu badibu babadike bua benze mudimu mu bisumbu bia tshiluilu, nebabalombole kudi mfumu wa tshisamba tshiabu: Mfumu wa bena Yuda: ke Nashone, muana wa Aminadabe, ne bantu bende
Bobo nebadie, muntu tshituha tshiandi muntu tshituha tshiandi ku mutu kua buhianyi bua batatu abo buakahanabo
Yeye wakamba ne, Mukelenge, kukuatshi tshiji, nengakule musangu eu, bikalamu bantu bakane dikumi Yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko bualu bua bantu dikumi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Igala, muana mulume wa Yosefe
Ndi Maweja Nangila
Bena Lewi: bana ba Yeshua ne Kadamiele ne ba Hodaweya, makumi muanda mutekete ne banai
Nzambi wakamba ne, Mulu muikale hankatshi ha mai a ha buloba ne mai a mu diulu
Mena a bamfumu abu adi nunku: Shamuwa, muana wa Zakure, wa mu tshisamba tshia Rubene
Dutelonone Mabue a Mikenji Mifundibue Tshiakabidi Ek
Nuenu nenusankishibue ku mutu kua bantu bonso: nansha mulume nansha mukashi munkatshi muenu anyi munkatshi mua bimuna bienu nebikale nkumba
Ebu bualu buakenza bantu aba banene basatu
Mikenji eyi kayena anu meyi patupu, kadi idi inupetesha muoyi
Kadi bobo bakamuambila ne, Nansha, netuhingane n ebe kudi bana benu
Bana ba Yakobe balume mu mpata, kubambilabu bionsu bivua bienzeka abi
Bobo bakaha Yakoba nzambi yonso ya bende yakadibo n ai ne nkanu yakadi ku matshu abo, Yakoba wakabijika muinshi mua mutshi munene wakadi hehi ne Shekeme
Bualu bua bobo badi bu tshisamba tshia bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi, kabena ne dijingulula dia malu munda muabo
Wakamuambila ne, Ulue n anyi, umone lukunukunu lundi n alu kudi Yehowa
Yuda kuambila kabidi tatuende ne: Tatu, anyisha tuye ne Binyamine
Mukelenge wakakohola kakanu ka ku munu wandi, wakakafila kudi Hamana, muana wa Hamedata, Muena Agaga, muena lukuna wa Bena Yuda
Bantu bonsu ba pa buloba mbafume anu kudi bana aba basatu ba Nowa

Pikala muena Levi umuka mu tshimenga tshia bena Izrayele mudiye musombe, bua kuya muaba wikala Maweja Nangila musungule, neenzele Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wende mudimu muaba awu, anu bu mudibu benza kudi bena Levi bakuabu badi benza mudimu mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu
Kadi, bua kubikila bena Izrayele bonsu muaba umue, bele amu mpungi kukuyi bibingu
Padibu bamane kushinguila nzubu awu, mutuangaji usangana butu kabuyi bumueneka tshiakabidi, neambe ne: nzubu ewu kena mupie mikiya to, bualu butu mbujike buonsu
Pashishe mesu abu bonsu babidi kutabala
Nenubahe kabidi bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi, ne tshia nvinyo muhia muhia, ne tshia manyi enu, ne miosa ya mikoko

Eliya ne Mukashi wa mu Lufuila wa ku Salefata Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudiye ne, Juka biebe, uye ku Salefata wa mu buloba bua Sidona, sombaku, bualu bua nakelela mukashi wa mu lufuila mukenji bua kukudisha kuinaku
Nembutule kabidi nyama yonsu minene ne mikese too ne nyunyi yonsu idi ibuka mulu, bualu ndi ne kanyinganyinga bua pandi mubifuke
Nudi basue kupumbisha bena Izrayele bua kufikabu mu ditunga didi Maweja Nangila mubapeshe anyi
Kumukeye mu nsubu wandi, yeye udi mua kuikala mukashi wa munga muntu
Usuike nkanu ayi ku mabaya bua kubuejamu mitshi ya kuambuila mesa
Nyama ya mpunda ya Kishi, tatu wa Shaula, yakajimina
Kadi, padi mutuangaji musumbe mupika, nansha bobu balele mupika mu diku diende, mupika awu udi mua kudia biakudia bia tshijila
Yeye neanutumine masama onso a mu Ejipitu anuakatshina; masama au neanulamate nuenu
Mabue awu, ikale dikumi ne abidi, bungi bua bana ba Yakobe
Lupuishi kuandamuka tumue mu ditunga dionsu dia Ejipitu
Disama dia Hezikiya Mu matuku au Hezikiya wakadi usama, lufu luakamutonda; yeye wakalomba Yehowa; yeye wakamukudimuna dî, wakamulesha bualu bua kukema
Matuku ende onsu a panu kena mua kumubenga to
Tshibangidilu Diledibua dia Ismayele Sarayi, mukaji wa Abrame, kavua mulele muana to
Abimeleke kumukonka ne: Wenji nanku bua tshinyi

Nomba Tshitudilu ne Balombodi ba Bisamba Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele nenshimike ntenta wandi hehi ne dibendele diandi, didi ne bimanyinu bia nsubu ya batatu abo bifundahu, nebashimike ntenta yabo minyunguluke tshitendelelu mitangile ku tshitendelelu
Tshimuangi Moshe uvua udisha bimuna bia tatuende muenu Yetro, mutuangaji wa mu Madiyane
Nunku bakakonkangana ne, Shaula kabidi udi munkatshi mua baprofete, anyi

Hakadibo anu bantu banya banya bua bungi buabo, e, hakadibo bantu banya banya be, ne hakashikamabo mu buloba bu benyi; hakendakanabo ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba, ne ku bukelenge bumue tô ne kudi bantu bakuabo ba bende, kakitabusha bua muntu umue kubenzela bibi

Yeye wakashiha Muena Ejipitu, wakadi muena bukitu; Muena Ejipitu wakadi ne difuma mu tshianza tshiandi; kadi Benaya wakaya kudiye ne mulangala, wakanyenga difuma dia Muena Ejipitu mu tshianza tshiandi, wakamushiha ne difuma diandi mene
Pashishe kubikilaye kabidi bana bonsu ba balume ba Arone, kubalaba mashi ku nsongu yabu ya matshi, ku biala ne ku minu minene ya bana ba nkasa bia ku luseke luabu lua dia balume
Bana balume ba Hama: Kusha ne Miselayima ne Puta ne Kanâna

Yehowa wakasomba n enu mpala ha mpala ha mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, Meme nakimana hankatshi henu ne Yehowa tshikondo atshi, bua kunulesha dî dia Yehowa; nuenu nuakatshina bualu bua kahia, kanuakabanda ku mukuna; yeye wakamba ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Kanushipi muntu
Padiye ulambula mukoku, aye nawu muaba wa tshijila

Davidi wakamba ne, Muan anyi Solomo utshidi nsongalume udi mutekete, ne nsubu utudi tuibakila Yehowa udi ne bua kuikala muakane ne wa butumbi ku nseke yonso ya buloba; nunku meme nembange kusangisha bintu
Kadi luendu kubatonda, kabayi kabidi mua kulama lutulu to
Muena mudimu awu kukonka Abrahame ne: Kadi pikala mukaji awu mubenge bua kumuka mu ditunga diabu bua kusomba kuneku, ndi mua kuya ne muanebe Izake bua aye kusomba kuenu, muaba udi mukaji awu anyi
Yozefe kumuambila ne: Dijingulula dia tshilota tshiebe didi nunku: bisaka bisatu bidi bileja matuku asatu

Ndongamu , diteeja dia tshidiidi tshiônso tshijima anyi mukanda udibo bateela ku tulongo twapitshi badi bawangata bu mwanyishibwa pa kumusha padibo banyishai mukanda wa ditangilula mu mikenji miteeka mu tulongo ne twa kanungu aka

Bena Izrayele badi babanyangana buloba bua Kenaane Mu mpata ya Mowabe, pabuipi ne musulu wa Yardene, mitangilangane ne Yeriko, Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua kumanyisha bena Izrayele ne: Panuikala bamane kusabuka musulu wa Yardene, bafike mu ditunga dia Kenaane, nuipate bena ditunga adi bonsu
Badiku bwa beena ditunga bônso ba Kongu

Nenusanke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muntu webe mulume ne muntu webe mukashi ne Muena Lewi udi mu musoko webe ne muenyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi munkatshi muenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi
Diba didi tshijila atshi tshijika, mukaji indile matuku muanda mutekete, bua mikiya ijike
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi, ne bua wewe ukume dikasa dimpe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha
Bana ba Bani, nkama isambombo ne makumi anai ne babidi
Esetê wakasangana luse ku mesu kua bantu bonso bakamutangila
Alambule kabidi kilo isatu ya bukula busambakaja ne mafuta, kabidi ne mafuta tshitupa tshia litre
Bana balume ba Zebuluna ku meku abo Selede ne meku a Bena Selede; Elone ne meku a Bena Elone; Yalele ne meku a Bena Yalele
Kanungu ka Beena Kongu bônso badi momumwe ku mêsu a mêyi ne mikandu ne badi tshia kwikala balamibwa mushindu wa momumwe kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Bintu bivuabu babanyina bena Izrayele bakuabu, bivua anu mushindu umue ne bivuabu babanyine bena mvita
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne mukashi wa tatu wandi udi ne mulau, bualu bua yeye wakavula tshilulu tshia tatu wandi
Mose wakabanda mu mukuna ne difutu diakabuikila mukuna

Buonso buabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne bibidi ne nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo, ha mutu ha bena mudimu babo balume ne bena mudimu babo bakashi bakadi binunu muanda mutekete ne nkama isatu ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete; bakadi ne bimbi ba misambu ne balume ne bakashi nkama ibidi ne makumi anai ne batanu
Netutumikile dî diebe bu mutuakatumikila mei onso a Mose; Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ikale n ebe bu muakadiye ne Mose
Tudi nende ne bumfumu bua mushindu umue ku bintu bionsu, pa kukumusha wewe, bualu udi mukajende
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Ki mmutoyi wa bantu batshimune mvita nansha babatshimune to, ndi ngumvua bantu bimba misambu ya bibilu
Bamonyi ba bualu nebolole bianza kudiye diambedi bua kumushiha, ne ku nyima bantu bonso nebolole bianza biabo
Kadi dituku dia muanda mukulu, mukaji awu angate nkudimba ibidi nansha tumanda nkutshi tubidi, abipeshile mutuangaji mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Hakadi mitshima yabo isanka, bakamba ne, Bikilai Shimishona, alue kutusekesha
Bu bobo bikale ne lungenyi, bakadi kujingulula bualu ebu, bakadi kuela meji a malu atua kudibo

Wewe ubambile ne, Muntu yonso wa mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi badi munkatshi muabo udi ufila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia anyi mulambu mukuabo ne udi uhidia kulua ne mulambu ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena bua kûshihela Yehowa nebumushe muntu au munkatshi mua bana babo
Hashishe mukashi wa lungenyi wa mu musoko, wakela dî diandi ne, Unvuai
Bualu bua bobo bakashiha bantu mu tshiji tshiabo, ne mu tshishiku tshiabo bakakosa ngombe mijilu ya bikono biai
Nenku bidimu bionsu binudi mu bupika mu ditunga dia baluishi benu, ditunga dienu dinuvua bashiye nedipete dikisha, bilondeshile bungi bua bikondu binuvua kanuyi bikishisha buloba
Davidi wakahita Hadadezê, mukelenge wa Zoba, bukole tô ne ku Hamata, hakayeye bua kujadika bukelenge buandi kukala kua musulu wa Pelata

Kadi Selofehada, muana mulume wa Hefê, muana mulume wa Maki, muana mulume wa Manashe, kakadi ne bana ba balume nansha, anu bana ba bakashi; au mmena a bana bandi ba bakashi: Mahala ne Noa ne Hogela ne Mileka ne Tîsa
Nanku panudi nutendelela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, kanuenji muvua bena ditunga benza to
Pashishe uvua mushipe kabidi Datane ne Abirame, bana ba Eliyabe, ba mu tshisamba tshia Rubene

Mu matuku au bantu banene ba nfiondo bakadi ha buloba, ne hakaya bansongalume ba bantu ba Nzambi kudi bansongakashi ba bantu ba tshianana, bakalela n abo bana Bobo bakadi bantu banene ba kale ne ba butumbi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Katuena ne buhianyi mu muana wa Yishai

Muntu wa Nzambi wakasemena ha buihi, wakambila mukulenge wa Isalele ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua Bena Sulia bakamba ne, Yehowa udi nzambi wa ku mikuna, kadi kena nzambi wa mu bibanda, ka meme nenfile tshisumbu etshi tshionso tshinene mu bianza biebe, ne wewe neumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Padiye umona mputa mu dibala mukunzubile, mufuanangane ne wa disama dia nsudi, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu awu mmupie mikiya, bualu disama dia nsudi ndimukuate ku mutu
Diba divua Arone ne bena Izrayele bamone muvua mpala wa Moshe ukenka bikole, kutshinabu bua kufika muaba uvuaye
Tshibangidilu tshia bukelenge buandi tshiakadi Babela ne Eleke ne Akada ne Kalene mu buloba bua Shinâ

Nenuambe ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne, Tuakumusha bintu bia tshijila mu nsubu yetu, tuakabiha Bena Lewi ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila, bu mukenji uwakutuelela, katuakashiha mikenji yebe, katuakuhua mikenji muoyo
Kulondolola Davidi wakadi muntu mununu wa matuku a bungi; yeye wakahingisha Solomo muan andi mu bukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele
Mu dikumbaja dia midimu eyi ne makookeshi aa, Tshibutshilu Tshinene tshia Kongu tshidi tshidikadile ne tshidi ne bukookeshi bwa kudiludika nkayatshi
Sungula luseke luudi musue
Batatu kabafuidi bana babo, ne bana kabafuidi batatu abo: muntu yonso adifuile bua malu mabi andi
Kumusuikishaye nkanu, bobu batangile
Nanku tunuishe tatu wetu maluvu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata Bena Lewi mu miaba ya ban a bute ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, ne bimuna bia Bena Lewi mu miaba ya bimuna biabo, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi meme ndi Yehowa Bua kuhikula ban a bute ba Bena Isalele, nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mutekete ne basatu, badi bahita balume ba Bena Lewi bungi, newangate nshekele itanu ku muntu ne ku muntu bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi nshekele udi bu guéras makumi abidi : wewe neufue nshekele ya bungi buabo buakahikulabo, kudi Alona ne kudi bana bandi balume
Nealongolole mampa dituku dia lumingu ku mpala kua Yehowa ku lumingu ku lumingu, yeye nênzele Bena Isalele bualu ebu bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele
Kukolaye, kushalaye tshilembi tshia buta bua mbale tshia kalanda musenga
Misoko ei yonso yakadi ne mpangu mile ne bibi bikanda ne biamu; tuakanyenga misoko mikuabo ya bungi yakadi kayiyi ne mpangu

Bikala muntu munkatshi muenu udi kayi muakane bua malu akamukuata butuku, hashishe yeye neaye ku mpenge kua tshitudilu, kabuedi mu tshitudilu; kadi hafika dilolo, yeye neowe mai, ne habuela diba, yeye neahingane mu tshitudilu
Kadi Abalama wakambila Salai ne, Mona, muena mudimu webe udi mu tshianza tshiebe, umuenzele bu mûdi musue Salai wakamuenzela bibi ne yeye wakanyema ku mesu kuandi
Kadi bu wewe mua kupeta bantu bakane anu makumi anayi ne batanu, batanu bakuabu kabayiku, neubutule tshimenga tshijima bua batanu abu anyi
Bobo bakantulukisha mu didiku dia dikenga dianyi; kadi Yehowa wakadi tshieyemenu tshianyi
Bualu mulambu ewu ngwa tshijila menemene
Kadi kena mubumvue, nansha munuteleje to
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kumenesha mitshi ya mishindu yonsu pa buloba, mitshi milenga kumona ne mesu, mimpe kudia mukana
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu mumane kuipata muntu mu lupangu lua Edene, kutekaye Bakerubine mu lupangu amu ne muela utema kapia
Benji ba bilengulengu ba bena Ejipitu kuidikija mua kuipata tumue atu, ku majimbu abu
Mukelenge Davidi wakamba ne, Umbikidile Sadoka muakuidi, ne Natana muprofete, ne Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada
Hashishe mukelenge ne bantu bonso bakafila milambu kudi Yehowa
Biakusumbishabo Muena Ebelu mulume anyi Muena Ebelu mukashi, yeye neakukuatshile mudimu bidimu bisambombo; kadi hafika tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete wewe neumulekele

Lufu lua Ban a Bute Hakalua mundankulu Yehowa wakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu, muan a bute wa Palô wakadi ushikama ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge tô ne ku muan a bute wa muntu wa mu nsubu wa lukanu, ne bana bonso ba bute ba bimuna
Kadi bua mikiya ayi kujika, amu yeye mudimiamine mayi a tshijila dituku disatu ne dia muanda mutekete, bua kudikobolola
Bualu bua wewe neutangile buloba budi ku mpala kuebe; kadi kuena ubuela mu buloba bundi mpa Bena Isalele
Kanungu ka Mbulamatadi udi ujadika budikadidi bwa kudisangisha ne bakwabo
Bamane kuenda matuku asatu, Abrahame ukenzakana kumona mukuna awu umueneka pa bule
Utshijidile, bua tshishale tshia tshijila
Nunku mukelenge ne Bena Isalele bonso bakajidila nsubu wa Yehowa

Ku nyima kua kulela kua Hanoka, Yalede wakikala ne muoyo bi dimu nkama muanda mukulu, wa kalela bana balume ne bana bakashi Matuku onso a Yalede akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne makumi asambombo ne bibidi, yeye wakafua biandi
Wakashimbula nsubu ya bena Sodoma yakadi ha buihi ne nsubu wa Yehowa kuakadi bakashi bakuma bilulu bia Bashela
Buloba budi bupeta tshitalela ku mayi a mvula
Yehowa wakabikila Samuele tshiakasatu

Hanuakalua ku muaba eu, Sihona, mukelenge wa mu Heshebona, ne Oga, mukelenge wa mu Bashana, bakaluhuka bua kuluangana n etu, ne tuetu tuakabahita; bakanyenga buloba buabo, tuakabuha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bu buhianyi buabo
Newambile Arone malu onsu andi mukuambile, bua aye kumanyisha mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, bua anyishe bena Izrayele bumuke mu ditunga diende
Bakamanyisha Shaula ne, Davidi wakaya ku Kila
Bualu bua Bena Amona ne Bena Moaba bakimana ku mpala kua ba ku mikuna ya Seî, bua kubabutula ne kubashiha; hakashikishabo kushiha ba ku mikuna ya Seî, bakashihangana nkayabo
Muntu mukuabu kena mua kupitshila ku mukuna aku
Muntu yonsu udi ulala ne nyama, numushipe
Hadiundisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matshika enu muakanulayeye, ne nuenu nenuambe ne, Netudie munyinyi, bualu bua mitshima yenu idi misue kudia munyinyi; nudi mua kudia munyinyi udi mitshima yenu misue
Avua muwule ne manananshi tente
Yeye wakabalombola ku Samalea

Wakenza tshikowelu tshia efoda ne buanda bua bleu, bakashiya disoso bua kubueshamu mutu, bakanyunguluka disoso ne muonshi muhindakana bu mudibo benza tshikowelu tshia nvita, bua tshikowelu katshihandiki nansha
Kanulambi muana wa mukoko ne mabele a mamu wandi
Edi ndisanka dia Yuda; wakamba ne, Yehowa, unvua dî dia Yuda, ulue n andi kudi bantu bandi: bianza biebe bimukoleshe, wikale mukuatshishi wandi kudi bena lukuna

Bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakasungulabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumuenzelabo mudimu ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina dia Yehowa, nebalue ha buihi: bua mei abo malu onso ne bilumbu bionso bia kukumangana nebijalame

Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, bakaya ne bantu bakatentekela buloba, bakadihanda bilulu biabo, bakambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele ne, Buloba butuakahita bua kutentekela budi butambe buimpe
Wenze ntenta mukuabu ne bilamba dikumi ne tshimue, bia boya bua mbuji, bua kubuikila pa mutu pa muaba wa tshijila
Kadi Nzambi mene neashikame munkatshi mua bantu ba ha buloba bulelela, anyi

Yehowa Udi Ubenga bua Mose Abuele mu Buloba bua Kanâna Nakasengelela Yehowa ku tshikondo atshi, nakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, wewe wakabanga kulesha muntu webe bunene buebe, ne tshianza tshiebe tshikole: nzambi kai udi mu diulu anyi udi ha buloba udi mua kuenza bu mûdi wenza malu ebe a kukema
Nanku kushipaye muena Ejipitu, kumujibikila mu lusenga
Hashishe Bena Benyamina bakunvua lumu ne, Bena Isalele bakadisangisha ku Misepa
Ne mashi au neabuikidibue
Mikenji ya Kunvuangana Biateya mulume mukashi utshidi kamama, udi kayi muanze kutangila kudi mulume, ne bialaleye n andi, yeye neafile biuma bia dibaka bulelela bua yeye kuikaleye mukashi wandi
Neaye ne bionsu ebi panyima pa tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja muaba wa tshijila menemene
Wakenza mahu asambombo, mahu asatu ku luseke lumue lua tshitekelu ne mahu asatu ku luseke lukuabo
Pafikabu ne muana wa ngombe muaba awu, nebamunyongoboje nshingu
Kubuejaye mitshi ayi ku nkanu ivua ku luseke lua mushete bua kuwambuilaku
Pashishe kuitshikijaye mashi avua mashale kuinshi kua tshilambuilu
Tshikondu tshionsu tshikale ne bidimu muanda mutekete
Bena Levi kuitababu bionsu bivua Moshe mubambile abi, kushipabu bena Izrayele bu binunu bisatu dituku adi
Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala udibo bafila kudi Yehowa
Hakaya mushete ku mpala, Mose wakamba ne, Yehowa, bika biebe, bantu badi n ebe lukuna batangadishibue, bantu badi n ebe tshiji banyeme ku mesu kuebe
Bena bukitu basatu bakahita munkatshi mua ma salayi a Bena Peleshete, bakasuna mai mu dina dia mu Beteleheme diakadi ha buihi ne tshibi, bakalua n au kudi Davidi
Bualu mbukula bua mulambu wa Maweja Nangila budiye mupeshe ndelanganyi ya Arone kashidi
Nanku, muntu yonsu, muena Izrayele nansha muenyi, udi utupakana mu mpukapuka, nebamukobolole anu mushindu umue ewu
Kujadikabu ne: Maweja Nangila mmubasungidile mu bianza bia bena Ejipitu ku bukole buende
Wewe newenze bitubuidi bia or, ne tukanu tua or tubidi, tudi tuhindakasha bu muonshi, uteke tukanu ku bitubuidi
Muaba wakadi mukese bua bobo kushikama hohamue, bualu bua bintu biabo biakadi bia bungi, kabakamanya mua kushikama hohamue
Mabue akadi bungi bua mena a bisamba bia Bena Isalele, dikumi ne bibidi, bakafundahu mena a bisamba bia Bena Isalele dikumi ne bibidi ku mulongo wa tshisamba ne tshisamba
Bakasuika mikaba, muntu ne muntu muele wandi; Davidi wakasuika mukaba kabidi ne muele wandi; bantu nkama inai bakalonda Davidi ne bantu nkama ibidi bakashala ha bintu biabo

Nomba Yehowa Udi Ubatumina Nkuadi Bantu bakadi batontolodi, bualu ebu buakadi bubi ku matshu a Yehowa ne hakabunvua Yehowa, tshiji tshiakamukuata, kahia ka Yehowa kakabosha tô ne ku matshika a tshitudilu
Edi kadiena di dituakukuambila mu Ejipitu ne, Utulekele bua tukuatshile Bena Ejipitu mudimu, anyi
Mu matuku au Yehowa wakabanga kukehesha Bena Isalele
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu kavua musue bua tatuenu ankengeshe to
Hashishe Bena Isalele bonso bakahingana, muntu ne muntu ku buhianyi buandi ne ku musoko wandi
Pankatshi pa Bakerubine abu, ke pandi nkupela mikenji idi itangila bena Izrayele
Mêyi ne mikandu adi afila mishindu ya kulondeshilula mapa aa
Meme ndi ne bukole bua kukukengesha n abu, kadi Nzambi wa tatu ebe wakungambila butuku bua lelu ne, Udimuke, kuambidi Yakoba nansha dî dimpe nansha di dibi
Bakumukaku, bakaya ku Gudugoda; ku Gudugoda bakaya ku Yotebata, muakadi buloba bua tusulu tua mai
Nunku bakumusha Bena Isalele mu buloba buabo, bakaya n abo ku buloba bua Ashû tô ne ku dituku edi

Kusombesha Bahele Bintu Bikalaku muntu muhele, umue wa bana benu, ku mbelu kua muntu yonso mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, kanukoleshi mitshima yenu, kanubuikidi tshianza tshienu kudi muan enu udi muhele; kadi nubulule tshianza tshienu kudiye, numusombeshe bintu bidiye musue bua kushikisheye n abi malu andi
Ba mu nsubu wa Ahazaya kabakadi ne bukole bua kujadika n abu bukelenge
Kabakihata Bena Kanâna bakadi mu Gezê: kadi Bena Kanâna batshidi bashikama munkatshi mua Bena Efelayima tô ne ku dituku edi, bakatua bu bahika babo ba mudimu
Mukelenge wakakonka Siba ne, Udi wenza tshinyi ne bintu ebi

Bienza Bena Isalele bonso bualu bubi, ne bikala bualu ebu busokome ku mesu kuabo, bienzabo bualu budi Yehowa uhidia ne biahilabo, ne hamanyabo bualu bubi buakenzabo, bantu bonso ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele nebafile muana mulume wa ngombe bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, balue n andi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, meme nemmuambile anu mei adi Yehowa ungambila
Noa wakabuela mu buatu ne mukashi wandi ne bana bandi balume ne bakashi ba bana bandi, bualu bua mai akavulangana
Yonatana wakalua ne Davidi kudi Shaula, yeye wakadi ku mesu kuandi bu muakadiye diambedi
Kadi ndi musungule bena Levi, bua bapingane pa muaba wa bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele
Kabidi kanuvua nukengela mampa a kudia, nansha maluvu a kunua
Mona, yeye udi ushihula orge mu tshishihuidi butuku ebu
Tudi bonsu bana ba tatu umue

Bualu bua wewe udi mutumibue kudi mukelenge ne bena lungenyi bandi muanda mutekete, bua wewe kuebesha bua Yuda ne Yelushalema bu mudi mikenji ya Nzambi webe idi mu bianza biebe, bua wewe kutuala argent ne or biakafua mukelenge ne bena lungenyi bandi bu mudi disua diabo kudi Nzambi wa Isalele, udi mushikame mu Yelushalema, ne argent yonso ne or yonso biudi usangana mu bukelenge bua Babulona, ne bintu bia bantu bonso ne bakuidi biakasuabo kufila bua nsubu wa Nzambi wabo udi mu Yelushalema; nunku bûdi n abu mbua kusumba ne argent ei ngombe ne bimpanga ne bana ba mikoko ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bia kunua, biudi ufila ha tshioshelu tshidi mu nsubu wa Nzambi webe udi mu Yelushalema

Hakuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, disanka, bikala nshila mutambe kule, ne wewe kuena mua kutuala bintu biebe bualu bua muaba udi Yehowa neusungule bua kujadikamu dina diandi udi utamba kule, hashishe neubihane ku argent: wangate argent mu tshianza tshiebe, uye biebe ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, musungule; neudisumbile bintu bidi mutshima webe musue, nansha ngombe nansha mikoko nansha mioyo nansha maluvu makole nansha bintu bionso biudi musue; neubidie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, neusanke, wewe ne ba mu nsubu webe
Bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa bakabalabo kudi Mose, muntu yonso ku mudimu wandi ne ku bujitu buandi, bakabalabo kudiye bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Pikala muntu wa munkatshi muenu mukune mitshi ya mvinyo, kayi muanji kupolaku bimuma bia tshianyi, apingane kuende
Bua bualu ebu kanuena nudituadila bubi, hanuanyukula bintu bidi bitamba buimpe kanuena nuona bintu bia tshijila bia Bena Isalele, bua nuenu kanufu
Nanku tuyayi kubondakaja muakulu wabu, bua bapange mua kumyuangana munkatshi muabu
Abashaloma wakamusengelela tô; nunku yeye wakitabusha, bua Amenona ne bana balume bonso ba mukelenge baye n andi
Lufu Lua Solomo Kul
Hashikisheye kulengesha muaba wa tshijila ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshioshelu, nealue ne mbushi udi ne muoyo
Ndelanganyi ya bena Edome ne ya bena Ejipitu, biangatshile ku ya musangu muisatu, idi misombe mu ditunga dienu, ke idi mua kubuela muaba udi bantu ba Maweja Nangila basangile
Wakakonka ne, Yeye utshidi ne muoyo, anyi

Yeye wakamba ne, Nempunge n enu tshihungidi; nengenze malu a kukema ku mesu kua bantu bebe bonso, malu adi kâyi manze kumueneka ha buloba buonso anyi kudi tshisamba tshikuabo; bantu bonso badi n ebe nebamone bienzedi bia Yehowa; bualu bua meme nengenze n ebe bualu bukole
Bialueye nkayandi, neaye biandi nkayandi, bikaleye mubake, nunku mukashi wandi neaye n andi
Yakoba wakavudishila Palo disanka, wakumuka ku mesu kua Palo
Muana awu mmushale amu nkayende wa ku bana ba mukaji uvua tatu mupite kunanga
Kadi, bena Izrayele bavua basue kuya ku mukuna ku bukole
Tuvua badimuene bishima binene ne bia dikema, bivua Maweja Nangila mukengeshe nabi mukalenga awu, diku diende ne bantu bende bonsu
Salai wakambila Abalama ne, Mona, Yehowa wakumpidisha bua kulela, ndi nkutendekena ne, Uye biebe kudi mukashi, muena mudimu wanyi, binamanya mua kuheta bana kudiye Abalama wakitabusha di dia Salai
Bana ba Yakobe bamona nanku, kudianjilabu kulongolola bintu bivuabu batuadile Yozefe

Nenudie bidia ebi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku muanda mutekete, mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka ne bintu bienu bionso biakakumbana, ne mudimu wonso unuakenza ne bianza bienu: nenuikale ne disanka dingi
Yai bienu, nudile kudi nzambi inuakasungula; musungile mu ntatu yenu

Mose Udi Ubavuluisha Mikenji ya Isalele Â mmei akela Mose Bena Isalele: â mmalu ne â mmei ne ei mmikenji wakambila Mose Bena Isalele, hakaluhukabo mu Ejipitu, dishiya dia Yadene, mu tshibanda tshidi tshitangilangane ne Bete peô, mu buloba bua Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona, wakashihabo kudi Mose ne Bena Isalele hakaluhukabo mu Ejipitu

Yehowa neanutumme tshisamba tshia kule kuakua ku ditunga dikuabo bu nyunyu wa mukanku; kanuena bamanye muaku wa tshisamba atshi; badi ne luonji ku mpala kuabo, kabena banemeka bantu banunu, kabena ne luse kudi bana batekete; bobo nebadie kukumbana kua bimuna bienu, ne bintu biakadiunda mu buloba buenu tô ne hanuajimishibua; kabena banushila kabidi manvua anyi nvinyo mihia mihia anyi manyi anyi kukumbana kua bimuna bienu anyi bana ba mikoko yenu tô ne hanuajimishibua kudibo
Kulembeleja tshilamba pankatshi pa muaba wa tshijila ne muaba wa tshijila menemene, bua kujika mushete, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Hakunyua Eli tshiona tshia madilu abo, wakakonka ne, Tshiona tshia madilu au ntshia tshinyi
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi
Kuelabu Maweja Nangila mbila mikole bua abambuluishe
Nuenu nuelangane meji mu mitshima yenu ne, Bu mudi tatu ukengesha muan andi mulume, nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanukengesha
Diba adi, nenusakidile bimenga bikuabu bisatu bia kunyemena ku bienu bisatu bia kale
Misangu yonsu ivua Moshe uya ku ntenta, bena Izrayele bavua bajuka, muntu yonsu wimana mu mushiku wa mbelu wa mutanda wende, mutangile mudi Moshe ubuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Bena Isalele ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne bantu bakuabo bakahingana ku buhika bakajidila nsubu eu wa Nzambi ne disanka
Kumupesha kabidi ne maluvu kunuaye
Kupinganabu mu tshimenga
Butuku abu Mvidi Mukulu kumumuenekela, umuleja malu
Kabena banjinguluila to

Nebashihe ngombe webe ku mesu kuebe, ne wewe kuena udia munyinyi wandi; nebanyenge mpunda webe ku mesu kuebe ku bukole, ne kabena bakuhingishileye; nebahe badi n ebe lukuna mikoko yebe, kakuena muntu wa kunusungila
Kubatekaye bakulu badi ku mutu kua bantu tshinunu, lukama, makumi atanu too ne ku kua bantu dikumi
Abimeleke wakaluangana ne bena musoko dituku adi dionso, wakanyenga musoko, wakashiha bantu bonso bakadimu
Dituku adi, buloba kupandika, kubajibikila pamue ne Kora
Kadi baku bende kuela meji ne: udi wamba bilele
Ishale bualu buenu
Nennutumine bena mvita bua baluishe ditunga dienu
Maki wakabaka mukashi wa Hupima ne Shupima, dina dia muan abo wa bakashi diakadi Mâka; dina dia mukashi wandi mukuabo diakadi Selofehada; Selofehada wakalela bana ba bakashi
Bakahingana ku nsubu wabo

Nuenu bakumbaje bimpe mikenji ya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu, indi nnuambila lelu eyi, nuenu bamunange, bamuenzele mudimu ne muoyi wenu mujima ne bukole buenu buonsu, nealokeshe mvula anu pa diba diende, bua nupete biakudia bimpe, ntete ya bungi ya kuenza bukula, maluvu a mvinyo, ne mafuta
Dîyi didi mwa kupatuka amu padibo badiamba ne didi diumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu kudi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadi kaakula mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu panyima pa dimanya
Bakelenge Ahaba ne Budimi bua Nabota Ku nyima kua malu â Nabota, Muena Yizelele, wakadi ne budimi bua tumuma tukese mu Yizelele ba buihi ne nsubu wa Ahaba, mukelenge wa mu Samalea
Bualu bua nakuha Bena Lewi tshintu tshia dikumi tshia Bena Isalele tshidibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, bu buhianyi buabo, bua bualu ebu nakubambila ne, Kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Tendelelai Yehowa baluate bivualu bia tshijila
Yehowa neanutumme biusha bibi ku binu bienu ne ku mikolo yenu, ne ku munda mua makasa tô ne mu lubombo lua mutu: disama didi kadiyi mua kuondahibua
Kayine kumuka muaba uvua Maweja Nangila, kuya kusomba mu ditunga dia Node luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua Edene
Ezela muakuidi wakajuka, wakabambila ne, Nuakuenza bibi, hanuakabaka bakashi ba bende, nunku nuakakumbasha kuhila kua Bena Isalele
Sheba wakahitshila munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele tô ne ku Abele ne Bete mâka ne kudi Bena Beli bonso; bakadisangisha hamue, bakamulonda
Nanku bonsu bumvue batela Izake nebaseke pamue nanyi
Bobo kabidi bakashikama mu Yelushalema mu buludiludi ne bana babo

Nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mu tshikondo tshinakasungula mu ngondo wa Abiba bualu bua nuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu mu ngondo au muntu kalu ku mesu kuanyi ne bianza bituhu, nenudie bidia bia disanka hanuahuola bintu bia kumudilu binuakakuna mu madimi, nudie bidia bia disanka kabidi kunshikidilu kua tshidimu hanuashikisha kusangisha bintu bionso bia mu madimi
Ku bilamba abi, uzolaku Bakerubine bikale ne mapuapua

Hashishe yeye wakambila Gehazi ne, Suika mukaba webe, wangate mulangala wanyi mu tshianza tshiebe, ya mu nshila webe; biwasangakena ne muntu, kumuedi muoyo nansha; biakuela muntu muoyo, kuitabi nansha; ya, uteke mulangala wanyi ha mpala ha muana Mamu wa muana wakamba ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mutshima webe ne muoyo, tshiena nkulekela
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bualu bua nakuambila Nabota, Muene Yizelele, ne, Umpe budimi buebe bua tumuma tukese ku mushinga, anyi biwasua, meme nenkuhe wewe budimi bukuabo
Kabidi munyinyi wa nyama wa dituku dia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila, nuudie ujike dituku adi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Kushipabu bena Kenaane bonsu, kubutula ne bimenga biabu
Biamu bikunze bivua bena Izrayele balambule bivua kilo
Nanku Maweja Nangila kunyingalala bua muntu uvuaye mufuke, muteke pa buloba
Ditshina dia Nzambi diakakuata ba mu bisamba bionso hakunvuabo ne, Yehowa wakaluangana nvita ne bena lukuna ba Bena Isalele
Muntu yonsu udi usendeka dina dia Maweja Nangila, bamushipe
Panuvua mu tshipela, Maweja Nangila ke uvua munulame bua kunufikisha muaba ewu

Kulondolola Solomo Udi Wangata Bukelenge bua Davidi Davidi wakabikila bantu banene bonso ba mu Isalele, bakadi ku mutu kua bisamba, ne tupitene tua bisumbu bia bantu tuakakuatshila mukelenge mudimu mu milongo yatu, ne tupitene tua bantu tshinunu ne tua bantu lukama, ne bakadi ku mutu kua bintu bionso bia mukelenge ne bimuna biandi ne bia bana bandi ne tuhita ne bena bukitu mu Yelushalema
Mutuangaji ateke bintu bionsu abi pa nkunyi ya kapia idi pa tshilambuilu
Kadi ndi ngitaba biudi ulomba bua Ismayele
Wangate kabidi mukoku wa tshimpanga udi kauyi ne bulema, uulambule Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa kuosha

Hulama wakamba kabidi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ikale ne disanka; yeye nguakafuka diulu ne buloba, wakaha Davidi muana wa lungenyi udi ne meji makane ne mutshima muimpe bua kuibakileye dina dia Yehowa nsubu ne bukelenge buandi nsubu
Kadi tuetu tuakatendelela Nzambi wetu tuakasungula batentekedi bua kutentekelabo munya ne butuku
Naftali udi nyama wa ntole, wendakana miaba yonsu, ulela bana bimpe batambe
Bualu bua meme ndi mumanye kutomboka kuenu ne tshitshu tshienu: monai, hantshidi ne muoyo munkatshi muenu lelu, nuakumana kutombokela Yehowa; nenutambe kutomboka ku nyima kua lufu luanyi
Yai, muana mulume wa Manashe, wakangata luseke luonso lua Âgoba tô ne ku butshika bua Bena Geshû ne Bena Mâka, wakidika buloba bua Bashana bu dina diandi ne, Hawota yai tô ne ku dituku edi
Katataka, tangila, muadi wa Bena Isalele Wakafika kundi, Hakatangila kabidi dikenga diabo didi Bena Ejipitu babakengesha n adi
Mose wakashila tshioshelu, wakidika dina dia tshi ne, Yehowa nisi, wakamba ne, Yehowa wakaditshiha, Yehowa neuhingane ne Bena Amaleka nvita ku tshikondo ku tshikondo
Bena Peleshete hakamana kuhaula misoko ya mu tshibanda tshia Bena Lefa
Nunku nudi ne bualu bua kutumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenza mikenji yandi ne mei andi bindi nnuambila lelu

Kadi misoko ya bantu aba idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuhayi bua nuenu kuyihiana, kanusungidi tshintu tshimue tshidi tshieyela muhuya; kadi nenubishihe bionso: ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; bua bobo kabanuyishi mua kulonda malu mabi abo, adibo benzela nzambi yabo; nunku nuenu nenuenzele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bibi

Biamueneka ditoba ditoke tô mu dikoba diandi, ne bikaladi kadiyi dibuela mu munyinyi wandi mene, ne bikala miosa kayiyi mianze kuandamuka mitoke tô, nunku muakuidi neabueshe muntu udi ne disama ha nkayandi mu nsubu tô matuku muanda mutekete
Udi mumane kutupatula mu Ejipitu muvua biakudia bia bungi, mabele ne buitshi, bua kutufuishila mu tshipela emu
Bena Isalele bonso nebunvue lumu elu, nebatshine, kabena benza bualu ebu bubi kabidi munkatshi muenu
Kumuladika tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi, kubuejamu Urime ne Tumime
Meme nenkoleshe mutshima wa Palô, yeye neabalonde, nempete butumbi kudi Palô ne kudi bisumbu biandi bionso, Bena Ejipitu nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa Bakenza nunku
Shaula wakamba ne, Nzambi angenzele bualu ebu ne bukuabo ha mutu, bualu bua wewe Yonatana neufue bulelela
Kadi Lote kubasengelela bikole
Nanku nelupatule mayi
Nunku Esetê wakajuka hanshi, wakimana ku mesu kua mukelenge
Pashishe Abimeleke kuambila Sara ne: Nempeshe tutuebe nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole tshinunu, bua bantu bonsu baudi nabu bajadike ne: wewe kuena muenze tshilema to
Mose wakabala ban a bute bonso ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bu muakamuambila Yehowa
Yoasha, mukelenge wa Isalele, wakaya kumutangila, wakadila muadi, wakamba ne, Tatu wanyi, tatu wanyi, makalu a Isalele ne badi benda ha nyima ha tubalu
Kutandishabu Moshe, bamba ne: Bivua bimpe bua Maweja Nangila kutubutula musangu umue ne bana betu
Anu bana benu bena Levi nkayabu ke badi mua kunuambuluisha ku midimu yonsu ya mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Tshibangidilu Malu onsu mamane kujika, dituku dikuabu bantu babidi bavua ne muanzu mu bukalenga bua Ejipitu, kuenzela mukalenga tshilema tshinene

Esetê Esetê Udi Ulaya Môdekai bua Kuakuila Bantu Bandi Hakamanya Môdekai malu onso akenzabo, Môdekai wakadihanda bilulu biandi, wakadiluatshisha bilulu bikayabala, wakadiela butue ham bidi, wakaya munkatshi mua musoko, wenda, udila bikole; wakalua ku mpala kua tshibi tshia mukelenge, bualu bua muntu kakamanya mua kubuela mu tshibi tshia mukelenge muluate bilulu bikayabala

Bantu aba nkama isatu bakela mpungi; Yehowa wakabaluishisha muntu ne mukuandi nvita, ne musumba wonso; musumba wonso wakanyema tô ne ku Bete shita ku luseke lua Zelala tô ne ku butshika bua Abele mehola hehi ne Tabata
Davidi wakambila Abinê ne, Kuena muntu wa bukitu, anyi
Kufilaye bintu bia mushinga mukole kudi Labane, ne kudi mamuende wa Rebeka
Bibaki ba Solomo ne ba Hilama ne Bena Gebala bakasonga, bakalongolola mabaya ne mabue a kuibaka n au nsubu
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Meme nengikale munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, nengikale Nzambi wabo
Neubueshe mitshi ai mu nkanu idi ku nseke ya mushete, bua kutuala n ai mushete
Â mei audi mua kuambila Bena Isalele
Bobo bakitabusha
Muntu yonso udi ukuma mukuabo mu musokoko udi ne mulau

Bakulu bonso ba mu musoko eu udi utamba ha buihi ne muntu mufue, nebuvuwe bianza biabo ha mutu ha kana ka ngombe kadi ne nshingu waku mutshibula mu tshibanda; bobo nebitabe ne, Bianza bietu kabiakamatshisha mashi au, mesu etu kaena mâmone
Bobu kuitaba ne: Eyowa, tudi bamumanye
Wewe neubuikile mibi idi ha tshioshelu matuku muanda mutekete, utshijidile, tshioshelu netshikale bu tshintu tshitambe tshia tshijila, muntu yonso udi ulenga tshioshelu neikale wa tshijila

Kanuena nuhiana buloba buabo bualu bua buakane buenu anyi bua dijalama dia mitshima yenu: kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ubihata ku mpala kuenu bualu bua bubi buabo; bualu bua kuakasha n enu dî diakalaya Yehowa kudi batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba

Kadi bantu bahele kabena bikala munkatshi muenu; bualu bua Yehowa neanusankishe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi buenu; binunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu
Etu ntupitene tua bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Tshikondu tshivuabu balele Izake, Abrahame uvua mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama
Kutandishabu Moshe, bambe ne: Tupeshayi mayi a kunua
Bantu bandi bakamuambila mu dikalu diandi mufue, bumuke ku Megido, bakalua n andi ku Yelushalema, bakamujika mu lukita luandi
Nunku bakalongolola malu onso dituku adi bua kudia bidia bia disanka dia kuhita kua Yehowa, ne bua kufila milambu ya kuosha ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, bu muakadi mukenji wa mukelenge Yoshiya
Nudi mua kudia munyinyi wa kabuluku ne wa mbashi bu mudi bakuabo badia; badi kabayi bakane ne badi bakane badi bamanye mua kudia
Yeye wakakeba Ahazaya; bakamukuata, musokome mu Samalea bakalua n andi kudi Yehu, yeye wakamushiha; bakamujika, bamba ne, Yeye udi muana wa Yehoshafata, nguakakeba Yehowa ne mutshima wandi wonso
Nunku Shaula wakambila Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ne, Utumanyishe bualu bulelela
Mpunde kumona mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu muimane munkatshi mu njila, mukuate muele ku bianza
Munyi mundi mua kutangila dibutuka dia bana betu
Bavua balambula mvidie yabu too ne bana babu ba balume ne ba bakaji
Numanye ne: minyinyi ayi idi ne mikiya
Bantu bonso bakamba ne, Amen; bakatumbisha Yehowa
Tshimuangi Mvidi Mukulu udi umanyisha dikenga dia ndekelu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi ntumina mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne bantu bende dinyoka dia ndekelu
Nunku mukelenge Yoasha kakavuluka luse luakamulesha Yehoyada tatu wandi; kadi wakashiha muan andi

Mu dituku dinai bana balume ba ngombe dikumi ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue, badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba; ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Hezikiya wakebesha Yeshaya ne, Nempete tshimanyinu kai bua ne Yehowa neangondahe, ne nembuele mu nsubu wa Yehowa hahita matuku asatu
Bidi matabisha akatumineye Esau mukelenge wandi, ne mona, yeye udi kabidi ku nyima kuetu
Nunku bakamushiha ne bana bandi balume ne bantu bandi bonso, nansha mundi umue wakashala, bakanyema buloba buandi
Izake kuandamuna Esawu ne: Yakobe mmumane kushala mfumuebe
Kusungulaye bantu bashindame munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Muprofete au wakambula tshitalu tshia muntu wa Nzambi, wakatshiteka ha nyima ha mpunda, wakahingana n atshi, wakalua mu musoko wa muprofete mununu, wakamujinga, wakamujika
Bakaji betu ne bana nebashale bapika

Kadi hakalua miloho kudi bantu banene ba mu Babulona yakatumabo bua kumuebesha bua malu a kukema akenjibua mu buloba buandi, Nzambi wakamulekela bua kumuteta, bua yeye amanye malu onso akadi munda mua mutshima wandi
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Alona nealuate tshikowelu henzeye mudimu, nebunvue tshiona tshia ndibu hayeye mu muaba wa tshijila ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne haluhukeye kabidi, bua yeye kafu nansha
Diba adi, meme Maweja Nangila nennukengeshe nuenu bena Izrayele, bu mumvua musue kukengesha bena Kenaane
Bikololo biakalua kudiye ne dinda ne bidia ne munyinyi, biakalua habi kabidi dilolo; wakanua mai a mu kasulu
Sheme, Apakashada, Shela, Ebê, Pelege, Leu, Seluga, Nahô, Tela, Abalama udi Abalahama mene
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Davidi wakaluangana ne Bena Peleshete, wakabahita bukole; Davidi wakanyenga Metega hama mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete

Balumbuluishi Mika ne Benu Dana Mu matuku au kamuakadi mukelenge mu Isalele; mu matuku au ba mu tshisamba tshia Dana bakakeba muaba wa kushikamabo; bualu bua tô ne ku dituku adi bobo kabakadi bangata buhianyi buabo munkatshi mua bisamba bia Isalele
Neambule yeye mene bionsu bidibu ne bua kulambula Maweja Nangila: ke munyinyi wa mafuta, ne tshiadi tshia nyama awu
Tamare kuya kuabu
Matu a Hilama akafuma ku Ofî ne or akalua ne mitshi ya sandal ne mabue a mushinga mukole bia ku Ofî kabidi
Yakobe mumane kumvua ne: Shekeme mmubuelele Diina mu nzubu ku bukole, kushalaye mupuwe, muindile dipingana dia bana bende bavua badisha bimuna mu mpata
Meme nembabishile muprofete munkatshi mua bana babo bu wewe; meme nenteke mei anyi onso mukana muandi, ne yeye neabambile mei onso anamuambila
Bumuka mu Abrona, kuyabu ku Eshiyone Ngebere

Muakuidi neangate bukula bua mulambu wa mukau ku bianza bia mukashi, neanyukule mulambu wa bukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, nealue n au ku tshioshelu, ne muakuidi neambule dianza tente ne bukula, bu tshivulukidi tshiau, neabuoshele ha tshioshelu, ne ku nyima yeye neamushe mukashi mai
Muntu eu wakadi Umuka ku musoko wandi ku tshidimu ku tshidimu bua kutendeleleye ne bua kufileye milambu kudi Yehowa wa misumba ku Shilo
Kabakadi ne nvita kabidi tô ne ku tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshitanu tshia mu bukelenge bua Asa
Ku nyama yonsu ya mu mayi, nudi mua kudia amu idi ne mamba ne misalala
Kanudionyi ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba, kanudienzedi bibi ne bintu bidi ne bukoya, kanudinyangi ne bintu ebi

Nehemiya Bantu bonso bakadisangisha bu muntu umue mu muaba mubaluluke wakadi ku mpala kua tshibi tshia ku luseke lua mai; bakambila Ezela mufundi ne, Ulue ne mukanda wa mikenji ya Mose yakambila Yehowa Bena Isalele
Mukelenge wakatuma dî bua kubikila Shimei, wakamuambila ne, Tshiakakutshihisha kudi Yehowa, tshiakakuambila dî dikole ne, Dituku diudi Umuka bua kuendakana ha bule, wewe neufue bulelela, anyi
Ahaza wakangata biamu bia argent ne bia or biakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bintu bilengele biakadi mu nsubu wa mukelenge, wakabituma bu matabisha kudi mukelenge wa Ashû
Nudi mua kulombela bantu ba bende bintu ebi; kadi bintu bionso bidi muan enu mulume n abi, nuenu nenubilekele
Yehowa mene uyaya ku mpala kuebe, yeye neikale hebe, kena ukuhanga, kena ukulekela: kutshinyi, kuzakadi
Mukelenge wa Yosefe wakamukuata, wakamubuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu muakadi bena buloko ba mukelenge basuikila, yeye wakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu nunku
Bena Isalele bonso nebunvue lumu elu, nebatshine, kabena benza bualu ebu bubi kabidi munkatshi muenu

Shemaya, muana wa Netanele, mufundi, wakadi Muena Lewi, wakafunda men abo ku mpala kua mukelenge ne ku mpala kua baminyampala ne Sadoka muakuidi, ne Ahimeleke, muana wa Ebeyatâ, ne ku mpala kua nakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ne ya bakuidi ne ya Bena Lewi; bakasungula nsubu umue wa batatu abo ba Eleazâ, ne umue wa batatu abo ba Itamâ
Mu buloba bua bisamba bienu, Maweja Nangila neasungule muaba anu umue, muaba udiye musue kusomba bua numonangane nende, numutendelelemu
Wakasumba tshituha tshia buloba kuakashimikeye ntenta yandi kudi bana ba Hamo tatu wa Shekeme, ku lukama lua kesita
Itaba bionsu bidi Sara mukuambile

Dutelonone Biabika muprofete anyi mulotshi wa bilota munkatshi muenu, udi unulesha tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema; ne hashikisheye tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema bua kunubikila ne, Tuye, tulonde nzambi mikuabo mudi kanuyi bamanye, tuyenzele mudimu; kanunvu mei a muprofete au, anyi mulotshi au wa bilota; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munutete, bua kumanya ne, Nudi basue Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso
Bakasonga bakeluba ne mabue a ngashi ne bilongo ku bimanu bionso bia nsubu munda ne ha nyima
Amuimanyike ne muoyi kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, bangabanga ne kumuipata bua kuyaye kudi Azazele mu tshipela
Lumu lua Davidi tuakamuangalaka ku maloba onso; Yehowa wakavuisha ba mu bisamba bionso ditshina bua bualu buandi
Yehowa wakaha bantu dikasa dimpe ku mesu kua Bena Ejipitu, bakabaka bintu biakabalombabo Bakahaula Bena Ejipitu
Yehowa kakanza kuamba ne, Nenjimishe dina dia Isalele muinshi mua diulu, kadi yeye wakatuma Yalobama, muana wa Yoasha, bua kubasungileye
Nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kujimisha miaba yonso yakadi bisamba binudi nuihata bitendelelaku nzambi yabo ku mutu kua mikuna mile, ne ku mutu kua tukuna tukese ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi
Messager wakambila Davidi ne, Bantu aba bakamba kutuhita bakole; bakaluhuka kutudi mu madimi; tuakaluangana n abo tô ne ku mbelu kua tshibi tshia ku musoko
Nuvuluke munu vua bapika mu Ejipitu
Nunku ndi nkusengelela ne, Webeshe mukelenge bualu ebu, yeye kena uhidia kunfila kûdi
Au mmeku a Bena Zebuluna, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne nkama itanu
Yehowa neabenzele bu muakenzeleye Sihona ne Oga, bakelenge ba Bena Amole, bakashiheye ne buloba buabo
Tangilai, nakateka disanka ne mulau ku mpala kuenu lelu
Kutelabu tshilamba tshia mushiku wa mbelu ne buanda bukole bua ndanda busambakaja ne bua miosa ya nyama bufikuluke, bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzuu
Ditendelela dibi Kanuena mua kuasa dikunji, nansha kukuna mutshi, bua kutendelela mvidie mikuabu, pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, tshinudi benzela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu to
Noa wakabanga kuikala tshidime ne yeye wakakuna mitshi ya tumuma tukese
Nupule mabue adibu bimanyike
Nenubanyenge bimenga biabu, nusomba mu nzubu yabu
Bana benu ba balume kabena mua kusela nsongakaji ya mu ditunga adi to
Ditshina dia Yehowa diakakuata bantu ba mu makelenge akadi ha buihi ne Bena Yuda, nunku bobo kabakaluangana nvita ne Yehoshafata

Bualu bua Yehowa neabutule bantu badi baluangana n andi: neabakume ne makubakuba a mu diulu: Yehowa nealumbuluishe badi kunfudilu kua buloba; neaheshe mukelenge wandi bakole, neabandishe lusengu lua wakueleye manyi ha mutu wandi
Kadi nuenu, nunyunguluke, yai bienu mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze
Hashishe Bena Isalele bakimba musambu eu ne, Mai abande, nuenu nuimbile musambu; mpokolo wa mai wakumbulabo kudi bakelenge, ne kudi miloho ya bantu ne dikombo dia bukelenge ne milangala yabo
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe, bualu mvua munange muntu wanyi Abrahame
Mose wakaluhuka kudi Palô, wakalomba Yehowa

Lewitiki Bubi bua Nadaba ne Abihu Nadaba ne Abihu, bana balume ba Alona, bakangata malonga a kahia, muntu dilonga diandi muntu dilonga diandi, bakatekamu kahia, bakelahu musenga wa manananshi, bakalua ne kahia kakadi kakayi tshijila ku mpala kua Yehowa, hakadiye kayi mubambile

Hakatangila nsongalume ne bantu bonso bakadi bimanaku, yeye wakumusha Amasa mu nshila, wakaya n andi mu mpata, wakamubuikila tshilulu; bualu bua yeye wakatangila ne muntu yonso wakafika hakadiye wakimanaku
Abashaloma ne bantu bonso, Bena Isalele, bakabuela mu Yelushalema; Ahitofele wakadi n andi
Padi mutuangaji awu mumane kujidila ne mafuta, bua kungenzela mudimu, kena mua kumuka mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu to
Moshe kubandila mudimu uvua bena Izrayele benza
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Tatu wanyi, wewe wakabulula mukana muebe kudi Yehowa, ungenzele bu mu dî diakahatuka mukana muebe, bualu bua Yehowa wakasombuela bena lukuna bebe, Bena Amona mene, bualu buebe
Hakabuela bamessager mu nsubu, bakatangila luhingu mu bulalu ne musamu wa miosa ya mbushi ku mutu kualu
Uliya muakuidi wakenza malu onso akamba mukelenge Ahaza

Mukashi wakadi ne mutshima mulengele ne kalolo munkatshi muenu wakatshina mua kuihata makasa ha buloba bualu bua kalolo ne kanemu kakatamba, neikale ne disu dibi kudi mulume udiye munange, ne kudi muan andi mulume ne kudi muan andi mukashi, ne kudi muana muhia muhia wakaleleye ha binu biandi ne kudi bana bonso hadiye mulele; yeye neabadie mu musokoko bua kuhanga kua bia kudia mu ditshintshimika ne ditata bidi bena lukuna banutatshisha n abi ku misoko yenu
Kadi uvua ne mupika wende, nsongakaji wa bena Ejipitu, dina diende Agare
Nuenu nenusankishibue ku mutu kua bantu bonso: nansha mulume nansha mukashi munkatshi muenu anyi munkatshi mua bimuna bienu nebikale nkumba
Wewe wakalengulula dî dia Yehowa bua kuenza bualu ebu bubi ku mesu kuandi bua tshinyi
Arone kukumbaja mudimu onsu uvua Maweja Nangila mumufundile kudi Moshe

Bukalenga bônso budi bufumina kudi beena ditunga badi babudia diakamwe mu njila wa dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga bônso anyi mu njila wa masungulangana, ne mu mantonya, menza kudi beena mpala baabo
Yeye wakamba ne, Wewe wakulomba bualu bakole, kadi biwantangila hanabandishibua kûdi, bualu nebuenjibue bu mu dî diebe; kedi biwikala kuyi untangila, bualu kabuena buenjibua
Nenukebeku mua kudihana kudi badi n enu lukuna bu bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, kadi kakuena muntu udi unusumba

Bena Manashe bakadi ne misoko ei munkatshi mua Bena Yisakâ ne Bena Ashê: Bete sheana ne misoko yau, ne Yibelama ne misoko yau, ne Bena Dô ne misoko yabo, ne Bena Endô ne misoko yabo, ne Bena Tanaka ne misoko yabo, ne Bena Megido ne misoko yabo, ne mikuna isatu
Mvidi Mukulu udi musue kupandisha Nowa Ndelanganyi ya Nowa idi nunku: Nowa nkayende munkatshi mua bantu ba tshikondu atshi, uvua muntu muakane, witaba Mvidi Mukulu, udisanga nende mu malu onsu
Ba Bena Lewi bakadi Yozabada ne Shimeyi ne Kelaya udi Kelita kabidi ne Petahiya ne Yuda ne Eliezê
Bana ba balume ba Lea bakadi Lubena, muan a bute wa Yakoba, ne Shimeona ne Lewi ne Yuda ne Yisaka ne Zebuluna
Mukelenge wakatuma dî bua kubikila Shimei, wakamuambila ne, Asa nsubu webe mu Yelushalema, ushikamemu, kuhatuki bua kuya kuntu nansha
Bobo nebabutahulule bituha muanda mutekete; Bena Yuda nebashikame mu tshituha tshiabo ku sude, ne Bena Yosefe nebashikame mu tshituha tshiabo ku nôde
Bialala mulume ne mulume mu kuabo bu mudiye ulala ne mukashi, bubidi buabo bakenza bualu bubi nebabashihe, ne mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo
Muntu kamulengi tshianza nansha, kadi nebamushihe ne mabue anyi nebamutahe ne difuma, bikaleye nyama anyi muntu, yeye kena wikala ne muoyo Helabo mpungi musangu mule, bantu nebalue ku mukuna

Muntu udi ne tshitshu, udi uhidia kunvua dî dia muakuidi udi muimane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumukuatshia mudimu, anyi dî dia mulumbuluishi, nebashihe muntu eu: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Bakasangana bualu bufundamu ne, Môdekai wakamba bua Bigetana ne Telesha, babidi ba bantu batungula ba mukelenge ba munkatshi mua balami ba tshibi bakadi bakeba bua kushiha mukelenge Ahashawelosha
Ulembeleje tshilamba ku nkanu

Biabika bantu bua kukulonda ne bua kukeba muoyo webe, muoyo wa mukelenge wanyi newikale musuikibue mu tshisumbu tshiotshimue ne muoyo wa Yehowa, Nzambi webe; ne mioyo ya bantu badi n ebe lukuna, yeye neayele bu mudibo bela mabue mu tshieledi
Yeye wakimana biandi, wakela bena nvita ba Bena Isalele dî ne, Nuakuluhuka bua kuela mualu wenu wa nvita bishi

Ku tshikondo atshi Yehowa wakajidila tshisamba tshia Lewi, bua kutualabo mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Nzambi, ne bua kuimana ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kamuenzela mudimu, ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina diandi, bu mudibo benza lelu
Bena ditunga bavua batendelela mvidie ya bisamba bikuabu bivuabu kabayi bamanye, ivua Maweja Nangila mubakandike, bua kabayenzedi mudimu
Bikala bantu bakane makumi atanu mu musoko, wewe neûshihe, kuena usungila musoko bualu bua bantu bakane makumi atanu badimu, anyi
Kanuhu Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu muoyo; bualu bua yeye kena ne tshituha tshiandi ne buhianyi buandi kunudi
Hakumuka bakuidi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, hakadiatabo makasa abo ha buloba bume, hashishe mai a Yadene akahingana mu muaba wau, aka tua ku muelelu bu diambedi
Bena Levi aba, kabavua bababadike pamue ne bena Izrayele bakuabu bonsu to, bualu kabavua ne bua kupeta muaba wabu wa kuasa mu ditunga to
Samuele Bena Kîyata yalima bakatua, bakangata mushete wa Yehowa, bakaya n au ku nsubu wa Abinadaba ku mukuna: bakajidila Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, bua kulameye mushete wa Yehowa

Malu a Mukelenge Wabo Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hanuabuhiana, bakashikamamu, hanuamba ne, Tudisunguile mukelenge bua kuteka ku mutu kuetu bu bisamba bikuabo bidi bituela munkatshi; nenutekele mukelenge ku mutu kuenu anu yeye udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula; nutekele anu wa munkatshi mua bana benu bu mukelenge wenu; kanuteki muenyi udi kayi muan enu ku mutu kuenu
Misangu mikuabu neusangane bantu bakane anu makumi asatu, newenze tshinyi
Wakunuenzela nunku bua kunumanyisha ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi; kakuena Nzambi mukuabo
Bakashiha Bena Benyamina binunu dikumi ne muanda mukulu; bonso aba bakadi bena bukitu

Nenudie bidia ebi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku muanda mutekete, mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka ne bintu bienu bionso biakakumbana, ne mudimu wonso unuakenza ne bianza bienu: nenuikale ne disanka dingi
Balake, muana wa Sipore, mukalenga wa bena Mowabe mu tshikondu atshi, kumvua bionsu bivua bena Izrayele benzele bena Amore
Wakenza minda muanda mutekete ne biamu bia kujimisha n abi minda ne malonga ai ne or nkayandi
Bakahaula biuma bionso bia mu Sodoma ne Amola ne bintu bia kudia, bakaya mu nshila
Maweja Nangila ukavua mumane kuambila Moshe bua kumanyisha Arone ne: Pikala muntu mukuabu muoshile Maweja Nangila musenga wa kamonya, neapete dinyoka bu dia Kora ne bonsu bavuaye nabu
Mu miaba yonso inakaya ne Bena Isalele, nakakonka mulumbuluishi umue wakasungula bua kulameye bantu banyi Bena Isalele ne, Kuena muanze kungibakila nsubu wa mabaya a cèdre bualu kai
Ndelanganyi ya Yakobe mmisombe bimpe, mu ditunga didi ne ntete ya kuenza bukula, kabidi ne mitshi ya maluvu a mvinyo
Nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mei akanuambileye ne malu andi akanumanyisheye
Aba mbana bakalela Davidi mu Hebelone
Nutumikile, nuenze malu onso ne mei onso anakuteka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Kukonkaye muena mudimu wa Abrahame ne: Muntu udi mutuvuile mu mpata bua kutuakidila nnganyi
Pashishe meku a bena Kenaane kutangalakawu
Maweja Nangila kufuila bena Izrayele luse, kena mubenzele bionsu bivuaye mubakanyine to
Kadi halua tshidimu tshinai, nujidile mamuma onso a mu tshidimu atshi bua kutendelela n au Yehowa
Patupu, mu luendu lukole, nansha lua dituku dimue, bidi mua kufua bionsu
Nenuikale ne disanka hanuabuela mu nsubu, nenuikale ne disanka hanualuhukamu
Apeshe mutuangaji bukula abu, bua yeye ambule dianza dia bukula abu bu mulambu wa tshivulukilu, oshe bukula abu pamue ne milambu mikuabu idibu boshila Maweja Nangila
Biasanganabo muibi mubuele mu nsubu ne biamukumabo ne biafueye, kabena benze mushiku bualu
Bikaleye muana wa balume udi ne bidimu bitanu tô ne ku bidimu makumi abidi, neubale nshekele makumi abidi, ne bikaleye muana wa bakashi, nshekele dikumi
Udi mundinge bualu kayi

Hashishe Amasaya wakatumina Yehoasha, muana wa Yehoaza, muana wa Yehu, mukelenge wa Isalele, ba messager bamba ne, Lua biebe, tutangilangane mpala ha mpala Yehoasha, mukelenge wa Isalele, wakatumina Amasaya, mukelenge wa Yuda, dî ne, Dieba diakadi mu Lebanona diakatumina mutshi wa cèdre wa mu Lebanona dî ne, Umpe muan ebe wa bakashi bu mukashi wa muan anyi wa balume
Bafika mu Ngorene Atade, dishiya dia musulu wa Yardene, kujukulabu miadi mikole

Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kukolesha ne kujadika, ne diambulwisha dia tulasa, dimanya dia maalu ne ditangalaja, dineemeka dia mapa a bantu bônso, budikadidi bwa nshindameenu ne makanyika a mweena mwaabo adibo bafunda mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi
Pashishe nengenze nebe tshisamba tshikuabu, tshidi tshipite bena Izrayele ku bungi ne ku bukole
Hakaha Nzambi wa mu diulu bisamba buhianyi buabi, hakatahululeye bantu, wakadika mikalu ya bantu bu mudi bungi bua bana ba Isalele
Benyi abu kubuela mu nzubu wa Yozefe anu ne bowa, bela meji ne: Tudi bafike muaba ewu bua makuta avuabu bele mu bibombi bietu pa diba dituafiki musangu wa kumpala
Pashishe kukonkaye nsongakaji ne: Ungambile: udi muana wa nganyi
Gala, muana wa Ebede, wakaluhuka, wakimana ku tshibi tshia musoko; ne Abimeleke ne bantu bakadi n andi bakabika kuakadibo balamina
Nenku, Maweja Nangila yeye muine neanuendeshe dikasa dimpe
Bena Izrayele kumuangalaka mu Ejipitu, benda badikebela bisosa
Bantumbishe, bantu bonsu batangile
Ndi njinga bua Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu, anuvudije kabidi, nuvulangane misangu tshinunu
Ku nyima kuandi Bena Lewi bakalongolola: Lehuma, muana wa Bani, wakalongolola
Muenyi kena mua kudia tshintu tshia tshijila, nansha muenyi wa muakuidi nansha muena mudimu kabena mua kudia tshintu tshia tshijila

Binuahidia kutumikila mei onso a mikenji idi mifunda mu mukanda eu, bua nuenu nutshine dina edi dia butumbi ne ditshina ne, YEHOWA, NZAMBI WENU; hashishe Yehowa neanuenzele masama a kukema ne bana badi banulonda; masama makole neashale kunudi musangu mule ne makenga manene neashale kunudi musangu mule kabidi
Ndi mumanye mua kukuambila bualu, anyi
Dia Arone divua munkatshi mua makombu dikumi ne abidi aa

Kadi muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kujadikamu dina diandi: nenukebe muaba kudiye mushikame, nenudisangisheku; nenulueku ne milambu yenu ya kuosha, ne nyama mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu, ne bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu

Kadi ku bintu bionsu bidibu bangate kudi bena Izrayele bakuabu, pa bantu makumi atanu nungumushile muntu umue, ne pa nyama makumi atanu nungumushile nyama umue: ngombe umue, mpunde umue, mukoku umue ne tshimuna tshikuabu tshionsu anu tshimue
Yeye mumane kunukengesha ne nzala, kumupeshaye mana, biakudia binuvua kanuyi banji kumanya, nansha nuenu nansha bankambua benu
Nunku Bena Sulia bakatshina kukuatshisha Bena Amona kabidi

Nunku udimuke biebe, ndi nkusengelela, kunu nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, kudi tshintu tshidi katshiyi tshimpe; mona, wewe newimite difu, neulele muana wa balume; dihaya kadibeyi ku mutu kuandi; bualu bua muana eu neikale Munazi kudi Nzambi ku difu dia mamu wandi; yeye neabange kusungila Bena Isalele mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Numuke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu: nutumikile mikenji ei yonso
Kutulabu kabidi bisosa ne mashinda bua kutudisha
Hakunvua Davidi lumu elu, yeye wakatuma Yoaba ne bena nvita bandi bonso ba bukitu
Hakashikisha Yehowa kusangana ne Abalahama yeye wakaya biandi ne Abalahama wakahingana kuandi
Uteke tukanu tua or tuhindakasha ku nkanu idi ku nseke ya tshilulu
Kena ne kansungansunga to
Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakabuela mu nsubu, wakashikama ku mpala kua Yehowa, wakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, meme ndi nganyi, ne tshiota tshianyi tshidi tshinyi bua wewe wakalua n anyi anu kunoko

Bintu Biakahetabo kudi Bakuidi ne Bena Lewi Mu dituku adi bakasungula bantu bua kulamabo nsuhu ya bibutshilu ne bua kufilabo milambu ya kukuha ne ya mamuma a diambedi akahuolabo ne ya tshia dikumi, bua kubisangishabo mu madimi a ku mpenge ya misoko, bituha biakasuagulabo bia bakuidi ne Bena Lewi; bualu bua Bena Yuda bakasanka bua bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bakadi bakuata mudimu
Tuakabika ku Holeba, tuakenda tô mu tshihela atshi tshinene tshibi tshinuakatangila, ku nshila wa ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakalua ku Kadeshe bânea

Kadi muprofete wa Yehowa wakadiku, dina diandi Odede; yeye wakaya kusangakena ne tshisumbu tshia bantu bakadi bahingana ku Samalea, wakabambila ne, Monai, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, wakadi ne Bena Yuda tshiji, yeye wakabafila mu bianza bienu, nuenu nuakabashiha ne tshiji tshikole tshiakafika tô ne mu diulu
Tshisamba tshia Dane tshivua anu ne diku dimue dia bena Shuhame, ndelanganyi ya Shuhame
Kupita matuku muanda mutekete, Nowa kutuma nyunyi wa nkudimba tshiakabidi
Nenku bena Izrayele badi ne bua kulambula Maweja Nangila tshia dikumi tshimue tshia biakudia bia mu madimi, kabidi ne tshia bimuma bia ku mitshi

Bualu bua Yehowa nealumbuluile bantu bandi bilumbu biabo, neakudimune mutshima wandi bualu bua bantu bandi, hatangileye ne bukole buabo buakujimina, ne kakuena muntu udi mushale muhika anyi mudishikaminyi
Bavudishile dina diebe dia butumbi disanka, didi ditumbishibue ha mutu ha masanka onso ne butumbi buonso
Bena Kila nebaufile mu tshianza tshiandi, anyi
Baye nawu muaba wa tshijila, baufile kudi mutuangaji bua yeye aye nawu ku tshilambuilu
Ubakandike bua kababandi ku mukuna, kabaulengi nansha
Nganyi wakukuna mitshi ya tumuma tukese kayi muanze kudia tumuma atu
Kadi nuenu nuakahidia bua kuyamu, nuakahidia mukenji wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Ke munudi nuenu kabidi mua kundambula tshintu ku tshia dikumi tshinudi nupeta kudi bana benu bena Izrayele

Bobo bakashikamamu, bakuashila dina diebe tshitendelelu tshia tshijila, bamba ne, Bialua malu makole kutudi, nansha muele wa nvita, nansha kulumbulula, nansha tshihuhu, nansha tshiole, tuetu netuimane ku mpala kua nsubu eu ne ku mpala kuebe, bualu bua dina diebe didi mu nsubu eu, netudile kudi mu makenga etu, ne wewe neutunvuile, neusungile
Muaba awu, ke uvuabu bateka mushete wa ndondu uvua ne mabue a mikenji
Bu mudi muntu kayi mua kubala lusenga ludi pa buloba, ke mudibu kabayi mua kubala ndelanganyi yebe
Dutelonone Lufu lua Mose Mose wakaya ku mpata ya Moaba ku mukuna wa Nebo, ku mutu kua Pisega, kuakadi kutangilangana ne Yeleko

Davidi wakahatuka bua kusambakena n abo, wakabambila ne, Bulualua kundi ne ditalala bua kukuatshishangana neanyi, mutshima wanyi neunvuangane ne mitshima yenu; kadi bulualua bua kuntangila tshitungu kudi bena lukuna banyi, hashishe Nzambi wa batatu betu atangile bualu ebu, anuhele, bualu bua tshiena ne bualu bubi mu bianza bianyi
Kadi tshimuna tshia bena Izrayele katshiena tshifua nansha tshimue
Yeye wakamuitaba ne, Wewe, kapitene
Katataka, Yehowa, tuakulua ne bintu biakaboba diambedi mu buloba buwakutuha
Yozefe uvua wambuluisha tatuende, bana babu ne bonsu ba mu diku diabu ne biakudia bilondeshile bungi bua bantu
Tshidimu atshi, Izake kukuna biakudia mu ditunga adi
Eu udi mukenji wa mukashi udi ulela nansha muana wa balume nansha muana wa bakashi

Dielulula Mua kusombuela mushipianganyi udi kayi mumanyike Panuafika mu ditunga dikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe bua kusomba, nuenu basangane tshitalu tshia muntu mu tshisuku, kanuyi bamanye uvua mumushipe, bakulu ne balumbuluishi nebapime mutantshi uvua muntu mufuile, ne ku bimenga bidi pabuipi, bua kujadika tshimenga tshidi pabuipi ne tshitalu tshia muntu awu
Diku dionsu, nedipete muaba, bilondeshile bungi ba bantu badimu

Mikalu yadi idi mushindu ewu: kutuadija ku tshipela tshidi kuinshi mu ditunga, too ne ku mikuna ya Lebanone, idi ku mutu mu ditunga; ku musulu munene wa Perate luseke lua kudi diba dipatukila, too ne ku Mayi manene a pankatshi pa matunga, luseke lua kudi diba dibuelela

Balume bonso nebamueneke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu mu muaba udiye Usungula: ku disanka dia mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, ne ku disanka dia mbingu ai muanda mutekete, ne ku disanka dia bitandatanda; kabamueneki ku mesu kua Yehowa ne bianza bituhu: kadi muntu yonso neafile bintu bidiye n abi bu muakanuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, disanka

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Buhidia Buabo Hashishe halua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, n enu mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kunuhabu, misoko minene ne miakane mudi kanuyi bibake, ne nsubu miule tente ne bintu bimpe mudi kanuyi bûshe, ne mena a mai akumbulabo, anudi kanuyi bumbule, ne madimi a tumuma tukese ne mitshi ya olive, binudi kanuyi bakune; nuenu nenudie, nenukute mafu tente; hashishe nudimukai, bua kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa buluka
Lubena ikale biandi ne muoyo, kafu nansha, bantu bandi kabikadi banya banya
Bilongelu bia ditunga bidi, mu diumvwangana ne bamfumu ba ditabuuja, mwa kupeesha balongi ba mabeela pa ludimi, pa dilomba dia baledi baabo, dimanya dia maalu didi dilonda ditabuuja diabo

Nunku biasua mukelenge, bafunde mukanda bua babutudibue; hashishe meme nenfile ntalanta ya argent binunu dikumi mu bianza bia bantu badi benzela mukelenge mudimu eu, balue n ai mu tshibutshilu tshia mukelenge
Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, wakatangila malu onso akenzela Bena Isalele Bena Amole
Moshe kumvua muvua bena Izrayele badila muadi, basombela ku diku ku diku mu mishiku ya ntenta yabu
Matuku asatu mamane kupita, muntu kampande kumanyisha Labane ne: Yakobe mmunyeme
Muanabu ukadi mufue
Biamatshila bilumi tshilulu anyi tshiseba nebatshiuvuwe ne mai, netshikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Dîyi dilongolodi didi disunguluja ngikadilu wa bakoshi ba nsambu

Kanuenzedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nunku bualu bua bobo badi benzela nzambi yabo malu onso mabi adi atonda Yehowa; bualu bua bobo badi boshila nzambi yabo bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi mene mene ha kahia

, ne dilongu diondoke dia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, dikale dia bujitu bua grame , bilondeshile tshipimu tshidi muaba wa tshijila malongu abidi aa, avua ne bukula busambakaja ne mafuta bua mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi
Mose wakamushiha, wakangata mashi, wakitaba ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu ne munu wandi, wakajidila tshioshelu, wakela mashi ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu bua kutshijidila, bua kubuikila bubi bua bantu
Kakuanyisha bua bena Izrayele bumuke to
Batentekedi bakuabu kudiwula Moshe
Tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi atshi, tshikale tshibombi tshimue tshia santimetre makumi abidi ne itanu nseke yonsu

Bualu bua Bena Isalele bakadi benza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, wakabaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu mu bianza bia Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, ne bakatshina nzambi mikuabo, bakenda mu mikenji ya bisamba bikuabo biakihata Yehowa ku mesu kua Bena Isalele, ne mu mikenji ya bakelenge ba Bena Isalele yakenzabo
Esawu kuambila Yakobe ne: Muakunyanyi, ndi ne bintu bikumbane
Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Bilele bia Bena Buloba Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, kanuyidi bua kulonda ku nyima kua malu a bundu a bisamba abi
Yeye udi umona tshimfuanyi tshianyi

Kanulumbuluishi bantu ne dilumbuluisha didi kadiyi diakane; kanutangidi mpala ya bantu; kanuitabushi bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi; bualu bua bintu bia kunubueshilabo n abi bidi bifofomesha mesu a muena lungenyi, bidi binyanga dilumbuluisha didi diakane
Nuditengule mu mitshima yenu, kanuikadi bantu ba tshitshu kabidi
Bena Awa bakadi bashikama mu misoko tô ne ku Gaza ne Bena Kafetô bakafuma ku Kafetô, bakabashiha, bakashikama mu muaba wabo
Kuena mua kubuelela mamuebe mukuabu nansha tatuebe mukaji mu nzubu to
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama ibidi ne tshitema
Nennumanyishe tshinudi mua kuenza

Mikenji Mishilangane Binuaya kuluangana nvita ne bantu badi n enu lukuna ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ubafila mu bianza bienu, nuenu nudi nuya n abo mu buluka, ne umue wenu udi utangila mukashi udi ne mpala muimpe munkatshi muabo, ne yeye udi mumusue, udi musue kumubaka bu mukashi wandi; hashishe yeye nealue n andi ku nsubu kuandi; nebamubeye nsuki ya ku mutu, nebamukose nzadi; yeye neavule bilulu biandi bia buluka, neashale mu nsubu wa muntu eu: neadile tatu wandi ne mamu wandi tô ngondo mujima; ne ku nyima muntu eu neaye kudiye bu mulume wandi, ne yeye neikale mukashi wandi
Bua bualu buanyi, tshiena ngitabusha bua kuenzela Yehowa bibi bua kulekela kunulombela Nzambi; kadi meme nennuleshe nshila muimpe ne muakane
Kabena banupesha bisosa to
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Bualu bua butudi n abu mbua kufua; tudi bu mai akelabo ha buloba, kabena bamanye mua kuasuna kabidi; Nzambi kena unyenga muoyo wa muntu, kadi udi ulongolola bua muntu udibo bihata kikadi bu muntu mubengibue kudiye
Ashehû, tatu wa Tekoa, wakadi ne bakashi babidi, Hela ne Nâla
Bena Izrayele bakuabu, nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, bamfumu ba meku ne bakulu, basombele babuela mu bisangilu, kuditua ku tshiabu
Wewe ne bantu bonsu badi bimane aba nenupungile
Nanku pinganayi ku midimu yenu
Bua kunuisha bimuna mayi, balami ba mikoku bavua bumusha dibue adi, basangisha bimuna bionsu muaba umue, babinuisha mayi
Kadi kabakabala Bena Lewi ne Bena Benyamina, bualu bua dî dia mukelenge diakatondesha Yoaba
Nzambi wakambila Mose ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Muntu yonsu udi kayi ujila biakudia dituku adi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Bakashiha Atalaya ne muele wa nvita hehi ne nsubu wa mukelenge
Muntu wa Nzambi wakamuebesha ne, Tshiakahona kudi kunyi

Dina dia muntu eu diakadi Nabala; dina dia mukashi wandi Abigayila; mukashi eu wakadi muena meji, wakadi ne mpala mulengele; kadi mulume wandi wakadi muena lukinu, wakadi ne bienzedi bibi; wakadi wa mu tshiota tshia Kaleba
Neatuute bena Mowabe dikombu ku mbanga
Yeye udi Dibue; mudimu wandi wonso udi muakane, bualu bua nshila yandi yonso idi milulame: Nzambi wa kalolo udi kayi ne bubi, udi ne malu makane a bushuwa
Nemmone bidi mua kubenzekela
Palo wakabakonka ne, Nudi benji ba mudimu kai
Maweja Nangila kuamba mundamunda muende ne: Tshiena mua kusokoka Abrahame bualu bundi nya kuenza to, bualu ndelanganyi yende neikale tshisamba tshinene ne tshia bukole

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Kanumushi tshisamba tshia meku a Bena Kohata munkatshi mua Bena Lewi, nubenzele nunku, bua bikale ne muoyo, kabafu, haluabo ha buihi ne bintu bia tshijila Alona ne bana bandi balume nebabuelemu, nebaleshe muntu ne muntu mudimu wandi ne bujitu buandi, kababuedi bua kutangila bintu bia tshijila nansha kakese, bua kabafu
Pa tshilambuilu tshianyi kanuena mua kundambula mulambu wa kuosha wa tshimuna tshifue mesu, nansha tshitebuke, nansha tshikoseke tshidimba, nansha tshikale ne disama pambidi
Yehowa neavuishe nvula wa buloba buenu bu lufuishi ne nsenga bia mu diulu tô ne hanuajimishibua
Muntu awu, neatuadije kabidi kudijidila

Yeye wa kamba ne, Ndi Nzambi wa tatu ebe, kutshinyi bua kuya mu Ejipitu, bualu bua nenkuvuisheku tshisamba tshmene nenye n ebe mu Ejipitu, nennumusheku kabidi bulelela, Yosefe neateke bianza biandi ha mesu ebe Yakoba Wakabika ku Be sheba, bana balume ba Isalele bakatuala Yakoba tatu abo ne bana babo ne bakashi babo mu makalu akabatumma Palo
Mu muaba wa tshijila wakenza bakeluba babidi ne mitshi ya olive, bule buabo bua mulu buakadi coudées dikumi
Ehuda wakamba ne, Ndi ne dî dia Nzambi dia kukuambila
Kadi Maweja Nangila wakunyengi bintu biebe
Muoyi wa tatu udi anu kudi muana ewu
Aba bonso bakadi bana ba Ashê ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo, bena nvita basungula ba bukitu ne tulala tua ha mutu
Wakalukila, wakangata ngombe ya ku tshikokedi, wakayishiha, wakatumpa minyinyi yai ne mutshi wa tshikokedi, wakayila bantu bandi, bobo bakadia
Mabue awu, avua dikumi ne abidi, bungi bua bisamba bia bena Izrayele

Wewe neujidile tshidimu tshia makumi atanu, newele di bua bantu bonso bahete budishikaminyi, etshi ntshidimu tshia disanka dinene kunudi, neuhingishe buloba buonso kudi bena buloba, ne muntu yonso neahingane kudi bana babo
Bakamona Nzambi wa Isalele, muinshi mua makasa andi muakadi mabue a saphir, akadi matoke tô bu mubidi wa diulu
Kadi yeye wakenda mu nshila wa bakelenge ba Isalele; wakahitshisha muan andi wa balume mu kahia bu mu malu a bundu a bantu ba mu bisamba bia bende bakihatabo kudi Yehowa ku mesu kua Bena Isalele
Kutekaye bantu bavuaye nabu, mikoku, mbuji, ngombe ne tumelu mu bisumbu bibidi bibidi
Bantu bonsu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Efrayime badi
Nenupete mputa ya lubangu ne masama makole mavule adibu kabayi mua kuondapa
Bikala mukuenu kayi ha buihi n enu, anyi biwikala kuyi mumumanye, hashishe nuye n abi ku nsubu kuenu, nushale n abi tô ne halua mukuenu bua kubikeba, nuenu nubihingashe kudiye
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bena Isalele bakadiku bakadia bidia bia kuhita kua Yehowa ku tshikondo atshi ne bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene tô matuku muanda mutekete

Mu bidimu bimpe muanda mutekete buloba buakalua ne bintu bia bungi, mafuka mafuka Yeye wakasangisha bintu bia kudia bionso bia mu bidimu abi muanda mutekete bia mu Ejipitu, wakabiteka mu bimenga, bintu bia kudia biakadiunda mu madimi a ha matshika a musoko, wakabiteka mu musoko au

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Buhidia Buabo Hashishe halua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, n enu mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kunuhabu, misoko minene ne miakane mudi kanuyi bibake, ne nsubu miule tente ne bintu bimpe mudi kanuyi bûshe, ne mena a mai akumbulabo, anudi kanuyi bumbule, ne madimi a tumuma tukese ne mitshi ya olive, binudi kanuyi bakune; nuenu nenudie, nenukute mafu tente; hashishe nudimukai, bua kanuhu muoyo bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa buluka
Lubena ikale biandi ne muoyo, kafu nansha, bantu bandi kabikadi banya banya
Kuipatshilabu bakalenga banayi abu too ne ku Dane
Kanujanguluki bua kuya ne bua kubuelamu ne bua kuhiana buloba
Hashishe bantu bandi bakamukonka ne, Bualu ebu bûdi wenza budi tshinyi
Kanukebi mua kubalesha ditalala ne malu makane tô matuku enu onso
Mu tshipela amu, bena Izrayele kujana Moshe ne Arone, bamba ne: Maweja Nangila uvua mua kutubutuila nansha mu Ejipitu, mutuvua tudia minyinyi ngesu tente ne mampa tuukuta, basombele panshi

Nebateke tshilulu tshia bleu ha mutu ha tshioshelu tshia or, nebâteke ha mutu hatshi tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebabueshemu mitshi ya tshioshelu nebangate malonga onso adibo benza n au mudimu wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu nebâteke mu tshilulu tshia bleu, nebâbuikde ne tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebâteke ha mitshi ibidi idi mikuatakasha Nebumushe butue ku tshioshelu, nebatekehu tshilulu tshikunzubile nebâteke ha mutu hatshi bintu bionso bidibo benza n abi mudimu watshi ne malonga a kahia ne nkobo ya munyinyi, ne nkasu, ne bihanza ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, nebâteke tshibuikilu tshia biseba bia nkonge, nebabueshemu mitshi yatshi
Bimenga ebi bionso biakadi ne miaba yabi ya ku matshika mibinyunguluke: bimenga bionso biakadi nunku
Nanku muananyi, teleja tshindi nkuambila, utshienze
Hakatangila Yoshua ne Bena Isalele bonso ne balaminyi bakanyenga musoko, ne muishi wa musoko wakabanda mulu, bobo bakakudimuka, bakashiha Bena Ai
Nenshipe muanabute yonsu wa bena Ejipitu biangatshile kudi muanabute wa mukalenga, uvua mua kupiana bumfumu bua ditunga too ne kudi muanabute wa mukaji mupika udi upelesha bukula
Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, ne Bena Isalele bakabashiha; ne Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, wakamuha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bu buhianyi buabo
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Nakahanduka mu tshitudilu tshia Bena Isalele
Kujukaye lubilu bua kubakidila
Ehaba, muana mulume wa Helona, mukelenge wa bana ba Zebuluna, wakafua bintu dituku disatu
Ke bana bonsu balume ba Esawu, bavuaye mulele mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Kanumvuanganyi ne bena matunga abu
