Yehowa neanuhadishe, neanutumme bufofo, nenufue mikemu mu mitshima yenu; nenububute munda munya bu mudi muntu mufofo ububuta mu midima; kanuena nuenda dikasa dimpe mu nshila yenu, nebanutatshishe, nebanuibe, kakuena muntu udi mua kunusungila
Nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kujimisha miaba yonso yakadi bisamba binudi nuihata bitendelelaku nzambi yabo ku mutu kua mikuna mile, ne ku mutu kua tukuna tukese ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi
Kadi kabavua basue bua Shela amupiane to

Bikala tshilumbu tshinuhite bukole, nansha hankatshi ha bashihianganyi, nansha hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu badi badiakuilangana, nansha hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu badi batutangana, mmalu adibo batandangana n au mu misoko yenu; hashishe nenubike, nenuye ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nenulue kudi bakuidi, Bena Lewi, ne kudi mulumbuluishi munene wa mu matuku au; nenubakonke, ne bobo nebanukosele tshilumbu
Kanutendeledi mvidie mikuabu to

Nuvuluke malu onso akanuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bidimu ebi makumi anai hakadiye munulombole mu tshihela, bualu bua kunuhuekesha, ne kunuteta bualu bua kumanya malu akadi mu mitshima yenu, ne nudi basue kutumikila mikenji yandi, anyi kuyihidia
Nunku wewe neumushe Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi
Bua Dana yeye wakamba ne, Dana udi bu muana wa nyama wa ntambue: udi muhika mumuke ku Bashana
Arone kuamiamina ku nseke inayi ya tshilambuilu
Usakidile kabidi bimenga bikuabu makumi anayi ne bibidi

Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge wanyi, muena mudimu wanyi wakundinga; bualu bua muntu webe wakamba ne, Nendielele tshiseba ha nyima ha nyama wa mpunda, bua meme mbande ha nyima handi, nye ne mukelenge; bualu bua muntu webe udi mulema
Ke Moshe kuangata mafuta a tshijila, kualaba ku ntenta wa kusambakena ne ku bintu bionsu bivuamu
Pashishe mutuangaji avuale muntumpu muenza ne buanda bua ndanda
Labane kuambila Yakobe ne: Bakaji bebe ne bana badibu balele mbanyi meme
Kadi ndi mumanye ne: wewe ne balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe, kanuena banji kutshina Maweja Nangila to
Atue kabidi munu, amiamine mashi kumpala kua mushete awu misangu muanda mutekete
Bana ba balume ba Yonatana: Pelete ne Zaza

Dishiya dia Yadene ku Yeleko ku esete bakasungula Besê wa mu tshihela tshia mu mpata wa tshisamba tshia Bena Lubena, ne Lamota wa mu Gilada wa mu tshisamba tshia Bena Gada, ne Golana wa mu Bashana wa mu tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe

Balumbuluishi Muena Lewi ne Mukashi Wandi wa Masandi Mu matuku au hakadibo kabayi ne mukelenge mu Isalele, Muena Lewi mukuabo wakadi mushikame ku nyima kua mikuna ya Efelayima, wakadiangatshila mukashi muhika wa mu Beteleheme yuda
Nudi mua kulua ne bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola kudi Yehowa, kadi bintu ebi kabiena bu bintu bidi bitua dihembu ha tshioshelu
Mose ne Alona bakaluhuka kudi Palô

Tshipwita munwamwanka yônso wa ditunga anyi tshipwita mukulumpa yônso udi udiumbukila ku diswa diende mu tshisumbu tshiende tshia tshidiidi mu tshikondo tshia bukalenga mudiye amu badi bamutangila bu udi mubeenga butshipwita budiye mupetela mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi atshi
Bena Sulia bakela mualu wa nvita kudi Davidi, bakaluangana n andi
Wakindila matuku muanda mute kete makuabo, waka tuma nyunyu wa nkutshi kabidi, ne nyunyu kakahingana kudiye kabidi tshiendelele
Pashishe Moshe kuamba ne: Nuenu bena Yeshurune, numanye ne: kakuena mvidie udi ufuana Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Bena Holi bakashikama mu Sei diambedi, kadi Bena Esau bakabalonda ku nyima; bakabashiha ku mpala kuabo, bakashikama mu muaba wabo; bu muakenza Bena Isalele ku buloba bua buhianyi buabo, buakabahebua kudi Yehowa
Matuku onsu adi muntu awu ne disama, udi mupie amu mikiya

Dutelonone Malu Adibo ne bualu bua Kuenza bua Kuheta Buhikudi ne Masanka Halua malu au onso kunudi ne disanka ne mulau, binakuteka ku mpala kuenu, ne hanuayuluka malu au munkatshi mua bisamba bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unutuma munkatshi muabi, ne hanuakudimuna mitshima yenu kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mei andi ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso, bu munakunuambila lelu, ne nuenu ne bana benu; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neakudimune buluka buenu, neanuleshe luse, neahingane kunudi, neanusangishe ba munkatshi mua bantu bonso muakanumuangalasha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kumubikilaye ne: Abrahame

Binabuikila diulu bua nvula kayiloki, anyi binatuma mikumbi bua kudiayi bintu biakamena mu buloba, anyi binatuma tshihuhu munkatshi mua bantu banyi, biadihuekesha bantu banyi badi babikila dina dianyi, biatendelelabo, biakebabo mpala wanyi, ne biakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua mibi yabo, nengunvuile mu diulu, nembabuikidile mibi yabo, nensangashe buloba buabo

Bana banyi balume, kanujangaluki; bualu bua Yehowa wakanusungula bua nuenu nuimane ku mpala kuandi bua kumukuatshila mudimu, ne bua nuenu nuikale bena mudimu bandi ne bua kumuoshela musenga wa manananshi
Kulambishilaye balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende bonsu biakudia
Nunku yai bienu, numukebe mu miaba yonso misokome yakadiye musokome, nulue bienu, nungambile bimpe; hashishe nenye n enu, ne bikaleye mu buloba nemmukebulule munkatshi mua binunu bia meku a mu Yuda
Aba mbana balume ba Sheme ku meku abo ne ku miaku yabo ne ku maloba abo ne ku bisamba biabo
Kadi witabe amu tshindi nkulomba etshi
Ndi ngamba ne, Wewe ne Siba nuabanyangane buloba
Kadi kanudi mashi, bualu bua mashi adi muoyo; kanudi muoyo ne munyinyi hohamue
Uvua mumuambile kabidi bua buloba bua muanetu Selofade, babupiane kudi bana bende ba bakaji
Maweja Nangila mmungendeshe diakalenga mu njila mujima, mumfikishe anu mu diku dia mfumu wanyi Abrahame
Bena Izrayele ba tshivua badila muadi, bela mbila, bua dikenga divuabu nadi

Bualu bua hanakamana kulua n abo mu buloba bunakalaya batatu abo, budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi, ne hakamanabo kudia, kukuta ne kuvunda, hashishe nebakudimune mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo, nebayikuatshile mudimu, nebampetule, nebashihe tshihungidi tshianyi
Numushihe anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu; kanumushihi anu ku dî dia mumonyi umue
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Tshiena mua kunutuala nkayanyi: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakunukumbasha ba bungi, ne monai, lelu nudi bu bungi bua mitoto ya mulu
Bantu bakuabo ne bunvue, nebatshine, kabena benza malu au mabi munkatshi muenu kabidi
Dutelonone Bidimu Biakashalabo mu Tshihela Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze, bu muakangambila Yehowa; tuakanyunguluka mukuna wa Sei matuku a bungi
Bena Peleshete bakadi n andi mukau

Kadi bantu bahele kabena bikala munkatshi muenu; bualu bua Yehowa neanusankishe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi buenu; binunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu
A mmalu akenza Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, ne wakadi ne dina dinene munkatshi mua bantu basatu ba bukitu
Moshe ne Arone kuya kumpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Muntu awu afile kabidi milambu iwaye kayi mufile
Yeye wakasangakena n andi mu muaba wa hatuhu, mu tshihela muakadi luhehele nkayalu; yeye wakamunyunguluka, wakamulama bimpe, wakamuenzela bu kamonyi ka disu diandi
Meku onsu a bena Ngade aa avua ne bantu balume
Kadi kanudi mashi andi; nuahongolole hanshi ha buloba bu mai
Nuende bienu mu nshila wakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, ne bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu mu buloba bunudi nuhiana
Kuinyikaye muana awu dina ne: Ashere
Bobo nebanusombeshe bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nubasombesha bintu; bobo nebikale bu mitu, nuenu nenuikale bu mikila
Hakunvua Bena Isalele lumu elu, bakatshina Bena Peleshete

Nunku Bena Lewi bakasungula Hemana, muana wa Yoele; ne ba bana babo, Asafa, muana wa Belekiya; ne ba bana ba Melali, Etana, muana wa Kushaya; ne bana babo ba mu mulongo muibidi, Zekâya ne Bena ne Yaziele ne Shemilamota ne Yehiele ne Uni ne Eliaba ne Benaya ne Mâseya ne Matitiya ne Elifelehu ne Mikeneya ne Obeda edome ne Yiele, balami ba ku bibi
Bule bua mahuahua abo buakadi coudées itanu: ku lusongo lua dihuahua dimue tô ne dinga kuakadi coudées dikumi
Milambu ayi, ikale ya ngombe, mbuji nansha mikoku
Bana ba balume ba Yetê: Yefune ne Pisepa ne Ala
Nudi mua kumudia ku mbelu kuenu: muntu udi muakane anyi udi kayi muakane udi mua kumudia bu mudiye udia kabuluku anyi mbashi
Kuakuitabusha bua meme kusangana mishiku ne bana banyi ba balume ne bana banyi ba bakashi munyi
Neboweshe makasa abu mu mafuta
Biabaka mulume mukashi ne mamu andi, bualu ebu budi bubi, nebaboshe mu kahia, busatu buabo, bualu bubi kabuikadi munkatshi muenu
O, nakadi kusua bua mutshima eu wikale munda muabo, bua kuntshina ne bua kuenza mikenji yanyi yonso matuku onso, ne bobo bikale ne dikasa dimpe, ne bana babo badi balonda ku nyima tshiendelele
Bualu Maweja Nangila kena musue bintu bia mushindu awu to
Hashishe bantu ba Yehowa bakaya ku bibi bia misoko
Bobo kabena bikala mu buloba buebe bualu bua bobo nebakuenzeshe bua kungenzela malu mabi, biwatendelela nzambi yabo, bualu ebu nebuikale buteyi kûdi
Abimeleke Wakabikila Isaka, wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, yeye udi mukashi webe, bualu kai wewe wakuamba ne, Yeye udi muan etu wa bakashi
Bana ba balume ba Samuele: muan a bute wandi Yoele ne Abiya muana muibidi
Bobo bakadi babadibua mu bikondo biabo mu misoko yabo bakadi bajidibua mu midimu yabo kudi Davidi ne Samuele, mumonyi wa malu
Bua tshinyi udi munyeme ne bana banyi ba bakaji bu bapika banyenga mu mvita
Maweja Nangila kuitaba majinga enu, kungambila ne: Dilomba dia bena Izrayele didi dimpe
Bena Isalele bakaya, bakadila ku mpala kua Yehowa tô ne dilolo; bakebesha Yehowa ne, Netuhingane bua kuluangana ne bana betu Bena Benyamina kabidi, anyi
Mukelenge wakamba kabidi ne, Nunku disanka dinene dikale kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakumpa umue bua kushikameye mu nkuasa wanyi wa bukelenge lelu, mesu anyi atangile bualu ebu

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula; ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuyifila n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni
Nehemiya Badi Bateketa Kulomba Kasombela Bantu bakuabo ne bakashi babo bakadi ne muadi munene, bakafunda bana babo, Bena Yuda
Ndi nkusengelela ne: ubambile ne: Abrame mmuanetu
Nudi mua kumudia ku mbelu kuenu: muntu udi muakane anyi udi kayi muakane udi mua kumudia bu mudiye udia kabuluku anyi mbashi
Dituku dia kabutu, nembasombuele, bua bapete difutu dia buenzayi buabu
Wenze mabaya makuabu makumi abidi, a kuteka muaba wa tshijila luseke lua ku mutu
Kadi bena Izrayele kusabuka mayi ku makasa kume
Tunkanunuina tua Yuda Bana ba balume ba Yuda: Ele ne Ônana ne Shela: muana mukashi wa Shua, Muena Kanâna, wakamulelela aba basatu
Kadi Wambile Yoshua dî, ushindike mutshima wandi, umukoleshe; bualu bua yeye neasabuke ku mpala kua bantu aba, neabahianyishe buloba budi utangila
Abrame uvua muase pabuipi ne mitshi ya tshijila ya Mambre, muena Amore
Bidimu bia Enoshe bidi nkama tshitema ne bitanu
Bavua basue kumonangana ne Maweja Nangila, bavua bumuka mu mitanda yabu, baye mu ntenta ewu bua kuyukila ne Maweja Nangila

Mu ngondo muibidi mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai ku dilolo nebakuvuluke, nebadie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene ne matshitshi adi ne bululu, kabashiyi tshintu to ne ku dinda, kabatshibudi nansha mufuba umue, nebenze bu mudi mikenji yonso ya kuhita kua Yehowa
Nanku padi muambi unuambila bualu mu dina dia Maweja Nangila, kabuyi buenzeka muvuaye muambe amu, numanye ne: ki mbua kudi Maweja Nangila to
Udi ungambila meme malu au munyi
Ke muaba uvua Abrahame musumbe kudi Efrone, muena Iti, bua muaba wa kujika bafue awu wikale wende
Alona wakasaku, bakamujika; ne Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, wakenza mudimu wandi wa buakuidi
Kadi binuikala kanuyi baditshiha, bualu ebu kabuena bubi kunudi
Tshiakunupesha kantu nansha kamue ka mu ditunga edi to
Dilolo nenuambe ne, Tudi basue butuku butshie bualu bua buowa budi bunukuata mu mitshima yenu, ne bua malu anudi batangila ku mesu
Bena Izrayele mene kutuadija kudiabakena, bebejangana ne: Udi mua kutupesha munyinyi wa tuetu kudia nnganyi

Bena Gibeona kabakadi ba mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele mene, bakadi ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Amole; diambedi Bena Isalele bakahunga n abo tshihungidi, kadi Shaula wakakeba kubashiha bua lukunukunu biakadiye n alu kudi Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda

Maweja Nangila neanyoke bena Izrayele Ndelanganyi yenu, ne bantu benyi badi munkatshi muenu bafume ku matunga a kule, pamonabu mushindu udi Maweja Nangila munukengeshe ne bipupu, nebambe ne: Ditunga dijima edi ndimane kunyanguka ku kapia, kabidi ne luepu
Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa wakanusungula munkatshi mua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Mu dituku diakalekela Amasaya kulonda Yehowa, bantu bakamuelela tshifufu mu Yelushalema; yeye wakanyema ku Lakisha, kadi bakamulonda ku Lakisha, bakamushihelaku
Mutuangaji uvua muvuale efode ne mampinda abidi masuika ku ndekelu kua tshilamba atshi
Hakahita ngondo ibidi, yeye wakahingana kudi tatu wandi, ne yeye wakamuenzela bu mu kuditshiha kuakaditshiheye; yeye kakadi mumanye mulume
Kuvulanganabu bikole, kusumba mpangu
Wewe neuyikile handi, neuteke mei mukana muandi, meme nengikale ne mukana muebe ne mukana muandi, nenkuyishe malu anudi mua kuenza
Kanukunyi ntete ya mishindu ibidi mishilangane mu budimi bua tumuma tukese, anyi nebajidile bintu bionso biakadiundamu ne ntete inuakukuna ne tumuma tukese tudi mitshi ei ikuama
Mbikumbane
Numujule pamue ne muena lukuna, nuakaje bujitu
Kanuena mua kupingana mu madimi enu bua kupumbulula tumuma tua mvinyo tunuvua bapue muoyi, nansha tuvua tumata panshi
Kuambilabu Moshe ne: Tuetu tudi ne mikiya, bualu tudi balenge bitalu
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Kubedi mulau, kubavudishidi disanka nansha

Hashishe Shaula wakamba ne, Nakuenza bibi; hingana, muan anyi Davidi, bualu bua tshiena nkuenzela bibi tshikondo tshikuabo, bualu bua muoyo wanyi wakadi bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole ku mesu kuebe lelu; mona, nakuenza bu muntu muhote, nakutamba kuhambuka
Yehowa wakamukonka ne, Mufuki wa mukana mua bantu nganyi

Mbua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne kuenda mu nshila yandi yonso, ne bua kumusua, ne bua kuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso ne bukole buenu buonso, ne bua kutumikila mikenji ya Yehowa ne mei andi anakunuambila lelu bua nuenu kukuma dikasa dimpe
Badi baleeja mpala musangu mwibîdi amu kudi bantu babidi badi bapeta mêyi mapita bungi musangu wa kumpala
Ateke tshianza pa mutu pa ngombe awu, bua Maweja Nangila anyishe mulambu, afuile muntu awu luse
Mvidi Mukulu ke udi muntume kumpala kuenu mu ditunga edi bua meme kunulamina biakudia, bua kunupandisha nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu yonsu mushindu ewu wa dikema

Yehowa wakangambila kabidi ne, Nakatangila bantu aba ne mona, badi bantu ba tshitshu; undekele, bua meme neashihe, nenjimishe dina diabo muinshi mua diulu; meme nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshidi tshibahita bunene ne bukole
Leya kuimita difu dikuabu, kulela muana muisambombu wa balume
Pashishe, wewe ne Arone, nubikile bena Izrayele bonsu
Muena mudimu wa Shaula wakadiku dituku adi, mukandibue ku mesu kua Yehowa, dina diandi Doege, Muena Edome, kahita ka balami ba mikoko ya Shaula
Kadi padi makenga onsu aa kaayi anutekesha, nuenu nubenga amu kubenga mua kungitaba, meme nennufikile munda, nnuluisha
Bualu ndi mubasungule pa muaba wa bena Izrayele bakuabu

Muakuidi wakelabo manyi ha mutu ne wakajidilabo bua kubuela mu mudimu wa tatu andi yeye neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, nealuate bilulu bia lin bilulu bia tshijila, neafile mulambu bua kujidila nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bua ntenta wa kusangakena ne bua tshioshelu ne bua kubuikila n au bubi bua bakuidi ne bua bantu bonso
Nuyifunde kabidi ne ku biibi bia bimenga bienu, ne ku mishiku ya mbelu ya nzubu yenu
Hakamûmusheye mu nshila, bantu bonso bakaya ne Yoaba bua kulondabo Sheba, muana wa Bikili
Numushihe anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu; kanumushihi anu ku dî dia mumonyi umue
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Meme ndi Yehowa wakakumusha mu Ula wa Bena Kasada, bua kukuha buloba ebu bua kubuhiana
Pikalaye wa balume numushipe, pikalaye wa bakaji numulekele ne muoyi
Tangilai, Yehowa udi muena diulu dikuabo didi ku nyima kua diulu, ne muena buloba ne bintu bionso bidimu
Kadi numanye ne: Nuenu kanuyi bakumbaje bionsu ebi, nenuikale bena tshibawu
Avua ne muenya bu wa mikata milamba ne mafuta
Maweja Nangila kuangata lubala luvuaye mulamune alu, kuenza nalu mukaji, kumupesha mulume
Bobo kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo; Yehowa udi buhianyi buabo, bu muakabambileye
Balaame udi umanyisha ne: baluishi nebabutuke Balaame umona bena Amaleke, kubambilaye ne: Nuenu bena Amaleke, nuvua tshisamba tshipite bikuabu
Kulambulabu kabidi bintu bia mupuya mukole, mafuta a kuela mu miendu, a kuela mu mutu, ne a kusambakaja ne manananshi a kuosha
Nulame tshimuna atshi too ne ku dituku dia dikumi ne dinayi dia ngondu ewu
Bena Yuda bakaya, ne Yehowa wakafila Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi mu bianza biabo; bakashiha binunu dikumi bia bantu mu Bezeke
Kanusuikakaji mpunde ne ngombe ku ditempu dimue bua kudima to

Wewe newamiamine ntenta wa kusangakena ne mushete wa Nzambi, ne mesa ne malonga onso a mesa, ne muinda ne malonga onso a muinda, ne tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi, ne tshioshelu tshia kahia ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, ne tshiowelu ne tshitaku tshia tshiowelu
Nenudie nukute
Nutumikile mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nuende mu nshila yandi, numutshine
Bualu bua bobo badi bu tshisamba tshia bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi, kabena ne dijingulula dia malu munda muabo
Kuikadi ne nzambi mikuabo ne meme hohamue
Bakalua ku Yelushalema mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bisanji ne nzenze ne mpungi
Kanuakadia mampa, kanua kanua nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Maweja Nangila, ku mvidie idibu batendelela, udi ukufuana nnganyi
Kadi meme tshiakuya nenu to, bualu nudi ne tshitunu, ndi mua kunubutula mu njila

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba bidi ku mpala kuenu, hanuabihata, hanuahiana buloba buabo, nudimuke, kanukuatshibu kudi mateyi abo bua kubalonda, habajimishabo ku mesu kuenu; kanukonkanganyi bua nzambi yabo ne

Dibikidibua dia Elisha Wakumukaku, wakasangila ne Elisha, muana wa Shafata, wakadi wihila budimi ne bikokedi bia ngombe dikumi ne bibidi: yeye wakadi wenda ku tshikokedi tshia dikumi ne tshibidi; Eliya wakafika kudiye, wakela tshikowelu tshiandi ham bidi n andi
Peka, muana wa Lemalaya, wakashiha bantu binunu lukama ne makumi abidi mu Yuda dituku dimue, buonso buabo bakadi bena bukitu; bualu bua bobo bakahidia Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo
Wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku nyima ne munda mua mushete, wakateka tshiamu tshia or ku mibangu ya mushete
Pashishe Moshe kutemesha miendu ayi muaba uvua Maweja Nangila, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Nsongakaji kumusha mulondu lukasa pa makaya, ungamba ne: Nuaku
Ditempu dionsu divua ne muendeshi ne bena mvita kabidi
Tshisamba tshia Zebulone:
Moshe kuamba ne: Dina diende didi Ngershone, bualu ndi muena tshimuangi, musombe mu ditunga dia bende
Yehowa kakahunga tshihungidi etshi ne batatu betu, kadi wakatshihunga anu n etu buonso buetu badi ne muoyo lelu eu
Kanutetshi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munda bu munuakamuteta mu Masa
Kadi Mikala, muana wa bakashi wa Shaula, wakananga Davidi; bakambila Shaula, ne bualu ebu buakamusankisha
Nunku nubueshe mei â munda mua mitshima yenu ne muoyo wenu; nuasuika ku tshianza tshienu bu tshimanymu ne hankatshi ha makiki enu
Yeye wakumukaku, wakaya ku Betele: hakadiye uya mu nshila, bana ba balume bakaluhuka mu musoko, bakamuseka, bakamuambila ne, Banda biebe, muena lubala
Hezikiya wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi; Manashe, muan andi mulume, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Bantu bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa Siba bakadi bahika ba Mefibosheta
Wadimanyisha
Kena ne mushindu wa kupeta tshikuabu, matuku adibu bamutshintshimike kudi baluishi bua kunukengesha mu bimenga bienu
Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudibo, bua kubashiha munkatshi mua tshitudilu, tô ne hakafuabo buonso buabo
Teka luhanza luanyi lua argent mu tshibombi tshia muana muakunyi ne argent yandi kabidi Yeye Wakenza bu dî dia Yosefe
Numanye ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neanupe ditunga edi dimpe, kadi ki mbua buakane buenu to
Mulombodi wa Ditunga wa tshimpitshimpi udi wimanyina pa bulongolodi bwa disungula dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga mupiamupia bilondeshila makanyika ne tshipungu tshidi Dîyi dikulu dikosa

MUTU WA MUKANDA V: Bidi bitangila Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga Kanungu ka Mbâsa mu ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga

Bialua muenyi wa munkatshi muenu mundi mubanji, ne bialua mukuenu udi ushikama hehi handi muntu muhele, biadihaneye kudiye anyi kudi mundi mukuabo wa mu diku diandi, hadihaneye, badi mua kumuhikula, umue wa bana babo udi mua kumuhikula, manseb andi anyi muana mulume wa manseb andi anyi muan abo mukuabo udi mua kumuhikula, bialueye muntu mubanji, yeye udi mua kudihikula
Nuenu mumane ku mbelu ne muntu uwakusombesha tshintu nealuhuke kûdi ne tshieya
Nutumine lubuebue alu diyi, bena Izrayele bonsu batangile
Tshimenga nansha tshimue tshia mu bimenga ebi, katshivua ne bukole bua kutuluisha
Enza biebe mitshi ya acacia, lamika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yai yonso

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Lewi ne, Hanuangata tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bintu bia Bena Isalele tshinakunuha bu buhianyi buenu, nenutshinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula kudi Yehowa, tshintu tshia dikumi tshia tshintu tshia dikumi tshiakanuhabo
Kabidi muntu kena mua kuenza majimbu, kutempa, nansha kulowa bantu, nansha kubuka, nansha kuyukila ne bakishi bua kumvua tshidibu bamba
Bantu aba nebimane ha mutu ha Ebala bua kuela bantu mulau: Lubena ne Gada ne Ashe ne Zebuluna ne Dana ne Nafatale
Nuenu bayikumbaje, nenushale ne muoyi matuku a bungi mu ditunga dinuyaya kubuela dishiya dia Yardene
Ila, muana wa Ikeshe, Muena Tekoa, wakadi kapitene ka tshisumbu tshia mu ngondo muisambombo; mu tshisumbu tshiandi muakadi bantu binunu makumi abidi ne binai

Ku tshikondo tshiakansungulabo gouverneur wabo mu buloba bua Yuda, ku tshidimu tshia makumi abidi tshia bukelenge bua mukelenge Atashasete tô ne ku tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne bibidi, bu bidimu dikumi ne bibidi, meme ne bana betu katuakanza kudia bidia bia gouverneur
Mose wakalua ne Alona ne bana bandi balume, wakabowesha ne mai
Muntu wa mu Maona wakadiku wakadi ne bintu biandi ku mukuna wa Kâmele; wakadi muntu munene, wakadi ne mikoko binunu bisatu ne mbushi tshinunu; yeye wakadi ukosa miosa ya mikoko yandi mu Kâmele
Kadi ndayi, nubambile ne: Meme Maweja Nangila, ndi ne muoyi
Bantu bebe kabena mua kuenza bualu bubi nunku
Kutedi dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe, tshitelatela, bua Yehowa kena ubingisha muntu udi utela dina diandi tshitelatela
Bienzedi bia Ahazaya bikuabo biakenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi
Pashishe neanumuangalaje miaba yonsu, munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende bidi pa buloba bujima
Nebatunyenge mpunde yetu, batukuate mu bupika

Mikalu idi luseke ludi diba dibuelela, idi ilonda tshibandabanda tshia Yardene, biangatshile ku dijiba dia Ngenesarete too ne ku Mayi manene a luepu, too ne ku mukuna wa Pisga, luseke ludi diba dipatukila
Monai, muan anyi mukashi utshidi kamama ne mukashi wandi muhika badiku, nenduhuke n abo, nubafuishe bundu, ne nuenze n abo budi buimpe ku mesu kuenu; kadi kanuenzedi muntu eu bualu bubi
Kadi mpindiewu, nuenu bena buenzavi, nudi basue kulonda amu meji mabi a bankambua benu, bua Maweja Nangila afikile kabidi bena Izrayele munda
Hashikisha Yehowa kubihata, kanuambi mu mitshima yenu ne, Mbualu bua buakane buetu, Yehowa wakaluamu n etu bua kuhiana buloba ebu: bualu bua Yehowa udi ubihata ku mpala kuenu bualu bua bubi buabo
Nennunyoke bilondeshile bijanu bienu abi
Mu matuku andi buloba buakadi ne ditalala bidimu dikumi
Bisamba ebi bidi bitendelela nzambi yabo munyi
Musombuedi, bu mudiye ne tshiji, udi mua kulondakaja mushipianganyi
Mulombodi udibo basungula udi ubanga mudimu mu tshipungu tshipiatshipia
Kanungu ka Mêyi malongolodi adi aleeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa midimu ya mbulamatadi ya bukalenga bunene, ya polovensa ne ya bitupa bia teletwale bidiludika
Nebabaleje midimu idibu mua kuenza ne bintu bidibu mua kuambula
Kadi Yeye ke uvua munudianjidile mu njila, bua kunukebela muaba wa kuasa mitanda
Yehowa nea nuvudishile disanka mu bisasa bienu, ne mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; neanuvudishile disanka mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nnuha
Moshe, Elazare ne bamfumu bakuabu ba bena Izrayele, kupatuka mu mitanda bua kuakidila bena mvita abu
Wakabenga Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua bandi; kakenda mu nshila wa Yehowa nansha

Nudie tshintu tshia dikumi tshia manvua enu ne tshia nvinyo yenu mihia mihia ne tshia manyi enu ne tshia ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne tshia ba mikoko yenu ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udiye Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi; nunku nenubale bualu bua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, matuku onso
Ebu mbuhianyi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Nafatale ku meku abo: bimenga ne misoko yabi
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua meme kuya kudiye bua kukosa mutu wandi
Nanku ebi ke mikenji ne meyi ne malongesha, bivua Maweja Nangila mumanyishe Moshe pa mukuna wa Sinayi bua ambile bena Izrayele

Yeye wakahitshisha bana bandi mu kahia mu tshibanda tshia muana wa Hinoma; wakatempa matempu, wakatendelela bakishi, wakahaka manga, wakasangisha dî ne batempeshanganyi ba mbuku ne bena buloshi; yeye wakenza malu mabi a bungi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufuisha n au tshiji
Pa nanku, mwenji wa Dîyi ewu udi mubwêja mapa ne madikadidi aa mu Dîyi dikulu
Neamanye tshidi tshikolesha mushinga wa nzubu awu, nansha tshidi tshiutekeshisha
Bua bualu ebu mulume neashiye tatu andi ne mamu andi, nealamate mukashi wandi, bubidi buabo nebikale mubidi umue
Yehowa, bua muntu webe, ne bua malu adi mu mutshima webe, wewe wakuenza malu â onso manene bua kumumanyisha malu â onso
Muntu umue wakadi kumanya mua kuihata tshinunu tshia bantu, ne bantu babidi bakadi kumanya mua kuihata binunu dikumi bia bantu munyi, bikala Dibue kadiyi dibahane, ne Yehowa kayi mubafile kudibo

Kadi nudi mua kushiha nyama ne mua kudia munyinyi ku mbelu kuenu udi mitshima yenu misue, bu mudi disanka dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, diakanusankisheye n adi; bantu badi kabayi bakane ne badi bakane badi mua kudia munyinyi wa kabuluku ne mbashi
Mutangidi wa bantu bavua balongolola maluvu a mukalenga, kuawila Yozefe tshilota tshiende, umuambila ne: Ndi mulote: mmone mutshi wa maluvu a mvinyo kumpala kuanyi, muikale ne matamba asatu
Davidi wakangata ngabu ya biamu bia or yakadi bantu ba Hadadezê n ai, wakalua n ai ku Yelushalema
Muena Izrayele uvuabu bashipe pamue ne mukaji wa bena Madiyane awu, uvua Zimri, muana wa Salu, umue wa ku bakulu ba diku dia bena Shimeyone
Nunku ndi nnaya ku mpala kua Yehowa
Binatuisha muele wanyi wa nvita, ne bingolola tshianza tshianyi bua kulumbulula bilumbu, meme nensombuele badi n anyi lukuna, neafute badi n anyi tshiji
Lufu lua Davidi Kul
Muntu kêna mwa kukandika mapa abu adi matangila dikalaku diaabu, midimu yaabu ne dilwangana diaabu bwa kupeta bukalenga mu mungalata
Anu bua bualu ebu bumue balume aba nebitabushe bua kushikama n etu tulue bantu bamue bua mulume yonso wa munkatshi muetu atengudibue bu mudibo batengula
Mukashi wakaya lubilu, wakamanyisha bayandi ne, Mona, muntu au wakalua kundi dituku dikuabo wakumueneka kundi
Bimenga biabu bidi binene

Hawakanda diulu bua nvula kayimatshi, bualu bua bobo bakukuenzela bibi; biatendelelabo ku muaba eu, bitabushabo dina diebe, biakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua mibi yabo hawabakengesha, ubunvuile mu diulu, ubuikidile bantu bebe, Bena Isalele, mibi yabo hawabalesha nshila muimpe udibo ne bualu bua kuendela; nunku umatshishe nvula ha buloba buebe buwakuha bantu bebe bu buhianyi buabo
Bakabika hatshiatshia honso: hakatshiabu, Samuele wakabikila Shaula ha mutu ha nsubu, wamba ne, Juka, bua meme nkutume
Kadi Yehowa wakangunvuila musangu eu kabidi
Ushale n anyi, kutshinyi, bualu bua udi ukeba muoyo wanyi ngudi ukeba muoyo webe kabidi; biwashala n anyi, neulamibue bimpe
Miakulu yaadi ya mu ditunga idi tshikongo, dingala, tshisawudi ne tshiluba
Nunku wewe neubidie kukanda bantu bua kulondabo bana babo musangu bule munyi
Kulayanganabu nende, kuya
Nanku mupika apete anu budikadidi, bua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu anusankishe mu bionsu binudi nuenza
Hashishe Samuele wakangata lusengu lua manyi, wakamuela manyi ha mutu handi munkatshi mua bana babo; Nyuma wa Yehowa wakatulukila Davidi bikole ku dituku adi

Bakamuha bidia ha buandi, bakabaka bidia ha buabo, ne bakaha Bena Ejipitu bakadi badia n andi ha buabo, bualu bua Bena Ejipitu kabatu badia bidia ne Bena Ebelu, bualu ebu budi bufuisha Bena Ejipitu bundu
Ahazaya, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakamana kuyaku bua kutangileye Yolama
Kabidi ndi mumone mudibu babakengesha kudi bena Ejipitu
Nakatendelela Yehowa, nakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, kushihi bantu bebe ne buhianyi buebe buwakahikula ne bukole buebe, bantu bawakahatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole
Mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu awu kena ne mikiya to
Bena Izrayele badi bu mudi nyama wa ntambue, udi ushipa nyama, udia munyinyi
Bua bualu ebu Bena Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo; Yehowa udi buhianyi buabo bu muakabambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Wewe newase tshitendelelu ne bilulu binene dikumi bia lin mutambe buimpe, bilulu bia bleu ne bilulu bikunzubile ne bilulu bikunze kunzû, ubienze ne bakeluba benjibue ne lungenyi lule
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Udi udidila kundi tshinyi
Yehowa wakakudimuna mutshima wandi bua malu akeleye meji bua kuenzela bantu bandi

Balumbuluishi nebalondolole tshilumbu tô; ne bikala mumonyi eu muena mashimi mutumpile mukuabo tshianana, hashishe bamuenzele yeye bu muakasueye kuenzela muan abo: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu

Bobo bakanyenga buloba buandi, ne buloba bua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, bakelenge babidi ba Bena Amole, bakadi dishiya dia Yadene kudi diba dihatuka; ku Aloê udi ku butshika bua tshibanda tshia mai a Ânona tô ne ku mukuna wa Sileona dina dikuabo ne Hêmona , ne buloba buonso bua Alabâ dishiya dia Yadene ku esete tô ne ku dishiha dia mai a Alabâ kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega
Tshibangidilu Yozefe kua Potifare, muena Ejipitu Bena Ismayele kufika ne Yozefe mu Ejipitu kumusumbisha kudi muena Ejipitu diende Potifare
Ba Bena Yisehâ; Kenanya ne bana bandi balume bakadi ne mudimu wabo ha mbelu ha ntempelo mu Isalele bu bakokeshi ne balumbuluishi
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kakasesuka mu malu mabi a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele matuku andi onso
Pashishe, wangate kabidi bintu abi, ubiteke pa tshilambuilu pa mutu pa mulambu wa kuosha, bua bikale mulambu wa dipembu udi unnunkila meme Maweja Nangila
Nuikishe, nudisangishe bua kuntumbisha meme Maweja Nangila, miaba yonsu inudi basombe

Wewe neutusumbishe bia kudia ku argent bua tuetu kudia; Utuhe mai a kunua ku argent, bua tuetu kunua, anji kuitabusha bua tuetu tuhite ku makasa; bu muakatuenzela bana ba Esau ne Bena Moaba badi bashikama mu Ala, tô ne hatuasabuka Yadene mu buloba buakatuha Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Yeye Wakenza tshinyi

BIDI BITANGILA DIAKAJILULA DIA DIYI DIKULU Bwa kwepula ngenyi miludiki ya mungalata idi mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi ku mpukapuka ya tshidiidi ne ku diyitangilula kadiyi dikengedibwa, diakajilula dia Dîyi dikulu nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kulenga bulongolodi budi butangila Mbulamatadi wa Bukalenga bwabanyangana, lungenyi luludiki lwa disungudibwa kudi bantu bônso, bweena mpala bwa Bukalenga bunene, bûngi ne bule bwa matuku a butumibwa bwa Mulombodi wa ditunga, budikadidi bwa bukalenga bwa bandumbulula, tshibûngi tshia bisumbu bia tshidiidi ne bia bakwidi ba beena mudimu
Bualu bua kahia aka kanene nekatuoshe; bitunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, kabidi, hashishe netufue

Yeye wakabambila ne, Edi ndî diakuamba Yehowa ne, Makelela udi dituku dia kuikisha dia tshijila, dituku diakadijidila Yehowa nulambe bidia ne munyinyi binudi basue, ne bintu bionso bidi bishala, nubitekele bua kudia makelela
Nebahe bantu bakuabo bana benu balume ne bana benu bakashi; mesu enu neabatangile ne mitshima minyingalala matuku onso; kadi kanuena nushala ne bukole nansha bukese mu bianza bienu
Kuluishabu bena Madiyane, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Solomo wakatumina Hulama, mukelenge wa mu Tulo, dî ne, Bu muwakenzela Davidi tatu anyi, wakamutumina mitshi ya cèdre bua kuibakeye nsubu wandi, ungenzele meme nunku kabidi
Mutuangaji nealambule nyunyi umue bua mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu, nyunyi mukuabu bua mulambu wa kuosha
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Yalobama kakalekela bubi buandi; kadi wakasungula bakuidi munkatshi mua bantu bonso ba tshianana, wakabateka mu bitendelelu biakadi ku mikuna
Hashishe Davidi wakajuka ne bantu bonso bakadi n andi, bakasabuka dishiya dia Yadene; hakatshiabu nansha umue wabo wakashala, buonso buabo bakadi basabuka

Kadi muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kujadikamu dina diandi: nenukebe muaba kudiye mushikame, nenudisangisheku; nenulueku ne milambu yenu ya kuosha, ne nyama mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu, ne bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu
Neikale wa tshijila, nsuki ne miedi bilepa naka
Padi muntu utapa mukuende mputa, bamutape pende mputa wa momumue
Nuenu, Bena Kamoshe, nudi bajimine
Nenuikale ne milau hanuabuela mu nsubu, nenuikale ne milau hanualuhukamu
Yehowa, ndi nkusengelela bua tshianza tshiebe tshikale kundi ne ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi; kadi katshikadi kudi bantu bebe bua bobo bikale ne tshihuhu etshi
Badi Bahita Bena Isalele Bukole ku Hôma Nom
Nundekelele bubi buanyi anu musangu eu, nundombele Yehowa Nzambi wenu, yeye angumushile bualu ebu bua lufu
Kumvuaye miadi yetu
Yeye wakadi mukelenge wa mu Yeshuluna, hakasangishabo bakadi ku mutu kua bantu ba bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele
Nunku nakenzela mushete wa mitshi ya acacia, nakasonga mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi, nakabanda ku mukuna ne mabue abidi mu tshianza tshianyi
Mulombodi yonsu kuangata dikombu diende
Bua Ashe yeye wakamba ne, Ashe asanke biandi ne bana, ikale ne diakalengele kudi bana babo: atue dikasa diandi mu manyi

Meme nengikale tatu wandi, yeye neikale muana wanyi; tshiena ngumusha luse luanyi lujalame kudiye bu munakalûmusha kudi wakadi ku mpala kuebe; luidi nemmujadike mu nsubu muanyi ne mu bukelenge buanyi tshiendelele; nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge neajadikibue tshiendelele
Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelese bakadi mu buloba tshikondo atshi
Meku onsu a bena Isakare aa avua ne bantu balume
Meme Moshe mvua mubande ku mukuna bua kuangata mabue, avua ne mikenji ya ndondu wenu ne Maweja Nangila
Ndi musue kuikala Mvidi Mukulu webe, meme nkayanyi
Kanuena ne bua kupia mikiya ku ngenzelu ya nanku to
Bana ba balume ba Beliya: Hebe ne Malekiele, wakadi tatu wa Bîzawita

Aba mbana ba balume ba Ehuda; aba bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo ba Bena Geba; bakaya n abo mu buhika ku Manahata: Nâmana ne Ahiya ne Gela bakaya n abo mu buhika kabidi; yeye wakalela Uza ne Ahihuda

Yeye wakasa Beteleheme ne Etama ne Tekoa ne Betesû ne Soko ne Adulama ne Gata ne Malesha ne Zifa ne Adolayima ne Lakisha ne Azeka ne Solea ne Ayalona ne Hebelone, idi mu Yuda ne Benyamina, misoko yakadi ne ngumbu
Yehowa wakabikila Mose ku mutu kua mukuna, ne Mose wakabanda
Nyoka Idi Isuma bu Kahia Bakumuka ku mukuna wa Hô, bakaya mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze bualu bua kunyunguluka ku nyima kua buloba bua Edome, mitshima ya bantu yakahanga bualu bua nshila
Yehowa kakahunga tshihungidi etshi ne batatu betu, kadi wakatshihunga anu n etu buonso buetu badi ne muoyo lelu eu

Bena Holi bakashikama mu Sei diambedi, kadi Bena Esau bakabalonda ku nyima; bakabashiha ku mpala kuabo, bakashikama mu muaba wabo; bu muakenza Bena Isalele ku buloba bua buhianyi buabo, buakabahebua kudi Yehowa
Yakobe kudipanda bilamba, kuvuala bilamba bikayabale, kuenza madilu a muanende matuku mavule
Ke bankambua ba meku a bena Shimeyone awu
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua manvua bua mukuenu, nudi mua kutula manvua mu tshianza, kadi kanutahi manvua a mukuenu ne muele
Nenuikale ne disanka mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa
Kanungu ka Mapangadika a Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kabeena mwa kuatontolola to ne badi ne tshia kuakumbaja diakamwe
Leya kuamba ne: Mpindiewu Mvidi Mukulu mmunsankishe bikole
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamusangana hehi ne mushimi wa mai wa mu tshihela, mushimi eu udi mu nshila wa ku Shû
Nunku yeye wakahingana ku buloba buandi ne bantu bandi
Hanuakuna bintu tshidimu tshia muanda mukulu, nenudie bintu bia diambedi biakadi bishale mu nsubu yenu, tô ne ku tshidimu tshia tshitema hanuahuola bintu, nenudie bintu bia diambedi biakadi bishale
Nunku wakabiteka ku mpala kuabo, bakadia ne bintu biakashala bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa
Ndelanganyi ya Rubene kuasulula bimenga ebi: Eshebone, Elale, Kiriyatayime, Nebo, Baale Meyone, bivuabu bamane kukudimuna dina
Meme kuikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete, kudijidila, bua dikale dituku dia Dikisha
Biatangila muakuidi ha mputa ne bielanganeye meji ne disama kadiena dibuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, ne nsuki mifike kayenaku, muakuidi neamubueshe ha nkayandi mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete

Yeye wakamba ne, Edi ndî dia Yehowa diakambeye kudi muntu wandi Eliya, Muena Tishebe, ne, Mbua neyidie Izebele mu muaba wa Yizelele; ne mubidi wa Izebele newikale bu tunvi ha mutu ha buloba bua Yizelele nunku kabena mua kuamba ne, Eu udi Izebele kabidi
Nanku dituku dia Dikisha dionsu nundambule mulambu wa kuosha ewu, pamue ne mulambu wa nyama ne wa mvinyo wa ku dituku ku dituku

Nuenu nutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi, bu munakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne disanka ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu ha buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha tshiendelele
Ndelanganyi ya Makire, muana wa Menashe, kutshimuna bena Amore, kubanyenga ditunga dia Ngilaade
Kuambilaye Binyamine ne: Muananyi, Mvidi Mukulu akuele lupemba
Katutshiena basue kumvua diyi dia Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu, nansha kumona kapia kadi kakenka aka, bualu kadi mua kutubutula
Bena Ejipitu bakenzesha Bena Isalele mudimu bikole

Bakaha bana ba balume ba Gêshoma mu tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe, Golana mu buloba bua Bashana ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Ashetalota ne miaba ya ku mpenge; mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Kedeshe ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Dabelata ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Lamota ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Anema ne miaba ya ku mpenge; ne mu tshisamba tshia Ashê, Mashala ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Abidona ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Hukoko ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Lehoba ne miaba ya ku mpenge; ne mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Kedeshe mu Galela ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Hamona ne miaba ya ku mpenge, ne Kîyata ayima ne miaba ya ku mpenge
Tshibangidilu Ndelanganyi ya Adame too ne ku Nowa Ke mena a bantu ba ku ndelanganyi ya Adame: Dituku divua Mvidi Mukulu mufuke bantu, wakabafuka bamufuane yeye Mvi di Mukulu

Mikenji ya Bamanyi ne Buhikudi Ei idi mikenji ya kuhumbulula hai malu ku bikondo bienu bionso, mu miaba yonso mudi nushikama, muntu udi ushiha mukuabo, nebashihe mushiku bu mu dî dia bamonyi; kadi kabena bamanye mua kumushiha anu ku dî dia mumonyi umue
Ba Bena Gêshona: Ladana ne Shimei
Hashika disama diandi, nebamubadile matuku muanda mutekete, ku nyima neikale mulengele
Ke munudi mua kujikija buenzayi munkatshi muenu nanku
Bakulu abu, bavua balumbuluisha bilumbu bikese matuku onsu

Hakaluabo ne bakelenge aba batanu kudi Yoshua, Yoshua wakabikila balume bonso ba mu Isalele, wakambila tuhita tua bena nvita tuakadi n andi ne, Luai bienu ha buihi, diatai makasa enu ha nshingu ya bakelenge aba batanu
Moshe kufikisha majinga a bena Rubene ne bena Ngade kudi mutuangaji Elazare, kudi Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, ne kudi bamfumu ba bisamba bia bena Izrayele
Kusha wakalela Nimeloda, yeye wakabanga kuikala muntu mukole

Kanungu ka Mweenyi yônso udi usanganyibwa mu bulaba bwa ditunga bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu, badi ne tshia kumukuba mushindu umwe udibo bakuba bantu ne bintu biaabo, bilondeshila bulongolodi bwenza mu ndondo ne mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga

Gideona wakabuela mu nsubu, wakalongolola muana wa mbushi ne mikata ya tshihiminu tshia bukula buakadi kabuyi ne luevene; wakateka munyinyi mu tshisaka ne nsuhu mu luesu, wakalua n abi kudiye muinshi mua mutshi, wakabifila kudiye
Tshintu tshionsu tshidi ne muoyi pa buloba netshifue
Ku nseke yonsu inayi ya mesa awu, kuvua mabaya malamika tshiamu tshia mpawungi avua ne santimetre muanda mukulu mu butshiama
Tshimuangi Mvidi Mukulu udi uleja Moshe bukole buende Moshe kuandamuna Maweja Nangila ne: Bena Izrayele kabakuitaba, kabakukumbaja bionsu bindi mbambila to
Mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu kuitaba ne: Mbimpe, ndi nganyisha kabidi biudi wamba
Ba ha mutu habo nebambile bantu mei makuabo kabidi ne, Nganyi udi ne ditshina ne mutshima mutekete
Kanutendeledi mvidie ya bena Kenaane Panuafika mu ditunga, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neabutule bisamba bionsu bidi mu ditunga adi
Palti, muana wa Rafu, wa mu tshisamba tshia Binyamine
Bobo nebadie bintu abi bidibo babuikidila n abi bantu mibi yabo, bua kubajidila ne kubalengesha kudi Yehowa, kadi muenyi kena mua kudia bintu ebi, bualu bua bidi bia tshijila
Muakuidi, muana wa Alona, neikale ne Bena Lewi hangatabo tshia dikumi; Bena Lewi nebalue ne tshia dikumi tshia mu bintu bia tshia dikumi, mu nsubu wa Nzambi wetu mu tshibutshilu tshiandi
Tshilamba tshionsu, tshikale ne metre dikumi ne anayi mu bule ne metre abidi mu butshiama
Yakobe kubenga, wamba ne: Ndi ndila amu Yozefe too ne mungafua
Bakenza bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu muaba wa tshima, bakenzela Alona bilulu bia tshijila bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Nzambi Udi Ubalaya Muprofete Mufuanangane ne Mose Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanubishile muprofete munkatshi mua bana benu bu meme, nenunvue dî diandi: bu munuakalomba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Holeba mu dituku dituakasambakena n enu ne, Katunvu dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, kabidi, katutangidi kahia aka kanene kabidi, bua katufu
Meme nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo dituku adi bulelela, bua malu mabi akenzabo, hakakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo
Bakelenge aba bonso bakadisangisha hamue; bakalua, bakasa tshitudilu ku mai a Meloma bua kuluangana ne Bena Isalele
Palô wakatuma mundi, wakamona ne, Nansha tshintu tshimue tshia bimuna bia Bena Isalele tshiakafua

Kuiba bimuna Pikala muntu muibe ngombe, mukoku nansha mbuji, yeye mushipe tshimuna atshi, nansha mutshisumbishe, neafute ngombe itanu bua ngombe umue awu, ne mikoku nansha mbuji inayi bua mukoku nansha mbuji umue awu
Bienzedi bia Yehoaza bikuabo ne malu onso akenzeye ne bukole buandi kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi

Aba mbashihianganyi badi mua kunyemenamu bua kuikala ne muoyo: muntu yonso udi ushiha mukuabo ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi; bu muntu wakuya ne mukuabo muitu bua kutaha nkunyi, ne hakuambeye kutaha mutshi ne kasui, ne kasui kakukuka, kakutaha muntu mukuabo, kakumushiha; muntu eu neanyemene ku umue wa misoko ei, neikale ne muoyo
Utshiteke hehi ne tshilulu tshidi ku mushete wa Nzambi, ku mpala kua tshibuikilu tshidi ha mutu ha mushete, kundi nsangakena n ebe

Kadi bobo ne bankambua betu bakadisua, bakambula mpala yabo, kabakunvua mikenji yebe, bakabenga mua kuyitumikila, kabakelangana meji a malu a kukema awakenza munkatshi muabo; kadi bakambula mpala yabo; mu kutomboka kuabo bakadisunguila mulombodi wa kubahingisha mu buhika buabo
Ke bena Izrayele kudiela panshi bua kukuila Maweja Nangila
Bua tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi, kuenzabu tukanu tubidi tua tshiamu tshia mpawungi menemene, tuluka bu mionji
Londa ku nyima kuanyi
Ndondu ewu mmusakidila ku ndondu wa ku mukuna wa Sinayi
Dane uvua mulele muana wa balume anu umue, diende Ushime
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kakasesuka mu malu mabi a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele
Ke muvua mena a bana ba balume dikumi ne babidi ba Ismayele nanku
Asakidile kabidi maluvu a mvinyo litre isatu
Bantu bonso bakadi mu tshitudilu ne mu madimi kabidi bakazakala; ne masalayi ne bambudi ba bintu bakazakala; buloba buakakanka kabidi, nunku kukanka kunene kua buloba kuakadiku
Abishai, muan abo ne Yoaba, wakadi ku mutu kua bantu basatu; yeye wakela difuma diandi kudi bantu nkama isatu, wakabashiha, wakadi ne dina dia butumbi munkatshi mua bantu aba basatu

Muntu yonso aditekele kakasu mu bintu biandi bia nvita, ne hayeye mu tshisuku, neaumbule dina, neahingashe buloba ha mutu ha bintu biakahuyeye; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi wendakana munkatshi mua tshitudilu bua kunusungila, ne bua kufila badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu; nunku tshitudilu netshikale tshia tshijila
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ungambile Udi ne muaba mu nsubu wa tatu webe bua tuetu kulalamu, anyi
Maweja Nangila kumvua tshijanu atshi
Dana neikale bu nyoka mu nshila, ne bu ntoka mu nshila udi usuma kabalu ku mijilu ya bikono, ne muntu udi ubanda ha nyima udi uhona hanshi bualame
Bintu ebi bionso ubienze ne tshituha tshimue tshia or, tshintu tshijima tshienza ne tshituha tshimue tshia or muedibue mutambe buimpe
Bena Ngershone bavua base mitanda yabu kunyima kua nzubu wa tshijila, luseke ludi diba dibuelela
Nunku bobo bakatuma mushete wa Nzambi ku Ekelona
Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele, bana balume ba Lubena, Hanoka ne meku a Bena Hanoka, Palu ne meku a Bena Palu, Heselona ne meku a Bena Heselona, Kantu ne meku a Bena Kami
Muaba au wakidikibua ne, Tshibanda tshia Eshekola, bualu bua tshisumbu tshia mamuma tshiakakosamu Bena Isalele
Bena Isalele bakadiangatshila bintu bionso bia mu misoko ei ne bimuna; kadi bakashiha muntu yonso ne muele wa nvita tô ne hakababutulabo bonso; kabakashiya umue uhuyakana
Muntu nansha umue wa kunudi, kena mua kuosha muanende wa balume nansha wa bakaji bua kumulambula

Udi ujula bahele ha buloba: udi ujula badi ne bintu bualu ku diala: udi ubashikika hohamue ne baminyampala, bua kuhianabo nkuasa wa butumbi: bualu bua makunshi a buloba adi a Yehowa, ne yeye wakajadika buloba ha mutu hau
Nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Mu bionsu binudi nuenza, nuleje munudi nuntshina
Ndelanganyi ya Tera, tatuende wa Abrame, wa Nahore ne wa Arane idi nunku: Arane kulela Lote
Hakatshunguluka Shaula, Davidi wakatua mpala wandi hanshi, wakamukukuila
Aba bakadi bana bandi ba balume ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo
Nuenu nuakadibisha mu miaba ya batatu benu bu bana ba bantu babi bakavulangana, bua kudiundisha bukole bua tshiji tshia Yehowa kudi Isalele
Maweja Nangila kakunupa bimuma, ne ntete bisaka tente to
Nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Diidikija diônso dia kumbusha ku bukole bukalenga bwenza kudi Dîyi dikulu badi badipiisha ne tshibawu katshiyi kukupula bwa bibi bienzela ditunga ne Mbulamatadi
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kakasesuka mu malu mabi a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele
Yosefe wakabambila ne Tshiena mua kuenza nunku anu muntu wakasanganabo ne luhanza mu tshianza tshiandi neikale muhika wanyi kadi bakuabo benu nuhingane kudi tatu wenu talala
Makenga onsu aa neanuenzekele bua kunubela, nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu
Maweja Nangila, tshianza tshiebe tshia balume tshidi ne bukole, tshidi tshibutula baluishi bebe
Ndelanganyi ya Yayire, muana mukuabu wa Menashe, kunyenga misoku mikuabu ya bena Amore, kuyinyikabu ne: Misoku ya Yayire

Bintu bionso biakangatabo kudi bena nvita biakadi mikoko binunu nkama isambombo ne makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu, ne ngombe binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne bibidi, ne nyama ya mpunda binunu makumi asambombo ne tshinunu tshimue, ne bakashi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi badi kabayi banze kumanyibua kudi balume
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mutshima webe ne muoyo, tshiena nkulekela
Kanuakupeta bikuabu pa mbelu to
Yeye wakatamba kulua mubanji wakadi ne bisumbu bia bimuna ne bena mudimu ba bakashi ne bena mudimu ba balume, ne tumelo ne tubalu
Mena a misoko ei akadi: Besê mu tshihela, mu muaba wa mpata, wa mu Bena Lubena; ne Lamota mu Gilada wa Bena Gada; ne Golana mu Bashana wa Bena Manashe
Esau wakamuebesha ne, Tshisumbu atshi tshinene tshmakusangakena n atshi mu nshila ntshia bualu kai
Nudi basue kutombokela mukelenge, anyi
, mpunde

Nakadi kuamba ne, Nembamuangalashe kule kuaka, nenjimishe tshivulukidi tshiabo munkatshi mua bantu; bu meme tshiyi nutshine ne bantu badi n abo lukuna nebanfikishe munda, ne bobo nebabange kujingulula bimpe, neba diambe ne, Bianza bietu bidi bibandishibua, ne Yehowa kena wenza malu â onso
Yotama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu musoko wa Davidi; Ahaza muan andi wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Bana aba bonsu dikumi ne basambombu ke ndelanganyi ivua Yakobe mulele ne Zilpa, mukaji mupika uvua Labane mupeshe muanende wa bakaji Leya
Pafikibu mu tshibandabanda tshia Eshekole, kutentekelabu ditunga
Bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bakadilengesha; bakalengesha bantu ne bibi ne lumbu kabidi
Ahaba wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi
Halelula, Bete sû ne Gedô, ne Mâlata ne Bete anota ne Eletekona; bimenga bisambombo ne misoko yabi

Hakunvua Izebele dî adi ne, Nabota udi mushihibue ne mabue, Izebele wakambila Ahaba ne, Juka biebe, wangate budimi bua Nabota, Muena Yizelele, buakahidieye kukuhanyisha ku mushinga; bualu bua Nabota kena ne muoyo, udi mufue
Kuebejaye bena mu Enayime ne: Mukaji mudisombele uvua pa buipi apa ku muelelu wa njila eku, udi penyi
Hafua wa mu nsubu wa Yalobama mu musoko, mbua neyimudie; biafuileye mu mpata, nyunyu ya mulu neyimuzokole; bualu bua Yehowa wakuamba dî edi
Nanku bakaji benu nebashale bakamba, bana benu nebashale bana ba nshiya
Wakalamika or munda mua nsubu yonso yakadi ha mutu
Nanku mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu uvua anu ne tshitunu
Hashala buloba, tshidimu tshia kukuna bintu ne tshidimu tshia kunowa bintu ne tshidimu tshia mashika ne tshidimu tshia luya ne munya ne mîdima kabiena bihanga tshiendelele nansha
Noa wakanua nvinyo, wakakuatshika nvinyo, wakalala mu ntenta wandi butaka
Davidi wakebesha Nzambi ne, Nye bua kuluangana ne Bena Peleshete, anyi
Bena Isalele, nuenu nudi ne disanka, banganyi badi bu nuenu basungidibue kudi Yehowa

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu badi bakakumbaja kudi bantu tshiteema bateeka kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga, yêye nkayende mudisungwila basatu ba ku bôbu abu, Tshimamwende wa Bukalenga patshi, mu tshisangilu tshiatshi tshinene, tshifila bantu basatu ne Kapangu ka kumutu ka bakoshi ba nsambu kafila bantu basatu
Padi muntu mushale ne tshibangu tshia tshiuja pambidi, padi tshibangu tshiuwula tshiakabidi, nansha dikeji ditokoloke dimueneka mu tshibangu atshi, muntu awu aye kudileja kudi mutuangaji

Bobo bakatshina hakaluabo n abo mu nsubu wa Yosefe, bakambilangana ne, Bakatubuesha mu nsubu nunku bualu bua argent yakahingashabo mu bibombi bietu diambedi badi basue kutubanda ne bubi, nebatukuate ne mpunda yetu, nebatubueshe mu buhika
Mu matuku akahita ku nyima hakadi Shaula mukelenge wetu, nguewe wakaluhuka ne Bena Isalele, wakahingana n abo
Kebai bienu Yehowa ne bukole buandi, kebai mpala wandi matuku onso
Muntu yonsu kabidi neamuluishe

Kadi biahidieye kuhikula budimi, anyi bikaleye muhanyishe muntu mukuabo budimi, kabena mua kubuhikula kabidi, kadi halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene hahingashabo budimi mu bia nza bia banfumu babu, budimi ebu nebuikale bua tshijila kudi Yehowa, nebuikale mu bianza bia muakuidi
Bena Levi kudilongolola, kumusha mikiya yabu, kusukula bilamba biabu
Kadi Bena Isalele bakambilangana ne, Tunyeme bietu, tubasemeshe kule ne musoko, baluile mu nshila minene

Mose wakambila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Nulambe munyinyi mu mai a kahia ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, nûdie ne mampa adi mu tshisaka tshidi ne bintu bia tshijila bu munakamba ne, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebaudie
Mitshi yakambila muonshi wa tumuma ne, Lua biebe, udikokeshe

Bakelenge Dibutuka dia Samalea ne Buhika bua Bena Isalele Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bibidi bia bukelenge bua Ahaza, mukelenge wa Yuda, Hoshea, muana wa Ela, wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele mu Samalea; wakabakokesha bidimu tshitema
Pashishe tuetu kutendelela Maweja Nangila
Tshimuangi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Neudimuene nkayebe mundi ngenzeja mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ku bukole bua kulekelaye bena Izrayele baye
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku bua matuku a kudia bidia akasungula Yehowa
Kadi pangabikidi bantu ngela mbila, kunyemaye, ushiya muntumpu wende panshi muaba umvua
Nudi nukoleshe mitshima yenu bu muakakolesha Bena Ejipitu ne Palô mitshima yabo bualu kai

Mufuanyikije kabidi: padi muntu ulengangana ne mukuabu kayi mumanye, ne udi mulengangane nende ewu udi ne mikiya idi yambulukilangana, udi mulengangane awu, padiye umanya bubi buende, diakamue udi muena tshibawu
Hawamulekela, kumutumi ne bianza bituhu; umuhe bintu bia bungi munkatshi mua mikoko yebe, ne bia bintu biwakuhuola ne bia nvinyo; bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, mukusankishe, wewe neumuhe
Nuenu bamane kumusha binudi ne bua kundambula, nuangate penu bidi bishale, bu mudi bena Izrayele bonsu bangate bintu bidi bishale ku ntete ya bukula, ku maluvu a mvinyo, ne ku mafuta

Yehowa wakambila Yehu ne, Bualu bua wewe wakuenza malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kuanyi, wakuenzela ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba malu anakasungula mu mutshima wanyi, nunku bana bebe ba balume nebashikame mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Isalele tô ne ku bikondo binai
Bena Izrayele bakumbaje bionsu bindi mukuambile ebi
Mukashi kaluatshi bilulu bia mulume, ne mulume kaluatshi bilulu bia bakashi: muntu yonso udi wenza malu au nunku udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bana benu kabidi, tshisamba tshia Lewi, tshisamba tshia tatu ebe, ulue n abo bua bobo bakukuatshile mudimu kadi wewe ne bana bebe balume badi n ebe nenuikale ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Au mmena a bana balume ba Esau Elifasa, muana wa balume wa Ada, mukashi wa Esau, ne Luele muana wa Basemata, mukashi wa Esau
Tangilai, batatu hetu bakashihibua ku miele ya nvita, ne bana betu balume ne bana betu bakashi ne bakashi betu hadi mu buhika bua bualu ebu
Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakahunga n etu tshihungidi mu Holeba
Munkatshi mua tshisamba tshia Lubena: Besê ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Yahasa ne miaba ya ku matshika, Kedemota ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Mefata ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga binai
Yehowa wakamueneka mu Ntenta mu difutu: difutu diakimana ku mutu kua tshibi tshia Ntenta

Hakatangila Yosefe Benyamina n abo, wakambila mulami wa nsubu wandi ne, Ulue ne balume aba mu nsubu, ubashihele nyama, ulongolole bintu bia kudia, bualu bua bantu aba nebadie n anyi bidia diba hankatshi
Hakahita bidimu makumi abidi, Solomo wakamana nsubu ibidi: nsubu wa Yehowa ne nsubu wa mukelenge

Tuetu ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne bantu tuakela nshobo bua mulambu wa nkunyi bua kulua n au mu nsubu wa Nzambi wetu, bu muakadi biota bia batatu etu bua kuwosha ha tshioshelu tshia Yehowa Nzambi wetu mu bikondo biakasungulabo ku tshidimu ku tshidimu, bu muakafundabo mu mikenji; ne bua kulua ne bintu bia diambedi bia mu buloba buetu ne mamuma a diambedi a mitshi yonso, ku tshidimu ku tshidimu, mu nsubu wa Yehowa; ne bua kulua ne ban a bute ba bana baledibue ne ba bimuna, bu muakadibo bafunde mu mikenji, ne ba ngombe ne ba mikoko, mu nsubu wa Nzambi wetu kudi bakuidi badi benza mudimu mu nsubu wa Nzambi wetu; ne bua kulua ne bintu bia diambedi bia mampa etu ne bia milambu ya kukuha ne bia mamuma a mitshi yetu yonso ne bia nvinyo mihia mihia ne bia manyi mahia mahia kudi bakuidi mu nsubu wa Nzambi wetu; ne bua kulua kudi Bena Lewi ne tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso bidi bimena mu buloba buetu; bualu bua Bena Lewi batu bangata tshia dikumi tshia bintu bietu bidi bimena mu buloba mu misoko yonso

Solomo kakabuesha Bena Isalele mu buhika kadi bobo bakadi bena nvita bandi ne bena mudimu bandi ne miloho yandi ne tupitene tuandi ne tuhita tua bena makalu andi ne tua bantu bakenda ha nyima ha tubalu tuandi

Yoshua ne Bena Isalele bonso bakangata Akana, muana wa Zela, ne tshiamu tshia argent ne tshilulu ne tshiamu tshia or ne bana bandi balume ne bana bandi bakashi ne ngombe yandi ne mpunda yandi ne mikoko yandi ne ntenta wandi ne bionso biakadiye n abi: bakalua n abi mu tshibanda tshia Akola

Bana ba balume ba Shela, muana wa Yuda: Ele, tatu wa Leka, ne Lâda, tatu wa Malesha ne ba mu nsubu wa bakumi ba bilulu bia lin, ba mu nsubu wa Ashabea; Yolama ne Bena Kozeba ne Yoasha ne Salafa wakakokesha mu buloba bua Moaba, ne Yashubi lehema
Enza mabaya abidi a kutoka ku matumba a tshitendelelu adi ku nyima
Udi ukutshipa, bamutshipe biende
Bena Iti, bena Amore, bena Kenaane, bena Perizi, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa, nenubashipe bonsu, muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu muambe
Maweja Nangila udi wakuila bakaji bakamba ne bana ba nshiya
Kabidi muntu yonsu udi wenza mudimu dituku adi, meme nkayanyi nemmushipe, mmumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Kanuena mua kuyidia to
Kamuangatshi to
Nemfile bionsu bua ngangate anu nsongakaji ewu, ikale mukajanyi

Hashishe yeye wakakudimuna mpala wandi ku tshimanu tshia nsubu, wakatendelela Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa, ndi nkusengelela ne, Uvuluke bu munakuenda ku mpala kuebe mu bushuwa ne mutshima mutoke, nakuenza malu mimpe ku mesu kuebe
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila, udi munupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, bua ngikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Nunku Bena Isalele kabena mua kuimana ku mpala kua bena lukuna babo; bakela bena lukuna babo nyima bualu bua bobo bakadiela mulau; meme tshiena ngikala n enu kabidi anu hanûmusha tshintu tshia tshijila munkatshi muenu
Nanku bantu aba, bisumbu bisatu, nebatuadije luendu, benza tshiluilu tshinayi, tshia ndekelu
Hakamona Atalaya, mamu wa Ahazaya, ne muan andi udi mufue yeye wakajuka, wakashiha bana balume bonso ba bakelenge ba Bena Yuda

Bualu bua nudi bamanye bu mutuakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne mutuakahita munkatshi mua bisamba biakadi mu nshila; ne nuenu nuakatangila malu mabi abo ne mpingu yabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue ne ya tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia or yakadi munkatshi muabo; bua muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu, nansha mulume nansha mukashi nansha diku dia bantu nansha tshisamba, udi akudimuna mutshima wandi kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kukuatshila nzambi ya bisamba abi mudimu; ne bua muji udi ukuama mamuma a mulungu ne a bululu kawikadi munkatshi muenu
Oteniele, muana wa Kenaza, wakafua
Ekesode Mikenji ya Dia Lumingu Mose Wakabikila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, wakabambila ne, Â mmalu adi Yehowa musue nuenu nuenze
Nanku, Yakobe kuela Yozefe tuasakidila, kuinama panshi ku mutu kua bulalu
Bobo nebanshihe meme, nebakushiye wewe ne muoyo
Matuku onso akakokesha Yalobama bantu akadi bidimu makumi abidi ne bibidi; wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi; Nadaba, muana wandi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu lukama dikumi ne tshitema
Wakabanga mudimu mu dituku dibidi dia mu ngondo muibidi, mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukelenge buandi
Kanukunyi mutshi wa Ashela hehi ne tshishihelu tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshinudi badiashile
Wakamuambila ne, Ku Hebelone
Kabatangidi lue vene mu miaba yenu yonso tô matuku muanda mutekete; kanushiyi munyinyi unuakashiha wa milambu dilolo dia dituku dia ku mpala butuku buonso tô ne ku dinda
Padi tshimuna atshi ne mikiya, katshiyi tshikumbana mua kulambula Maweja Nangila, muenatshi atshifile kudi mutuangaji
Nanku bonsu abu, bisumbu bisatu, nebatuadije luendu pashishe, benza tshiluilu tshisatu
Bualu bua batshidi muana wa Yishai ne muoyo ha buloba, wewe ne bukelenge buebe kabiena bijadikibue

Hanuakalua ku muaba eu, Sihona, mukelenge wa mu Heshebona, ne Oga, mukelenge wa mu Bashana, bakaluhuka bua kuluangana n etu, ne tuetu tuakabahita; bakanyenga buloba buabo, tuakabuha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe bu buhianyi buabo
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Nansha, mukelenge wetu, bantu bebe bakuluila anu bua kusumbabo bia kudia
Nanku, mpindiewu ndi mpingana kuetu

Mikalu ya maloba Panuafika mu ditunga didi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe, nuenu bamane kupeta miaba ya kusomba, mikalu ne bena mutumba nenu bavua badianjile kuasa muaba awu, ishale anu mushindu unuvua bayisangane, kanuyi nudiundisha buloba bunuvua bapete
Kumuambila ne: Ndi Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu

Hashishe hakajimina bena nvita bonso, hakafuabo munkatshi mua bantu, Yehowa wakangambila ne, Lelu nenuhite ku Ala, butshika bua Moaba: hanualua ba buihi ne Bena Amona, kanubatatshishi, kanuluanganyi n abo; bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba bua Bena Amona bu buhianyi buenu, bualu bua nakamana kuha bana ba Lota buloba abu bu buhianyi buabo
Kadi nuenu nudi nutamba kumuenesha tshiji kudi Bena Isalele hanuanyanga dituku dia lumingu
Pashishe, Abrahame kujika muena kuende mu lubuebue alu luvua mu budimi bua Makpela pabuipi ne Mambre, udibu babikila ne: Ebrone, mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Kalongu kinâyi : Bidi bitangila makookeshi a batshipwita ba Ditunga anyi a batshipwita bakulumpa
Bena Benyamina bakahingana ku tshikondo atshi; bakabaha bakashi bakakuatabo ne muoyo ku Yabesha gilada; kadi kabakabakumbana
Ke munudi mua kuenzela bimenga bionsu bidi kule, kabiyi mu ditunga dinuasomba
Sala wakamba ne, Nzambi wakansekesha ne bantu bonso badi bunvua lumu elu nebaseke n anyi

Aba mbana ba balume ba Luele, muana wa Esau: mukelenge Nahata ne mukelenge Zela ne mukelenge Shama ne mukelenge Miza, aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Luele mu buloba bua Edome, aba mbana ba balume ba Basemata, mukashi wa Esau
Bantu bakadi ku mutu kua musoko kabakamanya kunakaya anyi malu anakenza; tshiakanza kuambila Bena Yuda anyi bakuidi anyi bantu banene anyi bakadi ku mutu kua musoko anyi benji ba mudimu
Mose wakamba ne, Muntu yonso wakudifila kudi Yehowa lelu ku mushinga wa muan andi mulume ne muan abo mulume, Yehowa anuvudishile disanka lelu
Mu njila amu, bavua kabidi ne musumba wa bantu babande pa tubalu ne matempu
Kuambilaye bena Izrayele malu onsu awu
Abrahame kuinama panshi kumpala kua bonsu bavua muaba awu, wambila Efrone, bua bonsu bumvue, ne: Ndi nkusengelela ne: unteleje
Mose wakatshunguluka, wakahueka mu tshibanda ne mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu mu bianza biandi, mabue akadi mafu nda nseke yau ibidi, ha luseke lumue ne ha luseke lukuabo
Nudi mua kudisumbila bia kudia kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kudia; nenudisumbile mai a kunua kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kunua
Nuende bienu mu nshila wakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, ne bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu mu buloba bunudi nuhiana

Mukaji mukamba Pikala bana ba balume babidi ba muntu umue basombe muaba umue, umue mufue kayi mushiye muana wa balume, mukaji wa mufue awu, kabena mua kumupiana kudi muntu mukuabu to, amu kudi bayende tshina
Wateleji dilomba dianyi, wampeshi muana wa balume
Bobo nebayishe bana ba Yakoba mei ebe, ne Bena Isalele mikenji yebe; nebateke musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kuebe, ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ha tshioshelu tshiebe
Lubena wakahingana ku mukela, ne Yosefe kakadimu, yeye wakahanda tshivualu tshiandi
Bantu bonso bakasabuka Yadene, ne mukelenge wakasabuka; mukelenge wakatua ne Bâzilai mishiku, wakamuvudishila disanka; yeye wakahingana kuandi
Adame ne Eva kulela muana we balume mukuabu
Kadi Davidi ne bantu bandi nkama mai bakabalonda; kadi bantu bandi nkama ibidi bakashala ku nyima; bakatamba kuhanga, kabakamanya mua kusabuka kasulu ka Besô
Yehoyakina wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne muanda mukulu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema ngondo isatu ne matuku dikumi; Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Butuku abu mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende ne bena Ejipitu bakuabu babike ku tulu, kudilabu miadi bikole
Wangate Alona ne Eleaza, muan andi mulume, ulue n abo ku mukuna wa Hô, uvule Alona bilulu biandi, ubiluatshishe Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, Alona neasangakene ne bankambua bandi, neafue biandi
Bantu balume ba tshisamba etshi, bituadije ku bana batekete ba ngondu umue too ne ku bantu bakulumpe, bavua
Mvidi Mukulu udi uteka Arone tshindonda tshia Moshe Moshe kubenga, wambila Maweja Nangila ne: Maweja Nangila, tshiena mua kuya to
Buloba bua Argobe, ne bua Bashane, badi babubikila kabidi ne: ditunga dia Refayime
Bualu bua nenusabuke Yadene bua kubuelamu ne bua kuhiana buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha; nenubuhiane, nenushikamemu
Bantu badibu babadike bua benze mudimu mu bisumbu bia tshiluilu, nebabalombole kudi mfumu wa tshisamba tshiabu: Mfumu wa bena Dane: ke Akiyezere, muana wa Amishadayi, ne bantu bende
Bantu bonso bakamuangalaka muntu ne muntu ku nsubu wandi; Davidi wakahingana bua kuvudishileye ba mu nsubu wandi disanka
Bana ba balume ba Yediele: Bilehana
Bienzedi bia Yoasha bikuabo ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Mulongu muisatu wikale ne mabue a yasinte, agate ne ametiste
Maweja Nangila kakunupa bana ba bungi
Davidi wakamukudimuna ne, Ndi muana wa muntu webe Yishai, Muena Beteleheme
Kadi bena Mowabe badi bababikila anu ne: mbena Emi
Yeye wakamulomba mai, kadi yeye wakamuha mabele; wakalua kudiye ne manteke mu dilonga dia mukelenge
Milambu yonsu eyi, nuyilambule pamue ne mulambu wa kunukobolola nawu wa dituku adi, kabidi ne mulambu wa kuosha wa ku dituku dionsu, kabidi ne mulambu wa bukula ne wa maluvu a mvinyo
Au mmai a Meliba mu Kadesha mu tshihela tshia Sina
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga badi bamusungula kudi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia mêyi
Wewe wakahandulula mai ku mpala kuabo, nunku bakahita munkatshi mua mai manene ha buloba bume; wakela bakadi babalonda mu bunene bua mai bu mudibo bela dibue mu mai manene

Bualu bua meme nengihate bisamba bia bantu ku mesu kuenu, nendeheshe matshika enu: bantu bakuabo kabena bikale ne lukuka lua buloba buenu, hanuamueneka kudi Yehowa Nzambi wenu misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Kadi muakunyetu mukuabu ukadi mumane kufua
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, badi bashintakaja ngenyi pa malomba a kwenzeja dîyi aa
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila

Bualu bua ndi mumanye malu mabi audi muenzele Bena Isalele; wewe newoshe misoko yabo idi ne ngumbu ne kahia, wewe neushihe bansongalume babo ku miele ya nvita, wewe neukosolole bana babo bakese bituha bituha, neuhande bakashi babo badi ne mafu
Wakalongolola nkunyi, wakasaya ngombe, wakamuteka ha mutu ha nkunyi
Mulambu awu mbua kukobolola mfumu wa bena Izrayele bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Nakambila Yoshua ku tshikondo atshi ne, Mesu ebe akatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bakelenge aba babidi: Yehowa nênzele makelenge onso nunku a kunudi nuya

Biatangila muakuidi ne disama kadiena ditampakane mu tshilulu, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama nansha mu tshintu tshia tshiseba, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Nuvuwe tshintu tshidi ne disama, ne yeye neatshiteke ha buatshi matuku muanda mutekete makuabo
Kadi yeye wakahidia, wakamba ne, Tshiena ndia nansha
Mukanda eu wa mikenji yanyi kaumuki mukana muebe; kadi welangane meji a mukanda eu munya ne butuku, udimuke mua kuenza malu onso adi mafundamu; hashishe neutute dikasa dimpe, newikale ne diakalengele
Hakahita matuku asatu bakambila Labana ne, Yakoba wakunyema
Bana bakuabu ba Yakobe, kupawulabu bintu bionsu bivua pa bitalu nansha mu tshimenga

Nehemiya Badi Batuma Nehemiya mu Yelushalema Mu ngondo wa Nisana mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi tshia bukokeshi bua mukelenge Atashasete hakadibo balua ne nyinyo ku mesu kuandi, meme nakangata nvinyo, nakamuha mukelenge

Pashishe padi mamuende wa muana awu kayi muanji kudilongolola ku buvyele budiye nabu, kena mua kulenga tshintu tshia tshijila, kena mua kubuela muaba wa tshijila, too ne padi matuku makumi asatu ne asatu akumbana

Bualu bua bobo bakundekela, bakuoshila nzambi mikuabo musenga wa manananshi bua kunfuishabo tshiji ku bienzedi bia bianza biabo; nunku tshiji tshianyi netshikale, katshiena tshijima ku muaba eu nansha

YAKOBE Diledibua dia Esawu ne Yakobe Malu a Izake, muana wa Abrahame, adi nunku: Izake mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi anayi, kuselaye Rebeka, muana wa Betuyele, muena Arame, mufumine ku tshitupa tshia Mezopotamiya tshia ku mutu kua misulu
Lekelayi kupampakana, bualu Maweja Nangila nealuangane mvita eyi pa mutu penu

Padibio amu bikole,badi mwa kuleepesha tshipungu too ne ku matuku kaayi mapita pa lukama ne makumi abidi kudi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu padibo bakamanyisha kudi Kasumbu ka ditunga Kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana
Muaba awu kutuadijabu kuenda buendenda ne bakaji ba bena Mowabe
Uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, udijidile, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Bwa kumona mwa kukumbaja dijinga edi divwa batumibwa ba ku Muyuki wa beena Kongu balêja,tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulu mpe ba mabala tshivwa tshiledibwa mu diumvwangana dia mu kabujima ne dia Tshikongu tshitwateedi atshi, tshiaafidi mu Tshimamwende wa bukalenga anyi MPANGU tshia Ditunga, bilondeshile kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu dia tshisabu, tshingenyingenyi any MPANGU tshia kumpala tshia Dîyi dikulu dipiadipia; Tshimamwende wa Bukalenga tshia Ditunga tshiaatshitabiji bu tshingenyingenyi tshia Dîyi dikulu tshidi beena mwaabo ne tshia kwamba nembatshianyisha

Yolama ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi halama Lamota gilada bualu bua Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia; kadi mukelenge Yolama wakahingana ku Yizelele bua kumuondahabo mputa wakamutahabo kudi Bena Sulia, hakuluanganeye ne Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia
Kanumiaminyi mu madimi enu maminu a mishindu ibidi mishilangane
Mu nzubu emu katshiena utangila tshintu nansha tshimue
Bana ba Bebai, nkama isambombo ne makumi abidi ne basatu
Bualu Meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Nanku ileje bukole buayi, inupandishe, inulame ne muoyi
Kadi kanudi muoyo wa munyinyi wonso, mmashi mene mene
Mbadienzele lupingu lua tshiamu tshiengulula
Bena Izrayele kumona bitalu bia bena Ejipitu ku muelelu wa mayi
Nenusangishe bintu bionso bia musoko mu musesu, nenuoshile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musoko ne bintu ebi bionso; musoko eu newikale musasula tshiendelele, kabena bawasaku kabidi
Kadi Davidi wakashikama mu tshihela; yeye wakatangila Shaula ulua, umulonda mu tshihela
Pavuabu benda pamue, Izake kukonka Abrahame ne: Tatu
Bobo bakakeba mena abo mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua bankambua, kadi kabakâsangana; nunku bakadi bu bantu banyanguke, bakabumusha mu buakuidi
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neadie tumuma tuandi
Badi Basangula Balumbuluishi Ek
Mbua mene neyidie mubidi wa Izebele mu Yizelele, kabena bamujika nansha
Kusombabu mu tshimenga tshia Arane
Katuena bapiane madimi a mvinyo, nansha madimi makuabu to
Bakamukudimuna di ne, Mu buloba bua Kanana, tuakuluila bua kusumba bia kudia

Mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakambila baleleshi ba bakashi ba Bena Ebelu, dina dia umue wabo ne, Shifela, ne dina dia mukuabo ne, Pua ne, Hanuaya kuenzela bakashi ba Bena Ebelu mudimu wa baleleshi, ne hanuabatangila mu buledi, bialelabo muana wa balume, nuenu nenumushihe, kadi bialelabo muana wa bakashi, numushiye ne muoyo
Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kukuba bintu, biûma ne makasa a bantu bônso ne kuneemeka bintu bia bende
Meme Yehowa, tshiena ngenza malu â, anyi
Nunku nsubu wa Yehowa wakashikishibua
Wewe neusumbe bahika balume ne bahika bakashi kudi bisamba bia bantu badi hehi n ebe
Dilekedibwa anyi dipeepeja dia bitadi didi mwa kwenzeka anu mu diswa dia mêyi a ditunga
Shaula wakabika, wakumuka mu lubuebue, wakaya mu nshila wandi
Nanku, bu muudi mungendeshe diakalenga, ungambile bionsu biudi wela meji, bua meme nkumanye nkujadike, ngikale muena diakalenga kashidi
Kanungu ka Dineemeka dia mapa a muntu yônso ne dia budikadidi bwa shindameenu budi bushindikibwa mu Dîyi dikulu badi badikanyika bamfumu ba Mbulamatadi ne kabidi muntu yônso
Muanebe awu neikale bu nyama wa mpunde wa muitu
Yoshua wakatuma ba messager, ne bobo bakaya lubilu ku ntenta; monai, biakadi bisokoka mu ntenta wandi, ne tshiamu tshia argent muinshi muabi
Kuvuadikaye Arone muntumpu, kumusuika mukaba, kumuvuadika muntumpu mulamika tshilamba tshia efode kutshisuikila panyima ne tukaba tuatshi
Ku ndekeelu wa tshipungu tshidibu baleeja ku tulongo twa kumpala twa kanungu aka, padi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga katshiyi tshianyisha mapangadika dîyi aa wôwo adi ajika bukookeshi bwa kwenzeja
Hezikiya eu wakakanga mushimi wa mai a ku mutu kua Gihona, wakâlombola ku luseke lua ku wesete kua musoko wa Davidi
Uvua munuambile bua nunemeke ndondu, nukumbaje mikenji dikumi ivuaye mufunde pa mabue abidi
Bakumukaku, bakaya ku Gudugoda; ku Gudugoda bakaya ku Yotebata, muakadi buloba bua tusulu tua mai
Kuena ne bua kubuelela tatuebe mukaji mu nzubu to, bualu mmuanabu ne tatuebe
Elisafana muana wa balume wa Uziele neikale mukelenge wa nsubu wa batatu ba Bena Kohata
Tshimuangi Muaba wa tshijila Ungenzele muaba wa tshijila, mulongolola ne bilamba dikumi bia ndanda
Kadi nuenu, nunyunguluke, yai bienu mu tshihela mu nshila wa ku Dishiba Dikunze
Kadi mesu enu akatangila malu manene onso akenza Yehowa

Wewe udi Yehowa, wewe nkayebe mene; wewe wakafuka diulu ne diulu dia mu diulu ne misumba yau yonso ne buloba ne bintu bionso bidimu ne mai manene ne bionso bidimu, wewe utu wabilama buonso buabi; misumba ya mu diulu idi ikutendelela

Hashishe nenulue ne bintu binakanuambila ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi; milambu yenu ya kuosha ne nyama yenu mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu kunudi nuditshiha n aku kudi Yehowa
Wewe neumuvuishe butumbi buebe, bua Bena Isalele bonso batumikile dî diandi

Moshe kupesha bena Ngade, bena Rubene, ne tshitupa tshia tshisamba tshia bena Menashe, muana wa Yozefe, ditunga dia Sihone, mukalenga wa bena Amore, kabidi ne ditunga dia Oge, mukalenga wa bena Bashane
Bena Izrayele badi balomba munyinyi Dituku dikuabu bantu benyi ba mishindu yonsu bavua basombe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele kukuatshika lukuka lua munyinyi
Ahiya wakangata tshilulu tshihia tshihia tshiakadiye n atshi, wakatshihandulula bihese dikumi ne tubidi
Umanye ne: bayende mmuambi
Mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete ne dituku dia dikumi ne muanda mutekete dia ngondo buatu buakatua ha mikuna ya Alalata
Bantu ba kafiondu aba bavua bilobu bia kalanda musenga ku kale
Mu matuku au Yehowa wakambila Yoshua ne, Enza tuele tua mabue, utengule Bena Isalele tshiakabidi
Kadi bena ditunga kukanyina Lote, bamba ne: Umuke apa
Mose wakaluhuka mu tshitudilu ne bantu bua kusangakena ne Nzambi, bobo bakimana kuinshi kua mukuna

Bualu bukuabo kabidi, ndi mulelela mukenji unudi ne bua kuenzela bakulu aba ba Bena Yuda badi basa nsubu eu wa Nzambi ne, Nuangate biuma bia mukelenge bia mu milambu ya mu buloba bua dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, nubifile kudi bantu aba lubilu bua kubakuatshisha; kabahumbishibu kabidi
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Vulukai dituku edi dinuakuhatuka mu Ejipitu, mu nsubu wa lukanu, bualu bua Yehowa wakanuhatula mu muaba eu ne bukole bua tshianza tshiandi, kanudi bidia bidi ne luevene
Diku dianyi kadiena dihita meku onso a tshisamba tshia Benyamina bubale, anyi
Bena ngombe nebabanyangane makuta ne munyinyi wa ngombe uvua mufue

Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi uya ku mpala kuenu, yeye neanuluile nvita yenu, bu muakenzeye ku mesu kuenu mu Ejipitu, ne mu tshihela, nuakatangila ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanutuala mu maboko, bu mudi tatu utuala muan andi mulume, mu nshila yonso inuakaya tô ne hanuakalua ku muaba eu
Hakaluhuka Yoaba ku mesu kua Davidi, yeye wakatuma bantu ku nyima kua Abinê, banahingana n andi ku dina dia mai dia mu Sila; kadi Davidi kakadi mumanye bualu ebu

Kadi yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila tubalu tua bungi, anyi bua kuhingisha bantu mu Ejipitu bua kuheteye tubalu tua bungi; bualu bua Yehowa wakamana kunuambila ne, Kanuhinganyi mu nshila au kabidi
Samuele wakatuma bantu bonso muntu ku nsubu wandi muntu ku nsubu wandi
Udi umushiminyina, ungambila ne: mmumane kumanyangana ne balume
Moshe kuebeja Maweja Nangila ne: Udi unkengesha nenku, kuyi umfuila luse bua tshinyi
Nanku bantu kulekela kufila, bualu bintu bivuabu bafile bivua bikumbane bua kujikija mudimu, bipite ne kupita kuine
Nunku umue wa bakuidi wakumushabo wakahingana, wakashikama mu Betele, wakabayisha mua kutshinabo Yehowa
Kadi tumusumbishe kudi bena Ismayele aba

Muena Amona anyi Muena Moaba kababuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa; ne tunkanunuma tuabo kaubuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Yehowa tô ne hahita bikondo dikumi tshiendelele; bualu bua bobo kabakanuha bia kudia ne mai a kunua mu nshila hanuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu; ne bualu bua bobo bakahita Belâma, muana mulume wa Beô ku Petô wa mu Mesopotamia, bua kunueleye mulau
Amu mu tshipela amu, Maweja Nangila kunupa mana, biakudia bivua bankambua benu kabayi banji kumanya

Kanukengeshi muntu wakabuela mu mudimu wa difutu, udi muhele ne udi kayi ne bintu, nansha umue wa bana benu nansha muenyi udi ushikama mu buloba buenu ne mu misoko yenu; nubafute difutu diabo buatshia buatshia diambedi diba kadiyi dianze kubuela; bualu bua bobo badi bahele ne badi bakuma mitshima yabo ku difutu; bobo kabadidi kudi Yehowa bualu buenu, ne bualu ebu kabuikadi bubi kunudi
Kadi nenubenzele nunku: nushihe bishihelu biabo, nuele mabue abo hanshi adibo batendelela, nutahe Bashela babo, nuoshe mpingu yabo ne kahia
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuambila mukaji ne: Pawimita difu nenkuvudijile makenga
Mpeshayi mukaji, mpingane kua mfumuanyi
Yehowa atulumbuluishe hankatshi hetu n ebe, Yehowa ansombuele bualu buebe, kadi tshianza tshianyi katshiena tshikala kudi
Dane udi bu nyoka udi mu njila, bu nyoka wa ntoke ku mpenga kua njila: nyoka udi usuma kabalu mu lutambiku lua tshibelu
Ngulube kena muakane kunudi bualu bua yeye udi ne mikono mihanduluke kadi kena uhingishilula bintu mukana; kanudi munyinyi wa nyama ei, kanulengi tshianza ham bidi ha bitalu biai
Hashishe yeye wakamba ne, Ya, usombe biasu kudi bakuenu bia munda mutuhu: usombe bikumbane bia bungi

Bena Ashe kabakihata bantu ba mu Ako, anyi bantu ba mu Sidona, anyi ba mu Alabâ, anyi ba mu Akiziba, anyi ba mu Heleba, anyi ba mu Lehoba; kadi Bena Ashê bakashikama munkatshi mua Bena Kanâna, bena buloba; bualu bua kabakabihata nansha
dienza dia ndongamu ya majimba, ya bia mwinshi mwa buloba, ya matanda, ya mudilu udi wambulwisha polovensa ne diilonda bu mudibio mu mikenji ya kabujima ya ndongamu wa ditunga ;
Bintu ebi mbia Alona ne bana bandi balume, ne nebabidie mu muaba udi wa tshijila bualu bua bidi bitambe tshijila ku mesu kua Yehowa munkatshi mua mulambu yonso idibo bosha ha kahia
Meku onsu a bena Naftali aa avua ne bantu balume
Hakafikeye, Eli wakadi mushikame mu nkuasa kukala kua nshila, mutentekele; mutshima wandi wakadi ukanka bua mushete wa Nzambi
Kuendi masandi
Yehowa wakasengeledibua nunku bua buloba, ne disama diakashika munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Tshisamba tshionsu tshia bena Izrayele tshivua ne dikunji diatshi
Kuambilaye Kora ne bonsu bavuaye nabu ne: Malaba dinda, Maweja Nangila nkayende neatumanyishe muntu udi wa tshijila, udi mua kusemena pabuipi nende
Abimeleke wakabika ne dinda dionso, Wakabikila bantu bandi bonso, wakabambila malu au onso ku matshu abo; ne bantu bandi bakatamba kutshina
Kusongaye mabaya abidi a mitshi ya ndunga, kualamikaye tshiamu tshia mpawungi ku nseke yonsu
Muntu yonso udi ubuelakana ne bena muhongo ne batempi ba mbuku bua kulonda malu abo a masandi, nengumushe mesu anyi kudi muntu au, nemmumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Butshia dinda, kuditshipabu ku muntu ku muntu
Yehoyada muakuidi wakafila mafuma ne ngabu ne bintu bia nvita biakadi bia mukelenge Davidi, biakadi mu nsubu wa Nzambi, kudi tupitene tua lukama lua bantu
