Abrahame mumane kukumbaja bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema, kumutekabu pende panshi
Kabakalua ne argent yakangatabo ku milambu ya bisambukidi ne ku milambu ya kubuikila n ai mibi mu nsubu wa Yehowa; ei yakadi ya bakuidi
Bantu bakuabo ne bunvue, nebatshine, kabena benza malu au mabi munkatshi muenu kabidi
Meme tshiena Muena Peleshete, anyi
Bansongalume dikumi bakadi batuala bintu bia nvita bia Yoaba, bakela Abashaloma munkatshi, bakamuasa, bakamushiha

Pikala muntu osha budimi buende, kapia aku kalambuke, kosha bikunyibua bia mu madimi a bende bitshidi ku miepu, nansha bidibu bamane kunowa babiteka mu bisumbu mu madimi, muntu uvua mutemeshe kapia neafute muena budimi
Bualu bua Nzambi webe wakananga Bena Isalele bua kubajadika tshiendelele, nunku yeye wakakuhingisha mukelenge ku mutu kuabo bua wewe kuenza malu mimpe ne makane
Amu Yakobe mumane kulayangana ne bana bende, kudiololaye pa bulalu, kufuaye, kulonda bankambua bende
Dîyi dilongolodi didi dileeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kasumbu kakese kadikadile komekela mianda ya masungulangana mu ditunga
Kuyabu kuenza bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe ne Arone
Uvua kabidi ne bena mudimu ba bungi
Nuvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, didi dituku dia tshijila kunudi, mundi yonso udi wona dituku adi nebamushihe, mundi yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Kuenzabu mitanda mu tshipela amu, pabuipi ne mukuna awu
Muele wa nvita neubashihe ha bula, ne buowa nebubuele mu nsubu yabo; nebashihe bansongalume ne bansongakashi batshidi tumama, ne bana batshidi bamua mabele ne bakulumpe badi ne nvi ku mitu kuabo
Nuenu bena Izrayele, numanye ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu nkayende ke Mvidi Mukulu wa bushiwa
Kadi bayifile ne muoyi kudi mutuangaji mu mushiku wa ntenta, bua ayilambule Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa bobumue

Bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakasungulabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumuenzelabo mudimu ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina dia Yehowa, nebalue ha buihi: bua mei abo malu onso ne bilumbu bionso bia kukumangana nebijalame
Wakamba ne, Yehowa kena musungule eu
Nanku, ndi nkusengelela bua utuyishe tshiji tshiebe, kubabutudi to
Mushete wa Yehowa wakashala mu Kîyata yalima tô musangu mule bu bidimu makumi abidi; Bena Isalele bonso bakadila muadi kudi Yehowa
Pikala bantu bakuabu bumvue mudibu bamunyoke nanku, nebatshine

Bikala muntu muenze bualu bubi bua lufu, ne badi bamushiha, nebamuowe ku mutshi; kabashiyi tshitalu tshiandi ku mutshi butuku bujima, bamujike anu dituku adi mene; muntu yonso muowa ku mutshi udi muedibue mulau kudi Nzambi; kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana

Samuele Mei a Kunshikidilu a Davidi Â adi mei a kunshikidilu a Davidi: Davidi, muana wa Yishai, nyeye muntu wakabandishibua, wakedibua manyi ha mutu kudi Nzambi wa Yakoba, muimbi wa misambu mimpe wa mu Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nyuma wa Yehowa wakungakuila, dî diandi diakadi ha ludimi luanyi
Nebavungulule tshilulu ku mesu kua bakulu ba mu musoko
Nunku Solomo ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi n andi bakaya ku mutu kua mukuna wa mu Gibeona; bualu bua ntenta wa kusambakena wa Nzambi wakasabo kudi Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, mu tshihela wakadiku
Pashishe aye ne mukoku wa tshimpanga kudi mutuangaji
Kadi hakahita bidimu makumi abidi ne bisatu bia bukelenge bua Yoasha, bakuidi kabakanza kulongolola miaba ei
Yeye wakambila mukelenge wa Isalele ne, Teka tshianza tshiebe ha buta; yeye wakatshiteka
Bumuka muaba awu, kufikabu mu tshibandabanda tshia Zerede
Mushindu wa kukumbaja mapangadika adi mu tuloongu tudi ku mutu etu pamwe ne makookeshi makwabo a batshipwita badi bawuleeja kudi mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu
Bena Isalele bonso bakadi binunu tshinunu ne binunu lukama bakadi bena nvita; Bena Yuda bakadi binunu nkama inai ne binunu makumi muanda mutekete bakadi bena nvita
Bena Izrayele ne benyi badi munkatshi muabu, bakumbaje mikenji eyi kashidi
Kanuena mua kunyanga ditunga didiye munupe, ne buenzayi bua mushindu ewu
Kadi muntu mukuabu mufike pabuipi ne nzubu wa tshijila awu, nebamushipe
Dikopu dimue dia tshiamu tshia mpawungi divua dia bujitu bua grame
Wakamona miehu mikuabo muanda mutekete yakadi mikese, yakafubidila ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, yakadiunda kuinshi kua mikuabo

Bualu bua nuenu kanuakakuatshila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne disanka mu mitshima yenu bua bintu bionso biakanuheye, nunku nenukuatshile badi n enu lukuna mudimu badi Yehowa unutumina, ne nzala ne nyota ne butaka ne kuhanga kua bintu bionso
Muntu mukuabo wakamba ne, Yeye udi Beta sheba, muana wa Eliyama, mukashi wa Uliya, Muena Hiti
Bakumuka mu Alusha bakashikama mu Lefidima, ne bantu kabakadi ne mai a kunua
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga ke udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufwilangana luse

Bikala bakuabo bamuangalake tô ne ku ditengu dia diulu, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neabasangisheku, neabahingisheku kabidi; ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nealue n enu mu buloba bua batatu benu, ne nuenu nenubuhiane; yeye neanuenzele bimpe, neanuvudishe ha mutu ha hatatu benu
Biabueleye mu musoko mukuabo
Nunku bakahungakasha tshihungidi ku Bê sheba, ne Abimeleke ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakabika, bakahingana ku buloba bua Bena Peleshete

Bualu bukuabo, Shimei, muana wa Gela, udi n ebe kabidi, Muena Benyamina wa mu Bahulima, wakampenda ne bihendu bibi mu dituku dinakafuma ku Mahanayima, udi n ebe; yeye wakalua kusangakena n anyi ku Yadene; nakaditshiha kudiye ku mesu kua Yehowa ne, Tshiena nkushiha ne muele wa nvita

Bikaleye kayi ne bintu bia kubuhikula n abi, nunku buloba buakahaneye nebuikale mu bianza bia muntu wakabusumba tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene buloba nebuhikudibue ne yeye neahingane mu buloba buandi
Mose wakenza muakamba Yehowa, bakaya ku mutu kua mukuna wa Hô ku mesu kua bantu bonso
Miselayima wakalela Ludima ne Anamima ne Lehabima ne Nafetuhima ne Patalusima ne Bena Kasaluha nkambua wa Bena Peleshete ne Bena Kafetô
Bua Benyamina yeye wakamba ne, Munangi wa Yehowa neashikame n andi talalâ, utu wamubuikila matuku onso, udi ushikama hankatshi ha makaya andi
Tuakabika ku Holeba, tuakenda tô mu tshihela atshi tshinene tshibi tshinuakatangila, ku nshila wa ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakalua ku Kadeshe bânea
Numushe mikiya yenu dituku disatu ne dia muanda mutekete
Hashishe Davidi wakebesha Yehowa tshiakabidi
Mu musulu wa Nile nemuikale ndimba mipite bungi
Nanku mpindiewu kanuena kabidi ne bubi kumpala kua Maweja Nangila to

Bulongolodi bwa tshibidilu badi ne tshia kubulonda bwa bingenyingenyi anyi bwa bialwa kwikala mêyi bidi bitangila dikumbajangana dia Dîyi dikulu anyi dishintulula dia mêyi malongolodi pamwe ne bwa bingenyingenyi bia dîyi didi difila bukookeshi didibo baleeja kudi kanungu ka
Mvidi Mukulu, wewe ke udi mufuke bintu bionsu, mubipeshe muoyi
Bavua bamba ne: Mulombodi wa ditunga dia Ejipitu uvua ututandisha bikole, utuamba ne: nudi batentekedi
Mukuabo wakamba dî dikuabo ne mukuabo dî dikuabo
Yosefe wakidika muan a bute dina ne, Manashe; bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpuisha muoyo bua mudimu wanyi mukole ne bua bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu anyi
Nanku muntu yonsu udibu basuma kudi nyoka wa lulengu, padiye utangila nyoka wa tshiamu tshikunze, kena ufua to
Tshimuangi Mayi a Massa ne a Meriba Dib
Mutuangaji neangate nkunyi ya mutshi wa sedre, ditamba dia mutshi wa isope, ne buanda bua boya bukunze, abiele muiku, muaba udibu boshile ngombe awu
Leya kuimita difu dikuabu, kulela muana wa balume, kuinyika muana awu dina ne: Levi
Uye kuimana kumpala kuende
Bidimu bia Lemeke bidi nkama muanda mutekete makumi muanda mutekete ne muanda mutekete
Nanku muntu yonsu udi ushipa muntu mukuabu mu mpukapuka, kayi nende ne muoyi mubi, neanyemene mu tshimenga tshimue tshia ku bimenga ebi bua kudipandisha
Bintu abi nebishale biebe ne bia ndelanganyi yebe kashidi
Wenze kabidi makunji atanu a mutshi wa ndunga, malamike tshiamu tshia mapwungi
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Muntu webe mukashi kena ne tshintu mu nsubu anu kasu ka manyi

Kadi kanudi nyama mikuabo idi mihingishilula bintu mukana anyi idi ne mikono mihanduluke: kamelo, ne nsenji, ne kabundi ka ku mputu; bualu bua nyama ei idi mihingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kayena ne mikono mihanduluke, kayena miakane kunudi
Bualu mudimu ewu udi mupite bukole

Benyi badi basombe munkatshi muenu matuku makese, nansha benyi bamane kusombamu bidimu bia bungi, balelangane, bapete bikulu mu ditunga dienu, padibu basue kundambula milambu ya mupuya muimpe, balonde bonsu anu mikenji eyi
Bu muvua maboku a Moshe ashikila, Arone ne Ure kuteka dibue bua Moshe kusomba
Nudi nutupa ku diyi dia Maweja Nangila

Hashishe, bialua batatu abo anyi bana babo kutudi bua kutandangana n etu, netubambile ne, Nubafile kutudi bu matabisha bualu bua tuetu katuakubangatshila, muntu ne muntu, mukashi mu nvita, ne nuenu kanuakabahabo; bu nuenu babahebo, nuenu nuakadi kuhila
Butu abu nebuandamuke lupuishi mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Biamulonda musombuedi, kabafidi mushihi mu tshianza tshiandi, bualu bua yeye wakashiha mukuandi ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi lukuna diambedi
Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, bu nuenu babashiye ne muoyo, meme tshiakadi kunushiha
Pashishe avule bilamba abi, avuale bikuabu
Tshiena ngambila bana benu to
Kumuelaye lupemba, wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu muena kulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba atumbe
Bua Arone ne bana bende kutuadija mudimu wa butuangaji, wenze nenku: Uye ne ngombe mulume, kumpala kua mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena

Ku dituku adi kakuena muprofete mukuabo mubike munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bu Mose, wakadi mumanyangane ne Yehowa ku mesu, mu bimanyinu bionso ne mu malu a kukema akamutumina Yehowa bua kuenzeye mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne bua kuenzela Palo ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buandi buonso, ne mu tshianza tshikole, ne mu buowa bunene biakenza Mose ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso
Umpe meji ne lungenyi bua meme kumanya mua kuluhuka ne kulua ku mpala kua bantu aba; bualu bua udi mumanye mua kukokesha bantu aba banene nganyi
Ujikija kufunda, kuambilaye bena Levi bavua ne mudimu wa kuambula mushete wa Maweja Nangila ne: Angatayi mukanda ewu wa mikenji ya Maweja Nangila, nuuteke pabuipi ne mushete wa ndondu
Bena Beriya bavua basangisha kabidi meku aa: diku dia bena Ebere, ndelanganyi ya Ebere; ne dia bena Malkiyele, ndelanganyi ya Malkiyele
Bakamulesha mulambu wa kuosha, tshituha ne tshituha ne mutu, yeye wakabisha ha tshioshelu
Bantu ba kumpala ba mu ditunga dia Edome bavua ndelanganyi ya Seyire, muena Ori
Balaka wakamushihela ngombe ne mikoko, wakantumina Belâma ne miloho yakadi n andi
Nebakubikile ne: Izrayele
Kuenzabu nkanu inayi ya bijengu ya kuteka mu matumba anayi a munyingu wa tshiamu tshikunze awu, bua kuelamu mabaya
Isaka wakambila Esau ne, Mona, nakumana kumuvuisha mukelenge, webe nakufila bana benu bonso kudiye bu bahika bandi nakumujadika ne manvua ne nvinyo muhiamuhia nenkuenzele wewe tshinyi, muan anyi
Kuinyikaye muana awu ne: Rubene
Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Nowa ne bana bende ne: Ndi ntua nenu ndondu, kabidi ne ndelanganyi yenu
Yakoba wakasemena ha buihi ne Isaka tatu andi, yeye wakamulengela tshianza tshiandi, wakamba ne, Dî ndia Yakoba kadi bianza mbia Esau
Badi banowa bipiabipia ku ngondu ku ngondu
Mikaya wakamba ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, nengambe anu mei adi Nzambi wanyi wamba
Tshintu tshionso tshidibo bajila mu Isalele netshikale tshiebe
Samuele wakambila bantu ne, Luai, tuye ku Gilegala, netujadikileku bukelenge
Kubambilaye ne: Kanuvua bashipe bantu bakaji to
Bena Isalele bakaha Bena Lewi misoko ei ne miaba ei munkatshi mua buhianyi buabo bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa

Nunku kanufidi bana benu bakashi kudi bana babo balume; kanuangatshidi bana benu balume bana babo bakashi; kanukebi ditalala diabo anyi diakalengele diabo tô ne tshiendelele; bua nuenu nuikale ne bukole, bua nuenu nudie bintu bimpe bia mu buloba abu, ne bua nuenu nubushile bana benu bu buhianyi buabo bua tshiendelele
Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Mona, wewe udi ungambila ne, Uye ne bantu aba, ne wewe kuena muanze kummanyisha muntu udi musue kutuma n anyi
Bana balume ba Sheme: Elama ne Ashû ne Apakashada ne Luda ne Alama ne Uza ne Hula ne Getê ne Mesheke
Bakamujika mu musoko wa Davidi diatshimue ne bakelenge, bualu bua yeye wakenza bimpe mu Isalele, ne kudi Nzambi ne ku nsubu wandi
Mueyelu wa Mvidi Mukulu ke uvua unyunguluka pa mayi

Dutelonone Mose Udi Udimusha Bena Isalele bua Kutumikilabo Yehowa Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, unvuai mei ne mikenji bindi musue kunuyisha, bua nuenu kubienza bua nuikale ne muoyo, nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, unuha
Nenubahe kabidi bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi, ne tshia nvinyo muhia muhia, ne tshia manyi enu, ne miosa ya mikoko
Nanku, Arone neajidile bena Levi, abandambule meme Maweja Nangila pa muaba wa bena Izrayele bonsu, bua bangenzele mudimu
Neubangile mukashi kadi munga muntu nealale n andi; newase nsubu kadi kuena ushikamamu; neukune budimi bua nvinyo, ne kuena udia mamuma abu
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nenjimishe bantu banakafuka ha buloba, ne bantu ne nyama ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu ya mulu, bualu bua mutshima wanyi udi munyingalale bua nakabifuka
Wakaya biandi, wakayikila ne mukashi, ne yeye wakasankisha Shimishona bimpe

Wakazola bilongo bia amande ne tuhanza tusatu tuakadi ku mutu kua mahu a tshitekelu, ne tshihunga tshia or ne tshilongo, wakazola bilongo bia amande ha tuhanza tuakadi ku luseke lukuabo, ne tshihunga ne tshilongo, wakenza matu asambombo nunku
Newanyishe kabidi bua bana benu bena Levi, bena tshisamba tshia tatuebe, basemene nebe ku nzubu wa tshijila
Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu badi bakenzulula mu tshimwe tshia bisatu tshiaku panyima pa bidimu biônso bisatu
Nengashileku Mvidi Mukulu tshilambuilu, bualu uvua mungambuluishe pamvua mu dikenga dikole
Yehowa wakatuela mikenji ei, bua tuetu tutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, bua yeye atuenzele bimpe matuku onso, bua tuetu tuikale ne muoyo utudi n au lelu eu
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upatukila mu masungulangana menza kudi bônso musangu umwe bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itanu idibu mwa kwambulula musangu umwe
Yakobe utabuluka ku tulu, kukemaye wamba ne: Bulelela, tshiena mumanye to
Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Naho ne Nzambi wa tatu wabo ikale mulumbuluishi hankatshi hetu Yakoba wakaditshiha ku ditshina dia tatu wandi Isaka
Bionsu ebi nebinuenzekele panudi nuitaba Maweja Nangila, nukumbaja mikenji yende, idi mu mukanda ewu, nupingana kudiye muenu muonsu, kabidi ne muoyi mujima
Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba wa tshisamba tshia Yuda, wakafua bintu biandi dituku dia kumudilu
Kadi mmupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu

Dutelonone Mose Udi Udimusha Bena Isalele bua Kutumikilabo Yehowa Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, unvuai mei ne mikenji bindi musue kunuyisha, bua nuenu kubienza bua nuikale ne muoyo, nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, unuha
Nunyange mpingu yonsu, idi ileja mvidie yabu, nansha bayisonge mu mabue, nansha bayifule ne tshiamu
Numuambuluishe bua asombe nenu bimpe
Bana ba balume ba Yefete badi: Ngomere, Magoge, Madayi, Yavane, Tubale, Mesheke ne Tirase
Hakabandisha Mose tshianza tshiandi Bena Isalele bakatamba bukole, ne hakahuekesheye tshianza tshiandi, Bena Amaleka bakatamba

Nanku bena meji bavua benza midimu mishilangane muaba wa tshijila, kuanjibu kulekela midimu, kuyabu kuambila Moshe ne: Bantu mbafile bintu bipitshidile bungi butudi nabu dijinga bua kujikija midimu yonsu ivua Maweja Nangila mutufundile bua kuenza
Muntu yonso utu wenza malu au, malu au mabi, udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Mukelenge wakabitula mu mpata wa Yadene, mu muaba muakadi dima, hankatshi ha Sukota ne Zeleda
Hakahita tshikondo, Bena Amona bakaluisha Bena Isalele nvita
Kumonaye ne: bionsu bidi bimpe
Nutshijike amu dituku adi
Badi babasungula mu tshipungu tshibîdi ku Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Yeye wakamba ne, Anji kuhuwa

Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bualu buenu, wakamba ne, Wewe kuena ubuelamu: Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, utu wimana ku mpala kuebe, yeye neabuelemu: ukoleshe mutshima wandi, bualu bua yeye neahianyishe Bena Isalele buloba
Yozefe kubueja bantu mu bupika mu ditunga dijima
Muntu yonso udi ukuma mukuabo mu musokoko udi ne mulau
Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kukuha buloba bua Kanâna ne bua kuikala Nzambi webe
Nunku muntu yonso walua kudijidila ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne bimpanga muanda mutekete, yeye mene udi mua kuikala muakuidi kudi nzambi ya hatuhu
Yakoba wakashala ku nyima nkayandi muntu wakaluangana n andi bibula to ne hakatshia butuku

Kanudi mampa adi ne luevene ne mulambu eu; nenudie n au mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mbia kudia bia tshivulukidi tshia dikenga; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu lubilu; nunku numuke dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu matuku onso a muoyo wenu
Hazaele wakamuebesha ne, Mukelenge wanyi, udi udidila tshinyi

Ku nyima kua bualu ebu, bakamana Yoshiya kulongolola ntempelo, Neko, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, wakaya bua kuluangana ne ba mu Kâkemisha ku muelelu wa musulu wa Pelata; Yoshiya wakaya bua kuluangana n andi
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Bisamba ebi bidi bituhita bunene, nembihate munyi
bûngi bwa bantu ne dibabadika bidi bikale ne diambulwisha bwa ditunga dijima;
Nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai bu munakenza diambedi: Yehowa wakangunvuila musangu eu kabidi; Yehowa kakanushiha
Yakobe kuenzela Labane mudimu bidimu muanda mutekete bua kusela Rakele

Bituikala badiashile tshioshelu bua kuhambuka ne bua kuhanga kulonda Yehowa, ne bua kufila milambu ya kuoshilahu, ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, Yehowa nkayandi ashikishe bualu
Aba bonso bakadi ku mutu kua bintu bia Davidi
Bakenza bibi bibidi bia mitshi ya olive, bakabisonga ne bakeluba ne mabue a ngashi ne bilongo, bakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha nyima habi bionso; bakalamika or ha bakeluba ne ha mabue a ngashi kabidi

Padi muena Izrayele mu dikenga, yeye mudieyeka kudi muenyi udi mupetele biuma mu ditunga dienu, nansha kudi muntu mukuabu wa mu diku dia benyi, badi mua kumupikula kudi muena Izrayele umue wa ku bana babu ba tatuende
Mukashi wakamba ne, Wewe udi bayanyi wa mashi bualu bua ku tengula

Aba mbakelenge ba bana ba balume ba Esau bana ba balume ba Elifasa, muan a bute wa Esau, bakadi mukelenge Temana, ne mu kelenge Oma ne mukelenge Sefo ne mukelenge Kanaza ne mukelenge Kola ne mukelenge Gatama ne mukelenge Amaleka, aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Elifasa mu buloba bua Edome, aba mbana ba balume ba Ada
Bantu kabakadi ne mai a kunua, bakadisangisha kudi Mose ne kudi Alona
Bana ba balume ba Heleme, muan abo wa balume: Sofâ ne Yimena ne Sheleshe ne Amala

Bakashiha Pâsha nedata ne Dalafona ne Asepata, Polata ne Adalia ne Alidata, ne Pâmashata ne Alisai ne Alidai ne Wayezata, bana halume dikumi ba Hamana, muana wa Hamedata, muena lukuna wa Bena Yuda; kadi kabakahaula bintu biabo
Tshikondu atshi, bena Kenaane ne bena Perizi batshivua mu ditunga adi
Ndi mufike bua kubasungidila kudi bena Ejipitu, kubumusha mu ditunga edi, kubabueja mu ditunga dialabale didi ne mabela ne buitshi bipite bungi
Kadi ndelanganyi ya muakunyende Efrayime neyipite bungi, yenza bisamba bivule
Mpindiewu bakadi batusombuela, bua lufu luende
Nunku Boaza wakangata Luta bu mukashi wandi, yeye wakaya ku diye ne Yehowa wakamuimitshisha difu, wakamulelela muana wa balume

Ndi nkusengelela ne, Mukelenge wanyi kabadi bualu bua muntu mulembakana, Nabala, mene; bualu bua bienzedi biandi bidi bu kukudimuna kua dina diandi: Nabala ndina diandi ne buhote budi n andi; kadi meme, muhika webe mukashi, tshiakatangila bansongalume ba mukelenge wanyi bakatumeye
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Hezikiya, ne malu mimpe akenzeye, monai, bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa tshikena kumona wa Yeshaya muprofete, muana wa Amoza, ne mu mukanda wa bakelenge ba Yuda ne ba Isalele

Hakatangila Bena Isalele bakadi bashikama mu tshibanda ne, Bakadi ku mukuna bakanyema, ne Shaula ne bana bandi balume bakafua, bakahatuka mu misoko yabo, bakanyema kabidi; Bena Peleshete bakatua, bakashikamamu
Tshibangidilu Ndelanganyi ya bana ba Nowa Kul
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Kenana Enosha wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne dikumi ne bitanu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Kanukunyi ntete ya mishindu ibidi mishilangane mu budimi bua tumuma tukese, anyi nebajidile bintu bionso biakadiundamu ne ntete inuakukuna ne tumuma tukese tudi mitshi ei ikuama
Ke Moshe kulamuna mafuta onsu avua ku bia munda, lutandatanda lua ku mutshima, tuonyi tubidi ne mafuta onsu avua malamateku, kubioshila Maweja Nangila pa tshilambuilu
Yeye neanutumine masama onso a mu Ejipitu anuakatshina; masama au neanulamate nuenu
Biabika muena mashimi bua kutumpila mukuabo bua malu mabi akadiye wenza, nunku bubidi buabo badi batandangana, nebimane ku mesu kua Yehowa ne ku mesu kua bakuidi ne balumbuluishi ba mu matuku au
Bonsu abu, bisumbu bisatu, ke badi ne bua kumuka pashishe, benza tshiluilu tshibidi
Bumuka mu Kehelata, kuyabu ku mukuna wa Shefere
Bantu bonso ba mu Isalele bakadisangisha kudi mukelenge ku dituku diakadiabo bidia bia disanka mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete
Bakamujika ku mukalu wa buhianyi buandi mu Timenata sela wa mu mikuna ya Efelayima, ku nôde kua mukuna wa Gâsha
Bila mukaji mupika wa Rakele uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: ke Dane ne Naftali
Bakumuka ku Hô, bakashikama mu Salemona
Kanâna wakalela Sidona, muan a bute wandi, ne Hete ne Bena Yebuse ne Bena Amole ne Bena Gîgashi, ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Âka ne Bena Sina ne Bena Âwada ne Bena Semâ ne Bena Hamata
Nunku Bena Isalele bonso bakahingana ku nsubu yabo ya ntenta
Butshia dinda, kuyabu ku mukuna, bambilangane ne: Tudi bamane kuenza bibi
Bena tshisamba tshia Ashere kulonda, babalombola kudi Pagiyele, muana wa Okrane

Bantu bakamukudimuna dî ne, Yehowa atukande bua katumulekedi bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu; Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakatuluhula ne batatu betu mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa buluka, wakenza malu a kukema ku mesu kuetu, wakatulama bimpe mu nshila yonso utuakenda ne munkatshi mua bantu bonso butuakahita mu nshila
Yosefe wakadi mukokeshi wa mu buloba, nyeye mene wakadi uhanyisha bantu bonso bintu, bana babo ne Yosefe bakalua, bakamukukuila hanshi
Uvua mukengeshe bena ditunga edi mushindu ewu bualu kaayi
Tshisamba kai tshidi ne mikenji ne mei majalame bu mikenji ei yonso inakateka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Bena Ejipitu nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, hanakuangata butumbi buanyi bualu bua Palô ne makalu andi ne masalayi andi adi enda ha tubalu

Yeye wakambila mulume wandi mei onso ne, Muhika webe, Muena Ebelu, uwakulua n andi mu nsubu, wakabuela kundi bua kunfuisha bundu, ne hanakela di dianyi, yeye wakashiya tshivualu tshiandi kundi, wakanyema
Kadi pikala mupika awu mufue kunyima kua dituku dimue nansha kua matuku abidi, nebalekele mututshianganyi, bualu mbintu biende
Ei mmikenji yakelela Yehowa Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai

Muntu yonso udi ne lungenyi lule alue biandi bua kuenza bi ntu bionso biakunuambila Yehowa ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu, ne nkanu yatshi ne mabaya atshi, ne mitshi yatshi ne makurishi atshi ne nkanu ya ku makunshi, ne mushete ne mitshi ya mushete, ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete, ne tshilulu tshia munkatshi mua tshitendelelu, ne mesa ne mitshi ya mesa ne malonga a mesa ne bidia bia ha mesa, ne tshitekelu tshia minda ne malonga atshi ne minda yatshi, ne manyi a muinda, ne tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi, ne mitshi yatshi, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne manananshi adi atua dihembu dimpe, ne tshilulu tshia ha mbelu ha tshitendelelu, ne tshioshelu tshia kahia ne bintu bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mitshi yatshi ne malonga atshi, ne tshiowelu ne mesa atshi, ne bilulu bia ku luhangu ne makunshi a luhangu, ne nkanu ya ku makunshi ne tshilulu tshia ha mbelu ha luhangu, ne milondo ya mu tshitendelelu ne ya mu luhangu ne nshinga yai, ne bilulu bia mushinga mukole bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu muaba wa tshijila, bilulu bia tshijila bia muakuidi
Bubanji buenu mbufume mu Mayi manene, ne mu biuma bisokome mu lusenga
Neyikale pambidi pebe wewe, pa balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe ne pa bantu bebe bonsu
Wewe udi Wamba kadi udi wamba mei a hatuhu ne, Hatuahunga dî, tudi ne bukole bua kuluangana n abu
Nujile biakudia, nundambule mulambu wa kuosha
Nenuikale ne milau mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa
Moshe kutuuta dikombu pa lubuebue, bakulu ba bena Izrayele bonsu batangile
Kuendi masandi
Yeye wakatuma bamessager kudi Abimeleke mu musokoko bamba ne, Gala, muana wa Ebede, ne bana babo bakatua ku Shekeme, badi bakeba mua kukutombueshila bena musoko
Kadi muambudi wa ngabu wandi wakahidia; bualu bua yeye wakatamba kutshina
Bumuka mu Rimone Perese, kuyabu ku Libna
Bialala mulume ne mukashi wa muan andi, nebabashihe bubidi buabo, bobo bakenza bualu bubi, ne mashi abo neikale ham bidi habo
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Peka ne malu onso akenzeye bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele

Davidi wakadi muana wa balume wa Muena Efelata wa mu Beteleheme yuda, dina diandi diakadi Yishai, wakadi ne bana ba balume muanda mukulu; mu matuku a Shaula yeye wakadi muntu mununu, mukoke munkatshi mua bantu
Balaka wakamuebesha ne, Yehowa wakuamba tshinyi
Nenuikale bantu banyi, nengikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bakangata bintu biakadiunda mu buloba mu bianza biabo, bakalua n abi kutudi, bakatuambila ne, Buloba budi Yehowa mutuhe budi buimpe
Muena mudimu kupatula kabidi Shimeyone mu lukanu
Wewe mukoshi wa nsambu munene wa buloba bujima, kuena mua kukosa nsambu bibi to
Hashishe mukelenge wakamba ne, Babikile Hamana lubilu, benze bu muakuamba Esetê

Wakenza bakeluba babidi ne tshiamu tshia or tshituha tshimue tshijima, ku matengu abidi a tshibuikilu, mukeluba umue ku ditengu dimue, ne mukeluba mukuabo ku ditengu dikuabo, wakenza bakeluba ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne tshituha tshijima tshia or
buludiki bwa bungenda mushinga ne matunga meenyi;
Kadi bana benu bakese banuakamba ne, Nebafue, badi kabayi banze kumanya malu mimpe ne malu mabi, bobo nebabuelemu, nebahiane buloba
Wakateka kamue mu Betele ne kakuabo mu Dana

Nuangate mabeshi a hisopa, nutue mu mashi adi mu dilonga, numianune mashi ku mutshi wa ha mutu ha mushiku wa mbelu ne ku biluwa bibidi bia mushiku wa mbelu, muntu kaluhuki mu nsubu wandi tô ne ha tshia butuku
Pafiki Yakobe ne bena diende mu Ngoshene, Yozefe kuangata ditempu diende, kuya mu Ngoshene bua kumonangana ne tatuende
Ana uvua ne bana babidi: Dishone ne wa bakaji Oholibama
Pashishe Moshe kuambila kabidi Kora ne: Nuenu bena Levi telejayi
Mose wakashimika nsubu, wakalongolola nkanu ne mabaya, wakabueshamu mitshi, wakajadika makunshi a nsubu
Wewe ne ba mu nsubu webe nenubadie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ku tshidimu ku tshidimu mu muaba udi Yehowa musungule
Nenushale ne muoyi matuku a bungi panu
Kadi meme Maweja Nangila ndi ngamba ne: mu tshidimu tshisambombu, nennuvudijile biakudia bia bungi, bikumbane bua bidimu bisatu

Ke padibu bafunde mu Mukanda wa mvita wa Maweja Nangila ne: Vahebe mu Sufa, ne misapa yende, Amone ne misapa yende, udi luseke lua Are, uleja mikalu ya ditunga dia bena Mowabe Bena Izrayele bumuke muaba awu, kufika muaba uvuabu babikila ne: Tshiina tshia mayi

Nenulekelelangane bintu nunku: muena dibanza yonso nealekele bintu biakasombesheye muena mutumba n andi; yeye kena wenzesha muena mutumba n andi ne muan abo mulume bua kuhingishabo bintu ebi; bualu bua etshi ntshidimu tshiakabambila Yehowa bua kulekelelangana bintu
Mu tshidimu tshia kuhuola blê, Lubena wakaya mu budimi, wakangula tumuma, wakalua n atu kudi mamu andi Lea Lakele wakambila Lea ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Umpeku tumuma tukuabo tua muan ebe
Ada kulela Yabale
Nunku bakadisangisha mu Yelushalema mu ngondo muisatu wa mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bitanu tshia mu bukelenge bua Asa
Yeye wakavula bilulu biandi bionso, wakamba dî dia Nzambi ku mesu kua Samuele, wakalala hanshi butaka munya mujima ne butuku bujima
Nanku dishipula dia ntete mu ditunga dienu, neditungunuke too ne ku matuku a dinowa dia tumuma tua mvinyo
Nedishale bupianyi buebe ne bua ndelanganyi yebe
Bukula abu, buikale busambakaja ne mafuta, bukanga pa dilata bua kuenza mukata
Yeye wakamutuma ha bule tô ngondo ibidi; yeye wakaya ne balunda bandi, bakajinga matuku akatshidiye kamama ku mutu kua mikuna
Bana ba balume ba Elifasa bakadi Temana ne Omâ ne Sefo ne Gatama ne Kenaza
Shaula wakamba ne, Unvua, wewe muana wa Ahituba
Bumuka mu Risha, kuyabu ku Kehelata
Lea wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa difutu dianyi bualu bua meme nakafila muena mudimu wanyi wa bakashi kudi bayanyi, wakamuidika dina ne, Yisakâ
Bikala umue wabo kayi muakane, udi mulema anyi udi mufofo anyi udi muoneka muaba mukuabo, kanumushihedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Lelu nakuhita bidimu lukama ne makumi abidi; tshiena mua kuya ne mua kulua kabidi; ne Yehowa wakamana kungambila ne, Wewe kuena usabuka Yadene eu
Wakamumanyisha dina dia Yehowa
Bualu bua mei a Yehowa akambeye bua tshioshelu tshia mu Betele ne bitendelelu bionso bidi ku mikuna ne mu misoko ya Samalea, bulelela, nênjibue
Kekate ke uvua tatuende wa Amrame
Miloho yakalua, yakambila Bena Yabesha dî edi, ne bobo bakasanka
Kabundi ka mputu kakena kakane kunudi, bualu bua kadi kahingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kakena ne mikono mihanduluke
Ku Holeba wa mu nshila wa ku mukuna wa Sei tô ne ku Kadeshe bânea, nduendu lua matuku dikumi ne dimue
Nuakasabuka Yadene, nuakalua ku Yeleko; Bena Yeleko bakaluangana n enu ne Bena Amole ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Gîgashi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse; nakabafila mu bianza bienu
Tshiakalua ne muele anyi bintu bianyi bia nvita bikuabo, bualu bua mudimu wa mukelenge udi bualu bua lubilu
Hingana ku musoko talalâ, wewe ne bana bebe balume babidi, Ahimasa, muana webe, ne Yonatana, muana wa Ebeyatâ
Nanku bena Izrayele kuenza mikata ne ditapi dia bukula buvuabu basopa kabuyi buanji kubanda, buvuabu bumuka nabu mu Ejipitu
Diba adi, mu matunga aa, nenukebe Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Labana wakamuambila ne, Kabena benza nunku mu buloba buetu, katuena tufila muan a mukala ku dibaka diambedi mukulu andi kayi muanze kuya

Nubambile ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi ne muoyo, bu munuakuamba mu matshu anyi, nennuenzele nunku: mibidi yenu neyihone hanshi mifue mu tshihela etshi, buonso buenu baka balabo ba bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bakadi bantontolola, bulelela, nuenu kanuena nulua mu buloba bunakanulaya bua nuenu nushikamemu, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Bishi bionsu bidi ne masala, kanuena mua kubidia to, bualu bidi ne mikiya
Maweja Nangila neanuenzele bimpe bipite bivuaye muenzele bankambua benu
Muaba awu, nenusumbe bintu bionsu binudi basue: ngombe, mikoku, mbuji, maluvu a mvinyo, nansha maluvu makole, bua nuenu kudia, kunua, kusanka ne bena meku enu bonsu
Muntu udi wambula nyama awu mufue, nansha yeye musukule bilamba biende, utshidi ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Kumbushaye kabidi mbuji ya mashina yonsu ivua ne matoba manene ne makese
Nenjadike n enu tshihungidi tshianyi ne, Tshiena njimisha bintu bionso ne mai kabidi nansha, mai kaena awilangana kabidi bua kujimishau buloba
Bakamba ne, Mulau wakutukuata
Mukelenge wakambila Sadoka muakuidi kabidi ne, Wewe kuena mumonyi wa malu, anyi
Bualu bua bobo badi bu tshisamba tshia bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi, kabena ne dijingulula dia malu munda muabo
Kabuena nunku ne, Wewe uyaya n etu, ne tuetu, meme ne bantu bebe, netuikale bu bantu badi bahanduluka kudi bisamba bionso bia bantu badi hanshi ha buloba, anyi
Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele mikenji eyi ya Maweja Nangila
Badi babuleeja mu mishindu idi mêyi ne mikandu a ditunga mafunda
Tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu bakuabo tshiakaya n abo, ne mikoko ne ngombe ne bimuna bia bungi
Kadi mpindiewu, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mmunuvudije bu mitotu ya mulu

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kupangisha muntu yônso anyi tshisumbu tshia bantu mwa kwangata bukalenga ku bukole anyi mwa kudia bukalenga bikala badiaata ku makasa bulongolodi budi mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi
Pikala muntu mutuute mupika wende mulume nansha mukaji mumushipe disu, amumushe ku bupika bua kufuta disu diende adi
Diakamue Balaame kudiela mpala panshi

Bikala muntu munkatshi muenu udi kayi muakane bua malu akamukuata butuku, hashishe yeye neaye ku mpenge kua tshitudilu, kabuedi mu tshitudilu; kadi hafika dilolo, yeye neowe mai, ne habuela diba, yeye neahingane mu tshitudilu
Muakunyetu wa mukala mmushale kudi tatu
Bua bualu ebu mpindiu tuakuhingana kûdi kabidi bua wewe uye n etu bua kuluangana ne Bena Amona; wewe newikale mukelenge wetu wa Bena Gilada bonso
Mu Madiyane muvua mutuangaji Yetro ne bana bende ba bakaji muanda mutekete
Meme ke udi mujike njila, bualu ndi mumanye ne: luendu luebe elu ludi mua kukufikishisha ku kabutu
Dishintakaja dia ngenyi ne dieela dia tukanda didi mwa kwenzeka amu panyima pa mêba makumi anayi ne mwanda mukulu a difila dia mukanda
Kayeena yikumbanangana kabidi ne majitu kampanda mu tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi kansanga to
Bantu bonso bakakuohola nkanu ya or yakadi ku matshu abo, bakalua n ai kudi Alona

Mu matuku a Yoyakima bakuidi bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo: Melaya wa mu nsubu wa Selaya; Hananya wa mu nsubu wa Yelemiya; Meshulama wa mu nsubu wa Ezela; Yehohanana wa mu nsubu wa Amalia; Yonatana wa mu nsubu wa Maluki; Yosefe wa mu nsubu wa Shebanya; Adena wa mu nsubu wa Halima; Helekai wa mu nsubu wa Melayota; Zekâya wa mu nsubu wa Ido; Meshulama wa mu nsubu wa Ginetona; Zikeli wa mu nsubu wa Abiya; Piletai wa mu nsubu wa Minyamina wa Moadiya; Shamua wa mu nsubu wa Bilega; Yehonatana wa mu nsubu wa Shemaya; Matenai wa mu nsubu wa Yoyaliba; Uzi wa mu nsubu wa Yedaya; Kalai wa mu nsubu wa Salai; Ebê wa mu nsubu wa Amoka; Hashabeya wa mu nsubu wa Hilekiya; Netanele wa mu nsubu wa Yedaya
Kakuanyisha nansha kakese muntu udi umutombokela

Nunku bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele bakatua kudi mukelenge mu Hebelone; Davidi wakahunga n abo tshihungidi mu Hebelone ku mpala kua Yehowa; bakela manyi ha mutu ha Davidi bua kuikaleye mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele, bu mu dî dia Yehowa diakambileye Samuele
Bateke tshilambuilu tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi bua kuosha manananshi

Ku nyima kua malu â, Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakatuma bantu bandi ku Yelushalema, yeye wakadi ku mpala kua musoko wa Lakisha ne bantu bandi bonso kudi Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne kudi Bena Yuda bonso bakadi mu Yelushalema, bamba ne, Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, udi ukonka ne, Nudi nueyemena nganyi bua nuenu nudi nushala mu musoko wa Yelushalema udibo bamba kubutula
Badi Batuma Batentekedi ba Buloba ku Kadeshe bânea Nom
Numuke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu: nutumikile mikenji ei yonso
Kadi, bana bakuabu baudi mulele, balondangane ne babidi aba, nebikale bebe wewe
Kunupitshishaye mu tshipela tshinene tshidi tshikuata bowa, tshiena ne nyoka ya lulengu, ne tuminyiminyi, kamuyi mayi
Bu yeye mupete dikasa dibi, panudi nuya nende apu, nenunshipeshe meme mukulumpe bua kanyinganyinga ka lufu luende
Bakosha nsubu wa Nzambi ne kahia, bakashimbula ngumbu ya Yelushalema, bakosha mbalasa yau yonso ne kahia, bakahaula bintu bionso bia mushinga mukole

Yehowa wakangambila kabidi ne, Nakatangila bantu aba ne mona, badi bantu ba tshitshu; undekele, bua meme neashihe, nenjimishe dina diabo muinshi mua diulu; meme nenkuvuishe wewe tshisamba tshidi tshibahita bunene ne bukole
Bualu Maweja Nangila mmunupatule mu Ejipitu anu mu ngondu awu butuku
Nyemenamu lubilu, bualu bua tshiena mua kuenza bualu wewe kuyi muanze kufikaku
Ndi ntua kabidi ndondu ne bionsu binuvua bapatuke nabi mu buatu: nyunyi, bimuna ne nyama ya muitu, kabidi ne bivuavua kuenda ne muoyi pa buloba pashishe
Dituku adi, Maweja Nangila kutua ndondu ne Abrame muaba awu, kumulaya ne: Matunga aa nengapeshe ndelanganyi yebe, biangatshile ku musulu wa Ejipitu ne ku musulu munene wa Perate
Bakamuambila ne, Mona, bakole makumi atanu badi munkatshi mua bantu bebe badi kunoko; ludi tukusengelela ne
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina, Abidana muana mulume wa Gideom
Shaula wakamba ne, Tuyai, tulonde Bena Peleshete butuku ebu, tukuate bintu biabo tô ne hatshiabu: katubashidi nansha muntu wabo umue
Kanutetshi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munda bu munuakamuteta mu Masa
Nanku ndi ndomba bua kuya kumujika
Kadi benji ba bilengulengu ba bena Ejipitu kuenza tshishima atshi, ne majimbu abu
Ebi mbintu bionso bia mu mai binudi mua kudia: bintu bionso bidi ne mialala ne mabamba nudi mua kudia; kanuena mua kudia bintu bidi kabiyi ne mialala ne mabamba; kabiena biakane kunudi
Yeye wakambila Sala ne, Mona, nakuha mukulu webe bituha bia argent tshinunu, ntshintu tshiebe tshia kutokesha n atshi munda ne bantu bonso badi n ebe, wewe wakubingishibua ku mesu kua bantu bonso
Bena mudimu ba banfumu ba mu buloba bakadianjila ku mpala; Bene hadada wakatuma dî dia kukonka bualu ebu; bakamuambila ne, Bantu bakufuma ku Samalea
Nunku bobo ne bana babo balela bakadi batangila bibuelelu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa, nsubu wa kusambakena mene, bu balami babi
Pashishe dituku dia dikumi dia ngondu wa muanda mutekete, dituku dinene dia kukobolola bantu, nenuele mpungi ya disanka miaba yonsu mu ditunga
Yozefe kubuwujila bibombi biabu tente ne ntete ya kuenza bukula
Muntu wa Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi mua kukuha bintu bidi bihita ebi bungi
Nzambi yenu ibike, inukuatshishe, inulame
Nennufile mu ditunga dimvua mulaye Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe
Wakumukaku, wakimba dina dia mai dikuabo, kabakaditandila, yeye wakadidika ne, Lehobota

Badi babupeesha bilumbulwidi ebi : kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu,Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika, Kapangu ka Mbulamatadi, Kabadi ka kulu ka basalayi, tubadi ne tubinadi twa basevila ne basalayi pamwe ne palake idi milamata ku bilumbulwidi abi

Bualu bua Yehowa nealumbuluile bantu bandi bilumbu biabo, neakudimune mutshima wandi bualu bua bantu bandi, hatangileye ne bukole buabo buakujimina, ne kakuena muntu udi mushale muhika anyi mudishikaminyi
Moshe kuangata dikombu divua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile bua kuya nadi
Bwa kufunda muntu yônso, kumukwata, kumwela mu lukanu anyi kumupiisha, bidi bikengela anu kulonda mêyi ne mikandu mu mushindu udiwu alongolola
Yeye kabidi wakahitshisha muan andi wa balume mu kahia, wakatempa mbuku; wakadisunguila bena muhongo ne bena buloshi; wakenza malu mabi a bungi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufuisha n au tshiji
Ndaku, ubikile bakulu ba bena Izrayele bonsu, ubambile ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu, wa Abrahame, wa Izake ne wa Yakobe mmummuenekele
Kakamanya Palô bualu ebu, wakakeba kushiha Mose
Bana ba balume ba Alona: Nadaba ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ

Yehowa Udi Ubenga bua Mose Abuele mu Buloba bua Kanâna Nakasengelela Yehowa ku tshikondo atshi, nakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, wewe wakabanga kulesha muntu webe bunene buebe, ne tshianza tshiebe tshikole: nzambi kai udi mu diulu anyi udi ha buloba udi mua kuenza bu mûdi wenza malu ebe a kukema
Solomo wakalua ne bintu bionso biakajidila tatu wandi Davidi Nzambi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne malonga onso, wakabiteka mu bibu tshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Yeye mukune mitshi ya mvinyo, kakupola tumuma tuende tua tshianyi nansha musangu umue
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Nemmanye dî didi Yehowa kayi mutuambile munyi
Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa nzambi mikuabo, udi Mukelenge wa bakelenge, Nzambi munene ne mukole, udibo batshina, yeye katu watangila bantu ne kansungusungu, kena witabusha matutu
Kadi misangu yonsu, kanudi mashi a tshimuna to

Yobaba wakafua, ne Hushama, wa mu buloba bua Bena Temana, wakadia bukelenge buandi Hushama wakafua, ne Hadada, muana wa Bedada, wakahita Bena Midiyana bukole mu buloba bua Moaba, wakadia bukelenge buandi, dina dia musoko wandi ne, Awita
Pashishe Moshe ne Elazare kupueka ku mukuna
Ke tuetu kupingana kuetu, kulondela tatu, muntu webe, malu onsu auvua muambe
Ya biebe, ubambile ne, Hinganai bienu ku ntenta yenu
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Ditalala dikale kûdi, kutshinyi, wewe kuena ufila
Kadi mbuji udiye umona ne ngua Azazele, neajikije nende mibi
Miepu ivua mifubidile ayi, kuminayi miepu muanda mutekete ivua ne mubidi muimpe
Davidi wakakonka ne, Bualu ebu bua kuikala muku wa mukelenge budi bumueneka kunudi bu bualu bukese, anyi

Yeye wakamubandisha ha mutu ha miaba mile ya ha buloba, wakadia bintu biakaboba mu madimi, wakamunuisha buitshi buakadi mu mabue, ne manyi akadi mu mabue makole; Wakamudisha manteke a mabele a ngombe, ne mabele a mbushi, ne dianyi dia mikoko ne bimpanga bia mu Bashana ne mbushi, ne blê yakatamba buimpe, nuakanua nvinyo ya tumuma tukunze tuakadi bu mashi
Bakimba dina dia mai dikuabo, bakaditandila kabidi
Hashishe bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete bakalua kudiye ne argent mu bianza biabo
Yeye wakasangakena n andi mu muaba wa hatuhu, mu tshihela muakadi luhehele nkayalu; yeye wakamunyunguluka, wakamulama bimpe, wakamuenzela bu kamonyi ka disu diandi
Wakidikisha bujitu bua bitekelu bia minda bia or ne minda yabi kabidi, ne bua bitekelu bia minda bia argent wakidikisha bujitu bua tshitekelu ne tshitekelu ne bua muinda ne muinda
Leaya, muana wa Shobala, wakalela Yahata; Yahata wakalela Ahumai ne Lahada
bishimikidi bia mianda ya manga ne ya dinanga dia bantu;
Eleazâ muana mulume wa Alona, muakuidi, neikale ku mutu kua bakelenge ba Bena Lewi, ne ku mutu kua bantu badi balama bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Muntu yonso utu wenza malu au udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa; bualu bua malu au mabi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Wihata bantu ku mesu kuenu
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Meku onsu a bena Shimeyone aa avua ne bantu balume
Bantu ba bende nebadikokeshe kundi; hunvuabo lumu luanyi nebatumikile
Ntambue udi utua tshiadi panshi, ulala

Esetê Esetê Udi Ubikila Mukelenge ne Hamana ku Disanka Hakahita matuku asatu, Esetê wakadiluatshisha bilulu biandi bia bukelenge, wakimana mu tshiendedi tshia munda mua nsubu wa mukelenge ku mbelu kua nsubu wa mukelenge; mukelenge wakadi mushikame mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge mu nsubu wa bukelenge, ku tshibueledi tshia nsubu
Ezela muakuidi wakalua ne mukanda wa mikenji ku mesu kua bantu bakadi badisangishaku ne balume ne bakashi ne bonso bakadi ne matshu a kunvua mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa muanda mutekete
Padiye umanya bualu bubi buvuaye muenze, udi ne bua kudikobolola
Hanuasa nsubu muhia muhia, nenuenze kabidi lumbu tukese ku mutu kua nsubu, nunku muntu kahonyi hanshi, ne mashi andi kaikadi ku nsubu yenu
Yehowa wakavuluka Hana; yeye wakimita kabidi, wakalela bana ba balume basatu ne bana ba bakashi babidi
Yeye kena ne bualu bua kudiangatshila bakashi ba bungi bua kukudimuneye mutshima wandi; yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila biamu bia argent ne bia or
Lote kumusengelela ne: Mukalenga, kabienzeki nanku to
Mose wakalelela mikenji bu buhianyi bua tshisambakena tshia Yakoba
Dituku dinene dia Kukobolola bantu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Dituku dia dikumi dia ngondu wa muanda mutekete, ndituku dinene dia kukobolola bantu
Moshe kuteka mabue a mikenji dikumi mu mushete wa ndondu
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, anyi yeye neatekeshe mitshima ya bantu bakuabo
Bena Isalele bakadisangisha kudi Bâla peô ne tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa bualu bua Bena Isalele

Nunku hakalua dituku dia nvita kakuakadi muele anyi difuma mu bianza bia bantu bakadi ne Shaula ne Yonatana; kadi Shaula ne muan andi Yonatana bakadi n abi, Masalayi a Bena Peleshete hakaya kuala mu nshila mubumbakane wa ku Mikemasha
Bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola biai n abi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kadi, nansha biobi bikale nanku, utshinke bua kujadika muaba udi tshisamba tshionsu mua kupeta
Bana balume ba Uziele: Mika kahita ne Yishiya muibidi
Bualu bua bobo bakadi baditshiha ne kuditshiha kukole ne, Wahidia kulua kudi Yehowa ku Misepa neafue bulelela
Ke muana wa bakaji wa mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kupueka bua kuowa mayi
Bualu bua Mose wakamana kuha bisamba bibidi ne tshituha buhianyi buabo dishiya dia Yadene; kadi yeye kakaha Bena Lewi buhianyi munkatshi muabo nansha
Bikaleye kayi ne disanka bualu bua mukashi eu, hashishe yeye neamutume kudiye musue kuya; kadi kamuhanyi ku biuma, kamuenji bu muhika, bualu bua yeye wakamukehesha
Hashishe Davidi wakahingana bua kuvudishileye ba mu nsubu wandi disanka
Bilumelume ne bantu ba hatuhu bakadisangisha kudiye, bakadikolesha bua kuhidia Lehabama, muana wa Solomo, hakadi Lehabama nsongalume wa mutshima mutekete, kakadi ne bukole bua kubakandamena
Mukenji eu newikale kudiye ne kudi bana bandi badi banulonda ku nyima tô ne tshiendelele

Yehowa wakahita ku mpala kuandi, wakela dî ne, Yehowa, Yehowa, Nzambi wa luse ne dinanga, kena ukuata tshiji lubilu, udi mûle tente ne luse lujalame ne bushuwa, udi ulesha binunu bia bantu luse lujalame, udi ubuikidila bantu malonga abo ne kusambuka kuabo kua mikenji ne malu mabi abo; kadi kena ubingisha muntu udi uhila; udi utumina bana ba tshikondo tshisatu anyi tshinai mibi ya batatu abo
Kayena mu diulu bua nuenu nuambe ne, Nganyi neahande mu diulu bua kulua ne mikenji kutudi, ne bua kutunyuisha bua tuetu kuyenza
Milambu ya kujidila nayi tshilambuilu Dituku dia kujidila tshilambuilu, kutshilaba manyi, bamfumu ba bena Izrayele kufika kabidi ne milambu, kuya nayi kumpala kua tshilambuilu
Nuteleje muntu yonsu, mubanji ne mupele, kakuyi kansungansunga
Mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene budimi nebuhingane kudi wakabuhana, kudi muena budimi mene
Makuabu kuamiaminaye ku tshilambuilu
Bumuka mu Tera, kuyabu ku Mitka
Nutendelele amu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Aba mbana balume ba Shutela: Elana ne meku a Bena Elana
Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu, mmuabanyine bantu matunga

Buela mu buatu ne bintu bibidi bia tshintu tshionso tshidi ne muoyo, bua kusungila mioyo ya bintu, buela ne mulume ne mukashi ba bintu bionso, ba nyunyu ne ba bimuna ne ba tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi, bu mudi mishindu yabi, buela ne bintu bibidi bia bintu bionso bua kusungila mioyo yabi
Kadi, muntu udi kayi muteke panshi, kena mua kudia biakudia abi to
Bua bualu ebu Bena Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo; Yehowa udi buhianyi buabo bu muakabambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Munga nzambi wa mu bisamba bikuabo wakusungila buloba buandi mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû, anyi
Nudilongolole ku nsubu ya batatu enu mu milongo yenu, bu muakafunda Davidi, mukelenge wa Isalele, ne bu muakafunda Solomo muan andi
Nanku muntu kena mufue kabidi to
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Bualu kai budi bukutatshisha
Udi ukumbaja bionsu bidiye ulaya
Yehowa wakamujika mu tshibanda tshia buloba bua Moaba tshiakatangilangana ne Bete peô; kakuena muntu udi mumanye kudi lukita luandi tô ne ku dituku edi
Amenona wakamba ne, Bantu bonso bakuabo bumuke kundi
Kadi yeye kakamuambila bualu bua bukelenge buakamuambila Samuele
Mu tshikosu, bena Ejipitu kubenzeja midimu ya mishindu yonsu ne tshikisu
Dina dia mukashi wa Amalama diakadi Yokebede, muana mukashi wa Lewi, wakalelabo mu Ejipitu: yeye wakalelela Amalama Alona ne Mose ne Miyama, muan abo mukashi
Binatuisha muele wanyi wa nvita, ne bingolola tshianza tshianyi bua kulumbulula bilumbu, meme nensombuele badi n anyi lukuna, neafute badi n anyi tshiji
Arone ateke kapia aku mu ntenta wa kusambakena, kumpala kua tshilamba tshidi tshijika mushete wa ndondu
Nudi mua kudisumbila bia kudia kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kudia; nenudisumbile mai a kunua kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kunua
Moshe kulombela bena Izrayele kudi Maweja Nangila
Wewe neusaye tshimpanga, uvuwa mala atshi ne mikolo, uteke bituha biatshi hamue ne mutu watshi

Nudimuke bienu, bua kanudidingi mu mitshima yenu, kanusesuki bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo midimu ne kuyitendelela; bualu bua Yehowa neanukuatshile tshiji, yeye neabuikile diulu ne nvula kayena iloka, ne buloba kabuena bukuama bintu; nunku nenujimishibue lubilu mu buloba buimpe buakamba Yehowa

a Aba mbantu ba ku luseke lua bakumuka mu buhika bakadi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, muye n abo ku Babulona, bakahingana kabidi ku Yelushalema ne Yuda, muntu ne muntu ku musoko wandi: hakahia ne Zelubabela bakadi Yeshua, Nehemiya, Selaya, Lêlaya, Môdekai, Bileshana, Misepâ, Bigewai, Lehuma ne Bâna
Malu atshidi masokoka adi malu a Yehowa, Nzambi wetu: kadi malu adi masokolola adi malu etu ne a bana betu tshiendelele, bua tuetu tuenze mei onso a mikenji ei
Mpindiewu nudi basue kuya kabidi ne Binyamine
Kinshasa ke tshimenga tshia mpwilamambu tshia ditunga ne kabidi lubanza lwa bishimikidi bia ditunga
Kadi Yehowa kakandamuka ku bukole bua tshiji tshiandi tshikole tshiakadiye n atshi kudi Bena Yuda, bualu bua malu mabi onso akenza Manashe akamufuisheye n au tshiji
Ke Abimeleke kuipata Izake wamba ne: Umuke mu ditunga dietu, bualu udi mutupite makanda
Kuelaye meji ne: Pikala Esawu mua kubunda tshisumbu tshimue mvita, tshikuabu netshimunyeme
Numuambuluishe bua kujula nyama awu panshi

Bwa kubotakaja nsombelu mu nkatshi mwa polovensa yôyi nkayayi pa luseka, ne pankatshi payi ne Bukalenga bwa ku mutu, mbâsa Tshisangilu tshia banguvelenêla tshilombola kudi Mfumu wa Ditunga tshidi tshikala ne mudimu wa kukwatshisha mu mibelu bitupa bibidi bia Mbulamatadi ebi
Hakadi mukuabo utaha mutshi, tshisui tshiakanuka, tshikahona mu mai; yeye wakadila ne, Aka, mukelenge wanyi, tshiakadi tshisomba
Mose nealue nkayandi hehi ne Yehowa, kadi bobo kabalu hehi nansha, bantu kabayi n andi

Biasangakena mulume ne mushikankunde utshidi kamama, kayi mubangila kudi mukuabo, biamukuateye ku bukole bua kulala n andi, ne bantu badi babasangana; hashishe mulume wakalala n andi, neafute tatu wa mushikankunde nshekele ya argent makumi atanu, ne yeye neikale mukashi wandi, bualu bua yeye wakamunyanga, kena mua kumuhidia matuku andi onso
Bualu ndelanganyi yonsu ya bena Izrayele neikale imba anu musambu ewu
Pashishe Yakobe kuditshipa mu dina dia Mvidi Mukulu uvua mukuatshisha tatuende Izake bowa
Hakadi mukashi wa ku Tekoa uyikila ne mukelenge, yeye wakatua mpala wandi hanshi ha buloba, wakamukukuila, wakamba ne, Mukelenge, unkuatshishe
Mikenji ya bena Levi Nunemeke buena nzubu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Yakobe kuimanyika dibue pa lukita luende alu

Super Mwika Ya Marie eh Maman coup de foudre Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Bya kulwa disànka Bya kulwa disànka Bya kulwa disànka Bya kulwa disànka Bya kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Bya kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Bya kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Bya kulwa disànka Twayi lona we
Nanku, muntu wa kudibu nansha umue uvua muntombokele kena mua kufika mu ditunga dia Kenaane, dimvua mulaye bankambua babu to
Mamu a ndi wakamuambila ne, Mulau webe wikale ha mutu hanyi, muan anyi, anji kutumikila di dianyi, Ulue ne nkungulu ya mbushi
Tatu wanyi wakanunemeshila mutshi wa tshikokedi wa bujitu, kadi meme nennukumbashile majitu makuabo: tatu wanyi wakamutuma ne nsokotshi, kadi meme nennukume ne tuminyiminyi
Bushuwa, ndi Mvidi Mukulu wenu nkayanyi
Ndi nkusengelela ne: kubengi to
Genese Tshibumba tshia Babela Bantu bonso ba ha buloba bakadi ne muaku umue ne mei amue
Ku tshilambuilu mmuaba wa tshijila menemene, muntu yonsu watshilenga, nansha tshintu tshilengaku nebipete dinyoka
Yeye wakatuha bukenji, anyi
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamueneka kudiye mu ludimi lua kahia, luakadi luluhuka mu katshi, wakamona talala, kahia kakadi kosha katshi, katshi kakakahia
Nanku Arone kutentekaja munyinyi wa mafuta awu pa biadi bia nyama ibidi ayi
Hakambabo kubuela mu Ejipitu, Abalama wakambila mukashi andi Salai ne, Tangila ndi mumanye ne wewe udi mukashi muimpe kumona, ne hakumona Bena Ejipitu, bobo nebambe ne, Eu udi mukashi wandi
Kadi bena Levi, badi mua kupikula nzubu yabu idi miasa mu bimenga biabu bia bena Levi diba dionsu didibu basue
Mutuangaji oshe bionsu ebi pa tshilambuilu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bundi nnuha, ne hanuahuola bintu bia mu buloba, nulue bienu ne bintu binudi nuhuola diambedi kudi muakuidi, yeye neanyukule tshisumbu tshia bintu ku mpala kua Yehowa, bualu bua kunuitabushisha kudi Yehowa, muakuidi neatshinyukule dituku didi dilonda dia lumingu

Mikenji Neyitekibue mu Mushete wa Tshihungidi tshia Mei Hakashikisha Mose kufunda mei a mikenji ei mu mukanda, hashishe Mose wakadimusha Bena Lewi bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ne, Nuangate mukanda eu wa mikenji, nûteke ku luseke lua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, newikaleku bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi
Rakele kunyema lubilu bua kuambila tatuende Labane
Eyowa, panudi kanuyi nutumikila Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, neanubutule mushindu wabutulaye bisamba bidi pabuipi nenu
Kadi musangu awu Yuda kavua kumbelu to
Nuende ngendu ya mazengu lumingu lujima kumpala kuanyi meme Maweja Nangila

Balume bonso nebamueneke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu mu muaba udiye Usungula: ku disanka dia mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, ne ku disanka dia mbingu ai muanda mutekete, ne ku disanka dia bitandatanda; kabamueneki ku mesu kua Yehowa ne bianza bituhu: kadi muntu yonso neafile bintu bidiye n abi bu muakanuvudishila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, disanka
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Utshiangate
Muntu kai munkatshi mua bantu bonso wakunvua dî dia Nzambi wa muoyo, diakafuma munkatshi mua kahia, bu tuetu tuakulua, ne wakashala ne muoyo
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke milau ei yonso ham bidi ha bena lukuna ne badi n enu tshiji, bakadi banukengesha
Kadi padi kanyama kamue ka ku tunyama etu kapona, kafuila mu tshintu bu mudi: luvu, tshilamba, tshiseba nansha tshibombi, badi ne bua kusukula tshintu atshi
Tshitekelu tshia Minda tshia Or Ek
Tshituha tshia buhianyi bua Yehowa mbantu bandi; Yakoba udi buhianyi buandi
Kakuakadi bualu mu luesu kabidi
Wewe neubale bungi bua bintu kudi mundi mulume udi ne bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ku bi dimu makumi asambombo bu nshekele ya argent makumi atanu bu nshekele udibo bafila mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Pashishe wangate bakulu ba bena Izrayele, uye nabu kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, umuambile ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bena Ebrewu, Mvidi Mukulu wetu mmutumuenekele

Nuvuluke malu onso akanuenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bidimu ebi makumi anai hakadiye munulombole mu tshihela, bualu bua kunuhuekesha, ne kunuteta bualu bua kumanya malu akadi mu mitshima yenu, ne nudi basue kutumikila mikenji yandi, anyi kuyihidia
Muntu yonsu udi ushipangana mu musokoku, asangane muena tshibawu kuenza anyi

Numanye bienu ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi mene; Nzambi utu walamata dî diandi, utu watumikila tshihungidi tshiandi ne luse luandi kudi bantu badi bamusue ne batu batumikila mikenji yandi tô ne ku bihungu tshinunu; utu wafuta bantu badi n andi lukuna difutu diabo ku mesu kuabo, bua kubashiha: yeye kena uhanga muntu udi n andi lukuna, neamufute ku mesu kuandi
Ekesode Mose wakandamuna ne, Kadi bobo kabena bangitabusha, kabena bunvua di dianyi, bobo nebambe ne, Yehowa kakamueneka kûdi nansha
Yehowa neakukengeshe lelu
Nunku bakalua bahandi ba nkunyi ne basunyi ba mai kudi Bena Isalele bonso, bu muakabambila bakelenge babo
Pashishe bantu bakuabu nebabambuluishe bua kumushipa
Yehowa wakakonka Kana ne, Muakuny ebe Ebele udi kudi kunyi
Muntu keena mwa kwanji kufunda Mulombodi wa ditunga ne Minisitila Kavulambedi ku tubadi bwa bibawu bikalabo babûnda pambelu pa midimu yabo too ne ku tshikondo tshiaajika bumfumu bwabo
Nuenu nenuhaule misoko yonso idi ne ngumbu, ne misoko yonso idi miakane, nenushimbule mitshi yonso idi mimpe, nenujibike mishimi yonso ya mai, nenunyange madimi onso adi mimpe ne mabue kabidi
Hawalua ne mulambu wa bukula budibo balamba mu nfulu, nebuikale mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi, anyi mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene idi ne manyi mela ha mutu
Bualu bua bahele nebikale mu buloba buenu matuku onso, nunku nakanuambila ne, Nubulule tshianza tshienu kudi muan enu, kudi mukengi ne kudi muhele mu buloba buenu
Bakamutshintshimikila mu Abele wa Bete mâka; bakunguisha mushiki wa mabue ku buludiludi ne lumbu; bantu bonso bakadi ne Yoaba bakumbula kuinshi kua lumbu, bua kulushimbula
Kadi tudi ne bintu bia kudisha n abi mpunda yetu, ne tudi ne bidia ne nvinyo kabidi bualu buanyi ne bua muhika webe mukashi, ne bua nsongalume udi ne bantu bebe; kakuena dikengela dia tshintu
Balumbuluishi Shimishona ne Mukashi wa ku Timena Shimishona wakahueka ku Timena, wakatangila mukashi wa mu bana bakashi ba Bena Peleshete
Nanku kakufuta to
Yeye nealue n abu kudi muakuidi, ne muakuidi neabuambule dianza tente bu tshivulukidi, neabuoshe ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu
Umbuke ne butu abu mu mitanda, aye nabu muaba musunguluke kauyi mikiya bua kubimansha
Kadi Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, anu bobo bakashala ne muoyo munkatshi mua bantu bakaya bua kutentekelabo buloba
Panuamona bionsu ebi, nenuikale ne bowa, dinda nenujinge bua butuku buila lukasa, butuku nujinga bua butshia lukasa
Bu muakajimisha Yehowa bisamba bikuabo ku mpala kuenu, nunku nuenu nenujimine, bualu bua nuenu nuakahidia kunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Muntu musumbishe muanende wa bakaji ku bupika, kabena batekela mukaji awu bu mudibu batekela muntu mulume to
Mikenji ya bena Levi d

Bobo bakashikama mu Bê sheba ne mu Molada ne mu Hasâ shuala ne mu Bileha ne mu Eseme ne mu Tolada ne mu Betuele ne Hôma ne mu Sikelaga, ne mu Bete makabota ne mu Hasâsu sima ne mu Bete bili ne mu Shâla yima
Nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kujimisha miaba yonso yakadi bisamba binudi nuihata bitendelelaku nzambi yabo ku mutu kua mikuna mile, ne ku mutu kua tukuna tukese ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi
Unvuai, Isalele, nubienze; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nukumbane ba bungi, bu muakanulaya Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu, mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Bualu bukuabu: meme ke udi tatu mueyekele tshilumbu tshia muanende ewu
Bena Isalele bakadisangisha, bakangata bia kudia, bakaya bua kuluanganabo n abo

Hashishe Hamana wakambila mukelenge ne, Bua muntu udi mukelenge usanka kunemeka, balue ne bilulu bidi mukelenge uluata ne kabalu kadi mukelenge wenda ha nyima haku ne tshifulu tshia bukelenge tshidiye wasa ku mutu kuandi; bafile bintu ebi ne kabalu mu bianza bia umue wa bantu ba mukelenge badi batamba buneme, baluatshishe muntu udi mukelenge usanka bua kunemeka, bendeshe muntu au ha nyima ha kabalu aka mu musesu wa musoko, bele dî ku mpala kuandi ne, Nebenzele muntu udi mukelenge usanka bua kunemeka nunku
Meme nengikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Bantu ba lungenyi lule bakadi benza midimu ya mishindu yonso mu tshitendelelu bakaha kudi Mose, bakamuambila ne, Bantu badi balue ne bintu bitamba bungi bia kuenza n abi mudimu wakuamba Yehowa

Hakunvua tupitene tuonso ne masalayi atu onso lumu ne, Mukelenge wa Babulona wakasungula Gedaliya mukelenge wa buloba, tuakalua ne bantu batu kudi Gedaliya ku Misepa, mena atu ne, Yishemaele, muana wa Netanya, ne Yohanana, muana wa Kalea, ne Selaya, muana wa Tanehumeta, Muena Netofa, ne Yâzanya, muana wa Muena Mâka
Bakambila Shaula ne, Mona, bantu badi benzela Yehowa bibi, bualu bua badi badia mashi
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Tshiakakubikila, ya ulale biebe kabidi
Nutshipingaje kudi muenatshi
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bakelenge Abishaga Udi Ukuatshile Davidi Mudimu Mukelenge Davidi wakadi muntu mununu, mukoke wa bidimu bia bungi; bakamubikila ne bilulu bia bungi, kadi yeye kakunyua luya
Hanoka wakalela Ilada ne Ilada wakalela Mehuyaela ne Mehuyaela Wakalela Metushaele ne Metushaele wakalela Lemeke

Yehowa neanuhadishe, neanutumme bufofo, nenufue mikemu mu mitshima yenu; nenububute munda munya bu mudi muntu mufofo ububuta mu midima; kanuena nuenda dikasa dimpe mu nshila yenu, nebanutatshishe, nebanuibe, kakuena muntu udi mua kunusungila
Mu tshikosu, mmumanye mua kuenza midimu yonsu
Bualu bua Yehowa udi munene, budiye n abu mbua kutumbishibua bikole; budiye n abu mbua kunemeshibua ha mutu ha nzambi yonso ya hatuhu
Kadi padi mutuangaji mumane kuamba ne: muntu ewu kena mupie mikiya, pashishe mputa ya bilundu imueneka kabidi mu mutu, mutuangaji neakenkete musangu muibidi

Nsambu ya kukosela muaba wa tshijila Pikala balumbuluishi ba muaba unudi basombe, bapangile tshilumbu tshia bantu, bavua bashipangane, batutangane, batapangane mputa, nansha benze tshilema tshikuabu kampande, nuye ne tshilumbu atshi muaba wikala Maweja Nangila musungule
Ku ditamba dionsu kuvua tulongu tukese tusatu, tuikale ne mapu ne bilongu bu mudi mutshi wa amande
Uvua mumutue kabidi ne tuetu bonsu, batshidi ne muoyi lelu aba
Gideona, muana wa Yoasha, wakafua biandi ku bununu buandi, bakamujika mu majambu a tatu wandi Yoasha mu musoko wa Ofela wa Bena Abiezê
Moshe kubenga, wamba ne: Ndi nkusengelela ne: utume muntu mukuabu
Kuinaminyi nzambi yabo, kuyitendeledi, kuenji mudibo benza, kadi ubiele hanshi, ushihe bibumba biabo
Musapa muinayi ke Perate

Wakumusha bitendelelu biakadi ku mutu kua mikuna, wakashimbula makunshi akatendelelabo, wakatahila Bashela hanshi, wakabutula nyoka wa tshiamu tshia mitaku Wakenza Mose, bualu bua mu matuku au Bena Isalele bakadi boshila nyoka au musenga wa manananshi; wakamubikila ne, Nehushetana
Yosefe wakalesha tatu andi ne bana babo muaba bua kushikamabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu buloba buakatamba buimpe, mu buloba bua Lamesese, bu muakamba Palô
Kanungu ka Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi ke bunene ne polovensa
Wakabandisha mesu andi, wakamona dina dia mai mu budimi ne bisumbu bia mikoko bisatu biakadi bilalaku, bualu bua bakadi banuishaku mikoko, ne dibue dinene diakadi ku mushiku wa dina dia mai
Metushela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne muanda mutekete, wakale la Lemeke
Diabanyangana dia makookeshi pankatshi pa Mbulamatadi ne polovensa didi ne tshia kwenzeka mu bulongolodi bwa mutu wa mukanda IV bwa Dîyi ditudi nadi edi
Yalobama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakelenge ba Isalele; Zekâya, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Bena Isalele bakakuatshila Egelona, mukelenge wa Moaba, mudimu bidimu dikumi ne muanda mukulu
Nenubale mbingu muanda mutekete: ku tshikondo tshinudi nuhuole bintu nenubange kubala mbingu ei muanda mutekete
Bangate muana mulume wa ngombe ne mulambu wandi wa bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi, wewe newangate muana mulume wa ngombe mukuabo bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Padi muntu ubuelela mukaji wa mansebende, nansha wa tatuende mukuabu mu nzubu, kena munemeke mansebende nansha tatuende mukuabu to
Nenudie mampa adi kâyi ne luevene matuku asambombo; ne dituku dia muanda mutekete nedikale dia tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; kanuenji mudimu nansha

Bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu bidi bana balume ba Gêshona balama nebikale ntenta, ne tshilulu tshidibo bateka ha mutu, ne bilulu bia ku bibi bia ntenta wa kusambakena, ne bilulu bia luhangu ne bilulu bidibo bateka ku mbelu kua luhangu, hehi ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne hehi ne tshioshelu, ne nshinga ya ku luhangu bua mudimu wa tshitendelelu
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua tumuma bua mukuenu, nudi mua kudia tumuma kukuta tente, kadi kanuangatshi tumuma mu tshisaka
Nakanyunguluka, nakahueka ku mukuna, nakateka mabue mu mushete unakenza, adimu bu muakangambila Yehowa, Bena Isalele bakumuka ku Belota Bene yâkana, bakaya ku Mosela
Hashishe Abashaloma wakamba ne, Bikilai Hushai, Muena Aka, kabidi, tunvue tshidiye Wamba kabidi
Kumonaye tshibandilu tshitue mulu tshitue panshi
Muadi mukole newikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso; kakuena kuanze kuikala muadi bu eu, ne kawena wikalaku kabidi
Bena Isalele bakumukaku mu tshikondo atshi, bakaya muntu ne muntu ku tshisamba tshiandi ne ku tshiota tshiandi; bakumukaku, muntu ne muntu wakaya ku buhianyi buandi

Davidi wakashikama ne Akisha mu Gata, yeye ne bantu bandi, muntu ne muntu ne ba mu nsubu wandi, ne Davidi ne bakashi bandi babidi, Abinoama, Muena Yizelele, ne Abigayila, muena Kâmele, wakadi mukashi wa Nabala
Arone pende neikale koku
Mulume wakidika bimuna bionso ne nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bimuna bionso bia mu madimi mena abi, kadi mulume kakadi ne mukuatshishi wa bu muakadiye nansha
Bena musoko bakamukonka dituku dia muanda mutekete diambedi diba kadiyi dianze kubuela ne, Tshidi tshihita buitshi kushemakana ntshinyi
Bulelela, yeye udi unanga bantu bonso, bantu bandi bonso ba tshijila hadi mu tshianza tshiebe: bobo bakashikama hanshi ku makasa ebe, bua kunvua mei ebe
Butumbuke buatshi buikale metre umue ne tshitupa
Balame mukenji ewu kashidi too ne ndelanganyi yabu
Nuenze bidiye unuambila
Nanku Maweja Nangila kakuitaba bua mushipianganyi udiye mutume abuele mu nzubu yenu bua kunushipa to

Dutelonone Mukenji Mutambe Bunene Ei mmikenji ne â mmei ne â mmalu wakangambila Yehowa bua kunumanyisha, bua nuenu nubienze mu buloba bunudi nuhiana: bua nuenu nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mei andi onso ne mikenji yandi, binakanuambila, ne wewe ne muan ebe mulume, ne muana wa muan ebe mulume, matuku onso a muoyo wenu; bua wewe uvudishe matuku ebe
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu uvua anu ne tshitunu
Ne mashi au neabuikidibue
Ulekele bantu baye kutendelela Yehowa Nzambi wabo, wewe kuena mumanye ne, Buloba bua Ejipitu buakushihibua, anyi
Dituku dia muanda mutekete nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Wewe neujidile tshiadi tshidibo banyukula, ne tshihela tshidibo babisha mulu tshia tshimpanga tshia kujidila kua Alona ne tshia bana bandi balume

Bualu ebu kabuena butamba bakole ku mesu kuebe, hawamulekela, bualu bua yeye wakakuenzela mudimu bidimu bisambombo udi utamba muena mudimu wa difutu misangu ibidi; hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanusankishe mu malu onso anudi nuenza
Ashale ne muoyi
Ufike nabu ku ntenta wa kusambakena
Moshe kulondela tatuende muenu muvua Maweja Nangila mukengeshe bena Ejipitu ne mukalenga wabu mu tshimuangi tshia bena Izrayele
Kadi bantu bakolola bianza biabo, bakakoka Lota mu nsubu kudibo, ba kinshila tshibi
Mesa a kulambuila mampa Beshalele kuenzaye kabidi mesa a mutshi wa ndunga
Ku nyima muakuny andi wakahatuka ne tshianza tshiandi tshikuata ku tshikankanyi tshia Esau Bakamuidika dina ne, Yakoba Isaka wakadi ne bidimu makumi asambombo hakamuleleleye bana
Bukole buebe mbupite
Hashishe Yeshaya muprofete wakafika kudi Hezikiya mukelenge, wakamuebesha ne, Bantu aba bakuamba tshinyi
Dituku ditanu Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Mu mayi muikale minyinyi mishilangane, kabidi nyunyi ibuke mulu mu tshibuashibuashi
Maweja Nangila, wewe kubafikisha, kubasombesha, pa mukuna uudi mudisunguile, pa muaba uudi musue kusomba, mu nzubu wa tshijila uudi mudiashile
Bualu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi unuteta bua kujadika ne: nudi bamunange ne bukole buenu buonsu, kabidi ne muoyi wenu mujima anyi
Muntu wa ku Bâla shalisha wakalua kudi muntu wa Nzambi ne bintu biakahuolabo diambedi, mitanda ya bidia bia orge makumi abidi, ne manvua mabishi mu tshibombi tshiandi
Kena uyukila kabidi netu anyi
Tuetu katuena ne diyi dia kuamba
Lota wakaluhuka, wakambila baku bakadi babangila bana bandi bakashi ne, Jukai, numuke mu musoko eu, bualu bua Yehowa neashihe musoko Kadi yeye wakadi bu muntu udi wakula biakulakula kudi baku bandi
Mukenji wa Bamonyi Kanuitabushi dî dia mumonyi umue udi utumpila mukuabo tshianana bua dihambuka diandi anyi bua bubi buakenzeye; malu neajalame anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu
Bena Isalele bakamba ne, Nutuambile ne, Bualu ebu bubi buakalua munyi
Maweja Nangila neanupe bimuma, ne ntete bisaka tente
Yehowa wakaha Solomo lungenyi bu muakamulayeye; ditalala diakadi hankatshi ha Hilama ne Solomo, bubidi buabo bakahunga tshihungidi

Kanubatshinyi: nuvuluke malu akenzela Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Palô ne Bena Ejipitu bonso; mateta makole anuakatangila ku mesu, ne bimanyinu, ne malu a kukema, ne tshianza tshikole ne diboko diolola wakanuhatula n abi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nênzele bantu bonso banudi nutshina nunku
Lehabama, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Nanku mupika udibu balelela ku nzubu kuebe, nansha udibu basumba, babateke bonsu panshi, bua ndondu wanyi amueneke kashidi mu mubidi wenu
Nunku bakadilongolola bua bantu badie
Hakebeshabo ne hakakonkanganabo, bakamba ne, Gideona, muana wa Yoasha, nguakuenza bualu ebu
Genese Yuda ne Tamâ Mu matuku au Yuda wakumuka kudi bana babo, wakaya ku di Muena Adulama dina diandi Hila
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bobo bakadila kudi Bena Dana
Bualu mulambu awu kawena umulengelela to, udi umubipila
Yeye kabidi wakatombokela mukelenge Nebukadenesâ, nguakamutshihisha kudi Nzambi; kadi yeye wakadi ne mampaka, wakakolesha mutshima wandi kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele
Ndi muenze nanku, bualu ndi mumone malu onsu adi Labane mukuenzele
Mamuen andi wakamukonka ne, Wakahumbulula mpumbuluila kudi kunyi lelu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata bakelenge bonso ba bantu, ubowe ku mpala kua Yehowa mu munya, nunku tshiji tshikole tshia Yehowa tshiumuke kudi Bena Isalele
Nganyi wakukuna mitshi ya tumuma tukese kayi muanze kudia tumuma atu
Davidi wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi muntu wa nganyi
Pakuatshikaye, umanyangane pebe nende bua tumulelele bana
Uvua anu ne tshitunu
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge wanyi, bualu ebu nebuikale anu bu mu dî diebe; ndi webe ne bintu bionso bindi n abi
Pashishe nealambule bukula ne mvinyo
Kabakajimisha tshintu nansha tshinene nansha tshikese, nansha muana mulume nansha muana mukashi, nansha tshintu tshimue tshiakanyengabo; Davidi wakahingisha bionso
Nansha nuenu baye kusokoma mu bimenga, nennutumine disama dia kishi
Amu tunkanunuina tuebe tua tshikondu tshinayi netupingane mu ditunga edi kashidi
Kadi bantu badi mu buloba abu badi bakole, misoko yabo idi ne mpangu ya mabue, ne idi minene be; ne bualu bukuabo, tuakamonamu bana ba Anaka
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kuandamuna ne nsenda ne: Maweja Nangila ikale nenu
Bikondo bikuabo ditutu diakimana ku mutu kua nsubu matuku makese, hashishe bakashala mu tshitudilu bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa, ne bakaya ku luendu bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa
Mona, ba mu diku dianyi badi bahita Bena Manashe bonso bahele, ne meme ndi mutambe buhuekele mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi
Nuvua batentekele ditunga adi matuku makumi anayi
Nanku, nuenu nenufuile bonsu amu mu tshipela emu
Muntu umue kena mua kujadika bualu to
Muakuidi neoshe dianyi ha tshioshelu, kadi tshiadi netshikale tshia Alona ne bana bandi balume
Nuenu bena Izrayele mwuluke ne: nuvua ku bupika mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Davidi ne bantu bandi bakadi basokome mu luseke lukuabo lua lubuebue elu
Kadivua dikumbane mua kudisha bimuna biabu bonsu babidi to
Hawamulekela, kumutumi ne bianza bituhu; umuhe bintu bia bungi munkatshi mua mikoko yebe, ne bia bintu biwakuhuola ne bia nvinyo; bu mudi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, mukusankishe, wewe neumuhe
Yeye wakafunda ha mabue, bu muakafundeye diambedi, mikenji dikumi yakanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu; Yehowa wakumpau
Dilolu adi, nyunyi ya tulumbu kuikila muaba uvua bena Izrayele batudile
Nuvuluke matuku a diambedi, nuelangane meji a bidimu ne bikondo bia bungi: webeshe tatu webe, ne yeye neakuleshe; ne bakulu benu, bobo nebakuambile
Yehowa wakadi ne Alona tshiji tshikole bua kumushiha; nakalombela Alona musangu eu kabidi
Nunku halua bantu babi kundi bakashiha muntu muakane mulale mu nsubu muandi ha bulalu, bualu kabuena butambe kunkuata bua kusombuela mashi andi adi ha bianza bienu bua kunûmusha ha buloba, anyi
Kadi pawikala ubenga anu kubenga bua kulekela bantu banyi, malaba ndi ntuma mpasu mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu

Mu dituku ditanu bana balume ba ngombe tshitema ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Bena Isalele bakenza nunku, bakenza malu onso akambila Yehowa Mose
Neanuipatshile bisamba ebi muanda mutekete: bena Iti, bena Ngirgashi, bena Amore, bena Kenaane, bena Perizi, bena Ivi ne bena Yebusa, bidi binupita bungi ne bukole
Moshe umvua nanku, kudielaye mpala panshi
Hanuasa nsubu muhia muhia, nenuenze kabidi lumbu tukese ku mutu kua nsubu, nunku muntu kahonyi hanshi, ne mashi andi kaikadi ku nsubu yenu
Nenufue, nubutuke bonsu ne nzala
Kanulu ne tshintu tshidi tshitonda Yehowa mu nsubu muenu bua kufuanangana n atshi: nuhidie tshintu atshi, nuikale n atshi lukuna; atshi ntshintu tshibihe tshia tshijila
Tshituha tshibi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne Miyama ne, Busatu buenu nulue mu ntenta wa kusambakena Busatu buabo bakaluamu
Yehowa wakadi ne disanka bualu bua batatu benu, yeye wakahasua, yeye wakasungula bana babo bakabalonda ku nyima, wakanusungula nuenu mene mene munkatshi mua bantu bonso, bu mutshidi bualu lelu
Mehalai, Muena Netofa wa Bena Zela, wakadi kapitene ka tshisumbu tshia mu ngondo wa dikumi; mu tshisumbu tshiandi muakadi bantu binunu makumi abidi ne binai
Badi kabayi mua kutendelela Muntu mulume mubozeke mipese, nansha mukoseke mubidi wa bantu balume, kena mua kubuela muaba udi bantu ba Maweja Nangila basangile
Yehowa Nzambi, kukudimushi mpala wa muntu webe wakelabo manyi ha mutu handi; uvuluke luse luebe lujalame kudi Davidi, muntu webe
Samuele Badi Basombuela Bena Gibeona Tshiole tshiakadi ku buloba mu matuku a Davidi bidimu bisatu bilondangane; Davidi wakebesha Yehowa bualu ebu
Ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila mukalu wenu neubange kuinshi menemene kua Mayi manene a luepu
Bobo nebanuteke tshikokedi tshia tshiamu ha nshingu yenu tô ne hanuajimishibua kudibo
Bayandi wakabika, wakamulonda bua kumuambileye mei a kalolo ne bua kumuhingisha kabidi; muikale ne muena mudimu wandi ne mpunda ibidi; mukashi wakalua n andi mu nsubu wa tatu wandi
Bobo bakahaula misoko yonso yakadi ha buihi ne Gela, bualu bua ditshina dia Yehowa diakabakuata
Yeye wakatangila kudi Amaleka, wakabela lusumuinu luandi ne, Amaleka wakadi tshisamba tshia ku mpala munkatshi mua bisamba, kadi kunshikidilu tshisamba tshiandi netshijimme tshiendelele
Bakabika Muena Peleshete, hakasemeneye ha buihi bua kusangakeneye ne Davidi, hashishe Davidi wakabika lukasa, wakalumbila lubilu kudi bena nvita bua kusangakeneye ne Muena Peleshete
Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Bilele bia Bena Buloba Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, kanuyidi bua kulonda ku nyima kua malu a bundu a bisamba abi
Kanutedi dina dianyi meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu tshitelatela, bualu meme nennyoke muntu yonsu udi kayi unemeka dina dianyi
Nenteke ditahulula hankatshi ha bantu banyi ne bantu bebe, nengenze tshimanyinu etshi makelela

Yeye wakalongolola tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, wakafilahu milambu ya kuosha ne ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala ne ya kusakidila n ai Nzambi; wakelela Bena Yuda mukenji bua bobo batendelele Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele
Bena musoko bakambila Elisha ne, Mona, tudi tukusengelela ne
Tshiena mua kuenza bualu, wewe kuyi muanji kufikamu
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bobo bakamba dî dimpe
; Dut
Mose wakadila kudi Yehowa ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Nzambi, umuondahe
Nakangata mabue au abidi akadi mu bianza bianyi, nakashiha ku mesu kuenu
Nudimuke, kanufidi milambu ya kuosha mu miaba yonso mudi nutangila; kadi muaba udi Yehowa Usungula munkatshi mua bisamba bienu, nenufileku milambu yenu ya kuosha, nenuenzeku mei onso anakunuambila
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mumane kuipata bantu aba, kumpala kuenu, kanuditambishi ne: Maweja Nangila mmutupe ditunga edi, bualu tudi bantu ba nsongu
nennuvudishile disanka dianyi tshidimu tshisambombo, ne buloba nebukuame bintu bia bidimu bisatu

Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Bana aba bakashi mbana banyi, bana bakalelabo mbana banyi, ne bimuna mbianyi, ne bintu bionso biudi n abi mbianyi, ne lelu ndi mua kuenzela bana banyi ba bakashi ne bana bakalelabo tshinyi
Bena ditunga bonsu bavua muaba awu kuitaba bivua Amore ne muanende Shekeme bambe
Umukoleshe ku muoyi, ashindike muoyi wa munda
Kujadikabu ne: Maweja Nangila wamonyi makenga etu, watusambi
Ukudike tshilamba atshi, ku makunji anayi adi pa bitaku binayi
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ka meme eu
Maweja Nangila neebeje bena Izrayele ne: Mvidie yenu inuvua batekemene idi penyi
Hashishe yeye wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Nuenu nuikale ku luseke lumue, meme ne Yonatana, muan anyi mulume netuikale ku luseke lukuabo
Kadi Lote uvua anu ujingakana

Makoho onso a kunua n au mukelenge Solomo akadi a or, ne malonga onso a mu nsubu wandi wa ditu dia Lebanona akadi a or mene mene; nansha dimue diakadi dia argent: tshiamu atshi katshiakadi tshia mushinga mukole mu matuku a Solomo
Samuele wakunyua mei onso a bantu, wakâmba mu matshu a Yehowa kabidi
Dutelonone Muaba Umuehele wa Kutendelela Yehowa Â mmalu ne mei anudi ne bualu bua kutumikila mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, munuhe bua kubuhiana matuku onso a muoyo wenu ha buloba
Meku onsu a bena Rubene aa avua ne bantu balume
Kadi padi mu dibala dia ku dikoshi nansha mu lubombu mumuenekela dikeji dikunzubile, atshi ndisama dia nsudi didi dituadija

Ahaba wakambila Obadaya ne, Hitshila mu buloba buonso ku mishimi ya mai yonso ne ku tusulu tuonso, bumue neuheteku mashinde a kudisha n au tubalu ne nyama ya mpunda katujimishi nyama yetu yonso nansha

Bakelenge Dî dia Davidi kudi Solomo Matuku a Davidi akasemena ha buihi bua yeye afue; yeye wakadimusha muan andi Solomo, wamba ne, Nyaya mu nshila udi ba ha buloba bonso baya: nunku wikale ne bukole, udivuishe mulume wa bushuwa
Bana balume basatu ba Seluya bakadiku, mena abo Yoaba ne Abishai ne Asahele: Asahele wakadi ne makasa mahehele bu ngulungu
Nê wakalela Kishi; Kishi wakalela Shaula; Shaula wakalela Yonatana ne Malekishua ne Abinadaba ne Eshebâla
Edi ndî diakamba Yehowa bualu bua bana bakashi ba Selofehada ne, Bobo babakibue kudi balume hadibo basue, kadi babakibue kudi balume ba mu meku a tshisamba tshia batatu abo

Hakamba diba kubuela, bakajuka, bakaya ku tshitudilu tshia Bena Sulia; hakafikabo ku mpenge wa tshitudilu tshia Bena Sulia, kabakasanganaku muinu, Bualu bua Yehowa wakuosha Bena Sulia tshiona tshia makalu ne tubalu ne tshia masalayi a bungi; bakambilangana ne, Monai, mukelenge wa Isalele wakafuta bakelenge ba Bena Hiti ne bakelenge ba Ejipitu bua kuluanganabo n etu
Kena mua kuasa tshifulu ku mutu to
Mu difuku dia tshitema dia ngondo muinai tshiole tshiakatamba bukole mu musoko; nunku bena buloba kabakadi ne bia kudia
Mu tshikondo atshi Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia, wakaya kuluangana ne bena musoko wa Gata, wakaunyenga; Hazaele wakatangila mpala wandi bua kuyeye ku Yelushalema
Butshia dinda, Yozefe ufika bua kubatangila, kubasangana babungame
Dijika dia midimu didi dienzeka padi tshibambalu tshijikija ndongamu uvwabo batshibikidila ne bikala kabayi bapitshisha matuku makumi asatu kutwadijila ku dituku dia mbangilu wa midimu
Yonatana, muana wa Shaula, wakajuka, wakaya kudi Davidi hakadiye muitu, wakakolesha maboko andi mu Nzambi
Mikalu ya buloba buenu neyikale ku tshihela etshi ne ku Lebanona eu tô ne ku musulu munene dina diau Pelata, buloba buonso bua Bena Hiti tô ne ku mai manene kudi kubuelela diba
Kadi bobu nebajikije tulumbu tukese
Kanutshinyi ku mesu kuabo, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi munene udi uvuisha ditshina dikole
Bantu bakashiyabo mu musoko diambedi ne bakadi banyema ne bakadi baya kudi mukelenge wa Babulona, Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka masalayi, wakaya ne buonso buabo mu buhika
Kadi yoyo yakamulenduisha ne Bena Isalele bonso
Uvua munyeme ne bintu bionsu bivuaye mupete

Bisamba bia bena Edome, bilondeshile muaba udi tshisamba tshionsu tshisombe, bilondeshile kabidi dina dia nkambua watshi, ke Timna, Aka, Yetete, Oholibama, Ela, Pinone, Kenaze, Temane, Mibsare Magdiyele, Irame
Kadi kuaka nenukebe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusangakene n andi hanuamukeba ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Hashishe Abinê wakadi ne tshiji tshikole bua mei akamuambila Ishi boshete; yeye wakamukonka ne, Meme ndi bu mutu wa mbua wa Muena Yuda, anyi
