Musangu eu nentume milau yanyi yonso ku mutshima webe ne kudi bena mudimu bebe ne kudi bantu bebe, bua kukumanyisha ne, Kakuena nzambi mukuabo bu meme mu buloba buonso
Dutelonone Tshidimu tshia Buhikudi Hahita bidimu muanda mutekete nenulekelelangane bintu
Bena Ejipitu kuandamuna Yozefe ne: Wewe udi mumane kutupandisha
Bakabatahulula ku nshobo ku mudimu ne ku mudimu; bualu bua bakadi ne tuhita tua mu muaba wa tshijila ne tua Nzambi tua munkatshi mua bana ba Eleazâ ne tua Itamâ kabidi

Bua Yosefe yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa avudishile buloba buandi disanka, bua bintu bia mushinga mukole bia mu diulu, bua mume, ne bua mai adi muinshi mua buloba; ne bua bintu biakakuama mamuma bualu bua diba, ne bua bintu bidi belangana ku ngondo ku ngondo; bua bintu bimpe bia mu mikuna, ne bua mabue a mushinga mukole a mu mikuna ya tshiendelele; ne bua bintu bimpe bia ha buloba ne tshiuwidi tshiabu, ne bua diakalengele dia bantu badi bashikama muitu
Kadi dibaya dionsu divua ne metre atanu mu bule, ne santimetre makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu mu butshiama
Maweja Nangila kufika munda bikole
Nenuanyike milambu ha kahia, nenuyidie mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula; nenualukile dinda, nuhingane mu ntenta yenu
Kadi Nowa uvua muena diakalenga kudi Maweja Nangila
Nanku muaba awu nenuikale ne disanka dia bungi, bua bionsu binuikala bakumbaje
Bantu bakuabo ba munkatshi muabo bakadi ne lukuka be Bena Isalele bakadila kabidi, bakamba ne, Nganyi neatuhe munyinyi wa tuetu kudia
Pashishe kutualabu kabidi mukoku wa tshimpanga wa mulambu wa kuosha
Kanumutombokedi kabidi to
Yakobe upeta lumu lua difika diabu, kudikankamikaye, kusomba pa bulalu
Maweja Nangila kakunulokeshila mvula mu madimi enu to
Nu nku yeye wakalamata bakashi benji ba mudimu ba Boaza to ne kunshiki dilu kua kunowa kua orge ne blé yeye wakashikama ne mamuen andi
Shaula wakambila bantu bandi ne, Nunkebele mukashi mutempi wa lubuku, bua meme kuya kudiye kunuebesha
Bantu kukuluka ne muoyi mu kandondu ka bafue, pamue ne bintu biabu bionsu

Hanuasemena hehi ne musoko bua kuluangana n abo, diambedi nenubaleshe ditalala; ne bikalabo banukudimune mei makane, bianunzuluilabo bibi, hashishe bantu bonso badimu nebanulambule milambu, nebanukuatshile mudimu
Yeye Wakabikila tumelo binu hanshi ku butshika bua musoko hehi ne mushimi wa mai dilolo ha diba diyaya bakashi bua kusunabo mai
Yoshua wakafunda mei â mu mukanda wa mikenji ya Nzambi; wakangata dibue dinene, wakadimanyika muinshi mua mutshi wa telebinta wakadi hehi ne tshitendelelu tshia Nzambi

Muntu yonso aditekele kakasu mu bintu biandi bia nvita, ne hayeye mu tshisuku, neaumbule dina, neahingashe buloba ha mutu ha bintu biakahuyeye; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi wendakana munkatshi mua tshitudilu bua kunusungila, ne bua kufila badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu; nunku tshitudilu netshikale tshia tshijila
Kadi meme nengenze tshinyi mpindiewu
Nzambi Udi Ukengesha Bena Isalele Nom
Mu tshidimu tshitanu tshia bukelenge bua Lehabama, Shishaka, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, wakalua hua kuluisha Bena Yelushalema, bualu bua bobo bakenzela Yehowa bibi

Nakabambila ne, Kanunzuludi bibi bia ku Yelushalema anu habanda diba mulu; nuinshile bibi hatshidiku balami, bele nsahi, nusungule batentekedi ba munkatshi mua Bena Yelushalema, muntu ne muntu mu muaba wandi, muntu yonso ikale buludiludi ne nsubu wandi
Hakatshiabu, hakahita dituku diakabala ngondo, nkuasa wa Davidi wakadi mushale anu hatuhu; Shaula wakambila Yonatana, muan andi, ne, Muana wa Yishai kakuena n etu lelu ne makelela bua tshinyi
Samuele Davidi Udi Ubala Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda Kul
Muntu wakanuisha ne kahia neuvuwe bilulu biandi ne mubidi wandi ne mai, ne yeye neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Dutelonone Mabue a Mikenji Mifundibue Tshiakabidi Ek
Muana muakunyi pende kulela muana wa balume, kumuinyika dina ne: Bene Ammi
Shafana wakaubala ku mpala kua mukelenge
Ndi nnusengelela ne, Ambilai Yoaba alue kunoko bua meme kuyikila handi
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Uziya bia kumudilu ne bia kunshikidilu, Yeshaya, muprofete, muana wa Amoza, wakabifunda

Hanuasemena hehi ne musoko bua kuluangana n abo, diambedi nenubaleshe ditalala; ne bikalabo banukudimune mei makane, bianunzuluilabo bibi, hashishe bantu bonso badimu nebanulambule milambu, nebanukuatshile mudimu
Numanyishe bana benu mei â, nubambileu hanuashikama mu nsubu yenu ne hanuenda mu nshila ne hanuaya ne hanuabika
Neanyoke baluishi ba bena Izrayele bonsu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Betuyele uvua muana wa Nahore, muanabu ne Abrahame
Nunku tuakahita bana betu, bana ba Esau, bakadi bashikama mu Sei, mu nshila wa ku Alabâ ku Elata to ne ku Esione gebê
Maweja Nangila neavudije ndelanganyi yebe bungi budi muntu kayi mua kubala

Eu newikale mukenji wa tshiendelele kudibo muntu udi umiamine mai a kubalengesha n au, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, muntu udi ulenga mai a kubalengesha n au tshianza neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Yakoba wakatuangana ne Lakele mishiku wakabandisha di diandi, wakadia
Pashishe nundambule kabidi mbuji wa mpumbu, bua mulambu wa kunukobolola, bua mibi yenu ijimine
Ekesode Dibikidibua dia Mose Mose wakadi ulama mikoko ya Yetelo tatu andi muenu, mubuki wa mu Midiyana, wakaya ne mikoko ku nyima kua tshihela, wakalua ku mukuna wa Nzambi, dina diau Holeba
Di didi Nzambi uteka mukana muanyi, nenkuambiledi
Davidi wakakokesha Bena Isalele bonso; Davidi wakalumbuluila bantu bandi bonso biakane, wakabenzela malu makane
Meme nakanuambila ne, Nuakulua ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, buloba budi Yehowa mutuhe
Kushihianganyi
Yeye wakambila Yetê, muan a bute wandi, ne, Bika, ubashihe
Umue wenu neihate tshinunu tshia bantu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila nvita bu muakanuambileye
Bwa bidi bitangila bweena ditunga, mwenji wa Dîyi dikulu udi anu mwimanyina pa lungenyi luludiki lwa kabumwe ne lwa mukawu wa bweena ditunga dia Kongu
Nujile kabidi biakudia
Munyinyi awu ne mampa bidi mu tshisaka, Arone ne bana bende ba balume nebabidile mu mushiku wa mbelu a ntenta wa kusambakena
Numuke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu: nutumikile mikenji ei yonso
Ikala ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima, bualu bua wewe neutahuluke bantu aba buhianyi bua buloba bunakalaya batatu abo bua kubahabu
Mukelenge Yolama wakaya ku Yizelele bua kumuondahabo mputa yakamutaha Bena Sulia mu Lama, hakaluanganeye ne Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia
Newenzele muhika mukashi muomumue
Mulambu wa dinua tshibalu Mulambu wa dinua tshibalu badi baulambula mushindu ewu: Ke mulambu wa tshijila menemene
Kujidila kua Ban a Bute Nenujidile Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ban a bute balume ba ngombe ne ba mikoko; kanuenzeshi ban a bute ba ngombe mudimu, kanukoshi ban a bute ba mikoko miosa
Kadi kilo ne grame ivua mishale, kuenzabu nayi nkanu ya ku makunji, mitu ya makunji ne milonda ya kulamakaja nayi makunji awu
Udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufuta mabanza pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia ditunga
Nudi bantu ba tshianana, kanuyi lungenyi
Nenkumanyishe malu a wewe kubambila
Pashishe Labane kuambila Yakobe ne: Mona mushiki wa mabue undi ngunguija pankatshi petu, ne dibue edi dindi muimanyike
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Pandi ngumuka muaba ewu, nensengelele Maweja Nangila bua malaba njiji yumuke ku nzubu kuebe, kua balomboodi ba mu bukalenga buebe ne ku nzubu ya bantu bebe bonsu
Dutelonone Muaba Umuehele wa Kutendelela Yehowa Â mmalu ne mei anudi ne bualu bua kutumikila mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, munuhe bua kubuhiana matuku onso a muoyo wenu ha buloba
Kuikale kabidi nkanu ibidi ya bijengu ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi, ya kusuika ku mutu kua tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi
Bena Amona bakadisangisha ku misoko yabo yonso bua kuluanganabo
Ku nyima kua malu â Davidi wakaluangana ne Bena Peleshete, wakabahita bukole, wakanyenga Gata ne misoko yakadi ha buihi mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Bena Ejipitu bakamba kubihata, bakabalonda ku nyima kuabo mu bunene bua mai, tubalu tua Palô bionso ne makalu andi onso ne masalayi andi onso akadi enda ha tubalu
Maweja Nangila nkayende akose tshilumbu tshidi pankatshi petu nebe
Kadi, Abrahame kuela Abimeleke lusanzu bua tshiina tshia mayi tshivua bena mudimu bende bakandamana natshi
Kadi hanalala tulu mu lufu ne bankambua banyi, hashishe umuka n anyi mu Ejipitu, uye kunjika mu muaba wakabajikabo Yeye wakamba ne, Nengenze bu muwakuamba
Bitupa bia teletwale bidikadile abi bidi tshimenga, komina, seketela ne musoko wa bamfumu
Tudi tukusengelela ne: uditshipe bua kutuenzedi bibi nansha

Kadi bikala muntu ne muena mutumba n andi lukuna, umualamina, ubika, umutaha tô ne hafileye, ne bianyemeye ku umue wa misoko ei; hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebatuale bantu, nebamukuatemu, nebamufile mu bianza bia musombuedi bua kufueye
Yehowa wakangambilaku tshikondo atshi bua meme nnumanyishe mei ne mikenji, bua nuenu kubienza mu buloba bunudi nubuela bua kubuhiana
Nanku biakudia bionsu, too ne mayi a kunua, nuikale anu misumba
Bobo nebayishe bana ba Yakoba mei ebe, ne Bena Isalele mikenji yebe; nebateke musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kuebe, ne milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ha tshioshelu tshiebe
Bena Isalele bonso bakamukuma ne mabue yeye ne bintu biandi bionso kabidi, bakabiosha ne kahia
Bena Yuda bakahitshibua bukole kudi Bena Isalele, bakanyemena ku ntenta yabo
Kanulu ku mesu kuanyi ne bianza bituhu
Bantu bonsu bavua ne bua kuamona

Numanye bienu lelu ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi uya ku mpala kuenu udi bu kahia kadi kabutula bionso; yeye nembashihe, neabahoneshe ku mpala kuenu: nunku nenubihate, nembajimishe lubilu, bu muakanuambila Yehowa

Bialenga muntu tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshibi, nansha mifuba ya nyama udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya ngombe udi kayi muakane, nansha mifuba ya tshintu tshidi tshidikoka hanshi tshidi katshiyi tshiakane, ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, yeye udi muntu wa bukoya, neahile
Nuangate mabeji a mutshi wa isope
Nenku biakudia bia tshianyi bia mu madimi enu binudi nunowa abi: nansha mampa, nansha midioku mibishi, nansha miosha, kanuena mua kubidia, kanuyi banji kubindambula
Kutululabu bibombi biabu panshi lukasa
Yeye wakadi mushikame muinshi mua mabue a Debola, hankatshi ha Lama ne Betele ku mikuna ya Efelayima; Bena Isalele bakahanda kudiye bua yeye abalumbuluile
Bobu batshimone nanku, nebafue
Mitanda yabu neyinyungulukile ntenta wa kusambakena, kadi mikale mutantshi ne ntenta awu
Ndi musue kubabutula bonsu amu mpindiewu
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja mushindu wa kusanka ne budikadidi ebu
Diba didi muena Izrayele, nansha muenyi udi munkatshi mua bena Izrayele, musue kufila mulambu wa kuosha nansha mulambu mukuabu, udi ne bua kulambuila nyama awu ku mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena

Bana ba Yosefe bakamba ne, Buloba bua ku mikuna kabuena butukumbana; Bena Kanâna bonso badi bashikama mu tshibanda badi ne makalu a biamu, ne badi mu Bete sheana ne misoko ei ne badi mu tshibanda tshia Yizelele
Hakabueleye mu nsubu muandi, yeye wakangata kele, wakakuata mukashi wandi muhika, wakamukosolola bituha dikumi ne bibidi, wakabituma ku nseke yonso ya Isalele
Wewe udi munsungule, mungendeshe diakalenga bu muuvua mumane kuamba
Hashishe mukelenge wakangebesha ne, Udi ulomba tshinyi

Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi ufunda olodonase wa dijaadika nende mu nkwaasa banguvelenele ba polovensa, ne bindonda biaabu bidibu basungula mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu, bu mudibio biamba mu kanungu ka
Aba kambantu bawakahetula, anyi
Diakamue muana wa bakaji wa mukalenga kumona tshisaka mu malenga, kubikila nsongakaji muena mudimu wende, bua kumuambuilaye tshisaka atshi mu mayi
Bakenza mabue a onyx, bakabuesha mu masoso a or, bakafundahu mena a bisamba bia bana ba balume ba Isalele
Davidi wakasangisha bantu bonso, wakaya n abo ku Laba, wakaluangana ne musoko eu, wakaunyenga
Bankambua benu makumi muanda mutekete bakaya mu Ejipitu; katataka Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuvudisha bungi bua mitoto idi mu diulu

Dilondangana Mulombodi wa Ditunga Ndumbulwilu wa ku tubadi Tshidiidi a manyooka Mweena tshimwangi Didila Ndudiki Dibadika dia bantu Dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga Ditunga Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa Disungudibwa kudi bantu bonso
Yeye wakamba ne, Mmeme
Bakunfuisha mukau ne tshintu tshidi katshiyi Nzambi, bakunfikisha munda ne mpingu yabo ya hatuhu, meme nembafuishe mukau ne bantu ba hatuhu, meme nembafikishe munda ne tshisamba tshia bantu bahote
Yeye wakanumanyisha bua tshihungidi tshiandi tshiakanuambileye bua nuenu nuenze, mikenji ei dikumi mene mene; yeye wakayifunda ha mabue abidi
Arone kuandamuna ne: Mfumuanyi kumfikidi munda, bualu wewe nkayebe udi mumanye buenzayi bua bantu aba

Dina diebe dijadikibue, ditumbishibue tshiendelele, ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi Nzambi wa Isalele, Nzambi mene kudi Bena Isalele; ne nsubu wa Davidi muntu webe udi mujadikibue ku mpala kuebe tshiendelele
Tshimuangi Badi bimanyika ntenta, bamujidila Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa kumpala, wimanyike ntenta wa kusambakena, ne nzubu wa tshijila
Wakela Davidi ne bantu bonso ba mukelenge Davidi mabue; bantu bandi bonso ne bena bukitu bonso bakadi ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Mfumu wa kabukulu yônso udi ujinga kwenza mudimu, udi ukengela kufila mpala, udi ne tshia kudifila ku masungulangana, pa kumbusha dilonda dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka , kalongu bwa Dîyi dikulu edi
Shaula wakamukudimuna dî ne, Meme tshiena Muena Benyamina, tshisamba tshidi tshihita bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bukese, anyi

Bakowa mukelenge wa Ai ku mutshi tô ne ku dilolo; bakamba diba kubuela Yoshua wakamba ne, Batulule tshitalu tshiandi, bakatshiela ku mbelu kua tshibi tshia musoko, bakunguisha mushiki wa mabue ha mutu hatshi, udihu tô ne ku dituku edi
Kuenzaye nkanu inayi ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi bua kusuika ku mikolu inayi ya mushete awu, ibidi ku luseke ibidi ku lukuabu
ubala anyi Udi wakula musangu umwe ku tshidimu kumpala kwa batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpe batwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene bwa kuleeja tshitupa tshikâdi mianda ya Ditunga
Yeye wakakonka tuhita tua Palô diakadi n andi mu nsubu wa lukanu mu nsubu wa mukelenge wandi ne, Nudi nubungamina lelu nunku tshinyi
Yehowa neanutumine milau ne makenga ne mahumbisha mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu, tô ne hanuajimishibua ne hanûmushibua lubilu ha buloba; bualu bua bubi bua bienzedi bienu, bua nuakundekela
Kadi Yozefe uvua wambila tatuende malu mabi onsu a bana babu
Hakabikabo ne dinda dionso, hakakenka diba ha mai, Bena Moaba bakatangila mai mikale makunze kunzû bu mashi
Bualu bua Nzambi webe udi ukukuatshisha
Bana ba balume ba Bekê: Zemila ne Yosha ne Eliezê ne
Nakamukudimuna dî ne, Ndi Muena Amaleka
Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Shulishadai, mukelenge wa bana ba Shimeona, wakafua bintu dituku ditanu
Ba bana ba Bigewai, Utai ne Zabuda; bakadi n abo bakadi balume makumi muanda mutekete

Bintu bionso biakajidila Samuele, mumonyi wa malu a Nzambi, ne Shaula, muana wa Kishi, ne Abinê, muana wa Nê, ne Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, ne muntu yonso wakajidila bintu, biobi biakadi mu bianza bia Shelomota ne bia bana babo
Genese Abalahama ne Abimeleke Abalahama wakumuka ku muaba au, wakaya ku Sude, wakashikama hankatshi ha Kadesha ne Shû, wakashikama ku Gelâ
Bena Yuda ne bakokeshi bakuabo lukama ne makumi atanu bakadia ku mesa anyi ha mutu ha bakalua kutudi kudi ba munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu biakadi bitunyunguluke
Pikala bena Ejipitu bakumona, nebatshinke ne udi mukajanyi
Hashishe Betasheba wakatua mpala wandi hanshi, wakakukuila mukelenge, wamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi Davidi, ikale ne muoyo tshiendelele
Hanuaditshiha ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kanuhangi kushikisha mitshihu yenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nealombe bua nuyishikishe; ne bualu ebu nebuikale bubi kunudi binuahanga kuyisbikisha

Nenufile milambu ya buatshia buatshia nunku, milambu ya kuosha ha kahia tô matuku muanda mutekete, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa, nenufile milambu ei ku mutu kua milambu mudi nuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Wewe neusungule Alona ne bana bandi balume, ne bobo nebashale ne mudimu wa buakuidi, bialua muenyi ha buihi nebamushihe

Kabena mua kuhana anyi kuhikula tshintu tshia tshijila tshiakajidilabo kudi Yehowa, nansha tshintu tshia muntu anyi tshia nyama anyi tshia budimi bua buhianyi buandi bintu ebi bidi bitambe tshijila kudi Yehowa
Nzambi wakasombuela bena Shekeme kabidi bua malu mabi onso akenzabo; mulau wa Yotama, muana wa Yelubâla, wakabeleye wakalua ha mitu habo
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Nyaya Nunku bakatuma muan abo Lebeka ne muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi ne muhika wa Abalahama ne bantu bandi
Kanuena mua kudia bishi bidi ne masala, bikale kabidi ne mapangu anayi

Bantu bonso bakaya ku Gilegala: bakasungula Shaula mukelenge ku mpala kua Yehowa mu Gilegala; bakafilaku milambu idi ivuisha bantu ditalala ku mpala kua Yehowa; Shaula ne Bena Isalele bonso bakatamba kusankaku
Yakobe kujuka, kubandisha bakaji bende ne bana pa nyama ya tumelu
Kabakasesuka ku mikenji ya mukelenge kudi bakuidi ne Bena Lewi mu malu au onso nansha mu bibutshilu bia bintu
Ndayi nende bua ikale mukaji wa Izake, muana wa mfumuebe, bu mudi Maweja Nangila mulongolole
Bualu mbena tshibawu, bavua badikebela lufu
Katuena ne buhianyi buetu kudi muana wa Yishai; Bena Isalele, hinganai muntu ne muntu ku nsubu wandi wa ntenta; nuenu ba Davidi nulame nsubu yenu
Dituku dia muanda mutekete, muena nsudi awu asukule bilamba biende, akungule nsuki, miedi, makiki ne boya buonsu budi pambidi pende
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza Yehoyakima mu malu andi onso
Hezikiya wakamuha argent yonso yakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, ne bintu bionso bia mushinga mukole bia mu nsubu wa mukelenge
Munyinyi wa mukoku wa tshimpanga tshibidi wakubanjija nawu batuangaji, uulambila pa muaba wa tshijila
Panuamona malu onsu aa, nenuikale bu bantu badi ne disama dia mukupa
Hashishe Holama, mukelenge wa Gezê, wakalua bua kukuatshisha Bena Lakisha; Yoshua wakamushiha ne bantu bandi bonso, kakashiya nansha umue
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neabake mukashi au
Mose wakalelela mikenji bu buhianyi bua tshisambakena tshia Yakoba
Tshiena muhunge n enu nuenu nkayenu tshihungidi etshi ne kuditshiha eku, kadi ne muntu yonso udi muimane ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, lelu, ne muntu yonso udi kayi muimane n etu lelu

Shimishona wakabambila ne, Ndi musue kunuebesha dijimbu, ne binuamanya mua kudijingulula mu matuku muanda mutekete a bidia bia disanka, binuadisokolola, nennuhe bilulu bia lin makumi asatu ne bilulu bikuabo makumi asatu; kadi binuahanga kudijingulula, nuenu nenumpe bilulu bia lin makumi asatu ne bilulu bikuabo makumi asatu

Bualu ebu buakasankisha mutshima wa mukelenge ne bantu banene; mukelenge Wakenza bu muakadi dî dia Memukana; bualu bua yeye wakatuma mikanda ku nseke yonso, bafundile bantu bonso mu muaku wabo ne, Mulume yonso akokeshe ba mu nsubu wandi, akule mu muaku wa bantu bandi
Nuenze madiotu anu bungi bua tshibidilu
Mishindu ya kuludika ne kupeshangana buloba bwa Mbulamatadi butedibwa mu kalongu kadianjila aka idi mifidibwa kudi mêyi ne mikandu

Kanungu ka : Mu tshikondo tshia midimu yabo, Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne beena Bukalenga bunene kabeena, bôbo nkayabo anyi batuma muntu, mwa kusumba anyi kwangata mu mushindu kampanda, anyi kufutshila tshintu tshia Mbulamatadi, tshia polovensa anyi tshia bitupa bidikadile bia teletwale to
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Kena musue kupesha muanabu muana bua kusangukaye
Nunku numueneke ku mesu kua Yehowa ku bisamba bienu ne ku binunu bienu
Samuele wakajuka ku Gilegala, wakaya ku Gibea wa mu buloba bua Benyamina
Kadi ndi munupeshebu bua benze midimu idi itangila ntenta wa kusambakena

Bikala mulume ne bakashi babidi, udi musue umue, udi ukina mukuabo, ne bubidi buabo ne mukashi wakadiye musue ne mukuabo wakadiye ukina, hakamulelela bana; ne bikala mukashi wakadiye ukina mumulelele muan a bute wandi; hashishe mu dituku didiye uhianyisha bana bandi balume bintu bidiye n abi, yeye kena mua kuteka muana wa mukashi wakadiye musue ku mpala kua muan a bute wandi wa mukashi wakadiye ukina
Muena Lewi wakadi ne disanka bua kushikameye ne muntu eu; nsongalume eu wakadi kudiye bu umue wa bana bandi balume
Nuenu kanuena mua kukukuila mvidie wa tshisamba tshikuabu to
Kubala muan abo ne mukashi ebe, bua kumutatshisha hatshidiye ne muoyo ne kumuvula bilulu
Bimenga abi bavua babikolesha ne bimana, babiela mu mpangu mikanga ne bibi bia biamu

Bakenza nunku: bakangata ngombe ibidi yakadi ne mabele, bakayisuika ku dikalu, bakinshidila bana bai mu nsubu wai; bakateka mushete wa Yehowa ha dikalu, ne mushete mukuabo wakadi ne bifuanyikishi bia or bia mpuku ne bia masungu
Ku tusulu tua mai tua Lubena bakahangidisha meji manene mu mitshima yabo
Muena mudimu awu kuangata tumelu dikumi tua mfumuende ne bionsu bivuaye mumone ne mbilenga
Kadi ndondelayi munudi balote
Yuda, bana benu nebakutumbishe, tshianza tshiebe netshifiekele mu nshingu ya bantu badi n ebe lukuna, bana ba tatu ebe nebakukukuile
Samuele wakabikila bantu bua kudisangishabo kudi Yehowa ku Misepa
Bualu mbantu banyi, bamvua mupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Mutuangaji abiele mulu, abinyukule, abioshile bionsu Maweja Nangila pa tshilambuilu, bualu mmulambu wa kuosha, udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Kanulombi mukuenu bintu bia kasombela ka bintu biwakamusombesha: kasombela ka argent ne ka bia kudia ne ka bintu bionso biwakamusombesha
Yozefe kusumbisha bena Ejipitu ne bena Kenaane biakudia, wela makuta onsu mu mushete wa mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Yeye Wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, bu muakenza Amasaya tatu andi
Njiji yonsu kumuka kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, kua balombodi ba mu bukalenga buende ne kua bantu bende bonsu
Nuenu nulonde Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numutshine, nutumikile mikenji yandi, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nulamate kudiye
Bakuidi bakalua ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa mu muaba wau wa tshijila wa mu nsubu, ku muaba mutambe wa tshijila muinshi mua mahuahua a bakeluba
Sadoka muakuidi wakangata lusengu lua manyi lua mu Ntenta, wakela manyi ha mutu ha Solomo
Nakangata mabue au abidi akadi mu bianza bianyi, nakashiha ku mesu kuenu

Hashikameye ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge, yeye neadifundile mukanda wa mikenji idi mifunda mu mukanda au udi mu bianza bia bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi; yeye neashale ne mukanda eu, neaubale matuku andi onso; nunku yeye neamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, ne mua kutumikila mei onso ne mikenji yonso bidi bifundamu, bua kubienza; nunku mutshima wandi kaudibandishi ku mutu kua bana babo, nunku yeye kasesuki mu nshila wa mikenji nansha ku tshianza tshia balume nansha ku tshianza tshia bakashi; nunku nebavudishe matuku a bukelenge buandi, ne a bana bandi mu Isalele
Diba adi, mwuluke Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wenu, uvua munupatule mu Ejipitu mumwuamu bupika
Mpasu neyuwule mu nzubu muebe tente, mu nzubu ya balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe too ne mu nzubu ya bena Ejipitu bakuabu bonsu
Hakafikabo ku Yadene, bakataha mitshi
Bûdi n abu mbua kumuambila ne, Yehowa udi ukuebesha ne, Wewe wakumushiha bua kubunyenga ku bukole, anyi

Nomba Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bua Kanâna ebu mbuloba bua buhianyi buenu, buloba bua Kanâna mene ku mikalu yabo yonso mukalu wenu wa ku luseke lua sude newikale ku tshihela tshia Sina, ne ku mukalu wa Edome to ne kuinshi kua Dishiba dia Luehu ku luseke lua ku esete, mukalu wenu neunyunguluke mukuna wa Akalabima ku luseke lua ku sude, neutuangane ne tshihela tshia Sina tô ne ku Kadeshe bânea, tô ne ku Hasâ adâ, to ne ku Asemona, mukalu wenu neunyunguluke ku Asemona tô ne ku kasulu ka Ejipitu tô ne ku mai manene
Bintu bia kudia kabiakadi mu buloba, bualu bua tshiole tshiakatamba bukole, nunku bantu bonso ba mu Ejipitu ne ba mu buloba bua Kanana bakamba kufua ne nzala
Bakelenge aba batanu bakanyema, bakasokoma mu lubuebue lua ku Makeda
Nuenu nenutendelele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, yeye neayudishe disanka ku bidia bienu ne ku mai enu, nennumushile disama munkatshi muenu
Biasanganabo mulume mulale ne mukashi wa muntu mukuabo, nebashihe bubidi buabo, ne mulume wakadi ulala ne mukashi eu ne mukashi kabidi: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi mua Isalele
Nanku, bintu bia mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu ne bia mulambu wa dinua tshibalu, nebabiangate kudi mutuangaji, bualu mbintu bia tshijila menemene
Bena Lewi bakatuala mushete wa Nzambi ha maha abo ne mitshi, bu muakamba Mose bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa
Mesa a Bidia Bilesha Ek
Dutelonone Tshidimu tshia Buhikudi Hahita bidimu muanda mutekete nenulekelelangane bintu
Moshe kubuela munda mua divuba, kubanda kabidi pa mukuna, kushalaku matuku makumi anayi a munya ne a butuku

Bikala muntu kayi musue kuangata mukashi wa muan abo, hashishe mukashi wa muan abo mulume neaye ku tshibi tshia musoko kudi bakulu, neambe ne, Muan abo ne mulume wanyi udi uhidia kulelela muan abo wakafua bana mu Isalele, yeye kena mungangate bu mukashi wandi
Bavua balama kabidi mionji yonsu ya kuasa nayi ntenta
Mena a misoko ei akadi: Besê mu tshihela, mu muaba wa mpata, wa mu Bena Lubena; ne Lamota mu Gilada wa Bena Gada; ne Golana mu Bashana wa Bena Manashe
dipangadika dia bingenyingenyi, ndongamu ne diumvwangana bwa kwambulwishangana mu mianda ya bubanji, ya dikolesha dia ngenyi, ya mamanya ne ya majinga a bantu pankatshi pa matunga;
Kanungu ka Minisitila udi mfumu wa tshibambalu tshienda
Yoshua Buhianyi buibidi buakadi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Shimeona ku meku abo, buhianyi buabo buakadi munkatshi mua buhianyi bua Bena Yuda
Yehowa wakakuela manyi ha mutu, wakasungula mukelenge wa Isalele; Yehowa wakantuma ku luendu, wakamba ne, Ya biebe, ushihe bantu habi bonso ba Bena Amaleka, uluangane n abo nvita tô ne hahatukabo
Bana ba balume ba Kenaza; Oteniele ne Selaya
Yehowa mene uyaya ku mpala kuebe, yeye neikale hebe, kena ukuhanga, kena ukulekela: kutshinyi, kuzakadi
lupetu lwa mbulamatadi mu polovensa;
Abimeleke wakamuihata, yeye wakanyema ku mpala kuandi, ne ba bungi bakahona hanshi batahike mputa, tô ne ku mbelu kua tshibi tshia musoko
Ke Moshe kubapesha ditunga edi bua basemu
Nuenu nuakumvua diyi diende mu diulu, unulongesha bua kumutumikila
Bantu ba mu Nebo mukuabo makumi atanu ne babidi
Nunku wakaya n abo
Labane kuya lukasa bua kusambakena ne muntu uvua ku tshiina tshia mayi
Kumonaye kabidi ne: Yakobe mmuitabe diyi dia tatuende ne mamuende, muye ku Mezopotamiya
Gamaliele muana mulume wa Pedasu neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Manashe
Bintu bia mu Nsubu wa Tshitendelelu Ek
Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi, mu dienza dia dîyi, mwa kukosa, dîba diônso, mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu
Bukula abu kabuakashika ne tuanyi tua mu kasu katuakakeha bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa diakambeye mukana mua Eliya
Hashishe Shaula wakambila muambudi wa ngabu wandi ne, Hatula muele wa nvita webe, untahe, unsompole; bua bantu aba badi kabayi batengula kabalu ha buihi n anyi bua kutekabo
Nzambi wakambila Isalele mu bikena kumona mu butuku ne, Yakoba, Yakoba Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Au mmena a balume bakatuma Mose bua kutentekelabo buloba Mose wakidika Hoshea, muana mulume wa Nuna ne, Yoshua

Yehowa wakadi ne Solomo tshiji, bualu bua mutshima wandi wakumuka kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nguakamueneka kudiye misangu ibidi, nguakamuambila bualu ebu mene mene bua yeye kalondi nzambi mikuabo; kadi yeye kakenza muakamba Yehowa
Nganyi wakubangila mukashi kayi muanze kumubaka
Kadi nuenu kubenga, ditambisha kunuenza
Bakunfuisha mukau ne tshintu tshidi katshiyi Nzambi, bakunfikisha munda ne mpingu yabo ya hatuhu, meme nembafuishe mukau ne bantu ba hatuhu, meme nembafikishe munda ne tshisamba tshia bantu bahote
Shaula wakamba ne, Nzambi wakamufila mu tshianza tshianyi; bualu bua yeye wakabuela mu musoko udi ne bibi bidi bibaka bikole
Mona, yeye udi musokome mu lubuebue anyi mu muaba mukuabo; nunku hashihabo bantu bakuabo diambedi, yonso udi unvua lumu elu neambe ne, Kushiha kudi munkatshi mua bantu badi balonda Abashaloma
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Sheta Adama wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Dikenga disambombu: maputa Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Nuboye butu bua muiku mu bianza
Nunku Davidi wakaya mu nshila wandi, ne Shaula wakahingana ku muaba wandi

Gideona wakambila Nzambi ne, Tshiji tshiebe katshikadi kundi, nengakule anu musangu eu umue; ndi nkusengelela ne meme ntete musangu mukuabo ne miosa ei; witabusha ne miosa nkayai ikale miume, ne mume wikale ha buloba buonso
Umiamine kabidi ne bana bende ba balume ne ku bilamba biabu bionsu, nebikale bia tshijila
Kabidi nushale anu ku nzubu yenu too ne muatshia butuku

Amenona wakatamba kunyingalasha mutshima tô ne bakalueye bu musami, bualu bua muan abo wa bakashi, Tamâ; bualu bua yeye wakatshidi kamama ne bualu buakadi bukole kudi Amenona bua kumuenzeleye bualu bubi
Ngunwua nanku, meme kumukonka ne: Kadi pikala nsongakaji awu mubenge bua tuetu kuya nende, ndi mua kuenza tshinyi
Yeye wakuvuwa mai ku mpala kuandi, wakahingana kudibo, wakadikanda, wakamba ne, Lua ne bidia
Kadi pikalabu basue mvita, babenge bua nuenu kubuela mu tshimenga tshiabu, nuele tshimenga munkatshi ne tshiluilu
Wakamukudimuna ne, Mu nshila wa mu tshihela tshia Edome
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu
Mulami Wakenza bu muakamba Yosefe, wakalua n abo mu nsubu wa Yosefe
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Bamfumu kabena mua kufika bonsu musangu umue to
Mwâna yônso udi ne tshia kubweela mu tulasa tupwekela ne kabidi kabeena mwa kufutshila tulasa etu mu bilongelu bia mbulamatadi to

Bule bua muaba eu buakadi coudées makumi abidi, butshiama buau buakadi coudées makumi abidi, ne bule buau bua mulu buakadi coudées makumi abidi: wakateka tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso; wakateka mabaya a cèdre ha nyima ha tshioshelu kabidi
Davidi wakambila Abishai ne, Kumushihi nansha; udi mua kulenga muntu wakela Yehowa manyi ha mutu ne kubinga nganyi
Panuikala numuitaba, nukumbaja meyi ne mikenji bindi nnuambila lelu ebi, nuenza bidi bimulengelela, nenupete diakalenga kudiye, nupangane
Nakakuha meji ne lungenyi; nenkuhe bubanji ne biuma ne butumbi biakadi bakelenge bonso ku mpala kuebe kabayi n abi; kakuena mukuabo udi nkulonda ku nyima neikale n abi kabidi
Bana ba Dana, Hushima
Isaka wakambila Yakoba ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Lua ha buihi, nenkulengele tshianza tshianyi, muan anyi, nemmanye ne, Wewe udi muan anyi Esau bulelela
Nententakaje bitalu bienu pa mpingu yenu imvua mutshibule
Kadi, ubaleje muaba udibu mua kuimanyina kuinshi kua mukuna
Hashishe nakatamba kutshina bikole

Dutelonone Biabika muprofete anyi mulotshi wa bilota munkatshi muenu, udi unulesha tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema; ne hashikisheye tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema bua kunubikila ne, Tuye, tulonde nzambi mikuabo mudi kanuyi bamanye, tuyenzele mudimu; kanunvu mei a muprofete au, anyi mulotshi au wa bilota; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munutete, bua kumanya ne, Nudi basue Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso
Alambule Maweja Nangila mbuji wa dishina, kayi ne bulema
Balake kumuebeja tshivua Maweja Nangila mumumanyishe
Abigayila wakajuka lubilu, wakabanda ha nyima ha nyama wa mpunda, ne bansongakashi bandi batanu bakamulonda; yeye wakalonda bantu ba Davidi, wakalua mukashi wandi

Dutelonone Mukenji Mutambe Bunene Ei mmikenji ne â mmei ne â mmalu wakangambila Yehowa bua kunumanyisha, bua nuenu nubienze mu buloba bunudi nuhiana: bua nuenu nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mei andi onso ne mikenji yandi, binakanuambila, ne wewe ne muan ebe mulume, ne muana wa muan ebe mulume, matuku onso a muoyo wenu; bua wewe uvudishe matuku ebe

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba bidi ku mpala kuenu, hanuabihata, hanuahiana buloba buabo, nudimuke, kanukuatshibu kudi mateyi abo bua kubalonda, habajimishabo ku mesu kuenu; kanukonkanganyi bua nzambi yabo ne
Yeye wakakuata bakulu ba mu musoko ne meba a mu tshihela ne mingonge, yeye wakatuisha n abo Bena Sukota
Bakashiha difuka dia Bena Amaleka bakahanduka diambedi, badi bashikamaku tô ne ku dituku edi
Tô ne ku dituku edi Bakafuila ba mu nsubu wa Shaula, tatu ebe, ne bana benu ne balunda bandi luse, tshiakakufila wewe mu bianza bia Davidi; kadi wewe wakunkanda bualu bubi ne mukashi eu lelu

Nunku mukelenge wakakeba lungenyi, wakatula tuana tua ngombe tua or tubidi; wakambila bantu ne, Budi butamba bukole bua nuenu kuya ku Yelushalema; tangilai nzambi yenu, Bena Isalele, yakanuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Tshibangidilu Pashishe Yozefe kuya kuambila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne: Tatu ne bana betu mbafike ne bimuna biabu, kabidi ne bintu biabu bionsu
Bana ba balume bakuabo ba bakuidi bakadi balongolodi ba bintu bia muhuya muimpe
Omeli wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu Samalea; Ahaba, muan andi mulume, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Efa, mukashi muhika mubakibue kudi Kaleba, wakamulelela Halana ne Mosa ne Gazeza; Halana wakalela Gazeza
Bana ba Yakobe kuenza bionsu abi
Moshe ne Arone kuenza bionsu abi
Kumonaye kabidi Maweja Nangila muimane kumpala kuende, umuambila ne: Yakobe, ndi Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa kakuebe Abrahame, kabidi Mvidi Mukulu wa Izake
Kadi tshiakuitabusha mei tô ne hanakulua bua kudimuenena ku mesu: hakangambila anu tshituha tshia mei; lungenyi luebe ne bubanji buebe bidi bihita lumu lunakunvua bunene
Yalede wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne makumi asambombo ne bibidi, wakalela Hanoka
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Mai manene enze tshiona, ne bionso bidimu bibile; budimi bua mu mpata busanke, ne bionso bidimu bisanke kabidi
Arone kusemena pabuipi ne tshilambuilu, kukosa muana wa ngombe muminu bua kudikobolola
Eliya wakasemena ha buihi ne bantu bonso, wakabakonka ne, Nudi nuenda nuzobela hankatshi ha nseke ibidi musangu bule munyi
Balami ba mikoku kuandamuna ne: Katuena mua kunuisha bimuna mayi mpindiewu to, anu patuabisangisha bionsu muaba umue
Nunku Shaula wakahatula muele wa nvita wandi, wakadishindahu
Kuenzabu makopa makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilamba tshia ndekelu tshia ku bilamba bitanu

Bikala muntu kayi musue kuangata mukashi wa muan abo, hashishe mukashi wa muan abo mulume neaye ku tshibi tshia musoko kudi bakulu, neambe ne, Muan abo ne mulume wanyi udi uhidia kulelela muan abo wakafua bana mu Isalele, yeye kena mungangate bu mukashi wandi
Balaame ne Balake kuya ku Kiriyate Ushote
Nuenu bena nvita bonso nenunyunguluke musoko musangu umue
Kadi mukelenge Solomo neavudishibue disanka, ne nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Davidi neajadikibue ku mesu kua Yehowa tshiendelele
Kanungu ka Dikumbajangana,bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi babuleeja kudi mêyi malongolodi
Â mmalu akayishabo Solomo mua kuibakeye nsubu wa Yehowa
Nuambile bantu lumu lua luhandu luandi ku dituku ku dituku
Yeye wakamba ne, Ubuele, wewe udi musankishibue kudi Yehowa, udi muimane ha bule bualu kai
Kadi Yozefe kunyema lubilu, kupatuka pa mbelu, kumushiya ne muntumpu mu bianza
Kanulu ne tshintu tshidi tshitonda Yehowa mu nsubu muenu bua kufuanangana n atshi: nuhidie tshintu atshi, nuikale n atshi lukuna; atshi ntshintu tshibihe tshia tshijila
Gideona wakabika, wakashiha Zêba ne Salemuna; yeye kabidi wakangata bilenga biakadi mu nshingu ya tumelo tuabo
Wakunuenzela nunku bua kunumanyisha ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi; kakuena Nzambi mukuabo
Yehowa wakela dî kudi Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe ne mulangala webe ha mutu ha misulu ne ha mutu ha tusulu ne mashiba bualu bua kutuma biula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Mitshi ai neyikale mu nkanu ya mushete, kayumuki nansha
Ukebe bimpe mu bintu bianyi bionsu, bena diku diebe bonsu batangile
Lulengu elu kaluena lusokoma kundi, luteka mu tshibutshilu tshianyi, anyi
Yoktana kulela bankambua ba bena Almodade, bena Shelefe, bena Asharmavete, Yera, Adorame, Uzale, Dikla, Obale, Abimayele, Saba, Ofire, Avila ne Yobabe
Bana balume ba Esau: Elifaza ne Luele ne Yeusha ne Yalama, ne Kola
Kuladi ne mulume bu mudibo balala ne mukashi, bualu ebu budi bubi
Kusongabu mabue abidi a onikse, a kubueja mu masosu a tshiamu tshia mpawungi

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada bakadi ne bimuna bia bungi be, hakatangilabo ne buloba bua Yazê ne buloba bua Gilada buakadi muaba muimpe wa bimuna, Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena bakalua kudi Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi ne kudi bakelenge ba tshisumbu, bakamba ne, Atalota ne Dibona ne Yazê ne Nimela ne Heshebona ne Eleale ne Sebama ne Nebo ne Beone, buloba buakashihabo kudi Yehowa ku mpala kua tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, mbuloba bua bimuna, ne bantu benu badi ne bimuna
Bua bualu ebu mbuakalotela Palo bilota bibidi, bualu ebu nebujadikibue kudi Nzambi, Nzambi neabushikishe tshituha tshibi
Nuyilongeshe bana benu, nuyitele panudi basomba mu nzubu yenu, nansha bendakana mu misesu, panudi nulala, nansha nubika
Shimishona wakaya, wakakuata mibuabua nkama isatu, wakangata bimunyi, wakasuikakana mikila, wakasuika tshimunyi hankatshi ha mikila ibidi ibidi

Nunku wewe wambile bantu bebe mukenji bua bobo bankosele mitshi ya cèdre ya mu Lebanona; bantu banyi nebakuatshile bantu bebe, nenfile bantu bebe difutu diudi wamba, bualu bua wewe udi mumanye ne, Kakuena bantu munkatshi muetu badi bamanye mua kukosa mitshi bu Bena Sidona

Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, ikale n etu bu muakikaleye ne bankambua betu; kumuki munkatshi muetu, katulekedi; bua yeye akudimushe mitshima yetu kudiye bua tuetu tuende mu nshila yandi yonso, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne mikandu yandi biakambileye bankambua betu
Tangila, matuku akadi ha kulua andi nkukosa diboko diebe ne maboko a badi mu nsubu wa tatu webe, nansha muntu mununu washala mu nsubu webe
Hakaluabo n andi, yeye wakatumina tatu andi muenu dî ne, Nakimita difu kudi muena bintu ebi, ujingulule nfumu wa bintu ebi, kakanu ka ku munu, ne mionshi ya ku maboko ne tshibangu

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba bidi ku mpala kuenu, hanuabihata, hanuahiana buloba buabo, nudimuke, kanukuatshibu kudi mateyi abo bua kubalonda, habajimishabo ku mesu kuenu; kanukonkanganyi bua nzambi yabo ne
Nuenze mudimu matuku asambombu, kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete dikale dituku dia Dikisha, dia tshijila
Maweja Nangila udi ne bukole bu lubuebue
Wewe wambile Bena Isalele ne, Muntu yonso udi uhenda Nzambi wandi nendituadile bubi buandi
Bu muakadi Yehowa ne disanka bua kunuenzela bimpe ne bua kunukumbasha ba bungi, mbu mudiye mua kuikala ne disanka bua kunujimisha ne bua kunushiha; nebanûmushe mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana
Utangile hanshi mu muaba webe wa tshijila mu diulu, uvudishile bantu bebe ba Isalele disanka, ne buloba buwakutuha, bu muwakalaya bankambua betu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi

Bana babo ba mu meku abo, hakabalabo kulondolola kuabo, bakadi tulala Yiele ne Zekâya, ne Bêla, muana wa balume wa Azaza, muana wa balume wa Sheme, muana wa balume wa Yoele, wakashikama mu Aloe tô ne ku Nebo ne Bâla meona; ne ku esete bakamuangalaka tô ne ku tshibuelelu tshia tshihela ku musulu wa Pelata, bualu bua bimuna biabo biakavulangana mu buloba bua Gilada
Nanku, lupangu luikale ne metre makumi atanu mu bule ne metre makumi abidi ne itanu mu butshiama
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Ashe, Setû, muana mulume wa Mikaele
Utangile hanshi mu muaba webe wa tshijila mu diulu, uvudishile bantu bebe ba Isalele disanka, ne buloba buwakutuha, bu muwakalaya bankambua betu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Nebatekepu kabidi mampa a tshijila anudi ne bua kundambuilapu kashidi
Mayi avua anu enda akepela pa buloba too matuku lukama ne makumi atanu
Palô wakambila bantu bandi ne, Tudi mua kumona muntu mukuabo udi ne mutshima wa Nzambi nunku kudi kunyi
Ahaza, mukelenge eu mene, wakatamba kuenzela Yehowa bibi mu matuku a ntatu yandi
Mukelenge wakashiya bakashi bahika babakibue dikumi bua kulamabo nsubu

Mukalenga wa ditunga udi ukengesha bena Izrayele ne midimu mivule Anu dituku adi, Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kukandika bena Ejipitu ne bena Izrayele, bavua ne kulombola mudimu wa bantu ne: Kanuena mua kukebela kabidi bena Izrayele bisosa bia kuenza nabi madiotu, bu munuvua nubapesha kuonsu eku to
Pashishe kukangulaye bibuta biende, kupatulaye bilengejelu bia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, bia mpawungi, kabidi ne bilamba
Yeye wakamba ne, Bayiteke bisumbu bibidi ku tshibi tshia ku musoko tô ne dinda
Kadi tuakadiangatshila bimuna ne bintu bionso bia mu misoko

Ba bungi bakalua ne kuha kudi Yehowa ku Yelushalema, ne bintu bia mushinga mukole kudi Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda; nunku yeye wakadi utumbishibua ku mesu kua bantu ba mu bisamba bionso kubangila ku dituku adi
Kadi mulume kakitabusha bua kulala butuku abu; wakabika, wakaya, wakafika ku Yebuse udi Yelushalema mene ne mukashi wandi ne mpunda ibidi yakadi ne biseba ha nyima hai
Aba mbana balume ba Kaleba, Bana ba balume ba Hû, muan a bute wa Efelata: Shobala, tatu wa Kîyata yalima; Salama, tatu wa Beteleheme, Halefe, tatu wa Bete gadê

Kanungu ka Dipangadika dia kulondeshisha ne dia kufunda Mulombodi wa ditunga ne Minisitila kavulambedi badi badieelela tukanda kudi tshitupa tshinene tshia bia bisatu bibidi bia beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi benza Tshisangilu tshinene bilondeshila dikasa dia kulonda dilongolola kudi dîyi diludiki dia mianda ya munda mwaatshi

Kanungu ka Bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu, Mulombodi wa ditunga udi weelangana mvita ku dipangadika dia Tshipangu tshia baminisitila panyima pa dianyisha dia Kapangu ka ku mutu kwa bilwilu ne dianyisha dia bibambalu biônso bibidi
Nuvuluke ne: nuvua bapika mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Eyowa, patuikala bakumbaje bimpe mikenji yonsu ivua Maweja Nangila mutuambile, netuenze anu bidiye musue
Solomo Udi Ujadika Bukelenge Buandi Hashishe Adoniya, muana wa Hagita, wakalua kudi Betasheba, mamu wa Solomo
Wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko binasangana bantu bakane makumi anai ne batanu
Dielulula Tshimuna tshionsu tshidi ne bulema pambidi: ngombe, mukoku, nansha mbuji, kanuena mua kutshilambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu to
Tshiyole tshia nzala atshi kutampakana mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Bikaleye kayi ne muana wa bakashi, yeye neaheshe bana babo buhianyi buandi
Bobo nebanuteke tshikokedi tshia tshiamu ha nshingu yenu tô ne hanuajimishibua kudibo
Muntu yonso utu wenza malu au udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa; bualu bua malu au mabi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Wihata bantu ku mesu kuenu
Tshimuna tshia bena Izrayele katshiakufua nansha tshimue
Yonatana wakatshihisha Davidi tshiakabidi bualu bua dinanga diakadiye n adi kudiye; bualu bua yeye wakamunanga bu muakanangeye mutshima wandi mene
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi mwa kuselangana ne muntu ônso udiye musungula; wa bulume anyi bukaji bushilangana ne bwende,ne udi mwa kwaasa dîku
Ei yakadi milongo ya balami ba bibi, ba bana balume ba Bena Kola ne ba Melali

Tshiakamusungula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bua kuikaleye muakuidi wanyi ne bua kufueye milambu ku tshioshelu tshianyi ne bua kuosheye musenga wa manananshi ne bua kulaleye efoda ku mpala kuanyi, anyi
Nuvuluke ne: nuvua benyi mu ditunga dia Ejipitu

Hashishe Yoaba wakatuma di, wakamanyisha Davidi malu onso a nvita; yeye wakambila messager bikole ne, Hawashikisha kuambila mukelenge malu onso a nvita, ne biakuata mukelenge tshiji, biakonkeye ne, Bualu kai nuakasemena ha buihi ne musoko bua kuluangana
Ke mikenji yanyi inudi ne bua kulama: Bantu balume bonsu ba ku ndelanganyi yebe, nubateke panshi
Nuenze muenu muonsu bua kulumbuluisha bantu bimpe
Bualu yeye ke udi ulombola bimpe bantu banyi bonsu bena Izrayele

Kadi muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kujadikamu dina diandi: nenukebe muaba kudiye mushikame, nenudisangisheku; nenulueku ne milambu yenu ya kuosha, ne nyama mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu, ne bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu
Yeye wakabikila bayandi, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Untumine muena mudimu ne nyama wa mpunda bua meme kulonda muntu wa Nzambi, mpingane kabidi
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua tumuma bua mukuenu, nudi mua kudia tumuma kukuta tente, kadi kanuangatshi tumuma mu tshisaka
Padi dia dia lumungulu anyi dia tshimungu mukaji dikale kadiyi dia mudimu anyi dikale dia lumingu, midimu idi itwadija mu dituku dia mudimu didi dilonda
Nanku mikiya yende neijike ku dilolu
Alauna wakambila mukelenge kabidi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi webe, akuitabushe

Lewitiki Bidimu bia Kuikisha ne Tshidimu tshia Buhikudi Yehowa wakambila Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Hanuabuela mu buloba bundi nnuha, nenushiye buloba bua kubandabu kudi Yehowa
Hanakabanda ku mukuna bua kuangata mabue akadi ne mei a tshihungidi tshia Yehowa mafundahu, nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai munya ne butuku; tshiakadia bidia, tshiakanua mai
Tshiyole tshia nzala katshiyi tshianji kuenzeka, Yozefe kulela bana ba balume babidi ne mukajende Asnate, muana wa Potifera, mutuangaji wa mu tshimenga tshia One
Bumuka mu tshipela tshia Sine, kuyabu ku Dofka
Bisumbu bia mikoku ne bia mbuji bisatu bivua muaba awu, bikishe

Butumbi buandi budi bu muan a bute wa ngombe, nsengu yandi idi bu nsengu ya ngombe wa mu mpata; yeye neatue bantu bonso ba ha buloba nsengu yandi, ne ba binunu makumi bia bantu ba mu Efelayima ne binunu bia bantu ba mu Manashe
Kanutshinyi ku mesu kuabo, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munkatshi muenu, udi Nzambi munene udi uvuisha ditshina dikole
Bantu banene bakaha bantu ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bintu biakasuabo mu mitshima yabo
Neikale mamuende wa bisamba bia bungi

Dibutuka dia Samalea Mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukelenge bua Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne mu tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete tshia bukelenge bua Hoshea, muana wa Ela, mukelenge wa Isalele, Shalamanesê, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakalua bua kuluangana ne Bena Samalea; wakabatshintshimika
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Ubambile ne, Kanuyi, kanuluanganyi; bualu bua meme tshiena munkatshi muenu; kanuhonyi ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Patuafiki muaba ewu, Sihone, mukalenga wa tshimenga tshia Eshebone, ne Oge, mukalenga wa ditunga dia Bashane, kutubundabu
Wenza nkanu mikuabu ibidi ya bijengu ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi, uyiteke kuinshi kua mampinda adi kumpala kua tshilamba tshia efode
Meme kushala ku mukuna matuku makumi anayi a munya ne butuku, bu musangu mukuabu
Kuendi masandi
Nenshale bu muntu uvua kayi mulele anyi
Pawabandila ditunga adi, neufue, mufuile mukuluebe Arone, ulonda bankambua bebe
Bana ba balume ba Yuda Ele ne Onana ne Shela, ne Pelese ne Zela kadi Ele ne Onana bakafuila mu buloba bua Kanana Bana ba balume ba Pelese, Helelona ne Hamula
Wakatuangana mishiku ne bana babo bonso, wakadidila ku nshingu yabo, hashishe bana babo bakayikila n andi
Kanulambi muana wa mukoko mu mabele a mamu wandi
Samuele wakambila Shaula ne, Wewe wakenza buhote: wewe kuakanemeka mukenji wa Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuambileye; bu wewe muenze nunku, Yehowa wakadi kujadika bukelenge buebe mu Isalele tshiendelele
Sedekiya, muana wa Kenana, wakadienzela nsengu ya biamu, wakamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe neusekile n ai Bena Sulia tô ne hajiminabo

Hakunyua Davidi lumu elu, yeye wakamba ne, Meme ne bantu bonso ba mu bukelenge buanyi tuakubingishibua ku mesu a Yehowa tshiendelele bua mashi a Abinê, muana wa Nê: mashi andi ikale ha mutu ha Yoaba ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi; ne ba mu nsubu wa Yoaba bikale ne munda mashi, bikale bena nsudi anyi bendedi ba ku mitshi batebuke, bafue ku miele ya nvita, kabikadi ne bia kudia
Nunku mukelenge wakela mukenji, bakalongolola mushete; bakauteka ha mbelu ku tshibi tshia ku nsubu wa Yehowa
Wakuvuwa bintu bia munda ne bioku, wakabisha ha tshioshelu ha mutu ha mulambu wa kuosha
Oteniele, muana wa Kenasa, muan abo ne Kaleba, wakaunyenga: yeye wakamuha Akasa, muan andi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi

Mose wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso, wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakatangila malu onso akenzela Yehowa Palo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku mesu kuenu, ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buonso; mateta makole anuakatangila ne mesu, ne bimanyinu ne malu a kukema
Meme nakumbula mena, nakunua mai a bende, nengumishe misulu ya Ejipitu munda mua makasa anyi
Nsongalume awu kuluangana ne muena Izrayele mukuabu
Kuasabu mitanda yabu mu mpata ya Mowabe, pabuipi ne musulu wa Yardene, pankatshi pa Bete Yeshimote ne Abele Shitime
Wewe newenze manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu ne bintu ebi, manyi adi atua dihembu bu mudibo benza kudi benyi ba manananshi, manyi au neikale manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu
Nunku Solomo wakatula bintu ebi bia bungi bionso; kabakamanya mua kubala bujitu bua tshiamu tshia mitaku
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi bialueye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neajidile nsubu wandi
Pikala muntu wa kunudi muambi, meme Maweja Nangila nendimanyishe kudiye, mmuleje malu mu lungenyi, nansha mu tshilota
Wakatshiawila tatu wandi ne bana babo, tatu wandi wakamukuhulula ku di diandi ne, Etshi ntshilota kai tshiwakulota
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi, anyi yeye neatekeshe mitshima ya bantu bakuabo
Padi mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi bioshe muiku, bilambe mu luesu, nansha bikange pa dilata, bintu ebi nebishale bia mutuangaji uvua mulambule mulambu awu
Butuku abu, meme Maweja Nangila nempitshile mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Nzambi wakamba kabidi ne, Ambila Bena Isalele ne, NDI MUNDI wakuntuma
Ke munudi mua kujikija buenzayi bua mushindu ewu munkatshi mua bena Izrayele nanku
Shaula udi munkatshi mua baprofete, anyi
Bena Bete shemeshe bakakonkangana ne, Nganyi udi mumanye mua kuimana ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wa tshijila
Bobo bakenzela Nzambi wa batatu abo bibi, bakalonda malu a masandi ne nzambi ya bantu ba mu buloba abu bakashihibua kudi Nzambi ku mpala kuabo
Yakobe kumuambila ne: Uditshipe bua meme kujadika ne: newenze
Maweja Nangila, upeshe bena Levi bukole, ubele lupemba mu midimu yabu yonsu
Wakaya, wakatangila, wakamba ne, Kakuena tshintu

Kanukengeshi muntu wakabuela mu mudimu wa difutu, udi muhele ne udi kayi ne bintu, nansha umue wa bana benu nansha muenyi udi ushikama mu buloba buenu ne mu misoko yenu; nubafute difutu diabo buatshia buatshia diambedi diba kadiyi dianze kubuela; bualu bua bobo badi bahele ne badi bakuma mitshima yabo ku difutu; bobo kabadidi kudi Yehowa bualu buenu, ne bualu ebu kabuikadi bubi kunudi

Bantu ba Tshijila ba Yehowa Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusungula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bidi hanshi ha buloba, bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Bantu bakadinyangisha kudiye, kabena bu bana bandi, bakahambuka, malu abo akanyanguka, akalua manyongoboka
Kanungu ka Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshianyisha mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwaatshi
Muntu yonsu udi ne disama difuanangane ne dia nsudi, nebamufile kudi mutuangaji

Yeye wakamuambila ne, Biasua mukelenge, bingikala musangane luse ku mesu kuandi, bikala bualu buimpe ku mesu kua mukelenge, ne binasankisha mesu andi, bafunde mikanda mikuabo ya kukudimunabo n ai mikanda yakafunda Hamana, muana wa Hamedata, Muena Agaga, yakafundeye bua kubutulabo Bena Yuda ba mu nseke yonso ya mukelenge
Kanudi mampa adibu bela buanga to
Dipembu dia bintu binudi nungoshila kadiakunsankisha kabidi to
Nakanulombola mu tshihela tô bidimu makumi anai: bilulu bienu kabiakasunsuka ham bidi henu, ne bisabata kabiakasunsuka ku makasa enu
Kanuhu Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu muoyo; bualu bua yeye kena ne tshituha tshiandi ne buhianyi buandi kunudi
Kadi yeye wakamba ne, Balue kundi ne bukula
Bualu bua dibue diabo kadiena bu Dibue dietu nansha bikala bena lukuna balumbuluishi ba bualu
Muanabute uvua Nebayote, balonda kudi Kedare, bamutua mu nyima kudi Adbeyele ne Mibsame, Mishema, Duma, Masa, Adade, Tema, Yeture, Nafishe, uvua mushile Kedma dibela
Yehowa anuvuishe bubidi buenu ditalala mu nsubu ya babayenu
Nakaha Maki Gilada

Hakahita matuku â, mukelenge wakalambishila bantu bonso bakadi n andi mu nsubu wandi wa mu Shushana, ne banene ne bakese, bidia bia disanka, mu tshiendedi tshia mu tshibunda tshia ku mbalasa wa mukelenge matuku muanda mutekete
Ku nyima Yoshua wakabashiha, wakabowa ku mitshi itanu; bakadi balembelela ku mitshi tô ne ku dilolo
Yakobe umona Rakele, muana wa mansebende Labane, ufika ne bimuna, kumushaye dibue divua dibuikila ku tshiina tshia mayi, kunuisha bimuna mayi
Bualu kai bundi n abu mbua kuindila Yehowa kabidi musangu mule
Padi bena Izrayele kabatshiyi ne bukole, kabayi ne muntu udi mua kubambuluisha
Wenze kabidi nkanu ibidi ya bijengu ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi, uyiteke kuinshi kua tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi, bituangane ne tshilamba tshia efode
Bualu mu ditendelela diabu, bavua benza bivua Maweja Nangila mubenge
Bikala umue wabo kayi muakane, udi mulema anyi udi mufofo anyi udi muoneka muaba mukuabo, kanumushihedi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke milau ei yonso ham bidi ha bena lukuna ne badi n enu tshiji, bakadi banukengesha
Yehowa neamutahulule munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele bua kamuenzela bibi, bu mudi milau yonso ya tshihungidi etshi mifunda mu mukanda eu wa mikenji
Alona neoshileku musenga wa manananshi dinda ne dinda hayeye kulongolola minda
Meku onsu a bena Zebulone aa avua ne bantu balume
Nunku bakadia bidia abi matuku muanda mutekete, bafile milambu ya kuosha ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, batonde mibi yabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo

Numanye bienu lelu ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi uya ku mpala kuenu udi bu kahia kadi kabutula bionso; yeye nembashihe, neabahoneshe ku mpala kuenu: nunku nenubihate, nembajimishe lubilu, bu muakanuambila Yehowa
Bualu bua meme nengambe dina dia Yehowa: tumbishai bunene bua Nzambi wetu
Mabue awu, neikale tshimanyinu tshia bisamba dikumi ne bibidi bia bena Izrayele
Ku musangu umue eu nakambila bantu ne, Muntu ne muntu ashikame ne muena mudimu wandi mu Yelushalema bua bobo bamanye mua kutulama butuku ne bua kukuata mudimu mu munya
Ndi nkusengelela ne: usemene apa, nkubabate
Bikaleye mulume udi uhita bidimu makumi asambombo, wewe neubale nshekele dikumi ne itanu, ne bikaleye mukashi, nshekele dikumi
Uvua mutufuile luse ne bena meku etu bonsu

Nakambila bantu banene ne bakokeshi ne bantu bakuabo ne, Mudimu udi mukole ne munene, ne tuetu tudi bahanduluke ba mutu ha lumbu bashilangane umue kudi mukuabo; nunku mu miaba yonso mudi nunyua muadi wa mpungi, nudisangisheku kutudi; Nzambi wetu neatuluile nvita
Kanungu ka Tshipwita nansha umwe kabeena mwa kumulondesha, kumukeba, kumukwata, kumweela mu lukanu anyi kumulumbulwisha bwa ngelelu wa mêji anyi bwa tukanda tuvwayi mwêla mu dienza dia mudimu wenda
Dielulula Nunemeke bintu bia bende Nuenu basangane tshimuna tshia muanenu tshijimine: ngombe, mukoku nansha mbuji, kanutshilekedi tshipita to
Nanku tuetu kushala mu tshibandabanda etshi, batangilangane ne tshimenga tshia Bete Peyore
Davidi wakambila Solomo muan andi ne
Bena Isalele Badi Batombokela Yehowa ku Holeba Numanye bienu ne, Yehowa kena munuhe buloba ebu buimpe bu buhianyi bualu bua buakane buenu; bualu bua nudi bantu ba tshitshu
Biula nebiumuke kûdi ne ku nsubu yebe, ne kudi bahika bebe ne kudi bantu bebe, nebishale anu mu musulu nkayau
Kunemeka bapele Pikala muena mudimu mupela nansha muena dikenga, nansha yeye muanenu nansha muenyi udi musombe mu tshimenga tshia mu ditunga dienu, kanumutatshishi to
Pashishe, kuangataye manteka, mabela ne munyinyi uvua bu balamba awu, kubapesha
Padi mashi a nyama awu masampukile ku tshilamba, tshilamba atshi batshisukuile anu muaba wa tshijila
Shaula wakambila Samuele ne, Nakuenza bualu bubi bualu bua nakuhidia mukenji wa Yehowa ne mei ebe kabidi; nakatshina bantu, nakatumikila mei abo
Nuenu kanuikadi ne luse kudi muntu eu, kadi nenumushe mashi a muntu udi kayi ne tshilumbu munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua nuenu nuikale ne diakalengele

Bena Isalele ku Holeba Nuanji kudimuka, nulame mioyo yenu bilengele, bua kanuhu muoyo bua malu anuakatangila ne mesu enu, ne bua mei au kaluhuki mu mitshima yenu matuku onso a muoyo wenu; kadi nuamanyisha bana benu ne bana ba bana benu; dituku dinuakimana ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Holeba, hakangambila Yehowa ne, Unsangishile bantu, mbunvuishe mei anyi, bua bobo bamanye mua kuntshina matuku abo onso a ha buloba, ne bua bobo bayishe bana babo

Aba bakadi bana ba balume ba Abihayila, muana wa balume wa Huli, muana wa balume wa Yaloa, muana wa balume wa Gilada, muana wa balume wa Mikaele, muana wa balume wa Yeshishai, muana wa balume wa Yado, muana wa balume wa Buza; Ahi, muana wa balume wa Abediele, muana wa balume wa Guni, wakadi ha mutu ha nsubu ya batatu abo
Yeye udi uhesha mukelenge wandi luhandu lunene, yeye udi ulesha wakeleye manyi ha mutu luse lujalame, kudi Davidi ne kudi tunkanuniuna tuandi tshiendelele
Tshisamba kai tshidi ne mikenji ne mei majalame bu mikenji ei yonso inakateka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Kora uvua mulele bana ba balume basatu: Asire, Elkana ne Abiyashafe
bulongolodi budi butangila ngikadilu wa midilu, wa madimi ne meetu, bumunyi,bidibwa bia munyinyi ne bia bisekiseki;

Hakabanga tshidimu tshikuabo, mukelenge Nebuka denesâ wakatuma bantu, bakaya n andi ku Babulona ne bintu bia mushinga mukole biakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bakahingisha Sedekiya muan abo mu bukelenge bua Yuda ne Yelushalema
Abalahama wakamba ne, Muan anyi, Nzambi nkayandi neatuhe muana wa mukoko wa kuosha ha kalua, nunku bubidi buabo bakaya hohamue
Anyongobole nyunyi awu nshingu, kayi umukosa mutu

Masanka Alualua kudi Batumikidi ba Yehowa Binunvua mikenji ei, binuayenza, hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nênze tshihungidi ne luse biakalayeye batatu benu: yeye neanusue, neanusankishe, neanuvudishe, yeye neasankishe bana benu kabidi, ne bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba buebe, midioko yenu, ne nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, ne manyi enu ne bana ba ngombe yenu ne bana ba mikoko yenu, mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu bua kunuhabu
Nunku wakalukila bua kusangakeneye n andi, wakamuambila ne, Muana kena mutabale

Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa wakahueka ha mukuna wa Sinai, wakabika munkatshi muabo ku Sei, wakatemena ku mukuna wa Palana, wakamueneka munkatshi mua binunu makumi bia bantu bandi ba tshijila, wakalua kudibo ne mikenji mitema kahia mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bukole
Palô neambe bua Bena Isalele ne, Bakuhambuka mu nshila, tshihela tshiakubahumbisha
Bakulu ba bena Mowabe ne ba bena Madiyane bavuabu batume, kuangata bintu bia kufuta nabi muambi

Nansha nanku, tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa tshidi mwa kupeesha Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa bukookeshi, biumukila ku dîyi, bwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene
Bua Dana yeye wakamba ne, Dana udi bu muana wa nyama wa ntambue: udi muhika mumuke ku Bashana

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba bidi ku mpala kuenu, hanuabihata, hanuahiana buloba buabo, nudimuke, kanukuatshibu kudi mateyi abo bua kubalonda, habajimishabo ku mesu kuenu; kanukonkanganyi bua nzambi yabo ne

Bialua tshiole nansha tshihuhu anyi biakuata bintu mamoma ne butu, nansha mikumbi nansha meshi, biatshintshimika bena lukuna misoko yabo; bialua makenga ne masama onso; biakutendelela ne biakutendekena muntu yonso, nansha Bena Isalele bonso, bualu bua muntu yonso udi mumanye disama diandi ne ntatu yandi, ne biololabo bianza biabo ku nsubu eu; unvue biebe mu muaba webe mu diulu; ubabuikidile mibi yabo, ufute muntu yonso bu muakadi bienzedi biandi, nguewe udi mumanye mutshima wandi bualu bua wewe nkayebe udi mumanye mitshima ya bantu ; bua bobo bakutshine, bende mu nshila yebe hatshidibo bashikame mu buloba buwakaha batatu betu
Nanku nenudie nukute
Kanudinyangi
Bakabakeba mu tshidimu tshia makumi anai tshia mu bukelenge bua Davidi, bakasangana munkatshi muabo bena bukitu ku Yazê wa mu Gilada
Yozefe mumane kujika tatuende, kupinganaye mu Ejipitu ne bana babu, kabidi ne bonsu bavuaye muende nabu bua kuya kujika tatuende
Mukelenge wa Sodoma wakambila Abalama ne, Umpe bantu, wewe wangate biuma

Nententekashe malu mabi ha mitu habo, nembase mikete yanyi; nzala neyibanyange, makala a kahia ne makenga makole neabashihe, nentume nyama ya menu makole munkatshi muabo, ne lulengu lua nyoka idi idikoka hanshi
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne binai tshia bukelenge bua Hezikiya, Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakalua, wakaluangana ne bena misoko yonso ya Yuda yakadi ne ngumbu, wakayinyenga
Batangidi ba Mudimu Ebu mbungi bua bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu biakabalabo bu muakamba Mose biakakuatshila Bena Lewi mu mudimu wabo, mu bukokeshi bua Itama, muana mulume wa Alona, muakuidi
Hakamona Bena Isalele ne Mukelenge kakabunvuila, bantu bakandamuna ne, Tudi ne tshituha kai mu Davidi

Muntu udi usangisha butue bua muana wa ngombe neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane to ne ku dilolo eu udi mukenji wa Bena Isalele ne wa muenyi udi munkatshi muabo tô ne tshiendelele

Bakahunga tshihungidi bua kukebabo Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo, ne mitshima yabo yonso ne mioyo yabo yonso; bua muntu yonso wahidia kukeba Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ashihibue, nansha muntu mukese nansha muntu munene, nansha mulume nansha mukashi
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuihatshile bisamba abi ku mpala kuenu bituha bituha: kanubashihi tshikondo tshimue, bualu bua nyama ya muitu neyikumbane munkatshi muenu
Udi upumuna mashi a muntu, nebapumune ende kudi muntu, bualu mbafuke muntu mufuanangane ne Mvidi Mukulu
Shimishona wakamba ne, Nakabunguisha mishila ne mishiki ne mufuba wa lubanga lua mpunda, nakashiha bantu tshinunu ne mufuba wa lubanga lua mpunda
Ditunga dia Ejipitu dijima edi ndiebe

Wewe ne bana bebe balume badi n ebe nenuikale ne mudimu wa buakuidi bua bintu bionso bia tshioshelu ne bintu bidi ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika, nuenu nenuenze mudimu eu, nakunuha mudimu wa buakuidi bu mudimu wa kuha kuenu, muenyi udi ulua ha buihi, nebamushihe
Tshianza tshia Bena Midiyana tshiakahita Bena Isalele bukole; bualu bua Bena Midiyana, Bena Isalele bakadimbila mena mu mikuna ne mbuebue, bakadiashila ngumbu ya mabue
Nzambi wakamueneka kudi Belâma wakamuambila ne, Balume aba badi kuebe mbantu kai
Yeye neashihe muana wa ngombe ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebaye ne mashi, nebamiamine mashi ku tshioshelu tshidi ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Bimenga bionso bia Bena Lewi munkatshi mua buhianyi bua Bena Isalele biakadi bimenga makumi anai ne muanda mukulu ne miaba yabi ya ku matshika
Kanuenji bu munudi nuenza kunoko lelu, benza muntu yonso anu malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi; bualu bua kanuena banze kubuela mu dikisha ne buhianyi bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Buhika bua Bena Yuda Bak

nsombelu ne kudi Dilekelela anyi dinyanga dia bâna bu mudi kusangila bu mulume ne mukaji ne bâna bakese, bwenzavi bwa masandi pamwe ne dibatalula mupongo budi bukandikibwa ne badi babufidila manyooka kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Buloba nebukuame bintu bia bungi, nuenu nenukute mafu tente, nenushikame bienu talala
Dutelonone Bikala bantu babidi batandangane, ne haluabo bua kulumbuluishibua, balumbuluishi nebalumbulule tshilumbu tshiabo; ku nyima nebabingishe muntu muimpe ne nebahishe muntu mubi
Nakakoleshibua bualu bua tshianza tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, tshiakadi kundi; nakasangisha bantu banene ba mu Isalele bua kuyabo n anyi
Bika biebe, ubishe nsongalume, umukuate ku tshianza, bualu bua meme nemmuvuishe tshisamba tshinene

Tshisamba tshia Shimeyone tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Nemuyele, ndelanganyi ya Nemuyele; dia bena Yamine, ndelanganyi ya Yamine; dia bena Yakine, ndelanganyi ya Yakine; dia bena Zera, ndelanganyi ya Zera; ne dia bena Shawule, ndelanganyi ya Shawule
Nebabusangishe ne manyi mu dilonga, ne hashikishabo kubulamba, nebafile bituha bidi bilamba kudi Yehowa bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu
Meku onsu a bena Menashe aa avua ne bantu balume
Bikaleye mudi tshihe mu nsubu wa mulume wandi, anyi mulaye mulayi wandi, ne bikala mulume wandi munvue, muhuwe biandi kayi mumukande nansha, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso nebijalame
Yeye ke nkambua wa bena Amone batudi nabu lelu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neatungunuke midimu yenu; ne anupe bana bavule
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi ukeba tshinyi
Bakaya ne dibendele ba tshitudilu tshia Lubena, ne Elisû, muana mulume wa Shedeu, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Yehowa neanutumine biusha bia mu Ejipitu, ne disama dia muiaka, ne mpusu ne lubila: masama adibo kabayi mua kuondaha
Kabidi, kena mua kusemena pabuipi ne muntu mulue, nansha yeye tatuende nansha mamuende, bua kavu kupia mikiya
Yeye wakabashiha ku Aloê tô ne ku Minita, misoko makumi abidi mene, tô ne ku Abele kelamima; wakashiha bantu ba bungi

Kadi bikala muntu ne muena mutumba n andi lukuna, umualamina, ubika, umutaha tô ne hafileye, ne bianyemeye ku umue wa misoko ei; hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebatuale bantu, nebamukuatemu, nebamufile mu bianza bia musombuedi bua kufueye
Yeye wakabakoma nyima, wakadia, ne yeye wakatshinguluka kudibo, wakayikila n abo, wakakuata Shimeona, wakamusuika ku mesu kuabo
Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudibo, bua kubashiha munkatshi mua tshitudilu, tô ne hakafuabo buonso buabo
Mu dituku adi nenuambile muan ebe wa balume ne, Ebu mbualu buwakungenzela Yehowa hanakaluhuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Nanku neanulekele, anuipate mene kashidi mu ditunga diende
Kanusuiki ngombe ne mpunda ku mutshi wa tshikokedi umue
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kuawila Yozefe ndota, wamba ne: Ndi mulote nunku: mvua muimane ku muelelu wa musulu wa Nile
Mu dipingana diende, muena mudimu wa Abrahame kuya lubilu kumpala kuende, umulomba ne: Bu wewe musue, mpeshaku mayi a kunua
Yeye wakebesha Isaka ne, Wewe kuakunshilaku disanka, anyi

Hakatangila Yosefe ne tatu wandi wakatentekasha tshianza tshiandi tshia balume ha mutu ha Efelayima, bualu ebu kabuakamusankisha, ne yeye wakabisha tshianza tshia tatu wandi, wakamba kutshiumusha ku mutu wa Efelayima, wakamba kutshiteka ku mutu wa Manashe

Katataka, tangilai, anu meme nkayanyi, nYeye mene, kakuena nzambi mukuabo, anu meme; meme ndi nshiha bantu, ndi mbabisha ku lufu; meme ndi ntaha bantu mputa, ndi mbondaha kabidi; kakuena muntu udi mua kubasungila mu tshianza tshianyi

Bakulu ba mu musoko au nebakuate muntu au, nebamukengeshe; ne bobo nemmuambile ne, Ufute lukama lua nshekele ya argent ne yeye neayifile kudi tatu wa mushikankunde eu, bualu bua yeye wakuona lumu lua mukashi utshidi kamama mu Isalele: yeye neikale mukashi wandi, yeye kena mua kumuhidia tô matuku andi onso

Bakelenge Badi Bahingishila Mukashi wa ku Shunema Buloba Buandi Elisha wakambila mukashi, muena muana wakabisbeye ku lufu, ne, Juka, uye ne ba mu nsubu webe, ya ushikame kuonso kûdi mua kushikama, bualu bua Yehowa neatume tshiole mu buloba tô bidimu muanda mutekete
Nunku bakaya ku Yeleko
Butshia dinda, mukalenga kupampakana bikole bua bilota abi
Hakafuneye bulobo kudi Bena Isalele, Yonatana, muana wa Shimea, muan abo ne Davidi, wakamushiha
Ntenta wa kusambakena Bamane kuasa mitanda, Moshe kumusha nzubu wa ntenta wa tshijila uvua munkatshi mua bantu, kumuasaye ku luseke, mutantshi mule ne muaba uvua bantu basombele
Nenuele mashi ayi ku tshilambuilu
Kadi anu bidi kabiyi ne bulema

Masanka a mu Buloba bua Mulayi Nunku nutumikile mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne bukole, ne bua nuenu nubuelemu, ne bua nuenu nuhiane buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana; ne bua nuenu nuvudishangane matuku enu mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu bua kubahabu ne tunkanunuma tuabo, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Muakuidi neameme tshituha tshia mulambu wa bukula bu tshivulukidi, neatshioshile ha tshioshelu ne kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Tshimuangi Mvidi Mukulu udi utua ndondu ne bena Izrayele Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Bikila Arone, Nadabe, Abihu ne bakulu ba bena Izrayele makumi muanda mutekete
Koleshayi muoyi, kankamanayi, kanutshinyi bena ditunga adi to
Kadi Hezikiya kakenzela Nzambi bimpe bu muakamuenzeleye bimpe, bualu bua yeye wakadisua mu mutshima wandi, nunku tshiji tshia Nzambi tshiakadi kudiye ne kudi Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema
Bantu bonsu bamone nanku, kuelabu tunkunduluila

Kanudi tshintu tshidifuile: nudi mua kuha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu atshi, yeye atshidie; anyi nudi mua kutshihanyisha muntu wa bende; bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Nuenu bakumbaje mikenji eyi bimpe, bantu ba bisamba bikuabu pamanyabu mikenji eyi, nebajadike ne: nuenu nudi bantu ba lungenyi ne meji
Lehabama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi
Lota wakabamona, wakabika bua kubakidila, wakabakukiula hanshi

Bualu bua yeye wakasua batatu benu, nunku yeye wakasungula bana babo bakabalonda ku nyima, yeye nkayandi wakanuhatula mu Ejipitu ne bukole buandi bunene; bua kunuihatshila bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole ku mesu kuenu, ne bua kulua n enu mu buloba buabo bu buhianyi, bu mudi bualu ebu lelu

Kadi pikala muntu mukine muanabu, kubutamaye mua kumukuata, kumushipa, pashishe kunyemenaye mu tshimue tshia ku bimenga ebi bisatu, bakulu ba mu tshimenga tshiende, nebafume bantu bua kumukuata, kumufikisha kudi musombuedi bua amushipe
Muena mudimu kunua
Mesa avua malamika tshiamu tshia mpawungi mubidi mujima too ne ku mibangu
Nenuikale ne mitshi ya olive mu madimi enu onso, kadi kanuena nudilaba manyi ai ham bidi; bualu bua mamuma neahohoke
Yeye wakangata mikete isatu mu tshianza tshiandi, wakayasa ha muoyo wa Abashaloma hakadiye mulembelele mutshikale ne muoyo munkatshi mua matamba a mutshi

Bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakasungulabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumuenzelabo mudimu ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina dia Yehowa, nebalue ha buihi: bua mei abo malu onso ne bilumbu bionso bia kukumangana nebijalame
Dutelonone Bikala bantu babidi batandangane, ne haluabo bua kulumbuluishibua, balumbuluishi nebalumbulule tshilumbu tshiabo; ku nyima nebabingishe muntu muimpe ne nebahishe muntu mubi

Eleazâ muakuidi wakangata malonga a tshiamu tshia mitaku akatuabo, bakâtula bu tshibuikilu tshia tshioshelu, bua kuikalau tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele ne kubamanyisha ne, Muntu udi kayi muana wa Alona, kalu ha buihi bua kuosheye musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kua Yehowa, kenji bu Kola ne bantu bandi, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Bika biebe, ujidike bantu, ubambile ne, Nudijidile bua malu a makelela; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi Wamba ne, Tshintu tshia tshijila tshidi munkatshi muenu, nuenu Bena Isalele, nunku kanuena mua kuimana ku mpala kua bena lukuna tô ne hanûmusha tshintu tshia tshijila munkatshi muenu
Pashishe wowe mayi
Yehowa wakahueka mu difutu, wakimana ku mbelu kua Ntenta, wakabikila Alona ne Mîyama, bobo bakaluhuka
Bana benu ba balume kabasedi bana babu ba bakaji
Kuenzekabi nanku
Muaba wa tshijila awu, nuenu bena Izrayele, nusanke ne bana benu, bena midimu benu, bena Levi, benyi banudi nabu, bana ba nshiya, ne bakaji bakamba badi munkatshi muenu
Bana ba balume ba Shemê: Ahi ne Loga ne Yehuba ne Alama
Eliya wakaya bua kudimuenesha kudi Ahaba
Kadi kumvuaye diyi dia mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu difumina mu diulu dimubikila ne: Abrahame, Abrahame
Muntu udi wela tatuende nansha mamuende milawu, numushipe
Kadi kumubadi bu muntu udi kayi ne bualu, bualu bua wewe udi muena lungenyi; neumanye bualu bûdi n abu mbua kumuenzela: wewe neutume mutu wandi udi ne nsuki mitoke tô mu Muaba wa Bafue ne mashi
Kuipatabu Moshe ne Arone muaba uvua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Nangayi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, numutumikile, numuitabe ne muoyi umue
Pashishe nebabueje milonda ku mesa aku bua kuwambuilaku
Kusha wakalela Nimeloda, wakabanga kuikala muntu mukole mu buloba

Nomba Badi Bihata Badi Kabayi Bakane mu Tshitudilu Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wele dî kudi Bena Isalele bua bobo bihate bena nsudi mu tshitudilu, ne muntu yonso udi ne mputa wa luhangu ne muntu yonso udi munyanguke ku dilenga dia muntu mufue nebihate nansha mulume nansha mukashi ku tshitudilu, kabanyangi tshitudilu tshiabo, mundi mushikame

MUTU WA MUKANDA WA KUMPALA I : BULONGOLODI BWA MU KABUJIMA Tshitupa Tshia kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi ne Didikookesha Njila wa kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi Kanungu ka kumpala Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi, anu mu mikalu yadi ya mu dia a kashipunkenza ayi, Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu, mudikadile, mudikookesha, musangisha ne kayi kwabanya, udi utangila majinga a bantu, wa mungalata ne kayi mutwa ku tshia tshisumbu tshia ditabwija nansha tshimwe
Bikala muena musoko mulale ne mukashi webe, wewe wakadi kutuvuisha mu mulau
Ke kupitabu kumufikila munda bikole bua tshilota atshi ne bua bivuaye wamba abi

Hanuadia bana, ne bana ba bana benu, hanuashala mu buloba musangu mule, hanuona mitshima yenu bua kudisongela luhingu ne tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu, hanuenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumufuisha tshiji; ndi mbikila diulu ne buloba bu bamanyi ba bualu kunudi lelu ne, Nenujimine ha buloba bunudi nuhiana dishiya dia Yadene tshituha tshihi; kanuena nuvudishangana matuku enu ha buloba, kadi nebanujimishe bulelela

Dutelonone Hangata mulume mukashi bua kumubaka, ne bikala mukashi kayi muimpe ku mesu kuandi bualu bua yeye wakamusangana ne malu adi kayi mimpe, hashishe yeye neamufundile mukanda wa kushiha dibaka, neamuheu mu bianza, neamûmushe mu nsubu wandi
Mpunde, tubalu, tumelu, ngombe, mikoku ne mbuji, bionsu nebibutuke
Kadi kanuena mua kutupola bua kuela mu tshisaka, kuya natu pambelu to

Yelemiya wakashila Yoshiya madilu kabidi; bimbi ba misambu ne balume ne bakashi hadi batela dina dia Yoshiya mu miadi yabo tô ne ku dituku edi, bakayijadika bu tshilele mu Isalele, ne monai, mei au adi mafunda mu mukanda wa miadi

Nunku tuakuambilangana ne, Hatuambilabo anyi hambilabo milongo idi ilonda ku nyima mei â, netuambe ne, Monai tshifuanyikishi tshia tshioshelu tshia Yehowa tshiakenza batatu betu, kambualu bua kuoshelahu milambu ya kuosha, anyi nyama mishiha; kadi tshidi bu mumanyi wa bualu hankatshi hetu n enu
Davidi wakambila Shaula ne, Meme ndi nganyi, ne muoyo wanyi udi tshinyi, ne ba mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi badi banganyi mu Isalele bua meme kuikala muku wa mukelenge
Nemvudije tshiakabidi dinyoka dienu misangu muanda mutekete
Butumbi bua Maweja Nangila budi buwuja muaba wa tshijila Diba adi divuba divua dibuikila ntenta wa kusambakena
Tshisamba tshia Ashere:

Bakalua ne balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete ne bimpanga muanda mutekete ne mikoko muanda mutekete ne mpumbu ya mbushi muanda mutekete bu milambu ya kubuikila n ai mibi ya bantu bua bukelenge ne bua nsubu ne bua ba mu Yuda
Kadi bantu badi ba bungi ne etshi ntshikondo tshia nvula ya bungi, katuena bamanye mua kuimana ha bula; kemmudimu wa dituku dimue anyi wa matuku abidi; bualu bua tuakatamba kuenza bibi mu bualu ebu
Kadi dî edi didi ha buihi n enu ne mukana muenu ne mu mitshima yenu, bua nuenu kudienza
Yosefe wakalongolola dikalu diandi wakaya kusangakena ne Isalele, tatu andi, mu Goshene Wakafika kudiye, wakamuela tshituha ku nshingu, wakadila to musangu mule

Nenuteke bintu ebi hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenutendelele ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; nenusanke mu malu mimpe onso akanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu ne ba mu nsubu yenu, ne Muena Lewi ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu
Bantu kai bakumpa dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudibo munkatshi mua kahia, bu munuakadiunvua, ne bakikala ne muoyo
Kuenzabu kabidi mabaya asambombu bua ku luseke lua kudi diba dibuelela lua nzubu wa tshijila
Nenku tshidimu tshia muanda mukulu, nenukune biakudia kabidi
Nanku mmuena tshibawu

Ezela Au mmena a bakadi ku mitu ya nsubu ya batatu babo, eku nkulondolola kua bakafuma n anyi ku Babulona, mu bukokeshi bua mukelenge Atashasete: wa bana balume ba Pinehasa, Gêshoma; wa bana ba Itamâ, Danyele; wa bana ba Davidi, Hatusha; wa bana ba Shekanya ne ba Palosha, Zekâya; bakamubalabo n abo bakadi balume lukama ne makumi atanu
Hashishe, Mose wakabanda ne Alona ne Nadaba ne Abihu ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele makumi muanda mutekete
Elisha ne Bena Sulia Mukelenge wa Bena Sulia wakadi uluangana ne Bena Isalele; wakambila bantu bandi ne, Tshitudilu tshianyi netshikale mu muaba kampanda
Batuangaji boshe munyinyi onsu ewu pa tshilambuilu, pamue ne mulambu wa kuosha, bualu udi mulambu wa dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Yakobe kutendakena Esawu ne: Bu wewe musue, umfuile luse
Neulele muana wa balume
Nualekele, apueke panshi bu mayi
Biwahidia kubalekela, ne biwabakanda, Yehowa neateke tshianza tshiandi ha bimuna bidi mu budimi, ha tubalu ne nyama ya mpunda ne nyama ya tumelo ne ngombe ne mikoko, dishina dikole nedibikuate
Nakanulombola mu tshihela tô bidimu makumi anai: bilulu bienu kabiakasunsuka ham bidi henu, ne bisabata kabiakasunsuka ku makasa enu
Nunku nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kusua benyi bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Davidi wakela dî kudi bantu ne kudi Abinê, muana wa Nê, wakabakonka ne, Wewe Abinê, kuena witaba, anyi

Nunku Yoshua wakalekesha buloba bujima, ne bua ku mikuna, ne bua ku Sude, ne bua mu bibanda, ne bua ku tukunakuna, ne bakelenge babu bonso: kakashiya nansha umue, wakabutula bonso bakadi ne muoyo, bu muakamba Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele
Nenuikale ne disanka mu misoko yenu, nenuikale ne disanka mu madimi enu
Nenkumbaje malu onsu andi mukulaye
Bena Isalele bakahita Bena Yuda bukole; bakanyema muntu ne muntu ku nsubu wandi wa ntenta
Yehowa wakulua dî dia Bena Isalele, wakafua Bena Kanâna mu bianza biabo, bakabashiha ne misoko yabo yonso, ne dina dia muaba au diakadi Hôma
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Amasaya, bia kumudilu ne bia kunshikidilu, monai, kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa bakelenge ba Yuda ne ba Isalele, anyi
Yeye wakela kabalu ne muntu wakadi wenda ha nyima haku mu bunene bua mai manene

Bena Ejipitu bakabalonda ne tubalu dionso ne makalu onso bia Palô Masalayi andi ne bantu ba ha nyima ha tubalu bakabaheta hakadibo bashikama hehi ne mai manene, hehi ne Pi hahilota ku mpala kua Bâla sefona

Davidi wakasungula bansongalume bandi dikumi, wakabatuma kudi Nabala mu Kâmele ne, Yai, numuambike muoyo mu dina dianyi; numuambile nunku, yeye udi ushikama mu bubanji, ne, Ditalala dikale kûdi ne kudi bonso ba mu nsubu webe ne kudi bintu bionso biudi n abi

Bana balume ba Eliaba: Nemuele ne Datana ne Abilama Datana eu ne Abilama eu bakabikila tshisumbu tshia bantu, bakatanda ne Mose ne Alona mu tshisumbu tshia Kola, hakadibo batanda ne Yehowa, buloba buakubulula mukana muabu, buakabamma ne Kola, bakafua tshisumbu atshi, kahia kakosha balume aba nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ne bobo bakalua bu tshivulukidi kudi Bena Isalele
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza bankambua bandi mu malu abo onso
Hakamanyabo ne argent ya bungi idi mu mushete, secrétaire wa mukelenge ne muakuidi munene bakatua ne bibombi, bakabala argent yakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Hashishe hakakumbana Bena Isalele ba bungi, bobo bakenzesha Bena Kanâna mudimu wa mulambu, kabakabihata mene
Wakenza mbote ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi atanu bua kutuangasha bilulu bia nsubu bu nsubu umue
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe kabidi ne: Padi ngombe, mukoku nansha mbuji ulela, muana awu ashale kudi mamuende lumingu lujima
Mukashi wa masandi kikadi munkatshi mua bana bakashi ba mu Isalele, ne muena Sodoma kikadi munkatshi mua bana balume ba mu Isalele
Badi bankambua ba bisamba bibidi
Wewe wakungambila bu muwakungenzela bimpe lelu, bualu bua hakuila Yehowa mu tshianza tshiebe, kuakunshiha nansha
Bumuka mu Eshiyone Ngebere, kuyabu ku Kadeshe mu tshipela tshia Tsine
Mpindiewu, Maweja Nangila neanutshimuine bisamba bionsu binudi nabi mutumba, bidi binupita ku bukole ne ku bungi

Nunku halua matata ne makenga makole kudibo, musambu eu newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu, neudiambe kudibo; bana babo kabahu musambu eu muoyo, bualu bua meme ndi mumanye meji adibo n au mu mitshima yabo lelu diambedi tshiyi muanze kulua n abo mu buloba bunakabalaya
Shaula wakamuambila ne, Yehowa akuvudishile disanka; nakatumikila mukenji wa Yehowa

Kadi mu bualu ebu buonso kanuakatumikila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakaya ku mpala kuenu mu nshila bua kunukebela muaba wa kushimika ntenta yenu, mu difutu dikenka kahia butuku, ne mu dî tulu dia diledi munya, bua kunulombola mu nshila unuakadi ne bualu bua kuenda
