Hashishe balume ba mu Isalele bakambila Gideona ne, Utukokeshe; ne wewe ne muan ebe mulume, ne muana wa muan ebe mulume kabidi; bualu bua wewe wakatusungila mu bianza bia Bena Midiyana
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne umpe tuima tukese, bualu bua ndi ne nyota
Muntu eu Mose wakadi ne kalolo be, wakatamba bantu bonso ba ha buloba ne kalolo
Nafatale udi bu ntole musulula, udi Wamba mei malengele

Hakadilabo kudi Yehowa, yeye wakateka midima hankatshi habo ne Bena Ejipitu; wakatuma mai manene ha mutu habo, wakababuikila; mesu enu akatangila malu anakenza mu Ejipitu; nuakashikama mu tshihela matuku a bungi
Kuena mumanye ne kunfudilu kua bualu ebu nekuikale anu ne kanyinganyinga

Kabena babiabanyangana: mushikankunde umue anyi ibidi kudi mulume yonso, bilulu bia mekala mimpe bia kuha Sisela, bilulu bia mekala mimpe bizola, tshilulu tshimpe tshimue anyi bibidi bizola, bia kuela mu nshingu mua mutshimunyi, anyi
Nuenu kanuena bantume munemu to
Ku nyima kuabo Azaya, muana wa Mâseya, muana wa Ananiya, wakalongolola ku luseke lua nsubu wandi
Bualu muntu ewu Moshe, uvua mutupatule mu Ejipitu, katuena bamanye tshidi tshimuenzekela to
Pawajidila bintu abi, nebikale bia tshijila menemene
Ku nyima kuandi bakuidi, bantu ba ku Mpata, bakalongolola
Mose wakambila tatu andi muenu ne, Bualu bua bantu badi balue kundi bua kuebesha Nzambi malu
Bakumuka mu Ejipitu, bakalua ku buloba bua Kanana kudi Yakoba tatu abo

Wakatuma miloho kudi Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele, ku musoko, imuambila ne, Bene hadada udi wamba ne, Tshiamu tshiebe tshia argent ne tshiamu tshiebe tshia or mbanyi; ne bakashi bebe ne bana bebe badi batamba buakane mbanyi kabidi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Unsunguile bakulu ba bena Izrayele makumi muanda mutekete, bantu baudi mujadike ne: mbakulu ba bushuwa, balombodi ba bena Izrayele
Bantu bonsu kuitaba ne: Netuenze bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila muambe
Nebashipe ngombe yenu, nuenu batangile
Bakabuesha tukanu tua or tuhindakana mu nkanu ibidi yakadi ku nseke ya tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi

Ei idi ndelanganyi ya bana ba Yishemaele, muana wa Abalahama wakamulelela Haga, Muena Ejipitu, muena mudimu wa bakashi wa Sala: au mmena a bana ba Yishemaele ku bikondo biabo muaba bute wa Yishemaele Nebayota, ne Kedâ ne Adebele ne Mibesama, Mishema ne Duma ne Masa, Hadada ne Tema ne Yetû ne Nafisha ne Kedema
Bualu bua ndi mbandisha tshianza tshianyi kulu bua kuditshiha ne, Bu mundi muikale ne muoyo tshiendelele

Bikaleye mukuambile ne, Tshiena musue kumuka kûdi, bualu bua yeye udi ukunanga ne ba mu nsubu webe, wakabela disanka kûdi, hashishe wewe newangate nkulonda, neumutuhite ditshu ku tshibi ne yeye neikale muhika webe tshiendelele
Yalobama wakadi muimane ku tshioshelu bua kuosheye musenga wa manananshi
Kekate ke nkambua wa bena Kekate, badi batapulukangana meku anayi: dia bena Amrame, dia bena Ishare, dia bena Ebrone ne dia bena Uziyele
Mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Kishona ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Dabelata ne miaba ya ku matshika, Yâmuta ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Ene ganima ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga binai
Nakanyunguluka, nakahueka ku mukuna, nakateka mabue mu mushete unakenza, adimu bu muakangambila Yehowa, Bena Isalele bakumuka ku Belota Bene yâkana, bakaya ku Mosela
Nuenu Bena Isalele nuhingane ku ntenta yenu
Bobo nebanuteke tshikokedi tshia tshiamu ha nshingu yenu tô ne hanuajimishibua kudibo
Nennupe Sihone, muena Amore, mukalenga wa mu Eshebone, ne ditunga diende
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mikenji idi itangila batuangaji a
Nunku nutumikile mikenji ne malu ne mei binakunuambila lelu, nubienze
Kabatangidi lue vene mu miaba yenu yonso tô matuku muanda mutekete; kanushiyi munyinyi unuakashiha wa milambu dilolo dia dituku dia ku mpala butuku buonso tô ne ku dinda
Yoshua wakaluangana ne bakelenge aba bonso tô musangu mule
Buloba nebukumenene meba ne mingonga
Umue wa bantu ba mukelenge wa Isalele wakamba ne, Elisha, muana wa Shafata, udiku, wakadi wela mai ha bianza bia Eliya

Mose ne Alona ne bakelenge ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele bakabala bana balume ba Bena Kohata ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ba bidimu makumi asatu to ne ku makumi atanu, muntu yonso wakadi ubuela mu mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena bakabalabo ku meku abo bakadi binunu bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi atanu
Kadi kabivua bitungunuka to
Kadi matumba onsu anayi avua majuke kulu bu nsengu, milamakane pamue ne tshilambuilu
Nanku muaba uvuabu batshinke bua kutupesha neukepele
Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kumbusha anyi kutanakaja muntu, yêye kayi mudiswîle, ne nzuji udi mêyi ne mikandu imupeesha

Kadi yeye neitabushe muan a bute wandi wa mukashi udiye ukina, neamuhe bituha bibidi bia bintu bionso bidiye n abi; bualu bua yeye udi wa tshibangidilu tshia bukole buandi; bintu bia buan a bute mbiandi
Bu muvua Maweja Nangila mubambile, bena Izrayele kumuka bonsu pamue mu tshipela tshia Sine, benda bimana mu njila bua kuya mu Refidime

Hakatangila Delila ne, Yeye wakungambila malu onso a mu mutshima wandi, yeye wakatuma dî, wakabikila bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete, wamba ne, Luai bienu anu musangu eu, bualu bua yeye wakunsokoluela malu onso akadi mu mutshima wandi
Kadi baudile muaba wa tshijila, bualu udi wa tshijila menemene
Bukokeshi bua Amona Kul
Mukelenge wakambila Shimei ne, Wewe kuena utua
Bua tuetu kushilangana ne bisamba bikuabu, anu wewe muikale munkatshi muetu
Hakalua mundankulu, muntu au wakatabuluka, wakandamuka ku luseke lukuabo, ne monai mukashi wakadi mulale ku makasa andi
Nudimuke, kanufidi milambu ya kuosha mu miaba yonso mudi nutangila; kadi muaba udi Yehowa Usungula munkatshi mua bisamba bienu, nenufileku milambu yenu ya kuosha, nenuenzeku mei onso anakunuambila
Wangate mukoku wa tshimpanga muibidi, Arone ne bana bende ba balume batenteka bianza pa mutu pawu kabidi
Nanku Yakobe kuimanyika dibue bu tshivulukilu tshia ndondu wabu

Mu tshihungu tshia bantu tshidi tshitua, bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima ne benyi badi bafuma ku buloba bukuabo, hatangilabo makenga akalua ku buloba abu ne masama onso adi Yehowa mubatumine ne buloba buonso budi bu butue ne luehu ne bintu bioshibue, kabena bakunamu tshintu, kabena bahuolamu tshintu; ne mashinde kaena amenamu: buloba budi buikala bu kubutuka kua misoko ya Sodoma ne Amola ne Adema ne Seboima yakashiha Yehowa mu tshiji tshiandi tshikole; bantu aba bonso nebambe ne, Bualu kai Yehowa wakuenzela buloba ebu nunku
Eliya wakangata mabue dikumi ne abidi, bu bungi bua bisamba bia bana ba Yakoba, wakalelabo kudi Yehowa ne, Isalele ndina diebe
Mayi kubanda, kupita mikuna mile bule bua metre muanda mutekete
Afile kabidi kilo tshitema ya bukula bua mulambu busambakaja ne mafuta, ne tshitupa tshia litre tshia makuabu mafuta
Bana benu ba balume bonso nebamueneke kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Ahila, muana mulume wa Enana, mukelenge wa bana ba Nafatale, wakafua bintu dituku dia dikumi ne abidi
Alona wakasaku, bakamujika; ne Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, wakenza mudimu wandi wa buakuidi
Kuenzaye bintu bia kukuata nabi mudimu ku miendu: nkala ne bintu bia kuela butu
Nenuenzele misoko yonso idi kule, idi kayiyi misoko ya bisamba ebi
Shete kulela muana wa balume, kumuinyika dina dia Enoshe
Davidi wakambila Mikala ne, Nakenza nunku ku mpala kua Yehowa wakansungula ku mpala kua tatu wanyi ne kua bonso ba mu nsubu wandi, wakanteka mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu ba Yehowa, Bena Isalele mene
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi, ne bua wewe ukume dikasa dimpe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha
Bikala mukashi kayi muonyibue, kadi yeye udi muakane, nunku yeye neikale mubingishibue, nealele bana
Bisamba bionsu bitumbishe bantu ba Maweja Nangila
Bantu bakalua ne milambu ya kumusakidila n ai; bantu bakasua kuenza nunku mu mitshima yabo bakalua ne milambu ya kuosha kabidi

Nuitabushe balue ne mai, nuvuwe makasa enu, nuikishe bienu mu diledi dia mutshi, nendue ne bintu bia kudia bikese, nukoleshe mitshima yenu hashishe nudi mua kuhita, bualu bua nuenu nuakulua kudi muntu wenu Bakamuambila ne, Enza biebe bu muwakuamba

Hanuatangila malenda au, nuvuluke mikenji ya Yehowa, nuyenze, kanulondi mitshima yenu ne mesu enu adi anuenzesha malu a masandi, nuenu nuvuluke mikenji yanyi yonso, nuyenze, nuikale bantu ba tshijila kudi Nzambi wenu
Nanku padi matuku a kudilongolola ku buvyele akumbana, bua muana wa balume, nansha bua wa bakaji uvuaye mulele, mukaji awu aye kudi mutuangaji, imanyine ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Yehowa Udi Usungila Hezikiya Hezikiya mukelenge, ne Yeshaya muprofete, muana wa Amoza, bakalomba Nzambi bua bualu ebu, bakadila kudiye mu diulu
Bikalamu bantu bakane makumi atanu kakuiyi bantu batanu, neushihe musoko wonso bualu bua bantu batanu kabayiku, anyi
Moshe kuenza bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Mvidi Mukulu kumvua dilomba dia Leya
Nowa mayi ku makasa, nulale
Kumpala eku kutshidi bidimu bikuabu bitanu, bidi bantu kabayi mua kudima nansha kunowa

Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, wakadi ku mutu kua masalayi andi onso; Yehoshafata, muana wa Ahiluda, wakadi mufundi wa malu a tshisamba; Sadoka, muana wa Ahituba, ne Abimeleke, muana wa Ebeyatâ, bakadi bakuidi; Shawesha wakadi secrétaire; Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakadi ku mutu kua Bena Kelete ne Bena Pelete; bana balume ba Davidi bakadi tuhita ha buihi ne mukelenge
Butuku, divuba adi divua dikenka bu kapia too ne muatshiabu
Mionji ya maluvu a mvinyo neikale miaba yonsu, nansha muntu usuikaku nyama wa mpunde ki mbualu to
Bukokeshi bua Yotama Kul
Maweja Nangila kuambuluisha bena Izrayele
Mose wakalua ne bana balume ba Alona, wakabaluatshisha tuzaku, wakabasuika ne mikaba, wakabasa bifulu ku mitu yabo, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bobo bakamba dî dimpe
Kadi, diba dia kunowa, nufile tshia bitanu tshimue tshia bintu abi kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Mu dituku adi mene Palo wakela di kudi tuhita tua bantu ne tupitene tuabo ne, Kanulu bantu bisonsa bia kuenza n abi tushola bu munuakenza diambedi, bobo badikebele bisonsa
Mu ngondu wa Abibe unuvua bapatuke mu Ejipitu, nuikale nuenza tshibilu tshia dipatuka dienu

Nenufile diatshimue ne mulambu wa bukula wa bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha busangisha ne manyi, mulambu wa kutua dihembu dimpe muoshile Yehowa, nenufile mulambu wa nvinyo wa kunua wa tshituha tshinai tshia hin
Maweja Nangila udi uyukila ne Moshe Moshe kuambila Maweja Nangila ne: Maweja Nangila unteleje

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi bielela bingenyingenyi bia mêyi a mpetu tukanda mu mushindu udibo bateeka bwa dîyi dilongolodi didibo bâmba mu kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu
Milambu ya kuosha yakalua n ai bantu yakadi balume ba ngombe makumi muanda mutekete ne bimpanga lukama ne mikoko nkama ibidi; yoyo yonso yakadi milambu ya kuoshela Yehowa

Biahikula Muena Lewi nsubu, nunku nsubu wakahanabo ne musoko wa buhianyi buandi nebihingane kudibo halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, bualu bua nsubu ya mu misoko ya Bena Lewi idi buhianyi buabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Uyiteke ku tshitekelu bua itokeshe muaba awu
Yehowa neanuihatshile bena lukuna badi bahika ku mesu kuenu; nebalue kunudi mu nshila umue, nebanyeme ku mesu kuenu mu nshila muanda mutekete
Mai adi aluhuka mu milondo yandi, bana bandi nebikale munkatshi mua mai a bungi, mukelenge wandi neahite Agaga bunene, bukelenge buandi nebutumbishibue

Tatu wa mushikankunde neambile bakulu ne, Nakafila muan anyi kudi mulume eu bu mukashi wandi, ne yeye udi umukina; yeye wakambila bakuabo mei a bundu ne, Tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi muana webe; kadi ebi mbimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama
Bua tshinyi kuena mungambile ne: Sarayi mmukajebe
Katuena mua kupeta muntu mukuabu udi mupite Yozefe to
Nanku, malaba pa diba edi, nendokeshe mvula mukole wa mabue, udi kayi muanji kuloka mu ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu too ne mpindiewu

Anu Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakadi mushale wa Bena Lefa; monai, bulalu buandi buakadi bua biamu; budi mu Laba wa Bena Amona: bule buabu buakadi coudées tshitema ne butshiama buabu buakadi coudées mai
Ewu ke mulambu wa kukobolola nawu batuangaji
Abashaloma wakelela bantu bandi mukenji ne, Nutangile Amenona bimpe ne hasanka mutshima wandi mu kukuatshika kua maluvu
Aba mbana balume ba Hama ku meku abo ne ku nuaku yabo ne ku maloba abo ne ku bisamba biabo
Wewe neubikile bantu bonso badi ne mitshima ya lungenyi, bantu banakûsha ne lungenyi tente, bua bobo batelele Alona bilulu bia kumujidila, bua yeye ankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Nanku bantu balume bonsu
Yehowa wakumpa mabue au abidi akadi mafunda ne munu wa Nzambi; akadi mafundahu mei onso akanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu
Nunku Muena Lewi wakasomba
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Nanku nansha wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe, nansha bobu bena Levi, kanuakufua to
Ulekele bantu banyi bena Izrayele baye kuntendelela
Tuetu kushisha kunyenga bimenga biende bionsu, kubibutuilamu, kushipa balume, bakaji ne bana

Kadi bantu bahele kabena bikala munkatshi muenu; bualu bua Yehowa neanusankishe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi buenu; binunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu
Bana balume ba Ana: Dishona
Tshiena musue kubalama kabidi to
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen

Bena Gibeona bakatumina Yoshua dî ku tshitudilu tshia ku Gilegala, bamba ne, Kukandi tshianza tshiebe kudi bahika bebe nansha, lua biebe kutudi lubilu, utusungile, utukuatshishe, bualu bua bakelenge bonso ba Bena Amole badi bashikama ku mikuna bakadisangisha bua kutuluisha
Hakadiye umusengelela ne mei andi ku dituku ku dituku, wakamutatshisha, mutshima wandi wakatata tô ne ku lufu

Luta waka mba ne, Kunsengeledi bua meme kukushiya ne bua kuhingana tshikulondi, nenye kuwaya, nendale kuwalala, bantu bebe nebikale bantu banyi ne Nzambi webe neikale Nzambi wanyi, nenfue kuwafua, nenjikibuehu kabidi, bialua tshintu tshikuabo hankatshi hetu bua kutuhandulula, anu lufu nkayalu, Yehowa angenzele muonso muenzeye tô ne ha mutu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Umueneshile Samuele

Nusangishe bantu bonso, ne balume ne bakashi ne bana bakese ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, bua buonso buabo bumue, bayile lungenyi, batshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, batumikile mei onso a mikenji ei; nunku bana babo badi kabayi banze kumanya nebunvue, nebamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku onso anudi nushikama mu buloba bunudi nuya dishiya dia Yadene bua kubuhiana
Bobo badi bamba kunkuma ne mabue
Ku tshitekelu tshia muendu aku kuenzaye kabidi tulongu tukese tunayi, tuikale ne mapu ne bilongu bu mudi mutshi wa amande
Nanku, Maweja Nangila kuandamuna ne: Tuluka, uye kukeba muanenu Arone mu mitanda
Kuluishabu tshitalu tshiende ne mafuta a manananshi bua katshibodi
Anyi biaditshiha muntu lubilu ne mishiku yandi bua kuenza bualu bubi anyi bualu buimpe, biaditshiha muntu lubilu nunku ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, hamanyeye bualu, yeye neahile
Kadi mbamupitshi bukole
Bakashikama hehi ne Yadene, ku Bete yishimota tô ne ku Abele shitima, mu mpata ya Moaba
Pashishe mutuangaji mumane kufua, neapingane kuabu
Yeye wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, kadi kakadi ne mutshima mutoke tô
Diulu dikale ne disanka, buloba busanke kabidi

Pikalabio bienzeka mushindu wa momumwe luseka lukwabo, mwenyi yônso udi usanganyibwa mu njila mululame pa tshipaapu tshia ditunga udi ne tshia kusanka pende ne mapa ne budikadidi bwa momumwe ne bwa mweena Kongu, pa kumbusha mapa a tshidiidi
diteeka dia difutu dia muntu wa kwinshi mu polovensa bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga;
Paudi usumba, nansha usumbisha budimi kudi mukuenu, kumuenzedi bibi to
Nupikule muanabute mulume wa mpunde ku mukoku
Kadi Yoshiya wakahidia kumukoma nyima, wakadifuanyikisha bu mukuabo, bua yeye aluangane n andi, kakitabusha mei a Neko akamuambilabo kudi Nzambi; wakaya kuluangana n andi mu tshibanda tshia Megido
Bobo nebabikile bantu ku mikuna, nebashiheleku milambu ya buakane: bua bobo nebadie bintu bia bungi bia mu mai manene, ne bintu bimpe bidi bisokoma muinshi mua nsenga
Tshibangidilu Izake udi usela Rebeka Abrahame kukola kukulakaja

Nakambila mukelenge kabidi ne, Bitabusha mukelenge, bampe mikanda kudi ba gouverneur badi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, bua bobo bitabushe bua meme kuhitshila mu maloba abo tô ne hanafika ku buloba bua Yuda, ne mukanda mukuabo kudi Asafa, mulami wa metu a mukelenge, bua yeye ampe mabaya a kuenza n au mikamba ya bibi bia nsubu wa mukelenge udi hehi ne nsubu wa Nzambi, ne a lumbu lua musoko, ne a nsubu undi mua kulalamu

Bena Lewi neitabe, nebambile bantu bonso ba mu Isalele ne dî dikole ne: Muntu yonso udi usonga luhingu anyi udi wenza luhingu ne tshiamu tshiakatulabo kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule, udi kujadika mu musokoko, ntshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, udi ne mulau
Nanku meme nembasongakaje ne tshisamba tshia bantu, tshidi katshiyi tshisamba mene

Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kumwangalaja ne kulongesha Dîyi dikulu, Dijadika dia buloba bujima dia mapa a muntu yônso, Bulongolodi bwa beena Aflika butangila mapa a muntu yônso ne a bisamba, pamwe ne ndondo yônso ya munkatshi mwa ditunga ne ya pankatshi pa matunga mikala itangila mapa a muntu yônso ne bukubi bwa muntu yônso pankatshi pa bisamba, ndondo mianyisha mu njila mululame
Kanuakadia mampa, kanua kanua nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Pashishe wambile bena Izrayele, bafile pabu mbuji wa mpumbu kudi Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Moshe kuosha manananshi a tshijila pa tshilambuilu apu, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Osheya, muana wa Nune, wa mu tshisamba tshia Efrayime
Davidi wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso ku Yelushalema bua kuangata mushete wa Yehowa, balue n au ku muaba wakaulongolueleye
Bantu badi ne Buowa Ek
Bobo nebanusombeshe bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nubasombesha bintu; bobo nebikale bu mitu, nuenu nenuikale bu mikila

Nenuenze bu mudibo bamba ha muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nuenu nenutumikile mei onso adibo banuyisha: nenuenze bu mudi mikenji idibo banuyisha, ne bu dilumbulula didibo banuambila; kanusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi mu dî didibo banuambila
Pafikile bankambua benu mu Ejipitu, kabavua bapite ku makumi muanda mutekete to
Nulame mikenji yanyi bimpe, nuyikumbaje
Kanufuishi nsongakaji yenu bundu, panudi nubasaka ku dienda buendenda mu nzubu ya ditendelela mvidie
Muele wa nvita neubashihe ha bula, ne buowa nebubuele mu nsubu yabo; nebashihe bansongalume ne bansongakashi batshidi tumama, ne bana batshidi bamua mabele ne bakulumpe badi ne nvi ku mitu kuabo
Bualu buakalua nunku kudiye; bantu bakamudiata mu makasa ku tshibi, yeye wakafua
Pashishe, oshile munyinyi wa mafuta onsu pa tshilambuilu, bua wikale mulambu udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila

Règlement Recensement Référendum République Sénat Suffrage universel Souveraineté Servitude pénale Sanction Territoire Tourisme Technologie Terrorisme Transition Unité Visa Validation Ndongamu, dilondeshisha dia maalu anyi midimu

Davidi wakambila Gada ne, Ndi hankatshikatshi ha malu makole, ndi nkusengelela bua meme kudishinda mu bianza bia Yehowa, bualu bua luse luandi ludi lunene; kuitabushi bua meme kudishinda mu bianza bia bantu
Bena Izrayele badi baya ku Mowabe Bena Izrayele kumuka muaba awu, kufika ku Obote

Hakahita matuku asatu, dituku adi diakadi dituku dia kuledibua kua Palo, yeye wakalambishila bantu bandi bidia bia disanka, ne yeye Wakabikila kahita ka bana maluvu ne kahita ka bena bidia ku mesu kua bantu bandi
Hanuamana kusabuka Yadene, nenjadike mabue au mu mukuna wa Ebala, nenuashinguile ne nshimete, bu mundi nnuambila lelu
Ndi nkupa tshimanyinu tshidi tshileja ne: Meme ke udi mukutume
Muntu yonso udi uhambuisha muntu mufofo mu nshila udi ne mulau
Kadi uleshe bana balume ba Bâzilai, Muena Gilada, luse: bobo bikale munkatshi mua badi badia ku mesa ebe; bualu bua bobo bakankuatshisha hanakanyema ku mpala kua muan enu Abashaloma
Kànkamana mwena kwanyì, Mutu tudie emu kumutwikale, Bidimu bitu byà kukùdimuka
Pikalaku difwilakana dia bukookeshi pankatshi pa bukalenga bwa kumutu ne polovensa, anu Kabadi kimikila mianda ya Dîyi dikulu kôku nkayaku ke kadi ne bukole bwa kukosa nsambu
Kadi kanuena mua kutuuta mikaba kupitshisha pa makumi anayi to
Nenjadike bukelenge buandi tshiendelele, biananukileye kutumikila mikenji yanyi ne mei anyi bu mudibi lelu
Bena Izrayele kuteka madilu ende matuku makumi asatu mu mpata ya Mowabe

Dibadika Dilaya dia bena Nazire Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe, bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Pikala mulume nansha mukaji ulaya bua kudijidila bu muena nazire, bua kungenzela meme Maweja Nangila mudimu, muntu awu kena mua kunua mvinyo nansha maluvu makole to
Nebamuidike dina mu Isalele ne, Nsubu wa udi ne tshisabata tshiandi tshisulula
Nudi ne mukenji muomumue kudi muenyi ne kudi mundi muledibue mu nsubu yenu bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Nunku bakalekela mifuba yandi ne mifuba ya muprofete wakafuma ku Samalea
Kusuikabu tshitata atshi kumutu kua tshifulu ne mukaba mukunzubile kulu kuatshi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe

Davidi wakamunyenga bantu bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu tshinunu tshimue ne nkama muanda mutekete, ne bakadi benda hanshi binunu makumi abidi; Davidi wakakosa tubalu tuonso mifungu yatu, kadi wakasungula tukuabo bua makalu lukama
Kumuasabu mabue, kumushipa, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Uhiane biebe buloba bua ku dishiha ne bua ku sude
Kuvudi muana mukashi wa muana webe mulume, anyi muana mukashi wa muana webe mukashi bilulu, bobo badi bu wewe mene

Samuele wakambila bantu ne, Kanutshinyi: bulelela, nuakuenza bualu ebu bubi, kadi kanulekedi kulonda Yehowa, kadi nukuatshile Yehowa mudimu ne mitshima yenu yonso; kanusesuki mu nshila mukuabo: binuenza nunku nenulonde bintu bia tshianana bidi kabiyi bimanye mua kunukuatshisha ne kunusungila, bualu bua bidi bia hatuhu
Hakunvueye lumu ne, Bakanyenga mushete wa Nzambi ne lua lufu lua tatu andi muenu ne lua lufu lua bayandi kabidi, yeye wakatantamana, wakalela bualu bua kanyinganyinga kakamukuata
Meme ndi bu wewe, bantu banyi badi bu bantu bebe, tubalu tuanyi tudi bu tubalu tuebe
Bualu ebu buakadi bujitu bukole kudi Abalahama bualu bua muana wandi mulume

Yehowa wakasomba n enu mpala ha mpala ha mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, Meme nakimana hankatshi henu ne Yehowa tshikondo atshi, bua kunulesha dî dia Yehowa; nuenu nuakatshina bualu bua kahia, kanuakabanda ku mukuna; yeye wakamba ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Pakumonaye neasanke
Ke mikenji idi itangila bintu bikuate butu, nansha biobi bienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha bienza ne ndanda, nansha bilamba bikuabu bia pambidi, nansha bienza ne biseba
Patupu netufue

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshidi tshipeepeja bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene anyi bwa umwe wa ku beena Bukalenga bunene pa disungula dia mukanda wa dianyisha anyi dia mukanda wa didiombola
Levi uvua ne bana balume basatu: Ngershone, Kekate ne Merari
Nunku Davidi wakitabusha bintu bakalueye n abi kudiye mu bianza biandi; yeye wakamuambila ne, Uye biebe ku nsubu kuebe talalâ; mona, nakunvua dî diebe, nakukuitabusha
Naomi wakambila bamamuen andi babidi ne, Yai bienu, nuhingane mukuabo ku nsubu wa mamu wandi, mukuabo ku nsubu wa mamu wandi, Yehowa anuenzele malu a kalolo bu munuakenzela ba mufu ne meme kabidi
Nsongakaji awu kuimita difu, kulela muana wa balume
Bantu bonso ba ha buloba nebamanye ne, Nuenu nudi nubikidibua ku dina dia Yehowa; bobo nebanutshine
Hanuasa nsubu muhia muhia, nenuenze kabidi lumbu tukese ku mutu kua nsubu, nunku muntu kahonyi hanshi, ne mashi andi kaikadi ku nsubu yenu
Kutshisokokaye mu malenga avua ku muelelu wa musulu wa Nile
Mukenji ewu ushale kashidi
Yehu wakamba ne, Bikala bualu ebu mu mitshima yenu, muntu kumuki mu musoko hua kuambeye bualu ebu mu Yizelele
Kadi kavua ku tshisumbu tshia Kora ne bantu bende, bavua batombokela Maweja Nangila to
Seguba wakalela Yaî, wakadi ne misoko makumi abidi ne isatu mu buloba bua Gilada
Au mmeku a bana balume ba Efelayima, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama itanu Aba mbana balume ba Yosefe ku meku abo

Mukalu wabo wakadi Helekata ne Hali ne Betena ne Akasafa ne Alameleke ne Amada ne Mishala; Wakafika ku Kâmele ku wesete ne ku Shihô libenata; wakanyunguluka ku Bete dagona kudi kuhatukila diba, wakafika ku Zebuluna ne ku tshibanda tshia Yifetahele ku Bete emeke ne Niele; wakahatukila ku Kabula ku tshianza tshia bakashi, ne Ebelona ne Lehoba ne Hamona ne Kana tô ne ku Sidona, musoko munene; mukalu wakanyunguluka ku Lama ne ku musoko wa Tulo wakadi ne lumbu; mukalu wakanyunguluka ku Hosa; wakahatukila kukala kua mai manene ku luseke lua Akiziba; ne Uma kabidi ne Afeke ne Lehobo; bimenga makumi abidi ne bibidi ne misoko yabi

Bungi bua matuku atuakalala mu nshila ku Kadeshe bânea tô ne ku kasulu ka Zelede akadi bidimu makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu; tô ne hakafua mulongo wonso wa bena nvita munkatshi mua tshitudilu, bu muakabalaya Yehowa
Dutelonone Mose Udi Uvudishila Bisamba bia Bena Isalele Masanka Â mmasanka akavudishila Mose, muntu wa Nzambi, Bena Isalele, diambedi yeye kayi muanze kufua
Nunku bantu bakatandangana ne Mose, bakamba ne, Utuhe mai a kunua Mose wakabambila ne, Nudi nutandangana n anyi bualu kai
Abalama wakatahulula bantu bandi, wakatuangana n abo butuku, yeye ne bahika bandi bakabatamba bukole, wakabihata to ne ku Hoba, udi ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia Damaseke
Abrahame mumane kufua, Izake kuya kusomba pabuipi ne tshiina tshia mayi tshia Lahayi Royi
Nunku ujikemu tshitalu
Lotane uvua mulele Ori ne Emame
Tuyaya mu tshipela, tuenze luendu lua matuku asatu bua kulambula Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu milambu idiye musue
Solomo wakamba ne, Bienzeye malu a kalolo, lusuki lumue lua ku mutu kuandi kaluena luhona hanshi; kadi bikaleye ne malu mabi munda muandi, neafue
Hakatangila mutuadi wa ngabu wandi ne Shaula wakafua, yeye kabidi wakatula muele wandi wa nvita, wakadituaku, wakafua n andi

Lisepa, muana mukashi wa Aya, wakangata tshilulu tshikayabala, wakatshibikila ha mutu ha dibue ku tshibangidilu tshia kunowa tô ne hakabalokela nvula ya mu diulu; yeye kakitabusha bua nyunyu yikilehu mu munya, anyi bua nyama ya mu tshisuku isemene ha buihi butuku
Kadi Amasaya kakitabusha
Bakelenge Nsubu Mikuabo ya Solomo Solomo wakibaka nsubu wandi; hakaleha bidimu dikumi ne bisatu, wakamana nsubu wandi mujima
Ku tunyama tukese tudi tuenda panshi, numanye ne: tudi ne mikiya tudi nunku: tshibulebule, mpuku, misodi ya mishindu yonsu, dibula mutshi, dimemba, tshimpulumunzu, lomba ne lungonyonyi
Nemvudije dikenga dienu tshiakabidi misangu muanda mutekete
Utshiteke kumpala kua mushete wa ndondu
Yehowa wakamujika mu tshibanda tshia buloba bua Moaba tshiakatangilangana ne Bete peô; kakuena muntu udi mumanye kudi lukita luandi tô ne ku dituku edi
Yosefe wakamba ne, Numpe bimuna bienu, nennuhe bia kudia ku bimuna bienu bikale argent yenu mishike
Wewe newangate tshimpanga tshikuabo, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha tshimpanga

Hakunvueye lumu ne, Tîhaka, mukelenge wa Atiopa, ulualua bua kuluangana n ebe, wakatuma ba messager kudi Hezikiya kabidi ne, Nuambile Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne, Nzambi webe ûdi weyemena kakudingi nansha ne, Kabena bafila musoko wa Yelushalema mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû

Bualu bua buloba bunuyaya kuhiana kabuena bu buloba bua Ejipitu munuakumuka, bunuakakuna ntete yenu, nuakayimiamina mai nuendakana ku makasa, bu tshibanda tshia midioko; kadi buloba bunuyaya kuhiana mbuloba bua mikuna ne bibanda, buloba ebu budi bumina mai a nvula ya mu diulu, buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ulama; mesu a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, atu atangila ha buloba abu ku tshibangidilu tshia tshidimu tô ne kunshikidilu kuatshi
Yehowa wakabambila ne, Nubaluishe
Mmudileje nanku diba divua bena Ejipitu bakengeshe bena Izrayele bikole
Dikuata dia bantu Pikala muena Izrayele mukuate muanabu, mumulame bu mupika, nansha mumupane, mbimpe kushipa mukuatshianganyi awu
Nunku nenuikale ne mukelenge haluhukeye ne habueleye

Mbulamatadi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi mwa kupeta ne kwenza mudimu,ushindika ne udi umwepula ku dipangila dia mudimu, ne kabidi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi ne tshia kupeta difutu dilelela ne dikumbana bwa kumwambulwisha yêye ne dîku diende, bwa kwikala ne ngikadilu ulonda mushinga wa bumuntu, ngikadilu mukumbaja kudi mishindu mikwabo yônso ya dikuba dia majinga a bantu, bu mudi pansio wa bujika ngondu ne pansio wa kashidi
Kadi Wambile Yoshua dî, ushindike mutshima wandi, umukoleshe; bualu bua yeye neasabuke ku mpala kua bantu aba, neabahianyishe buloba budi utangila
Ba munkatshi mua Bena Shimeona bena nvita ba bukitu bakadi binunu muanda mutekete ne lukama
Tshilambuilu etshi netshikale tshijidila, tshikale muaba wa tshijila menemene

Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakajuka hanshi, wakimana ku makasa andi, wakamba ne, Unvuai, bana betu ne bantu banyi; meme nakadi ne bualu mu mutshima wanyi bua kuibakila mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa nsubu wa kuikisha ne tshitekelu tshia muinshi mua makasa a Nzambi wetu; nakabanga kulongolola bintu bia kuasa n abi nsubu
Ebu kambualu bua hatuhu kunudi; kadi budi muoyo wenu, budi buvudisha matuku enu mu buloba bunuyaya kuhiana dishiya dia Yadene
Hashishe Palô wakatabala Wakalala tulu kabidi, wakalota tshiota tshikuabo, wakamona miehu ya mponda muanda mutekete minene, miakane idiundile ku lubalabala lumue
Biwangata tshilulu tshia mukuenu bu tshieya, wewe neutshihingashe kudiye diambedi diba kadiyi dianzekubuela, bualu bua tshiotshi tshidi anu tshiandi tshia kudibuikila n atshi, yeye nealale tulu munyi
Bakafuma ku nsubu wa Abinadaba, wakadi ku mutu kua mukuna, ne mushete wa Nzambi; Ahio wakadi wenda ku mpala kua mushete
Tuakanyenga misoko yandi yonso ku tshikondo atshi, katuakashiya musoko umue; tuakanyenga misoko makumi asambombo, ne luseke tuonso lua Âgoba, bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana
Tuakabajimisba, bu munuakenzela Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona; tuakahaula misoko yonso yakadi ne bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese
Kulembelejaye tshilamba mu mushiku wa mbelu wa lupangu alu

Hashishe bûdi n abu mbua kuya ku mukuna wa Nzambi, kudi masalayi a Bena Peleshete; hawafika ha buihi ne musoko, neusangile ne tshisumbu tshia baprofete bafume ku mutu kua mukuna badi ne lunzenze lua nshinga dikumi ne dizele ne lushiba ne tshisanji; bobo mene nebikale bamba dî dia Nzambi
Bena Midiyana, bendi ba mushinga bakahita, ba kahatula Yosefe mu mukela, bakamuhanyisha Bena Yishemaele ku bituha bia argent makumi abidi
Luseke lua ku mutu, lupangu luvua anu bule bumue
Bienzedi bia Bâsha bikuabo ne malu onso akenzeye ne bukole buandi kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi
Wakamba ne, Benze nunku tshiakabidi; bakenza nunku tshiakabidi
Yehowa neanuihatshile bena lukuna badi bahika ku mesu kuenu; nebalue kunudi mu nshila umue, nebanyeme ku mesu kuenu mu nshila muanda mutekete
Tuakabika ku Holeba, tuakenda tô mu tshihela atshi tshinene tshibi tshinuakatangila, ku nshila wa ku mikuna ya Bena Amole, bu muakatuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakalua ku Kadeshe bânea
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuelela mukenji lelu bua nuenu nuenze mikenji ei ne mei au; nunku nubienze ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso
Muntu yonso udi uhidia kunvua mei anyi adiye wamba mu dina dianyi, meme nenkose tshilumbu tshiandi
Bena Iti kujadikilabu bantu bonsu bavua ku tshibuelelu tshia tshimenga ne: muaba udi Abrahame musumbe washadi mu dina diende
Pamona mutuangaji ne: boya bua muaba awu kabuena butokoloke, kabidi tshibangu katshiena tshiondoke, tshibangu atshi tshidi anu tshimpe, neateke muntu awu pa nkayende matuku muanda mutekete
Yeye udi musue kubuesha Bena Isalele mu bualu bubi bishi
Bukokeshi bua Yehoshafata Kul
Mutshima wanyi, enda ne bukole

Ahaza wakasangisha mpanza yonso yakadi mu nsubu wa Nzambi, wakataha mpanza ya mu nsubu wa Nzambi bituha bituha, wakinshila bibi bia ku nsubu wa Yehowa; wakashila bioshelu mu miaba yonso ya mu Yelushalema
Abinê wakambila Asahele tshiakabidi ne, Usesuke, lekela kundonda; bundi n abu mbua kukushiha, anyi
Nubenge tshiendenda
Tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Eliaba muana mulume wa Helona neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Zebuluna
Unvuai, Isalele, nubienze; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nukumbane ba bungi, bu muakanulaya Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu, mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Nunku Mose, muinu wa Yehowa, wakafua mu buloba bua Moaba muakamba Yehowa
Kadi Amore kuambila Yakobe ne bana bende ne: Bu mudi muananyi Shekeme munange muanenu wa bakaji ne muoyi mujima, anyishayi amusele
Ku mulambu onsu wa bia mu madimi udi mutuangaji ulambula Maweja Nangila, kena mua kudia kantu nansha kamue to
Mvidi Mukulu kumona ne bionsu bidi bimpe

Kadi bikala mulume usangakena ne mushikankunde udi mubangila kudi mulume mukuabo mu budimi, udi umuakuata ku bukole, udi ulala n andi, anu mulume wakalala n andi neafue biandi; kadi kanuenji mushikankunde bualu; yeye kena muenze bualu bubi budibo mua kumushihela; bualu ebu budi bu muntu udi uhika ku mpala kua muena mutumba n andi udi umushiha; bualu bua yeye wakasangakena n andi mu budimi; ne mushikankunde mubangila kudi mukuabo wakadila, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kumusungila
Bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Bobo nebafue mu tshihela
Hakatshiabu, yeye wakaluhuka, wakimana, wakambila bantu bonso ne, Nuenu nudi bakane; meme nakelela mukelenge wanyi tshifufu, nakamushiha; kadi wakashiha bonso aba nganyi
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku disatu
Nuambile bantu bonso ba mu Isalele ne, Mu dituku dia dikumi dia ngondo eu muntu ne muntu asungule muana wa mukoko ku nsubu ya batatu abo, muana wa mukoko ku nsubu muana wa mukoko ku nsubu
Yehowa wakamueneka mu Ntenta mu difutu: difutu diakimana ku mutu kua tshibi tshia Ntenta

Kudi dinyanga dia lumu anyi diupula dia mushinga wa ditunga bu mudi dîba didi lwendu lwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga anyi lwa Minisitila wa Kavulambedi lubengangana ne bibidilu bia mulowu anyi padibo babajadikila ne badi bênza, bênza pamwe anyi bambulwisha bakwabo mu ditulakaja dibi dia lupetu, dibwejilangana anyi dineema dikandikibwe
Yakobe katshivua umona bimpe to, bualu ukavua muntu mukole
Wakahita bantu bonso lungenyi: wakahita Etenana, Muena Ezele, ne Hemana ne Kalakola ne Dâda, bana ba balume ba Mahola, lungenyi luakane; butumbi buandi buakamuangalaka bisamba bionso
Mu tshikondo atshi nakanuambila malu onso anudi ne bualu bua kuenza
Dutelonone Buloba Buimpe bua Kuhiana Nuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, nukumbane, nubuelemu bua kuhiana buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu
Nuvua badienzele lupingu lua kana ka ngombe ka tshiamu
Bilamba bikuabu bia batuangaji Muntumpu wa Arone wikale onsu mujima wa tshilamba tshikunzubile
Bena Izrayele kuambula biakudia abi

Binuahidia kutumikila mei onso a mikenji idi mifunda mu mukanda eu, bua nuenu nutshine dina edi dia butumbi ne ditshina ne, YEHOWA, NZAMBI WENU; hashishe Yehowa neanuenzele masama a kukema ne bana badi banulonda; masama makole neashale kunudi musangu mule ne makenga manene neashale kunudi musangu mule kabidi
Bana balume ba Shimeona ku meku abo Nemuele ne meku a Bena Nemuele, Yamina ne meku a Bena Yamina, Yakina ne meku a Bena Yakina, Sela ne meku a Bena Sela, Shaula ne meku a Bena Shaula
Tuakahaula bintu ku luseke lua Sude lua Bena Kelete ne lua Bena Yuda ne lua Kaleba; luakosha Sikelaga ne kahia
Nanku bavua bajula mitanda, bayasa tshiakabidi amu ku diyi dia Maweja Nangila
Ba Bena Shilona: Asaya, muan a bute wandi ne bana bandi ba balume
Bantu abu, nebanusombeshe makuta, nuenu kanutshiyi ne tshia kubasombesha to
Nunku Mose wakahueka kudi bantu, wakabamanyisha
Nanku, minyinyi yonsu ya mu mayi idi kayiyi ne misalala nansha ne mamba, kanuena mua kuyidia to
Bavua bengulule kilo
Mvidi Mukulu kumvua muadi wa muana
Nanku nemmuenzeje malu ku bukole
Yozefe kubakonka ne: Lelu nudi babungame nenku bua tshinyi
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Kabakadi ne kuhita kua Yehowa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bu eku, katshia mu matuku a Samuele muprofete; bakelenge bakuabo kabakadi ne kuhita kua Yehowa bu eku kuakenza Yoshiya ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi, ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Isalele bakadiku, ne bantu ba mu Yelushalema
Yuda ne bana babo bakalua ku nsubu wa Yosefe, yeye wakadiku, bakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua ndi
Kuendi tshiendenda
Panudi nundambula mulambu wa bobumue, bua kukumbaja bualu bunuvua balaye, nansha bunuvua badisuile, nengitabe mulambu wa bimuna binene ne bikese
Nunku bika biebe ne dinda dionso, ne bantu ba mukelenge webe bakatua n ebe: ne hanuabika ne dinda dionso, ne hatoka hanshi, nuye
Nebajadike mudi makenga aa abenzekela, bualu meme Mvidi Mukulu tshiena kabidi munkatshi muabu
Bena Isalele bonso ku Dana tô ne ku Bê sheba bakamanya ne Samuele wakadi mujadikibue bu muprofete wa Yehowa
dikuba dia bantu mu ditunga;
Yakoba wakangata mitshi mibishi ya peuplier ne ya amande ne ya platane, wakubula bihusu bibaka bitoke, wakamuenesha bibaka bitoke bia mitshi

Yeye udi udianjila kudisunguila tshituha tshiandi, bualu bua etshi ntshituha tshia mukokeshi, wakalua n atshi kudi ba ku mutu kua bantu; yeye udi ujadika dilumbulula diakane dia Yehowa, ne mikenji yandi kudi Bena Isalele
Kumukeye mu nsubu wandi, yeye udi mua kuikala mukashi wa munga muntu
Mulau wa Buihi Matuku akakumbana muanda mutekete ku nyima kua dituta dia mai a mu musulu kudi Yehowa
Numumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele, bualu kavua musue kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu pa diba diayi
Bana ba balume ba Hananiya: Pelatiya ne Yeshaya; muan andi wa balume Lefaya, muan andi wa balume Anana, muan andi wa balume Obadiya, muan andi wa balume Shekaniya
Ku mulambu wa ngombe yonsu, nenusakidile mulambu wa maluvu a mvinyo litre isatu, ku mukoku wa tshimpanga, mvinyo litre ibidi, ku wa muana wa mukoku, mvinyo litre umue ne tshitupa
Kadi nudi mua kulambula milambu eyi, anu mu tshimenga tshikala Maweja Nangila musungule bua nuenu kumonangana nende
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mulambu wa bobumue Padi muena Izrayele ulambula ngombe bu mulambu wa bobumue, ngombe awu ikale mulume nansha mukaji, kayi bulema
Dituku dia muanda mukulu diakadi dia disangisha dia tshijila; bualu bua bakadi bajidila tshioshelu matuku muanda mutekete, ne bakadia bidia bia disanka matuku muanda mutekete
Bikala tshintu tshikese tshia munyinyi wa tshijila anyi tshia bidia bishale tô ne ku dinda, wewe neutshioshe mu kahia, kabatshidi, bualu bua tshidi tshia tshijila

Muakuidi neangate umue wa bana balume ba mikoko, neamufile bu mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne dikoho dia manyi, neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa; yeye neashihe muana mulume wa mukoko kudibo bashihela milambu ya kubindila n ai bubi ne mulambu ya kuosha ha kahia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, mulambu wa disatu buka dia mikenji udi mulambu wa muakuidi bu mudi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila
Kadi, bena Perese bavua basangisha kabidi diku dia bena Esrone, ndelanganyi ya Esrone; ne dia bena Amule, ndelanganyi ya Amule

Nzambi atambe kuela Abinê mulau binahanga kuenzela Davidi malu onso akamulaya Yehowa; bua kunyenga bukelenge mu nsubu wa Shaula ne bua kujadika nkuasa wa butumbi wa Davidi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda ku Dana tô ne ku Bê sheba
Yehu Udi Ushiha Ahazaya Bak

Hashishe Yefeta wakasangisha Bena Gilada bonso, bakaluangana ne Bena Efelayima; Bena Gilada bakashiha Bena Efelayima, bualu bua bobo bakamba ne, Nuenu Bena Gilada nudi banyemi ba Efelayima ba munkatshi mua Bena Efelayima ne ba munkatshi mua Bena Manashe
Bualu bua Yehowa wakasungula Bena Lewi munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kunuenzela mudimu mu dina dia Yehowa, ne yeye ne bana bandi balume tshiendelele
Nkadi mumane kumufila mu bianza biebe, yeye ne bantu bende bonsu, kabidi ne ditunga diende dijima

Angata muana mulume wa ngombe ne bimpanga bibidi bidi biakane, ne mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, ne mikata idi kayiyi ne luevene misangisha ne manyi, ne tukata luhehele ludi katuyi ne luevene tudi ne manyi mela ha mutu, ubilambe ne bukula buakane bua blé
Nunku meme tshiakakuenzela bibi, kadi wewe udi ungenzela meme bibi bua kuluangana n anyi; Yehowa, Mulumbuluishi, ikale mulumbuluishi hankatshi ha Bena Isalele ne Bena Amona lelu
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kadi kakenza bu muakenza tatu wandi ne mamu wandi; bualu bua yeye wakumusha luhingu lua Bâla luakenza tatu wandi
Bobo bakambila Yoshua ne, Bulelela, Yehowa wakadia buloba buonso mu bianza bietu; ne bualu bukuabo kabidi, bena buloba bonso badi batekete teketê ku mpala kuetu
Wakadi ne bakashi nkama muanda mutekete, bana ba bakelenge ne bakashi bahika bakabakeye nkama isatu; bakashi bandi bakakudimusha mutshima wandi
Vulukai, kanuhu muoyo bu munuakafuisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiji mu tshihela; ku dituku dinuakahatuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu tô ne hanuakafika ku muaba eu, nuakahidia Yehowa

Kanuikadi ne kansungusungu hanualumbulula bilumbu; nunvue dî dia muntu mukese ne dia muntu munene muomumue; kanutshinyi mpala wa muntu; bualu bua kulumbulula kua bilumbu kudi kua Nzambi: tshilumbu tshidi tshihita bukole, nulue n atshi kundi, meme nentshiunvue
Ku Tabela ne Masa ne Kibelota hatawa nuakafuisha Yehowa tshiji
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuihatshile bisamba abi ku mpala kuenu bituha bituha: kanubashihi tshikondo tshimue, bualu bua nyama ya muitu neyikumbane munkatshi muenu
Alona nêle mbushi ei ibidi nshobo, biakuata nshobo umue, ngua Yehowa, ne biakuata nshobo mukuabo, ngua Azazele

Wewe wakatangila dikenga dia bankambua betu mu Ejipitu, wakunvua muadi wabo kukala kua mai a Dishiba Dikunze, wakalesha Palô ne bena mudimu bandi ne bantu bandi bonso bimanyinu ne malu a kukema, bualu bua wewe wakamanya ne, Bobo bakadi bafunyina batatu betu bulobo, ne wewe wakangata dina dinene bu mudi n adi lelu
Kadi munyinyi wa ngombe awu uvua mushale, tshiseba, bia munda ne bunyawu, Moshe kumuka nabi mu mitanda, kuya kubiosha amu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Bidimu bia Adame pa buloba bidi nkama tshitema ne makumi asatu
Nuvuluke ngondo wa Abiba bua kutendelela kuhita kua Yehowa wenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu butuku mu ngondo wa Abiba
Bualu buloba bujima mbuanyi meme
Yehowa wakambila tshisumbu tshienu tshionso mei â ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, mu difutu dinene, ne mu midima mikole ne dî dikole; kena usangisha mei makuabo ha mutu
Yozefe uvua musangishe ntete ya kuenza bukula mipite bungi, bu lusenga lua ku muelelu wa mayi, ludi muntu kayi mua kubala to
Yeye neikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bu muvuaye mumane kunulaya, muditshipe kabidi kudi bankambua benu, Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe

Kadi yeye neitabushe muan a bute wandi wa mukashi udiye ukina, neamuhe bituha bibidi bia bintu bionso bidiye n abi; bualu bua yeye udi wa tshibangidilu tshia bukole buandi; bintu bia buan a bute mbiandi
Newenze nunku: ubamiamine mayi bua kubakobolola nawu
Yeye wakafunda ha mabue, bu muakafundeye diambedi, mikenji dikumi yakanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu; Yehowa wakumpau

Miehu muanda mutekete mikese yakadi mifubidile ku luhehele luakafuma ku esete, yakadiundila kuinshi kua mikuabo, ne miehu nukese yakadia miehu muanda mutekete miakane, meme nakatshiawila benu majimbu, kadi nansha umue wabo wakamanya mua kutshinjinguluila
Maweja Nangila ne: Meme musangane bantu bakane makumi asatu, tshiakubutula tshimenga

Bakenza nkanu yonso ya makunshi ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, kadi bitubuidi bia makunshi biakadi bia tshiamu tshia argent, wakalengesha mitu ya makunshi onso ne tshiamu tshia argent, ne makunshi onso a luhangu akadi malengesha ne tshiamu tshia argent
Hashishe umue wabo wakamba ne, Tatu webe wakukandika bantu ne mutshihu ne, Muntu udi udia lelu udi ne mulau
Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, wakadi ne lungenyi munda muandi tente bualu bua Mose wakamutentekasha bianza biandi; ne Bena Isalele bakunvua di diandi, bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nuenu ba bisamba bionso, sankai ne bantu bandi, bualu bua yeye nealombe mashi a bantu bandi, neasombuele badi n andi lukuna, udi umusha dihila dia buloba ne dia bantu bandi

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakatuadishila disanka mu malu onso anuakenza ne tshianza tshienu; yeye wakamanya ngendu yenu mu tshihela etshi tshinene; mu bidimu ebi makumi anai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakadi n enu; kanuakakengela tshintu

dienza dia ndongamu wa mianda ya madimi, ya meetu ne ya nzembu idi yambulwisha Ditunga dijima ne ditwangaja dia ndongamu idi yambulwisha polovensa; biâpu bia bia pa madimi ne bishimikidi bidi bifwanangana pamwe ne diabanya dia beenji ba mudimu bilondeshila mukanda mulongolodi wa ngikadilu wa beena mudimu ba mbulamatadi bashindame
Nuenu Bena Isalele, kanuluanganyi ne Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu; bualu bua kanuena mua kumuhita bukole
Kunuishaye ne tumelu tuanyi
Nyama wa lonji mmumudie, mumusunsule
Moshe kuandamuna Maweja Nangila ne: Bantu kabena mua kusemena pabuipi ne mukuna wa Sinayi to
Mukalu wabo wa ku wesete wakadi mai manene
Wewe newenze mesa a mutshi wa acacia buludi buau nebuikale coudées ibidi, ne butshiama buau nebuikale coudée umue, ne bule buau bua mulu nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha
Nulue kudi muakuidi wa mu matuku au, numuambile ne, Ndi nkuambila lelu ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ne, Nakubuela mu buloba buakaiaya Yehowa batatu betu, bua kutuhabu
Moshe kuenza nyoka wa tshiamu tshikunze, kumulembelejaye kulu
Bakafunda bifuanyikishi bia tumuma tukese tua grenade ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso
Bualu bua meme ndi mumanye kutomboka kuenu ne tshitshu tshienu: monai, hantshidi ne muoyo munkatshi muenu lelu, nuakumana kutombokela Yehowa; nenutambe kutomboka ku nyima kua lufu luanyi
Shaula ne muan andi wa balume Yonatana ne bantu hakadibo n abo bakashala mu Geba wa mu buloba bua Benyamina; kadi Bena Peleshete bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo mu Mikemasha

Kadi misoko ya bantu aba idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuhayi bua nuenu kuyihiana, kanusungidi tshintu tshimue tshidi tshieyela muhuya; kadi nenubishihe bionso: ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; bua bobo kabanuyishi mua kulonda malu mabi abo, adibo benzela nzambi yabo; nunku nuenu nenuenzele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bibi
Ke mulambu wa dinua tshibalu
Kanuhu Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu muoyo; bualu bua yeye kena ne tshituha tshiandi ne buhianyi buandi kunudi

Nakangata bualu bubi bunuakenza, kana ka ngombe mene, nakakosha ne kahia, nakakadiata munda mua dikasa, nakakabotesha bu dinfuenkenya dia buloba: nakela dinfuenkenya diaku mu kasulu kakadi kafuma ku mukuna
Yeye wakafunda ha mabue abidi, wakampau

Yehowa neanuhadishe, neanutumme bufofo, nenufue mikemu mu mitshima yenu; nenububute munda munya bu mudi muntu mufofo ububuta mu midima; kanuena nuenda dikasa dimpe mu nshila yenu, nebanutatshishe, nebanuibe, kakuena muntu udi mua kunusungila
Yetro kusanka bikole bua bilenga bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muenzele bena Izrayele bua kubapatula mu bupika bua bena Ejipitu

Yehowa neanumuangalashe munkatshi mua bantu bonso ku ditengu edi dia buloba tô ne ku ditengu dikuabo; nenukuatshileku nzambi mikuabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue mudimu, mudi kanuyi bamanye, ne bankambua benu kabakayimanya kabidi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: imanyisha kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Padi muntu ulambula Maweja Nangila nyama wa mulambu wa bobumue, neapeshe Maweja Nangila bidi bimutangila
